story:
Ninja EDC was started by college students that were low on cash but love EDC tools for utility, survival, and safety on and off campus.  We are here on Indiegogo to grow our EDC community and get feedback on what products to focus on, and test run our FREE Rewards Program.

Our Unique FREE Rewards Program makes it easy to earn freebies and discounts with Every 500 points = $5 that can used to pay for any of our products.  Lifetime membership on NinjaEDC.com is FREE, with automatic signup for the Rewards program. We start you with 200 points, and 200 more on your birthday!  You earn more points simply by sharing links of our products with friends and family.  No Purchase Required!

Members also get FREE MONEY to spend on NinjaEDC.com.  For instance, during the month of May, they can use coupon code May5 and get $5 off - no minimum purchase required! 

Keychain, Wallet, and Pocket Tools

Bags, Wallets, and Mobile Technology

Every supporter of this Indiegogo campaign will get automatic signup for the Rewards program, and get $5 to spend no matter how many points you have.

Vote with your $ on the following products to help us decide which products to focus on.  The prices here are even lower than the discount prices on NinjaEDC.com.  They will start shipping in June. 

Get $8 Keychain Charging Cable just for sharing our campaign.  Click here or on the picture below, you will be redirected to tweet or post about our campaign. Afterwards, you will be directed to our Secret Perk to pay $1 for S & H.

FREE EDC Tool or Spinner* - just pay $3 S & H

* Get 3 FREE Spinners - Pay $6 Shipping and Handling

 

  • A. Ninja Key 6-in-1 Survival Tool
  • B. 11-in-1 Wallet EDC Survival Tool Card
  • C. Aluminum Water Bottle Clip and Carabiner
  • D. 6-in-1 Mini Keychain Pry Bar Tool
  • E. T Shaped Keychain Wrench Screwdriver Tool

FREE EDC Tool - just pay $5 S & H

  • F. 10-in-1 Pocket Tool with 4 Screwdriver Bits
  • G. Keychain Wrench with 4 Screwdriver Bits and LED Light
  • H. Keychain Mini EDC Tool with 2 Screwdriver Bits
  • I.  Keychain Skull EDC Tool Pry Bar, Bottle Opener, and Wrench
  • J. Pocket Wrench, Screwdriver and Pry Bar

FREE S & H (USA) on the following:

Bluetooth Wireless Sports Earphones with Microphone - IPX7 Waterproof HD Stereo Sweatproof Earbuds + Handsfree Phone.   $50 Retail  $20 Indiegogo

  • TRUE HD HIGH FIDELITY SOUND Featuring the latest Bluetooth 4.1 CSR technology
  • COMFORTABLE AND SECURE FIT WITH IPX-7 WATERPROOF RATING - stay comfortably and firmly in place to guarantee fatigue free ears and remain tangle free.
  • LONGEST BATTERY LIFE - up to 10 hours and 240 hours stand-by with a quick charge of only 2 hours.
  • CVC 6.0 NOISE SUPPRESSION TECHNOLOGY - stay focused on your favorite music and answer calls without skipping or missing words.

Koala Modular RFID Leather Wallet with Phone Charger. $68 Retail  $30 Indiegogo

Handcrafted full grain leather (black)
•RFID shielding protects credit cards
•Fit up to 15 credit cards throughout the wallet
•2 cash compartments & 2 hidden slots
•Expandable accessories pocket holds mobile charger (white color included), business cards, and other accessories (not included)

Minimalist Leather RFID Wallet with Quick Swipe Slots.  $48 Retail  $20 Indiegogo

  • 2 quick swipe credit card slots, and 2 inside cash compartments.
  • Handcrafted, lightweight with premium scratch resistant leather.
  • RFID shields protect credit / ID cards from electronic theft.

Vbag 5-in-1 Convertible Backpack System: One Bag Does It All.  $120 Retail  $45 Indiegogo

The Vbag has 7 pockets inside for important stuff. The front panel also has 2 INDIVIDUAL pockets with hidden zippers, and 1 large zippered pocket for fast access. 840 water repellent Oxfard canvas with waterproof linings in the compartments.

 

Please share this campaign with your friends and family - just use the Share buttons under the campaign image.

Get $8 Keychain Charging Cable just for sharing our campaign.  Click here, you will be redirected to tweet or post about our campaign. Afterwards, you will be directed to our Secret Perk to pay $1 for S & H.

You can also find us on:

facebook.com/NinjaEDC

twitter.com/NinjaEDC

story:
Who Are We?

We are the ANU Quidditch Club, a small social and competitive organisation operating out of the Australian National University. We play quidditch on a regular basis, almost exclusively on the east coast of Australia, but this July we are aiming higher than ever before!

The Asian Quidditch Cup is being run for the first time ever this year. ANU has decided to head over to test itself on a global stage. However, we need to get there first.

Why Do We Need Your Help?

Travel oversees is expensive! We are aiming to send 15 players to the Asia quidditch cup which will cost exactly lots of money (as demonstrated in the images below). 


Since the estimated cost per person is around $800, the money raised in this campaign is designed to make the trip a little easier on all of our wallets.

How Are We Using Your Money?
Approximately 20% of our funds raised will go towards fees, shipping, and perk costs. This leaves 80% (or $2400 out of our $3000 goal for those playing at home) to subsidize the event itself. This equates to 20% of the total cost per person or 100% of the accommodation costs.


PERKS

In order to thank you for helping us fly to KL for the tournament, we have a number of thing we are willing to do for you and give to you! A brief description  of such things, include some photos, can be found below.

This is our team, well some of it and some randoms, but you get the idea.They will do awesome things like write you postcards, shout your name at the start of the game, personally thank you after we win, spell your name with their limbs, read things out loud in funny accents, speak without using certain letters, and just generally be awesome.

Doesn't this look fun? Finally feel part of the team, without actually *being* part of the team! What you've always wanted.


This is Inu, he is adorable. He has paws, and we will get him to personally sign a photo of himself with his very own paws! An adorable Doge just for you. :)



ANU pink socks, like the pair above, are the stuff of legend. Featured in every quidditch tournament ANU attends, and this hilarious Facebook post (https://www.facebook.com/permalink.php?story_fbid=910814875695360&id=910810135695834), we guarantee you will be 150% cooler when you put these on.


Jerseys aren’t supposed to have giant boxes on the front, but every now and then accidents happen. Some say it looks better this way, some say those people are blind, you decide! With only 25 such jerseys in the world and an absolutely 0% chance of them ever being printed again, this is an opportunity you don't want to miss.

Shipping
If you are ordering physical things which take up space and weight an amount greater than 0, and do not wish these things to be shipped to you via the post but instead want to pick them up in person, for example at august Triwziard, select the country "Wallis and Futuna".

story:
James Pittard, inventor of Loqski, came up with the idea of a bespoke ski and pole lock when he couldn't find a locking mechanism specifically for the ski market that secured both skis and poles together.  With the rising cost of ski equipment, he didn't feel confident purchasing new skis only to leave them unsecured.

"I couldn't bring myself to spend all that money on skis and poles only to worry or find that they had gone missing when I went for a drink or lunch.  My wife had her hire skis mistakenly taken which caused the family to miss most of the day skiing.  This was extremely frustrating, especially when you only go for one week of the year."

This situation led us to believe there was a requirement for a bespoke ski lock solution to help prevent mistaken identity and theft of ski equipment.   The journey began to design an effective deterrent that was quick and easy to use, would work in extreme weather conditions and fit in a ski jacket pocket.

 

UK Patent GB2510258; USA and International Patent Pending PCT/EP2013/077710

To realise our concept we teamed up with award winning London based design agency PDD.  

PDD worked closely with the Loqski team to assess its early solutions comprising large electronic solutions to cumbersome mechanical locking systems.  PDD focused on achieving a simple solution that would secure skis and poles but small enough for your pocket. 

Having analysed many ski types we proposed to capitalise on the snow brake crossover area which provides a consistent position that could be secured.  

The Loqski ski lock secures the snow brakes at the point where they cross on stored skis; two side cuffs retain the poles, while the tether provides further flexibility and security.

Early mock-ups were user tested on the ski slopes to assess both ease of use and effectiveness.

The locking mechanism was designed to exploit a readily available lock, but with a novel mechanical arrangement to enable skis and poles to be secured easily.  PDD then designed the mechanical arrangement, made proof of principle models (to test the function) and visual, working models to assess reaction at trade shows.  

Following a positive outcome from the major brands, retail and rental operators and users, PDD then produced prototypes and a fully detailed production database.

To embark upon the manufacturing stage we enlisted the help of UK, Midlands based MAN Group, who offer complete engineering and manufacturing solutions throughout a network of companies.

Loqski was launched last season and produced in small batch quantity to test the market.  It received some excellent reviews and we are now confident to push forward with large batch production.  For Loqski to succeed, we are asking for your help to fund the tooling, which will enable us to produce large volumes.

 Loqski is designed, manufactured and assembled in the UK

  • Pocketable, foldable lock securing both skis and poles
  • Tested in extreme temperatures -25 degrees Celsius (-13 degrees Fahrenheit)
  • Very quick and easy to fit, whilst still wearing ski gloves
  • High security lock, with built in shutter
  • 600mm stainless steel cable tether with protective outer PVC coating
  • UK patent GB2510258; USA and International patent pending PCT/EP2013/077710
  • Size: L 60mm W 32mm D 70mm
  • Loqski is built using robust, durable materials: zinc, stainless steel and glass filled plastic
  • Approximate weight 250g

Contents include: one ski lock, one cable tether, two keys and a user guide

 

Loqski facebook - https://facebook.com/loqski/

Loqski website - www.loqski.com

Exchange policy - we only replace items if they are defective or damaged.  To request an exchange for the same item, please email info@loqski.com with the details and send your item to the address below:

Loqski International Ltd, 6th Floor, 2 Kingdom St, London W2 6BD, United Kingdom

Loqski International Ltd guarantees this product from defect in material and workmanship.  The guarantee does not cover damage caused by misuse or abuse; the attachment of any unauthorised accessory, alteration to the product or any other conditions whatsoever that are beyond the control of Loqski.  The guarantee is valid only if the product is operated in accordance with the User Guide for the purposes of securing snow skis and ski poles.  Consequential and incidental damages are not recoverable under this guarantee.

Please note: Import duties and taxes are not included in the product price and may be collected upon delivery.  These charges are the recipient's responsibility; you may wish to check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be.

story:
I'm so excited to win the Entrepreneur Elevator Pitch funding.  If you haven't watched the show please take a minute to watch it. 

 

YukBGone is a non-toxic, sanitizing toilet seat spray that allows you to sit instead of practicing your squats.  Then when you finish and there's no soap,  just spritz YukBGone on your hands and rub them together to sanitize your hands.  YukBGone won a Stevie Award for the Best New Product, Rule Breaker of the Year and was an Innovator of the Year finalist for the Journal Record. 

      

 

           

 

It is simple and easy.  Spritz YukBGone on the toilet seat. Swipe off the excess. Now it's clean to SIT ON IT.  Easy enough that anyone can use. 

              

 

It's better to relax and sit then to flex your muscles whiles squatting on dirty toilet seats.  So how dirty are public restrooms? Toilets seats and sink handles are the top contaminators in any public restrooms.  

 

 

YukBGone brings you instant peace of mind when you walk into a public restroom. Just spritz YukBGone on the toilet seat, swipe off the excess and sit on it.  Why does YukBGone work?

  • YukBGone active ingredient instantly sanitizes toilet seats
  • Doubles as a hand sanitizer
  • Third party lab verification 
  • Standard Data Sheet for YukBGone
  • Mom tested kid approved
  • Great for ALL travelers      

  

 

I travel over 200 days a year and I couldn't do it without YukBGone. ~ S. Miller

 

I wouldn't be able to go to the state fair without my YukBGone. ~ R. Clark

 

I love taking my kids to the zoo and parks but the one thing that bothers me is public restrooms. Now that I found YukBGone, I question taking my kids to the restroom. ~ M. Humphrey  

     

WOW! YukBGone where have you been all of my life.  I love shopping and I don't go shopping without my YukBGone. ~ T. Whittman

 

After my last flight, I had decided to quit flying...ok maybe not quit but definitely not using the plane's restroom.  A friend of mine told me about your product YukBGone and now I GO when I need to GO on the plane. ~  J.  Austin

 

         

 

My company is a solution-based company that invented the multi-award-winning YukBGone to solve everyday problems.  Now you can be apart of YukBGone's future of making it a household name.  We are seeking $25,000 to develop new scents and a key chain spritzer for YukBGone. To develop these one of a kind scents it will cost approximately $7,500.  To start another production line of key chain spritzer it will cost $15,000 and labeling will cost $2,500.  By increasing our visibility through new scents and the smaller convenient size YukBGone we will be able to capitalize on additional markets.  Over the last 18 months, over 12,000 of the original scent YukBGones have been sold.  Now with the new product line, we are expecting to break into new markets i.e., Walgreens who has a program for Women Owned Businesses and organic and health minded stores.  Would you like to be a part of history and put your personal touch on next biggest household name product?  Also, everyone deserves an opportunity to have a sanitizing product to keep them healthy.   So, how would you like to join me in delivering 100 YukBGone to a homeless shelter?  Check out the PERKS to see how you can name the next YukBGone scent and give back to those less fortune by keeping them healthy and get an experience of a lifetime.  
 
 
 

 
  Jody Harris, is the CEO and Founder of a solution-based company that invented the multi-award-winning YukBGone to solve everyday problems.  Jody is known as the "Problem Solver Extraordinaire".  At 16, the founder of YukBGone, Jody Harris, found herself pregnant and that everyone had turned their back on her.  Overcoming an abusive—life threatening—marriage, Jody Harris never gave up on her dreams. She is now an award-winning inventor, best-selling author, best-selling publisher, highly regarded speaker, a grandmother, and successful business woman.

story:
Our Story


Atravea was born long ago... At first, it was just a passion to travel, then it moved to a stage of business, it became a dream just a few years later... And finally a challenge! 

Our story goes way back to 2012, where my partner and I inspired by travel and southern French culture set on a challenge of setting up rentals company spanning over 140 manager property portfolio. The people we have met and the places we had seen, set us on a mission to bring an affordable listing platform and worldly adventures to other travellers.

Travel being many things, building another holiday technology portal for just an accommodation wasn't enough! The objective and aim of Atravea become a global challenge and ambition: connecting every user worldwide to offer a wide range of services and putting them in one place; empowering the website with a pinch of trust: by allowing user verified profiles, social media verified accounts, 100% genuine reviews, builtin secure communication and creating a variety of holiday experiences.

Our aim is to change the travel as you know it and winning the race against big market players dominating accommodation and other areas. The team involved in this project brings a wealth of technology and travel experience which are crucial to our success, ensuring we are tough enough to each our milestones. We have set some strict deadlines around the delivery of this project, and should all go well, we will be live in a few months of initial development review taking place in mid-September.  

More updates will be posted here as we progress. Each one of you who participated will hear from us individually. 
 

Why we need funds?...

  • Majority of funds will go towards XML integration.

  • Marketing hacking, raising social media awareness and promoting of our site to a global audience.

  • Mobile phone (iOS and Android) development

  • Introducing new technologies and security on our site as we launch and grow

  • Hiring skilled designers and developers to deliver better UX/UI 

What do you get

  • You get to be a part of this venture and share your ideas which we can then implement to our business and the website. Your name could be featured on our social media, PR etc

  • An opportunity to be a part of something new, and a chance to change travel as we know it. You will look back one day and say "I am a part of this!"

  • Your generosity could make you Atravea's partner in a long-term and entail you to seamless exclusive offers to travel services available on our site when launched.

  • We will feature you on our SM and other campaigns and let the world know who helped us achieve our dream. You will be a part of our 'wall of fame'.  

Anyone can contribute anything. There is no minimum or maximum amount that is required from any one individual. But we do offer perks based on the amount one contributes as a "thank you". 

In addition, we are here to listen, so if you have any incredible ideas, do share them with us and we will set up our team for a challenge. 

Thanks everyone!

Jean

story:
LUNA - World's Tiniest Titanium Flashlight

Cool Backer - "Super small waterproof titanium flashlight.  LUNA is a quarter-sized flashlight that not only shines a light when you need it, but is damn-near indestructible too."

The Gadgeteer - "LUNA is an ultra mini flashlight made of Titanium."

Geeky Gadgets - “LUNA is a tiny flashlight constructed from titanium to provide a virtually indestructible everyday carry (EDC)"

Steemit - “It's a perfect flashlight that you can carry with you, light up your way in the dark, and use at night to read a book.”

AnyGator - "LUNA...is super bright and measures just 1 inch in length"

Our goal with LUNA is to create the world's tiniest, super bright, most durable, convenient, simple LED flashlight.  Easy to bring with you anywhere you go and effective in any situation. Tooled from grade 2 titanium with a simple intuitive two piece patent pending design, twist the flashlight on or off so you don't have to fiddle with tiny buttons. 

Features

  • Replaceable super bright LED (25~ LUMENS) - Choose Cool White or Warm White
  • Replaceable SMD LED upgrade option (87~LUMENS) - Add-on for $2 each LUNA
  • Replaceable UV LED DIP - UV 365nm and UV 395nm
  • Waterproof
  • Attaches to keychain
  • A little over an 1 inch tall
  • Two piece patent pending design

FREE LED (dip) Option - Cool White or Warm White.  (If selecting SMD upgrade you can purchase additional LED diodes $2 each.)

 

SMD LED UPGRADE OPTION - Add-on $2 each LUNA (this will replace the standard LED diode)

  • Additional UV LED DIP OPTION 365nm (left in photo)- Add-on $5 each

  • Additional UV LED DIP OPTION 395nm (right in photo)- Add-on $2 each

 

Production Timeline

  • MARCH 2019 - Receive funds (two weeks)
  • MARCH 2019 - Place order with manufacturers/packaging manufacturers 
  • LATE MARCH 2019 - Receive final run of manufacturing
  • APRIL 2019 - Packaging assembly
  • LATE APRIL/MAY 2019 - Mail all rewards out 

Tech Specification

  • Titanium Grade 2 Body/End Connection
  • Machined Finish
  • 3mm LED Diode - DIP - Choose Cool White or Warm White (if choosing the SMD upgrade you can get additional LED diodes for $2 each)
  • SMD LED upgrade option - Add-on $2 each LUNA (this will replace the standard LED Diode)
  • Additional UV LED 365nm - Add-on $5 each
  • Additional UV LED 395nm - Add-on $2 each
  • Additional LED DIP Warm White - Add-on $2 each
  • Additional LED DIP Cool White - Add-on $2 each 
  • Three 10 size batteries - Included
  • Titanium Keyring (25mm) - Included
  • Twist Turn On/Off Switch
  • Warranty
  • One Year Warranty against defects in materials and workmanship when normally used.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team researched and interviewed over a dozen manufacturers before choosing four. The manufacturers that we finally chose was based on their commitment to the highest standards of production and their capacity to produce consistent quality and timely delivery.

Our team has worked on multiple successful social funding campaigns and through that process we have learned about the kind of unforeseen challenges that can arise from concept to completion and fulfillment. Through our experience, we have also learned that even with the best plans and due diligence, unforeseen challenges can still occur. In the event of unforeseen challenges that could impact the campaign, we will keep our backers updated and aware of our progress, step by step.

With the knowledge and experience that we have gained, we are confident that we will be able to successfully deliver a great product in a timely manner.

story:
One of Track Gear´s objectives is to be part of a healthy lifestyle. We want each person to claim his way in the world, which is part of nature and above all: that is true to himself.

As lovers of adventures and outdoor activities, We looked for that perfect product that combined the highest quality with an affordable price.

 

Jackets that make a difference: 

Now you can be the first to exclusively try a new product that has not yet been released to the market. Do you want to know in scoop how Track Gear clothing works?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Indiegogo investors not only they can have Track Gear products in exclusive at a competitive price, they'll be for ever our Gold Friends. This will give them great benefits in their  upcoming purchases. Such as a 10% discount in all products and they will be the first to receive all news and brand premieres.

 

 

Take all the jackets at a very low price that will allow you to enjoy this great product in scoop.

The products are available in various sizes for both men and women. 

 

 

 

If you have any questions, before, during or after this action, you can contact us anytime at support@track-gear.com.

We follow each step of production: from the conception of the product and its manufacture, until it reaches the customer´s hands.

Process:

 

 

To all those people and entities that called us crazy but who trusted and bet on Track Gear. Without every grain of sand, the beach does not exist. Without each contribution, Track Gear would remain a dream, and not a reality.

story:
PinGo Summary

Having the peace of mind of knowing where the people or things you love are in real time, and knowing they are safe, is priceless.

  • We are PinGo Entrepreneurs and we have over 15 years experience in the consumer industry, looking at potential products of interest and developing winning concepts for the Mexican and Latin American population.

  • PinGo will improve our lives by helping us know where our loved ones are in real time.

  • PinGo integrates a children/pet/elderly - friendly device with a great app to help us to locate them at any time, giving our loved ones incremental space and freedom.

  • Our solution will give us peace of mind by giving us an accurate location and the possibility to communicate with our loved ones through the built-in two way communication system.

  • Can you imagine a bigger contribution than helping parents know that their kids are safe?  Or to maintain a family united?

Your contribution will help us to finish the app, improve the device (and possible redesign) and to start changing lives.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to start with $100K US dollars to achieve the first goal, which is to finish the app, to manufacture the device, and packaging. If we exceed that goal, we can promote it, create a website, redesign the device for the next version, and improve some useful accessories (already in the pipeline).

You might have heard about similar devices, but ours is unique for the following reasons:

  • Global coverage:  We will look to have coverage in more than 180 countries.

  • Simple two-way communication: Your kids or older love ones won't need a mobile phone to be able to talk to you.

  • Constant monitoring: You can know the route of the device in real time (this is very important in emergency cases) and listen to what is around it.

  • A unique App: Specially designed App to make tracking simple and helpful.

If we don't reach the entire goal here, we will look to find new ways to make this happen because we know we can help families with this solution.

The funds collected will be used to accelerate our project and help us provide a better solution and service.

The Impact

The device can be on any object that you want to track like bikes, cars, suitcases, drones, etc., but especially it's focused on children, elders and pets.

In pets, this is a good alternative to the chips used under the skin. More pets can be tracked.

Missing people problem

In many countries, missing children are not tracked.  It is estimated that at least 8 million children worldwide go missing each year.

A very large number of children will be reported missing each year:

When a child goes missing, the first 3 hours are the most crucial in finding the child safely. In some countries, it can take over 2 hours to get information about a missing child from a panicked parent.

Family abductions are the most common type of child abduction.

Additionally, people go missing for other reasons. For example, those who suffer from mental disorders and go missing often receive little attention.

In most jurisdictions, missing person cases receive low priority.

Those with drug and alcohol addiction, psychiatric problems, and the elderly suffering from dementia or Alzheimer’s make up the bulk of missing-adult cases. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Similar devices might be found but a few or maybe none with as integral a solution as ours.

  • To be compared with competitors that don’t consider family needs, in real situations and emergencies.

  • We need to have a dedicated team to improve the device and App features, 24-hour support to ensure the App is working correctly and key partnerships to generate an integral solution.

  • PinGo depends on the satellite coverage similar to a smart phone. The results are directly related to the signal in the zone.

  • We know we have to constantly improve our integral solutions. We really believe in this first version. We know there is a problem in several countries and we have been working for years on an integral solution. As a parent, I'm convinced that I would use it.

  • We might not be the first ones but we strive to be the best ones.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help us:

  • If you agree this is a great solution, get the word out and make some noise about us, sharing our videos or links.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.

If you agree this is a great solution, get the word out and make some noise about us, sharing our videos or links.
Use the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
MIRA bike bags - as seen in

 

      

  


Hi, we are Gosia and Maciek. We live by bicycle.

            

We both love cycling and we bike everywhere - any season, any weather (well, count the storms out!). We cycle to work, we do our shopping, work errands and all sorts of other activities by bike. Gosia even carried out a social/photography project aimed to show everyone that all year cycling is easy and doable - it was called “365 Days with a Bike”, covered 69 bicycles, 12 countries and, well, 365 days, the whole of 2013.

In 2011 we decided to combine our passion with work and started our own company - Bike Belle, a boutique for cycle enthusiasts with a carefully selected collection of bicycle accessories to make your cycling easier, prettier and more you. Bike Belle stocks a range of bike baskets made of sustainably sourced wicker, colourful bicycle bells, waterproof seat covers, coffee holders, skirt guards and much, much more. Bike Belle branded items are designed by us and our team and made with great care and as such are now available from our website and from our stockists in over 12 countries worldwide with more international partners coming onboard very soon.

                      



MIRA is our perfect everyday cycling bag 

We know about bicycle accessories. Whatever we introduce in our boutique, we have tested ourselves. But there was still something missing for us: a pannier bag that could be elegant enough to be used as a business bag or a smart handbag. We both tester numerous panniers and and found nothing that would fully match our needs. 

So, as many times before, we went to design the perfect product ourselves. We called it MIRA, Spanish for "look!" as the bags draw immediate attention. The name is also the first letters of our surnames to emphasize how close we are to our own designs.




We made it big enough to hold a regular 15'’ laptop ,we gave it a handle for comfortable carrying and a shoulder strap to make it more versatile. We attached an easy to use clip-on system to the back of each bag so it can be quickly taken on or off a bike. 



See how it works:

MIRA bags can help changing the world - one bike at a time. 

We strongly believe that more people on bikes in our cities make for healthier and happier societies. The MIRA bags take one of the excuses out - imagine no more struggling with the following:

  • taking your laptop to the office while commuting by bike. No more heavy bags on your shoulders. Let your bike carry your computer for you.

  • carrying your daily necessities on your back (goodbye backpacks, goodbye sweaty back on a summer morning!) or attached to your cycle with plastic bags, straps and other creative yet uncomfortable way. MIRA holds it all, in style.

  • carrying your water-resistant sporty pannier to the office. As many others you might have used your touring panniers for commuting purposes. It doesn't really go with your suit, we guess, nor is it handy to carry when you're off the bike. MIRA bag sorts this out for you, acting as both - office bag and bicycle pannier.

  • trying to squeeze your favourite handbag into a touring pannier. Errr. just stop it or you'll damage both. We believe that the Au Lait, the Swing Velvet or the Elston will become your new favourite handbag as it's become ours. AND it will clip on your bicycle in no time. You're welcome! :)


The MIRA bags provide the combination of style and functionality we have been looking for.  We hope the campaign will also raise awareness and show people that there does not need to be a compromise between your transport choice and style. Now we need your support to bring this idea to life.


You can help make it happen!

It took us over a year and a half to develop these bags. We have gone through a number of meetings and sample makings with many manufacturers to be sure that the factory supplying our bags is reliable and trustworthy. After testing the final batch of samples earlier this year we are ready to have the production started. We are very excited about these designs and just can't wait to see our bags on your bikes around the world.

We need to raise £10,000 to complete the production of the initial 3 styles that will start the MIRA bag line. The costs will include the purchase of materials, workmanship, packaging, express shipping costs, customs and all legal charges that will apply. To keep the final prices reasonable (and this is what we are aiming for) we are required to place an order for a large number of bags so the manpower and materials used per piece are on an optimal level. We would also like to use expedited shipping so you could still enjoy your new bags this bike season and so your reward would be delivered to you as quickly as it is physically possible. 

If we do not manage to raise the funds necessary, we will need to delay the production until we can save enough to have it running or we will need to increase the price of the bags due to making an order that does not match a Minimum Order Quantity for our factory. None of these is a perfect plan so we are counting on you!

We made these bags for you - all urban cyclists out there - and we hope you will like them as much as we do. If so, please support our project and help our bags get on your bikes!



All the Awesome Rewards we offer in return for your support 


Last Minute Perks!!
£25 gets you a £45 worth of bicycle goodies in a surprise box, gift wrapped and made with love/  £100 gets you a £150 XXL version. This is an awesome offer, valid only until the campaign ends! Contribute now to make sure you don't miss it!!
 



£1 - a big and honest Thank You for supporting us!
£5 - a pair of cute bicycle earrings or an I LOVE MY BIKE bell to help you express your #bikelove or - NEW PERK!! - a "Bicycles are a girl's best friend" tote bag with a little surprise inside!

                                   



                             



£10 - a lovely coffee mug for a good start of a day! 

                                

£35 - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: one of the MIRA bags (of your choice!) at an unbeatable £35. Only 10 bags available.This offer will never happen again! RRP: £60-65


THE SWING VELVET




THE AU LAIT





THE ELSTON




>> First batch of the bags should be ready for shipping 2 weeks after the campaign ends. We will use express air shipping to get them to you pronto!<<
 

£40 - ALMOST_AN_EARLY_BIRD SPECIAL: a MIRA bag of your choice. Only 50 bags at this price.

£42 - the Swing Velvet bag.

£45 - the Au Lait or the Elston bag.

For £315 you can have 10 MIRA bags and £600 will get you 20. Great offer for shops or groups of friends!


If you choose to pledge £750 or £1000 we will make - by hand, in Poland - a beach cruiser bicycle especially for you. This lovely bike is unbelievably comfortable and will come in your colour choice together with a set of accessories, including a Bike Belle handmade wicker basket - again, your choice of colour - and of course a MIRA bag. You will also get your name on the bike, get on our Key Backers board and a special certificate will be issued as a thank you for your support. Below, an idea on how your new bike could look like. Remember! You choose your colours, frame (step-through or classic cruiser) and bag! 3-speed for £750 and 7-speed for £1000.



£2000 - Customized bike + MIRA bag + Krakow Tour!  Experience our #bikelife!
OK, now this is something very, very special. We love our hometown almost as much as we love cycling so we offer you a combination of both - come to Krakow to meet us, see our HQ, spend a weekend with us and receive your customized bike with a MIRA bag at the end! We will make sure you get properly pampered when you're here and this includes a stay in a lovely hotel, a restaurant crawl, two local tours and even a countryside experience in the woods if you fancy that. We basically become your personal guides to all secrets of our charming city and its surroundings. You will also get on our Key Backers board and a special certificate will be issued as a thank you for your support.
Flights and your domestic airport transfers are not included. 
Remember! Krakow is best enjoyed from May until October. 







Risks & Challenges

We are specialists when it comes to bicycle accessories and working towards promoting easy, stylish way of cycling. Each of our team members has years of expertise in their field beyond them - whether it be commercial design, marketing, project management or customer service. We are a real, existing company, registered in 2011 and built by and for people who are totally dedicated to bicycles and helping other cyclists out. We work closely with local bicycle advocacy groups, we promote cycling extensively and we listen carefully to our fans and customers. We were also featured in numerous media, such as Forbes (Polish), Bloomber Business Week, Stylist (UK), Der Tagesspiegel (Germany), Time Out (UK), Eat and Travel Weekly (Hong Kong).

But even though we have been working hard on this project for over a year and a half now, we are fully aware that things can go not quite perfect sometimes. Bags can get damaged during shipping, We can experience delays during production or customs control. But should anything happen, anything at all, you will be immediately notified. We're always there for you and you can email us, call us or skype us. You can even visit us while on a Eurotrip and passing through Krakow, why not?


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute to our project yourself you can still help! Sharing our campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social networks will be unvaluable and will surely help us towards our goal. So please click here to spread the word! We also came up with the hashtag #mirabikebags to help with all potential shout outs so please feel free to use it :)

If you are a blogger or a journalist and would like to cover a story about MIRA bags, please let us know. We will be more than happy to provide you with all necessary information, pictures etc. or to be interviewed should you be like to speak to us personally. This would also be a great help!



Or... get yourself a FREE bag!! 

How to get a free MIRA pannier of your choice?
1. Refer our campaign: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/mira-the-chic-bike-bag/x/10601338#/updatesto a bike store, bike workshop, bicycle manufacturer or any other business that might like to become our stockist.
2. Send us an email (marketing@bikebelle.pl) with your name and an email of the shop you referred us to.
3. Should they order any bags from Indiegogo and confirm your name while doing so, you will get a free bag once the campaign ends!





More about MIRA bags:
mirabikebags.com
Check out who we are here:
Rowerzystka Miejska (Gosia's fanpage - in Polish, pictures include the 365 Days with a Bike project)
Bike Belle Facebook page
Bike Belle Twitter
www.BikeBelle.com - our boutique
story_txt:
MIRA bike bags - as seen in

 

      
  


Hi, we are Gosia and Maciek. We live by bicycle.
             
We both love cycling and we bike everywhere - any season, any weather (well, count the storms out!). We cycle to work, we do our shopping, work errands and all sorts of other activities by bike. Gosia even carried out a social/photography project aimed to show everyone that all year cycling is easy and doable - it was called “365 Days with a Bike”, covered 69 bicycles, 12 countries and, well, 365 days, the whole of 2013.In 2011 we decided to combine our passion with work and started our own company - Bike Belle, a boutique for cycle enthusiasts with a carefully selected collection of bicycle accessories to make your cycling easier, prettier and more you. Bike Belle stocks a range of bike baskets made of sustainably sourced wicker, colourful bicycle bells, waterproof seat covers, coffee holders, skirt guards and much, much more. Bike Belle branded items are designed by us and our team and made with great care and as such are now available from our website and from our stockists in over 12 countries worldwide with more international partners coming onboard very soon.                      MIRA is our perfect everyday cycling bag We know about bicycle accessories. Whatever we introduce in our boutique, we have tested ourselves. But there was still something missing for us: a pannier bag that could be elegant enough to be used as a business bag or a smart handbag. We both tester numerous panniers and and found nothing that would fully match our needs. 
So, as many times before, we went to design the perfect product ourselves. We called it MIRA, Spanish for "look!" as the bags draw immediate attention. The name is also the first letters of our surnames to emphasize how close we are to our own designs.We made it big enough to hold a regular 15'’ laptop ,we gave it a handle for comfortable carrying and a shoulder strap to make it more versatile. We attached an easy to use clip-on system to the back of each bag so it can be quickly taken on or off a bike. 


See how it works:


MIRA bags can help changing the world - one bike at a time. 
We strongly believe that more people on bikes in our cities make for healthier and happier societies. The MIRA bags take one of the excuses out - imagine no more struggling with the following:
taking your laptop to the office while commuting by bike. No more heavy bags on your shoulders. Let your bike carry your computer for you.
carrying your daily necessities on your back (goodbye backpacks, goodbye sweaty back on a summer morning!) or attached to your cycle with plastic bags, straps and other creative yet uncomfortable way. MIRA holds it all, in style.
carrying your water-resistant sporty pannier to the office. As many others you might have used your touring panniers for commuting purposes. It doesn't really go with your suit, we guess, nor is it handy to carry when you're off the bike. MIRA bag sorts this out for you, acting as both - office bag and bicycle pannier.
trying to squeeze your favourite handbag into a touring pannier. Errr. just stop it or you'll damage both. We believe that the Au Lait, the Swing Velvet or the Elston will become your new favourite handbag as it's become ours. AND it will clip on your bicycle in no time. You're welcome! :)
The MIRA bags provide the combination of style and functionality we have been looking for.  We hope the campaign will also raise awareness and show people that there does not need to be a compromise between your transport choice and style. Now we need your support to bring this idea to life.You can help make it happen!It took us over a year and a half to develop these bags. We have gone through a number of meetings and sample makings with many manufacturers to be sure that the factory supplying our bags is reliable and trustworthy. After testing the final batch of samples earlier this year we are ready to have the production started. We are very excited about these designs and just can't wait to see our bags on your bikes around the world.We need to raise £10,000 to complete the production of the initial 3 styles that will start the MIRA bag line. The costs will include the purchase of materials, workmanship, packaging, express shipping costs, customs and all legal charges that will apply. To keep the final prices reasonable (and this is what we are aiming for) we are required to place an order for a large number of bags so the manpower and materials used per piece are on an optimal level. We would also like to use expedited shipping so you could still enjoy your new bags this bike season and so your reward would be delivered to you as quickly as it is physically possible. If we do not manage to raise the funds necessary, we will need to delay the production until we can save enough to have it running or we will need to increase the price of the bags due to making an order that does not match a Minimum Order Quantity for our factory. None of these is a perfect plan so we are counting on you!We made these bags for you - all urban cyclists out there - and we hope you will like them as much as we do. If so, please support our project and help our bags get on your bikes!



All the Awesome Rewards we offer in return for your support Last Minute Perks!!
£25 gets you a £45 worth of bicycle goodies in a surprise box, gift wrapped and made with love/  £100 gets you a £150 XXL version. This is an awesome offer, valid only until the campaign ends! Contribute now to make sure you don't miss it!!
 



£1 - a big and honest Thank You for supporting us!

£5 - a pair of cute bicycle earrings or an I LOVE MY BIKE bell to help you express your #bikelove or - NEW PERK!! - a "Bicycles are a girl's best friend" tote bag with a little surprise inside!                                   

                             

£10 - a lovely coffee mug for a good start of a day! 

                                
£35 - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: one of the MIRA bags (of your choice!) at an unbeatable £35. Only 10 bags available.This offer will never happen again! RRP: £60-65

THE SWING VELVET








THE AU LAIT







THE ELSTON






>> First batch of the bags should be ready for shipping 2 weeks after the campaign ends. We will use express air shipping to get them to you pronto!<< 
£40 - ALMOST_AN_EARLY_BIRD SPECIAL: a MIRA bag of your choice. Only 50 bags at this price.
£42 - the Swing Velvet bag.
£45 - the Au Lait or the Elston bag.
For £315 you can have 10 MIRA bags and £600 will get you 20. Great offer for shops or groups of friends!

If you choose to pledge £750 or £1000 we will make - by hand, in Poland - a beach cruiser bicycle especially for you. This lovely bike is unbelievably comfortable and will come in your colour choice together with a set of accessories, including a Bike Belle handmade wicker basket - again, your choice of colour - and of course a MIRA bag. You will also get your name on the bike, get on our Key Backers board and a special certificate will be issued as a thank you for your support. Below, an idea on how your new bike could look like. Remember! You choose your colours, frame (step-through or classic cruiser) and bag! 3-speed for £750 and 7-speed for £1000.


£2000 - Customized bike + MIRA bag + Krakow Tour!  Experience our #bikelife!
OK, now this is something very, very special. We love our hometown almost as much as we love cycling so we offer you a combination of both - come to Krakow to meet us, see our HQ, spend a weekend with us and receive your customized bike with a MIRA bag at the end! We will make sure you get properly pampered when you're here and this includes a stay in a lovely hotel, a restaurant crawl, two local tours and even a countryside experience in the woods if you fancy that. We basically become your personal guides to all secrets of our charming city and its surroundings. You will also get on our Key Backers board and a special certificate will be issued as a thank you for your support.
Flights and your domestic airport transfers are not included. Remember! Krakow is best enjoyed from May until October. 












Risks & ChallengesWe are specialists when it comes to bicycle accessories and working towards promoting easy, stylish way of cycling. Each of our team members has years of expertise in their field beyond them - whether it be commercial design, marketing, project management or customer service. We are a real, existing company, registered in 2011 and built by and for people who are totally dedicated to bicycles and helping other cyclists out. We work closely with local bicycle advocacy groups, we promote cycling extensively and we listen carefully to our fans and customers. We were also featured in numerous media, such as Forbes (Polish), Bloomber Business Week, Stylist (UK), Der Tagesspiegel (Germany), Time Out (UK), Eat and Travel Weekly (Hong Kong).But even though we have been working hard on this project for over a year and a half now, we are fully aware that things can go not quite perfect sometimes. Bags can get damaged during shipping, We can experience delays during production or customs control. But should anything happen, anything at all, you will be immediately notified. We're always there for you and you can email us, call us or skype us. You can even visit us while on a Eurotrip and passing through Krakow, why not?
Other Ways You Can HelpEven if you cannot contribute to our project yourself you can still help! Sharing our campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social networks will be unvaluable and will surely help us towards our goal. So please click here to spread the word! We also came up with the hashtag #mirabikebags to help with all potential shout outs so please feel free to use it :)If you are a blogger or a journalist and would like to cover a story about MIRA bags, please let us know. We will be more than happy to provide you with all necessary information, pictures etc. or to be interviewed should you be like to speak to us personally. This would also be a great help!Or... get yourself a FREE bag!! How to get a free MIRA pannier of your choice?1. Refer our campaign: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/mira-the-chic-bike-bag/x/10601338#/updatesto a bike store, bike workshop, bicycle manufacturer or any other business that might like to become our stockist.2. Send us an email (marketing@bikebelle.pl) with your name and an email of the shop you referred us to.3. Should they order any bags from Indiegogo and confirm your name while doing so, you will get a free bag once the campaign ends!More about MIRA bags:mirabikebags.comCheck out who we are here:
Rowerzystka Miejska (Gosia's fanpage - in Polish, pictures include the 365 Days with a Bike project)Bike Belle Facebook pageBike Belle Twitterwww.BikeBelle.com - our boutique

story:
Hi! I'm Dana Goldsmith. I am a 29 year old mother of 3 beautiful children, and the wife of a disabled army veteran! My heart is dedicated to Humanitarian work. I have been a volunteer for the American Red Cross for about 2 years, and recently became an AmeriCorps VISTA for the American Red Cross so that I can dedicate myself to full time volunteerism in my community. 

As it plays out, my AmeriCorps commitments end in November, and a HUGE opportunity has been offered to me, to spend 12 days in Nepal, rebuilding a village that was decimated by the second 7.2 Magnitude Earthquake that effected the area. I can't even put into words how thrilled I am to have this opportunity to change lives in Nepal! 

Our work in Nepal will be to rebuild the local school, as well as local homes that were destroyed in the quake. We will work along side the local community to build their economy, livelihood and educational infrastructure. The trip will be hard- lots of hard labor, tent sleeping, 24 hours of travel one way... whew! What a crazy adventure! The trip itself is from November 28th-December 9th.

In order to make this Trip a reality, I have several hurdles to clear. 

First, I need to raise $500 to secure my spot on the team. This is an urgent need, as there are only 12 spots on each team, and over 60 people were asked to consider the trip! 

Second, I need an additional 1300 to cover my costs while in-country. According to the company that is hosting our team, this will cover our transportation, food, lodging and etc while in Nepal. The $1800 I am hoping to raise in the first 60 days is to cover both the first and second hurdles! 

Third, I need around $1800 to cover the cost of my flight, round trip. 

And Finally, I'd like to have extra spending money to boost the economy in the area. The leadership has already mentioned that donations on-the-ground, and investments into projects are a possibility while we are there. I would love to have the chance to make some on-the-spot donations to the local community- whether that means buying homemade items, gifting funds, or purchasing tools to leave behind for the locals to utilize... I want to be able to go above and beyond to make a lasting impact in this village! 

If I don't raise the money that I need to take the trip, I will donate the funds to someone else who IS going on the trip, or directly to Sherpa Karma, who owns the company that is sending volunteers, and is a member of the affected village. 

I can't wait to take this amazing, epic adventure. I've responded to 4 National Disasters in the United States and I'm excited about the challenges and opportunities that come with international disaster relief!! Thank you for sharing this adventure with me! 

If you can share my page and get the word out  about this opportunity I would be so grateful! Thank you!

story:
The Moxi Roller Skate Team is a group of roller skaters from all around the world  with one common mission; to spread our love for roller skating through all that we do! Together we have sparked worldwide attention with our roller skates by promoting them outside of the roller rink. We have discovered that the more we promote the ways we use our skates, the more we inspire others to go out and try new things on them.

We were asked to come and teach clinics in Europe at the International Roller Fest in Barcelona, Spain.

We ask for your support by participating in our crowd funded raffle fundraiser to help us get there! Your purchase will go towards our travel expenses. 

We have included a few perks to make our journey raising the money more fun but anyone that donates will have a chance to win a pair for themselves!

We are raffling off ten pairs of roller skates to ten random contributors as an incentive to keep donating! For each donation we receive we will add your name to the raffle and pull winners if and when we reach our goal!

Thank you very much for considering and supporting our mission.
