story:
OVERVIEW

Las rutas bici-oníricas de Ngongorokó que significa Amor, es un viaje de una mujer en bicicleta que ha emprendido el camino del autoconocimiento y que ha aprendido a través de la cotidianidad a asumir su propio cuerpo y el movimiento. 

The bike-oniric routes of Ngongorokó, which means Love, is a journey of a woman on a bicycle who has embarked on the path of self-knowledge and has learned through everyday life to assume her own body and movement. 

 

QUIÉN SOY? 

Daniella , 27 años, soñadora, comunicadora social y periodista, cicloviajera, escritora cronista, con enfoque en las artes del cuerpo y el movimiento. 

Nací en la cordillera central de los andes de Colombia. Siempre había soñado vivir como mis personajes favoritos, al estilo de indiana jones; entre la selva africana como Jane Goodall o caminar hacia la naturaleza salvaje con no más que una mochila como lo hizo Christopher McCandless. A mi manera, estoy viviendo y haciéndole honor a esos sueños de niña, montada en una bicicleta por el mundo, viviendo mi propia aventura de la vida. 

 

WHO AM I? 

Daniella, 27 years old, dreamer, social communicator and journalist, cycle traveler, chronicle writer, focusing on body arts and movement. 

I was born in the central mountain range of the Andes of Colombia. I have always dreamed of living as my favorite characters, in the style of Indiana Jones; among the African jungle like Jane Goodall; or walking into the wild with no more than a backpack like Christopher McCandless did. In my own way, I'm living and honoring those girlish dreams, riding a bike around the world, and living my own life adventure.

 

QUÉ ES? 

Ngongorokó tiene dos ejes principales: 

1. Los talleres de expresión corporal: en donde se generan espacios de intercambio de saberes que ponen en tensión acciones y pensamientos en torno al cuerpo, tales como las prácticas estéticas base en el camino del autoconocimiento y aceptación de sí mismos para el amor propio. 

2. La Escritura: se recolectan y documentan historias transformadoras desde la misma experiencia de amarse a sí mismos. 

 

WHAT IS IT? 

Ngongorokó has two main axes: 

1. Body expression workshops: where there are spaces for the exchange of knowledge that strains actions and thoughts around the body, such as aesthetic practices based on the path of self-knowledge and acceptance of oneself for self-love. 

2. Writing: transformative stories are collected and documented from the experience of loving yourself. 

 

POR QUÉ ES IMPORTANTE?

Tenía preparada una super respuesta a esta pregunta, pero quiero decir unas cosas, un tanto más espontáneas: La verdad es que he estado creando este proyecto desde inicios del 2019, pero sólo hasta inicios del 2020, empecé a materializarlo por esta plataforma.

Me dije a mi misma, que debía atreverme a hacer lo que mi corazón dictara, aunque tuviera miedo, aunque me diera vergüenza exponerme tanto. Y aunque no fue el coronavirus lo que generó este pensamiento, si fue el momento de la crisis, el que me permitió entender la importancia de los proyectos que nos devuelven imágenes de nosotros mismos. Por ejemplo, un individuo que nunca se ha visto reflejado frente al espejo, es un individuo que no se reconoce ni acepta con facilidad, un individuo por ende, con tremendos problemas para reconocer al otro. 

La importancia de este abordaje se remite precisamente al fenómeno de la expresión, la comunicación como aquello que se pone en común y es de significativo para la misma comprensión de la vida. Es necesario restituir la experiencia del otro y transformarla. 

Lo que se propone es vivir el cuerpo con espontaneidad, entendiendo la experiencia que se manifiesta en la cotidianidad. Haz parte del proyecto y ayúdame a dar mucho ngongorokó pu vó (amor pa’vos) 

 

WHY IS IT IMPORTANT? 

I had prepared a super answer to this question, but I want to say a few things that are somewhat more spontaneous. The truth is that I have been creating this project since the beginning of 2019, but only after the beginning of 2020, I started to materialize it through this platform.

I told myself that I should dare to do what my heart dictated, even if I was afraid. Even if I was ashamed to expose myself that much. Although it was not coronavirus that generated this thought, it was the moment of crisis that allowed me to understand the importance of projects that give us images of ourselves. For example, an individual who has never been reflected in front of a mirror is an individual who is not easily recognized or accepted, an individual - therefore - with tremendous problems in recognizing the other.

The importance of this approach refers precisely to the phenomenon of expression, communication as that which is put in common and is significant for the same understanding of life. It is necessary to restore the experience of the other and transform it. 

What is proposed is to live in the body spontaneously, understanding the experience that manifests itself in everyday life. Be part of the project and help me give a lot of ngongorokó pu vó (love for you). 

 

CON TU APORTE ¿CÓMO AYUDAS A CAMBIAR EL MUNDO? 

A lo largo y ancho del camino, he conocido personas y grupos liderando proyectos que están aportando a transformar el mundo. Tu contribución hace posible que la historia de esos proyectos, pueda llegar a ti y a muchas otras personas. La difusión es clave para generar nuevas transformaciones, porque como dije antes, es de gran relevancia, tener a nuestro alcance imágenes, personas e historias que nos muestren que es posible aquello que soñamos. Pero no sólo que nos muestren e inspiren, sino que nos hagan cuestionar, reflexionar y  nos inviten a la acción desde la cotidianidad, porque la historia se escribe día a día. 

Además y no menos importante, tu ayuda también aporta a la transformación de al menos una persona: yo misma, al recargar el combustible de las acciones, espacios y palabras que realizo, que ayudan a sembrar una semilla de amor en el mundo. Cabe mencionar, que estás contribuyendo a la realización de un proyecto alternativo, sostenible y amoroso, que ya está caminando.

WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTION, HOW DO YOU HELP TO CHANGE THE WORLD? 

Along the way, I have met individuals and groups leading projects that are helping to transform the world. Your contribution makes it possible for the history of these projects to reach you and many other people. Diffusion is key to generate new transformations because as I said before, it is highly relevant to have images, people and stories within our reach that show us what we dream of is possible. But not only that they show us and inspire us, but also that they make us question, reflect and invite us to action from everyday life, because history is written day by day.

In addition and not less important, your help also contributes to the transformation of at least one person: myself, by recharging the fuel of the actions, spaces and words that I carry out, which help to sow a seed of love in the world. It is worth mentioning that you are contributing to the realization of an alternative, sustainable and loving project that is already under way.

 

EL MEDIO 

La cotidianidad es un modo de asumir el propio cuerpo y el primer paso para el empoderamiento es el auto-conocimiento. Ha pasado un año viajando sobre dos ruedas y quiero servir a corazón abierto: 

El medio para transmitir este mensaje se encuentra en el arte de vivir, creando redes de afecto y solidaridad; facilitando experiencias de autocuidado. Además de productos escritos y audiovisuales visibles a través de internet, que sirvan de inspiración para promover una generación del amor. 

THE MEDIUM 

Everyday life is a way of assuming one's own body, and the first step to empowerment is self-knowledge. I have spent a year traveling on two wheels, and I want to serve with an open heart: 

The means to transmit this message is found in the art of living; creating networks of affection and solidarity; facilitating self-care experiences. This is in addition to written and audiovisual products visible through the internet that serve as inspiration to promote a generation of love. 

 

LO QUE NECESITO Y LO QUE OBTIENES 

Necesito suficiente comida y agua (ya que será mi gasolina durante el viaje). También es importante adquirir equipo bueno y liviano que permita entregar productos de calidad, que hasta ahora he logrado hacer en colaboración con otras personas que encuentro en el camino o con mi propio celular y salas de internet ocasionales, pero todavía necesito de tu ayuda. El dinero recaudado en la campaña se utilizará principalmente para: 

● Comprar comida y agua. 

● Adquirir un buen equipo tecnológico, para realizar los registros y productos de muy buena calidad. 

● Completar mi equipo de camping para el viaje, sobre todo para no morir de frío. 

● Aunque me alojo principalmente con locales o en mi carpa con la naturaleza, no se está exenta de nada y debo tener en cuenta los imprevistos. 

Como agradecimiento a las personas que creen y aportan a este proyecto, he creado una serie de productos escritos y audiovisuales, que dan cuenta de la fuerza que nace de pedalear y creer en sí misma. Quiero hacerte partícipe de esta creación colectiva y que al decidir apoyarme, te sientas parte de las historias Ngongorokó:

a.  Vagabunda del Dharma, es un libro que relata la experiencia de una mujer contemporánea, que se montó en una bicicleta a darle cuerda a sus sueños y el camino la condujo a compartir con una comunidad espiritual. Los periplos de esa convivencia están narrados desde sus más íntimos pensamientos, su cuestionamiento por la relación con Dios, su misión sobre dos ruedas y la misma práctica del amor. 

b. Ñuca warmi rina munani (mujer que viaja a donde quiera), es un cortometraje, que nació de los archivos audiovisuales de pedalear la cordillera de Chugchilán hacia la laguna Quilotoa en Ecuador, y perderme para terminar viviendo por 10 días con una comunidad quichua que habita en las faldas del cráter. 

c. Videohistoria Ngongorokó (Fredy Fernandez), es la historia de un hombre oriundo de Chincha, una provincia en el desierto al sur de Perú, que ha abierto las puertas de su chacra (huerta) para recibir viajeros del mundo. Él mismo cuenta las razones por las que decidió hacer eso, y nos enseña con acciones por donde va el amor.

d. Fotografía personalizada, se ven muchas cosas bonitas en ruta y recibirás la captura de un momento de esos lugares que cuentan una historia y vuelan la imaginación. 

e.  Exergo: carta a mis antepasados, rescato esta escritura del año 2017, porque dibuja uno de los escenarios que sin saberlo, alimentaron las acciones del futuro en que me encuentro viajando en bicicleta por el mundo. 

 

WHAT I NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

I need sufficient amounts of food and water (since it will be my gasoline during the trip). It is also important to acquire good and light equipment that allows me to deliver quality products. So far, I have managed to do it in collaboration with other people I meet on the road, or with my own cell phone and occasional internet rooms, but I still need your help. The money raised in the campaign will be used mainly to: 

● Buy food and water. 

● Acquire a good technological team, to make good quality products and records of my travels. 

● Complete my camping equipment for the trip, especially in order to not freeze to death. 

● Although I stay mainly with locals or in my tent with nature, I am not exempt from any surprises, and I must take into account the unforeseen. 

In gratitude to the people who have believed in this project, I have created a series of written and audiovisual products that show the strength that comes from pedaling and believing in yourself. I want to make you a participant in this collective creation, and when you decide to support me, you feel part of the Ngongorokó stories: 

a. Dharma Vagabond: book that relates the experience of a contemporary woman who rode a bicycle to pursue her dreams, and the path that led her to share her experiences with a spiritual community. The outlines of this coexistence are narrated from her most intimate thoughts, her questioning about the relationship with God, her mission on two wheels and the very practice of love.

b. Ñuca warmi rina munani (woman who travels wherever she wants): short film born from the audiovisual files of pedaling the chugchilán mountain range towards the Quilotoa lagoon in Ecuador. I got lost and ended up living for 10 days with a quichua community that inhabits the slopes of the crater.

c. Videostory Ngongorokó (Fredy Fernández): the story of a man from Chincha, a province in the desert in southern Peru, who has opened the doors of his farm to receive travelers from the world. He, himself, tells the reasons why he decides to do that and teaches us where love goes with his actions.

d. Personalized photography: many beautiful things seen on the road. You will receive the capture of a moment of those places that tell a story and let the imagination fly.

e. Exergue: letter to my ancestors. I rescued this writing from the year 2017 because it draws from a scenario that unknowingly fueled the actions of my future, in which I found myself traveling around the world by bicycle.

OTRAS FORMAS DE AYUDAR

¡Difunde esta campaña con todos tus conocidos! Nunca sabes quién puede estar interesado en apoyar.  

Si conoces proyectos inspiradores en Suramérica, postúlalos para que los pueda visitar.

Si conoces amigos que vivan la ruta que tengo, ponme en contacto con ellos para que me reciban una noche! 

GRACIAS

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Share this campaign with all your acquaintances! You never know who may be interested in supporting.

If you know inspiring projects in South America, let me know so I can visit them.

If you know friends that live along the route I’m taking, contact me so that they can host me for a night!

THANK YOU
story_txt: OVERVIEWLas rutas bici-oníricas de Ngongorokó que significa Amor, es un viaje de una mujer en bicicleta que ha emprendido el camino del autoconocimiento y que ha aprendido a través de la cotidianidad a asumir su propio cuerpo y el movimiento. The bike-oniric routes of Ngongorokó, which means Love, is a journey of a woman on a bicycle who has embarked on the path of self-knowledge and has learned through everyday life to assume her own body and movement.  QUIÉN SOY? Daniella , 27 años, soñadora, comunicadora social y periodista, cicloviajera, escritora cronista, con enfoque en las artes del cuerpo y el movimiento. Nací en la cordillera central de los andes de Colombia. Siempre había soñado vivir como mis personajes favoritos, al estilo de indiana jones; entre la selva africana como Jane Goodall o caminar hacia la naturaleza salvaje con no más que una mochila como lo hizo Christopher McCandless. A mi manera, estoy viviendo y haciéndole honor a esos sueños de niña, montada en una bicicleta por el mundo, viviendo mi propia aventura de la vida.  WHO AM I? Daniella, 27 years old, dreamer, social communicator and journalist, cycle traveler, chronicle writer, focusing on body arts and movement. I was born in the central mountain range of the Andes of Colombia. I have always dreamed of living as my favorite characters, in the style of Indiana Jones; among the African jungle like Jane Goodall; or walking into the wild with no more than a backpack like Christopher McCandless did. In my own way, I'm living and honoring those girlish dreams, riding a bike around the world, and living my own life adventure. QUÉ ES? Ngongorokó tiene dos ejes principales: 1. Los talleres de expresión corporal: en donde se generan espacios de intercambio de saberes que ponen en tensión acciones y pensamientos en torno al cuerpo, tales como las prácticas estéticas base en el camino del autoconocimiento y aceptación de sí mismos para el amor propio. 2. La Escritura: se recolectan y documentan historias transformadoras desde la misma experiencia de amarse a sí mismos.  WHAT IS IT? Ngongorokó has two main axes: 1. Body expression workshops: where there are spaces for the exchange of knowledge that strains actions and thoughts around the body, such as aesthetic practices based on the path of self-knowledge and acceptance of oneself for self-love. 2. Writing: transformative stories are collected and documented from the experience of loving yourself.  POR QUÉ ES IMPORTANTE?Tenía preparada una super respuesta a esta pregunta, pero quiero decir unas cosas, un tanto más espontáneas: La verdad es que he estado creando este proyecto desde inicios del 2019, pero sólo hasta inicios del 2020, empecé a materializarlo por esta plataforma.Me dije a mi misma, que debía atreverme a hacer lo que mi corazón dictara, aunque tuviera miedo, aunque me diera vergüenza exponerme tanto. Y aunque no fue el coronavirus lo que generó este pensamiento, si fue el momento de la crisis, el que me permitió entender la importancia de los proyectos que nos devuelven imágenes de nosotros mismos. Por ejemplo, un individuo que nunca se ha visto reflejado frente al espejo, es un individuo que no se reconoce ni acepta con facilidad, un individuo por ende, con tremendos problemas para reconocer al otro. La importancia de este abordaje se remite precisamente al fenómeno de la expresión, la comunicación como aquello que se pone en común y es de significativo para la misma comprensión de la vida. Es necesario restituir la experiencia del otro y transformarla. Lo que se propone es vivir el cuerpo con espontaneidad, entendiendo la experiencia que se manifiesta en la cotidianidad. Haz parte del proyecto y ayúdame a dar mucho ngongorokó pu vó (amor pa’vos)  WHY IS IT IMPORTANT? I had prepared a super answer to this question, but I want to say a few things that are somewhat more spontaneous. The truth is that I have been creating this project since the beginning of 2019, but only after the beginning of 2020, I started to materialize it through this platform.I told myself that I should dare to do what my heart dictated, even if I was afraid. Even if I was ashamed to expose myself that much. Although it was not coronavirus that generated this thought, it was the moment of crisis that allowed me to understand the importance of projects that give us images of ourselves. For example, an individual who has never been reflected in front of a mirror is an individual who is not easily recognized or accepted, an individual - therefore - with tremendous problems in recognizing the other.The importance of this approach refers precisely to the phenomenon of expression, communication as that which is put in common and is significant for the same understanding of life. It is necessary to restore the experience of the other and transform it. What is proposed is to live in the body spontaneously, understanding the experience that manifests itself in everyday life. Be part of the project and help me give a lot of ngongorokó pu vó (love for you).  CON TU APORTE ¿CÓMO AYUDAS A CAMBIAR EL MUNDO? A lo largo y ancho del camino, he conocido personas y grupos liderando proyectos que están aportando a transformar el mundo. Tu contribución hace posible que la historia de esos proyectos, pueda llegar a ti y a muchas otras personas. La difusión es clave para generar nuevas transformaciones, porque como dije antes, es de gran relevancia, tener a nuestro alcance imágenes, personas e historias que nos muestren que es posible aquello que soñamos. Pero no sólo que nos muestren e inspiren, sino que nos hagan cuestionar, reflexionar y  nos inviten a la acción desde la cotidianidad, porque la historia se escribe día a día. Además y no menos importante, tu ayuda también aporta a la transformación de al menos una persona: yo misma, al recargar el combustible de las acciones, espacios y palabras que realizo, que ayudan a sembrar una semilla de amor en el mundo. Cabe mencionar, que estás contribuyendo a la realización de un proyecto alternativo, sostenible y amoroso, que ya está caminando.WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTION, HOW DO YOU HELP TO CHANGE THE WORLD? Along the way, I have met individuals and groups leading projects that are helping to transform the world. Your contribution makes it possible for the history of these projects to reach you and many other people. Diffusion is key to generate new transformations because as I said before, it is highly relevant to have images, people and stories within our reach that show us what we dream of is possible. But not only that they show us and inspire us, but also that they make us question, reflect and invite us to action from everyday life, because history is written day by day.In addition and not less important, your help also contributes to the transformation of at least one person: myself, by recharging the fuel of the actions, spaces and words that I carry out, which help to sow a seed of love in the world. It is worth mentioning that you are contributing to the realization of an alternative, sustainable and loving project that is already under way. EL MEDIO La cotidianidad es un modo de asumir el propio cuerpo y el primer paso para el empoderamiento es el auto-conocimiento. Ha pasado un año viajando sobre dos ruedas y quiero servir a corazón abierto: El medio para transmitir este mensaje se encuentra en el arte de vivir, creando redes de afecto y solidaridad; facilitando experiencias de autocuidado. Además de productos escritos y audiovisuales visibles a través de internet, que sirvan de inspiración para promover una generación del amor. THE MEDIUM Everyday life is a way of assuming one's own body, and the first step to empowerment is self-knowledge. I have spent a year traveling on two wheels, and I want to serve with an open heart: The means to transmit this message is found in the art of living; creating networks of affection and solidarity; facilitating self-care experiences. This is in addition to written and audiovisual products visible through the internet that serve as inspiration to promote a generation of love.  LO QUE NECESITO Y LO QUE OBTIENES Necesito suficiente comida y agua (ya que será mi gasolina durante el viaje). También es importante adquirir equipo bueno y liviano que permita entregar productos de calidad, que hasta ahora he logrado hacer en colaboración con otras personas que encuentro en el camino o con mi propio celular y salas de internet ocasionales, pero todavía necesito de tu ayuda. El dinero recaudado en la campaña se utilizará principalmente para: ● Comprar comida y agua. ● Adquirir un buen equipo tecnológico, para realizar los registros y productos de muy buena calidad. ● Completar mi equipo de camping para el viaje, sobre todo para no morir de frío. ● Aunque me alojo principalmente con locales o en mi carpa con la naturaleza, no se está exenta de nada y debo tener en cuenta los imprevistos. Como agradecimiento a las personas que creen y aportan a este proyecto, he creado una serie de productos escritos y audiovisuales, que dan cuenta de la fuerza que nace de pedalear y creer en sí misma. Quiero hacerte partícipe de esta creación colectiva y que al decidir apoyarme, te sientas parte de las historias Ngongorokó:a.  Vagabunda del Dharma, es un libro que relata la experiencia de una mujer contemporánea, que se montó en una bicicleta a darle cuerda a sus sueños y el camino la condujo a compartir con una comunidad espiritual. Los periplos de esa convivencia están narrados desde sus más íntimos pensamientos, su cuestionamiento por la relación con Dios, su misión sobre dos ruedas y la misma práctica del amor. b. Ñuca warmi rina munani (mujer que viaja a donde quiera), es un cortometraje, que nació de los archivos audiovisuales de pedalear la cordillera de Chugchilán hacia la laguna Quilotoa en Ecuador, y perderme para terminar viviendo por 10 días con una comunidad quichua que habita en las faldas del cráter. c. Videohistoria Ngongorokó (Fredy Fernandez), es la historia de un hombre oriundo de Chincha, una provincia en el desierto al sur de Perú, que ha abierto las puertas de su chacra (huerta) para recibir viajeros del mundo. Él mismo cuenta las razones por las que decidió hacer eso, y nos enseña con acciones por donde va el amor.d. Fotografía personalizada, se ven muchas cosas bonitas en ruta y recibirás la captura de un momento de esos lugares que cuentan una historia y vuelan la imaginación. e.  Exergo: carta a mis antepasados, rescato esta escritura del año 2017, porque dibuja uno de los escenarios que sin saberlo, alimentaron las acciones del futuro en que me encuentro viajando en bicicleta por el mundo.  WHAT I NEED AND WHAT YOU GETI need sufficient amounts of food and water (since it will be my gasoline during the trip). It is also important to acquire good and light equipment that allows me to deliver quality products. So far, I have managed to do it in collaboration with other people I meet on the road, or with my own cell phone and occasional internet rooms, but I still need your help. The money raised in the campaign will be used mainly to: ● Buy food and water. ● Acquire a good technological team, to make good quality products and records of my travels. ● Complete my camping equipment for the trip, especially in order to not freeze to death. ● Although I stay mainly with locals or in my tent with nature, I am not exempt from any surprises, and I must take into account the unforeseen. In gratitude to the people who have believed in this project, I have created a series of written and audiovisual products that show the strength that comes from pedaling and believing in yourself. I want to make you a participant in this collective creation, and when you decide to support me, you feel part of the Ngongorokó stories: a. Dharma Vagabond: book that relates the experience of a contemporary woman who rode a bicycle to pursue her dreams, and the path that led her to share her experiences with a spiritual community. The outlines of this coexistence are narrated from her most intimate thoughts, her questioning about the relationship with God, her mission on two wheels and the very practice of love.b. Ñuca warmi rina munani (woman who travels wherever she wants): short film born from the audiovisual files of pedaling the chugchilán mountain range towards the Quilotoa lagoon in Ecuador. I got lost and ended up living for 10 days with a quichua community that inhabits the slopes of the crater.c. Videostory Ngongorokó (Fredy Fernández): the story of a man from Chincha, a province in the desert in southern Peru, who has opened the doors of his farm to receive travelers from the world. He, himself, tells the reasons why he decides to do that and teaches us where love goes with his actions.d. Personalized photography: many beautiful things seen on the road. story:
The perfect gear when you need to cutaway 

Tired of bringing too much or not enough everytime you go outdoors? LINK is a versatile blanket with everything you need to relax outside, all in one tiny package! If there are trees, it’s a hammock, on windier days you can snap it around you. If there’s a field or you are back home in the sofa, it’s a cozy blanket. If you’re traveling, it’s a pillow or travelsheet. Perfect for backpacking, vanlife, festivals, home comfort, or just a day outside.

 

 

 

These features can be combined to convert the blanket to what's needed for the situation. 

Thanks to the built-in ropes, it's possible to transition the blanket into a hammock or travelsheet in a few seconds. The ropes also works as weights to hold the blanket steadier on the ground. With the buttons you can snap it around you like a hammock cocoon, travelsheet or as a poncho. You can also turn it to a XL blanket by connecting two links. With the two-sized bag, you can pack it either small or big depending on what's needed for the situation. 

 

 

 

Progress and development

Since we launched our first campaign, we've recieved a lot of awesome feedback from you and from our live testing on festivals.  We've improved the new generation of LINK by adding smarter solutions to make it even more useful in your everyday life. 

 

If you're purchasing our products outside of EU, there might be added customs in your country. Custom fees are not included in the shipping. To see what you might have to pay your gouvernment - use this shipping calculator:

https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/ 

 

Know some relaxed people who would be interested in this project? Please help us reach our tribe and spread the word. This will bring us closer to reaching our goal and share even more innovations with care for nature.

story:
PRE-ORDER the "Next Generation" WETSUIT before Season 2021


Save up to 40% of the future retail price when you order at indiegogo.

 

The LEADER ADD-ON is the first expandable 4in1 wetsuit that will keep you warm in every season. Never need a second wetsuit with this new product innovation from SKINFOX.

After more than 1 year of development, the SKINFOX brand from Bad Feilnbach, Bavaria, is setting another exclamation mark in terms of "innovation", "functionality" and "quality".

Made of 2.5 mm thick, highly elastic SCR Fullflex neoprene that can be stretched in 4 directions. Cuddly soft and fits like a second skin even for problem figures.

Complemented by 2 additional sleeves and legs made of 2.5 mm CR Ultraflex material.

This means that the problems that often arise when purchasing a wetsuit, such as sleeves or legs that are too long, are a thing of the past.

The 1 cm wide & extremely soft adhesive tapes in the sleeve and leg edges, as well as the CR Ultraflex material, ensure a firm fit and hold with every movement.

The Leader ADD-ON consists of a basic suit (short sleeves and short legs = shorty) and the additional sleeves and legs that are part of the scope of delivery, both a shorty with long sleeves, a long john (short sleeves and long legs) or a full suit be expanded.

Depending on the weather and the right wetsuit for every season of the year.

A high-quality, in "neoprene-coverd" technique, sewn in YKK zipper (this ensures long durability), is just as natural as the elaborate printings that indicate this extraordinary suit. Due to its flex material and its versatility, this wetsuit is suitable for all types of water sports. This new and quick drying wetsuit will immediately attract everyone's attention due to its uniqueness.

 

Sport Arts

 

Size Chart

Available for MEN & WOMEN
 

Our GOAL

THINK BIG AND STAY INNOVATIVE

As a family operated business we have reached a limit of what is possible.

We need YOU to help growing this story of success into an established leader brand that makes sure people around the world can be safe out there on water and doing what they love to do.

Spending their time with family, exploring new exciting places or racing to the limit and not worry about hypothermia, being wet and cold all day long and stop the action for changing clothes.

About Us

InntalSport GmbH with the SKINFOX brand was founded in 2013. The company has also had a local shop in Bad Feilnbach since 2019.

With the web shop, the family business reaches water sports fans from all over Germany and many other countries. The shop is also popular with customers from the region and is an important stopover on the journey south.

Services, products and / or specialization
"It can be done better", thought Karin Lachotta and Jeannette Lachotta and their water sports enthusiast family back then, when stand-up paddling had established itself as the ultimate leisure fun.

So they invented a SUP board that stands out from the conventional models in many ways: SKINFOX SUP boards are extremely robust, stable and extremely durable due to a specially designed construction. Instead of cheap PVC, only high-tech materials are used, which means they cannot be deformed. Instead of the usual 15 PSI, 8 to 9 PSI are completely sufficient for this version. The diamond-cut cover pad also guarantees comfort support and a non-slip grip.

The product range also includes exceptional safety life jackets with a fluorescent
Patch, as well as neoprene suits in carbon look with UV protection factor +50, which are now also available as “4 in 1 “wetsuit can be purchased, which combines all variants from the shorty to the full suit.

Due to the conviction of their products and the high quality of the SUP boards, the company grants a warranty claim of 5 years instead of the usual 2 years.

 

Success factors

The enthusiasm for sport, the many years of experience and the great fun in developing new ideas that do not exist on the market make InntalSport GmbH particularly successful. In this way, in family cooperation, innovative products are repeatedly realized that have repeatedly caused complete enthusiasm among customers.

 


WE NEED YOUR HELP

The reason for the campaign is that we want our Skinfox range of services to include new and qualitative products. . It is important for us to raise funds this way, as the Corona crisis has led to many banks no longer approving loans and investors are also not ready to belong to regional companies.

We know this products has potentials, but in order to fulfil that potential and bring the products to reality, we need to raise some funds to bring the plan to life. Please help us reach our target budget of 

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We have been making and selling SKINFOX Products for over 7 years now. We have tested our supply chain, materials, and manufacturing capabilities, and we are highly unlikely to have issues with the production volumes.

With regards to COVID and the current world situation, possibly causing certain risks and challenges, we are confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate the issues on time.

And as we want to keep you in the loop of events throughout the whole campaign and after it, we will communicate every challenge, issue, and positive updates with you.


WHAT YOU GET

Besides the satisfaction of helping us achieve the dream of producing these new quality products a reality, when you contribute to our campaign you can choose  between a selection of perks. We have varieties of amazing perks for you to choose from and enjoy.

We grant, that we will ship each perk to supporter, also if Funding will not finish with needed Money for production

 

Other ways you can help

You don't have to contribute financially alone to help us achieve our project. You can also help us by spreading the word about crowdfunding campaign to your friends, community and networks.

Click here to visit our facebook page ):  https://www.facebook.com/skinfox.sportwear

Click here www.skinfox.com to visit our official website

All these actions will help us achieve the mission of producing new and qualitative products and thereby bringing our dreams to reality.

THANKS

It is important for us to raise funds this way, as the Corona crisis has led to many banks no longer approving loans and investors are also not ready to belong to regional companies.

We know this products has potentials, but in order to fulfil that potential and bring the products to reality, we need to raise some funds to bring the plan to life. Please help us reach our target budget of 
 
 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
We have been making and selling SKINFOX Products for over 7 years now. We have tested our supply chain, materials, and manufacturing capabilities, and we are highly unlikely to have issues with the production volumes.
With regards to COVID and the current world situation, possibly causing certain risks and challenges, we are confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate the issues on time.
And as we want to keep you in the loop of events throughout the whole campaign and after it, we will communicate every challenge, issue, and positive updates with you.

WHAT YOU GET
Besides the satisfaction of helping us achieve the dream of producing these new quality products a reality, when you contribute to our campaign you can choose  between a selection of perks. We have varieties of amazing perks for you to choose from and enjoy.
We grant, that we will ship each perk to supporter, also if Funding will not finish with needed Money for production
 
Other ways you can help
You don't have to contribute financially alone to help us achieve our project. You can also help us by spreading the word about crowdfunding campaign to your friends, community and networks.
Click here to visit our facebook page ):  https://www.facebook.com/skinfox.sportwear
Click here www.skinfox.com to visit our official website
All these actions will help us achieve the mission of producing new and qualitative products and thereby bringing our dreams to reality.
THANKS

story:
THE WORLD'S FIRST AND ONLY COLLECTION OF BAGS DESIGNED TO BE FULLY MACHINE WASHABLE AND TO DRY SUPER FAST.

"I had a chance to test the bag before anyone else and I've got to say it's amazing. I can really wash it like my favorite denim and it's easy & fast to clean and dry". Melania P.

​

DESIGNED AND ENGINEERED TO WAGE WAR AGAINST DIRT



MATERIALS TREATED FOR A QUICK & SAFE DRYING


IMPREGNATION FOR ECOLOGISTS

Eco friendly waterproof treatment, which grants the fabric the ability to repel water and other aqueous soiling substances

  • No fluorinated compounds
  • Formaldehyde-free
  • Highly water-repellent
  • Effects are resistant to abrasion and wear

Water repellency at its best

  • 100% home machine washable
  • 100% made with breakthrough innovation of antimicrobial fabrics treatments
  • 100% safe and sustainable, cosmetic grade


ANTIMICROBIAL TECHNOLOGY

Our materials are treated with HeiQ V-Block, an innovative Swiss antimicrobial technology which  makes treated textiles resistant against the degradation by microorganisms and 
inhibits the growth of bacterial odors. It is added to the fabric during the final 
stage of the textile manufacturing process.

  • Strong antimicrobial efficacy (ISO 20743 and ISO 18184 tests). Antimicrobial properties built in to protect the product.   
  • Winner of the coveted Swiss Technology Award 2020
  • Extra resistant against degradation by microorganisms  (treatment is effective for at least 30 washes at 140°F)
  • Hypoallergenic, made out of 100% cosmetic ingredients (72% are bio-based  26% hydrocarbon and  2% microsilver)
  • Certified as safe and sustainable as all its ingredients are cosmetic grade
  • Patent-pending combination of advanced antimicrobial HeiQ Pure TAG silver technology and vesicle booster technology
  • EU BPR & EU REACH compliant and registered with US TSCA


    The MINI

    The DAYPACK


    The DAYPACK

    The XXL

    PACKED WITH FEATURES (*)

    • Padded laptop sleeve for most 15" devices (Daypack) or 13" (Mini)
    • Extra security zip clipping system (Ykk patented), to prevent pickpockets
    •  Anti theft rear pocket
    •  Padded bottom
    •  Padded back panel and adjustable shoulder straps
    • Additional inner zippered pocket
    • Made with a waterproof and antimicrobial/ antivirus polyester
    • Treated with HeiQ V-Block, an innovative Swiss antimicrobial technology
    • Treated with BIONIC-FINISH®ECO, patented ecological water-repellent impregnation
    • Breathable, resistant to washing, weatherproof

    (*) Features common to Daypack,  Mini and XXL

    WASHME SPRING SUMMER 2021, MILAN







    WASHME SPRING SUMMER 2021, KYOTO, JAPAN

    THE WORLD FIRST TRULY HYGIENIC DAILY COMPANION
    Our new backpacks should be used to enhance not replace other safety protocols, 
    such as handwashing, social distancing, and wearing masks. 

    At Mueslii, we are passionate about making high quality, long lasting bags, which is what we've been doing since 2007.

    Over time we've come to realize there is something missing on the market: none of the bags out there can be really cleaned, surely not in a washing machine.

    This is why we have decided to launch WASHME, the first collection of bags that loves water and hates dirt.
    We are launching it on Indiegogo because we believe it will help us to reach a wider audience, in a time when travelling and discovering new trends and fads can be extremely difficult, as we all know.

    Do you want to find out more?
    Please contact our support team: hello@mueslii.com

Over time we've come to realize there is something missing on the market: none of the bags out there can be really cleaned, surely not in a washing machine.This is why we have decided to launch WASHME, the first collection of bags that loves water and hates dirt.We are launching it on Indiegogo because we believe it will help us to reach a wider audience, in a time when travelling and discovering new trends and fads can be extremely difficult, as we all know.


Do you want to find out more?Please contact our support team: hello@mueslii.com

story:
Overview

It's time for a Better Tennis Bag! Stand out from the competition with The Cancha Bag. Functional, stylish, and perfect for tennis and travel. The first tennis bag designed for the courts and day to day life. The Cancha Bag has a detachable racket bag that allows it to look professional on and off the courts. Designed with thoughtful details and responsible fabric, so you can look good and feel good while performing. 

Cancha Bag is the first tennis bag that features the military grade modular attachment systems known as the MOLLE. (Modular Lightweight Load-Carrying Equipment) It has a simplified, precision laser cut grid that balances a minimal aesthetic with the perfect level of functionality. This feature allows your tennis bag to transform into a professional bag suitable for any work space, separate your tennis rackets from your bag so you can fit it on planes, and make the best use of your backpack’s space

The Cancha Bag holds up to 32 litres, more than double what traditional tennis bags can hold! With Cancha Bag’s unique top roll feature, you can fit even more than that into your Cancha Bag. Because the Racket Bag attaches outside of the backpack, it allows you to fit more of what you need inside the backpack.

The Cancha Bag is the most comfortable tennis bag on the market. Existing racket bags are large, bulky,  and difficult to travel with. The Cancha bag introduces an innovative back panel made with Moulded Eva foam formed into a unique herringbone design for increased airflow to provide the user with maximum comfort and breathability. This keeps the bag light and sweat free against your back, even in the hottest conditions and the longest journeys.

The Cancha Bag sports a unique style made for on the court and off the court performance. Stand out from the competition with your Cancha Bag. The Cancha Bag comes in 3 unique colors that allows you to show off your unique style and personality.

The Cancha Bag is the only tennis bag that stands out on the Courts but fits in everywhere else.

Unlike other tennis bags, the CANCHA Bag incorporates several water-resistant features. All external access pockets have YKK® AquaGuard® zippers, which are specially formulated with a water-resistant coating to help keep rackets and gear safe from the outside elements. Zips are heat bonded to the fabric to further seal them from water and increase durability.

The CANCHA Bag is made from our 500D Nylon 66 fabric: a high tenacity, abrasion-resistant nylon with a special water-resistant TPU coating that keeps the pack dry in any condition.

CANCHA Bag’s fabric is laser cut which grants it greater flexibility and precision than any other tennis bag on the market. This feature ensures the CANCHA Bag’s ability to maintain their unique design and superior quality. CANCHA Bags are built to last for years unlike other typical tennis bags.

Quick Access compartments for keys and wallets etc. (Protected byYKK® AquaGuard® heat-bonded zippers)

Most tennis bags do not fit on airplanes. The CANCHA Bag is designed for travel and is made to fit as a carry on for easy travel.

The racket bag attachment can be removed or attached in seconds via the quick release clips that attach onto the MOLLE grid. This means that the CANCHA bag can convert into a functional work backpack instantly.

Fluorescent interior greatly provides improved visibility within the main compartment, making it easy to find whatever you are looking for in your CANCHA Bag.

Wet Dry Bag for storing your clothes after a tennis match while not contaminating anything else in The Cancha Bag!

story:
Treehouse Rainforest Lodge

 

  • Our name name is NeoArchitects, a firm with 24 years of experience working in tropical areas designing low impact developments, completely integrated with nature. We, in a partnership with the internationally acclaimed Tattoo artist Jairo Ramirez are the promoters / owners of the project, We are oriented to the Bitcoin community , permanent discount for Bitcoin clients.
  • Our project is a unique development in Costa Rica, integrating Sustainability, Social responsibility , Integration of the Indigenous local tribes, use of edge technology in design and the only Resort with a certified 95 hectares private reserve, We are building nine tree house units and one open air canopy roof structure as space for Yoga, Meditations and Wellness in general.
  • With your support you will help us in the construction of the units , implementation of the park rangers program, creating of job opportunities for the indigenous local people, and create the first Treehouse hotel  100% sustainable designed in a holistic way.

 

Escape from your every day life and feel a direct contact with nature, Discover the hidden Costa Rica.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to complete construction, We have already acquired 90 hectares of rain forest and 15 of grass land to be reforested, now we need your support to complete construction of the units

  • For this construction stage we need to collect $150,000 what we offer is a 50% discount in the rental cost of the tree houses once the hotel is open, we expect to have the units fully functional by May 2020 .
  • Treehouse Rainforest Lodge is the first designed Treehouse community in Costa Rica, including a private wildlife reserve and a biological studies station,  you will have the experience of a full immersion in nature , being directly on a tree in the canopy of the rain forest in direct contact with all the wild life.
  • If we do not reach the goal the remained amount will go any way to the construction and implementation fund to complete all the proposed units.

 

 

 

What we do with your contribution

 

  • Your contribution is of great value to help us create , educate and protect nature, you will allow Us to be able to have a place for people to learn and understand how important is the rain forest, you will also help us to mitigate the Co2 from your own Co2 footprint . Also We will give working opportunities to the Indigenous locals, a community in some how forgotten by the central government , 20% of the profit will go directly to social programs and sustainable efforts in conservation, our plan is to extend the protected area surrounding the Sorpresa river.
  • We have being doing developments for private clients with 100% success for the last 20 years in the pacific coast of Costa Rica.
  • With your contribution you will have the right to stay in one of our Treehouses and experiences a place called by National Geographic as the most intense biodiverse in the planet, with 4% of the biodiversity of the world.

story:
Yeti Research Healing Outpost Biodynamic Nature Preserve & Campground

 

A spiritual and biodynamic campground and event space offering traditions of natural living & bushcrafting, olde world gardening, healing, music, spirit work and higher self development.

Our principals:

Our principals are caring for and evolving the natural landscapes and forests, according to biodynamic, old world traditional skills and gardening, & forest caretaking. 

 

The idea: 

Our main idea is to facilitate and maintain sacred events and provide natural building structures  (indoor and outdoor) for spiritual gatherings, performances and educational workshops. This will include traditional craft making, bush crafting, off grid living, healing the soil & healing ourselves, permaculture, traditions of natural healing, wild foods & plant medicines, spiritual development, and sacred musical events.  These events will be small scale, up to max 200 people. 

About us:


Brian Gardner & Katalin Pazmandi.

Brian is a long time herbalist, natural healer, and Katalin is a visionary artist, gardener. (See her paintings here: http://katalinpazmandi.com) We are both musicians as well. We own the land and live on it full time with our son Bo, who is 13 at the moment. We also have a dog: Coconut and a cat named Cicoka. We have 6 chickens and two ducks as well. 

We sold our small house in order to purchase the land on August, 2020, with big dreams in our hearts.   But now we need help to make it possible!

The land:

The land is located on Mountaindale Rd in Greenfield Park, NY. It is an Upstate New York location that is very close to major hiking areas, many spiritual communities, state forests, and many fun small towns in the area. The land is 13.9 acres with forests, meadow, wetland and rocky outcrops in some parts. It has a tiny stream and a spring on it.  In order to develop the land as a campground, as a prerequisite we would need to put in a septic system and a well, and build a foundation for a tiny home that will be about 400 sq feet.

We will use it as a full time residence.

Event plans:

1.  Forest Art & Shamanic Practices school to learn natural art making techniques, spring and fall workshops for ages 10 to 18. Please see more information about this school at http://katalinpazmandi.com under the Forestschool section. Sign up available for next year’s children workshops and weekend workshops for adults. Check out the perks you can get when you donate!
2. Yeti Research Bush Crafting and Survival Workshops for children and youth - we will invite expert bush crafting masters and teachers of survival in the wild to offer workshops for children and youth all year long, some daytime and some sleepover camps. 

3. Forest Café - dawn and evening fireside music cafe, where we will invite amazing musicians, accordion players, flute players, etc, roast the best coffee on cast iron over the fire, and offer hot  herbal infused spring waters. Discounts for donations in the perk section!

4. Solstice & Equinox celebrations

5. Search for Yeti adventure camping, see perks for discount prices!

Yeti Healing living installations:

Biodynamic beehives area - wildflowers, herbs planted to benefit bees, walking paths, beekeeping workshops 

Stinging nettles herb hugelkulture gardens - large herb garden predominantly full of stinging nettles, amazing multifaceted healing plant, fresh nettles served in drinks & meals during workshops, events. Nettles’ sting healing therapeutic practice.  Fresh/dried herbs & practical herb products sold at farm store

Viking forest cabin cafe & event area - rustic Viking style log structures built around fire pits for communal gatherings during camping, sunrise fireside coffee/herb teas/foods, music events & workshops

Mongolian Yurt zone - meditation space and temple

Walking paths of practical wonders - special designed paths throughout the entire property connecting to all living installations

Biodynamic CBD/CBG hemp garden 

Organic Orchard, tree nursery and greenhouse

Organic Berry bush gardens

Wild Animal Rescue and Falconry area

Mini chicken and duck sanctuary

Projected timeline:

By mid-2021:

Campground: We will develop 10 campsites and start the process for a small bathroom/shower facility, a parking lot, and get permits to operate.

Forest Café: Build an outdoor forest cafe and a tiny commercial kitchen, get licenses and permits to operate.

Events: We will create events that will begin as outdoor events first, then utilizing a beautiful traditional yurt as an additional indoor area for spiritual events and gatherings.

Invite experts to hold workshops and teachings.

Rustic buildings: We will begin the process of developing an area for rustic buildings, Viking house, sacred fire pit area for ceremonies, sweat lodge, etc.

Gardens: Start a tree nursery and begin to develop an orchard, berry bush and hügelkultur garden on the wetland area. The orchard/garden area will also be open for campers to hang out in.

Walking Paths

 

2022: 

Cabins: Build 2-4 tiny log cabins (~140 sq ft) that will be available for people who are visiting.

Campground: Develop 10 more campsites.

Continue developing and building the already started projects.

 

2023:

Build 2 more tiny log cabins.

Finalize and maintain the whole development.

And hopefully more amazing things to come...


Guidelines that we live by:

Building materials we will use must be as natural as possible.

Full time off grid living is not allowed in NY state at the moment, but will be followed as much as possible allowed by NY state codes. Right now, composting toilet and solar might be possible.

We respect nature, respect living things, and nature conservation is essential for us, with minimal altering of the surroundings.

About perks: 

Please check out the perks we offer, donate, and share the link to this fundraiser.

We believe that it will be an amazing place for many people to connect with our earth mother and with their own higher self, while immersing themselves in a beautiful and unforgettable experience.

Our Forest Goddess Guardian. (Katalin Pazmandi: Forest Goddess (2020) katalinpazmandi.com)

Our Forest Goddess Guardian. (Katalin Pazmandi: Forest Goddess (2020) katalinpazmandi.com)

story:
What is Solbrite

Solbrite is a solar fairy light that now has a detachable solar panel.  Never seen before! It was created in 2015 out of a personal need.  We have too much shade in our front patio therefore the normal solar panel was not getting charged by the sun in able for it to work.  Problem solved. Easy to detach – simply place in the sun during the day, reattach at night and see the magic of these lights shine!  They work in ALL shady areas and in your home! These lights are no longer limited to being placed in direct sun.  The uses are endless. Your contribution will help people all over the world who love the ambiance of solar fairy lights, use them anywhere – inside, outside, shady spots or sunny spots!

So simple to use! Simply detach to place in sun, then re attach to light up anywhere!


Why We Need Solbrite Lights

It's eco-friendly. We all need to be kind to our earth.

It’s no longer a product for sunny areas.  This was made for shade areas

Perfect for in home use

No need for extension cords

No more fire hazard

Waterproof

SAFE:

Did you know that according to NFPA ( National Fire Protection Assoc.)

U.S. fire departments responded to an estimated average of 210 home structure fires per year that began with Christmas trees in 2009-2013. These fires caused an annual average of seven civilian deaths, 19 civilian injuries, and $17.5 million in direct property damage.


Why We Need You

Solbrite is revolutionary string light that will help thousands and thousands. We are anxious to bring it to market. We have tremendous aspirations and many exciting projects brewing, but none of these will ever happen without your help.

We are confident that Solbrite fulfills a need for those with shady yards but is a safe solution for Christmas tree lighting as well as being eco-friendly. We have finalized the prototypes and now we need that last push to bring the product to you as quickly as we can.

Please join our community and bring solar lights to everyone we can. We are so excited!

How it Works

So simple! All you do is detach the solar panel, place in the sun to charge, and at night, attach. Voila! Lights!

The Impact

Your contribution will not only help those of us who want to create a magical and romantic yard either year round or for the holiday season, but it will help our planet by using the sun for power instead of our planet earth who works so hard each day to feed us, eat our trash and keep our water clean.  Remember, these lights are not just for outside, but can be used inside now to save electricity.  We all need to be a little kinder to our planet by going green as much as we can.

We are offering these lights in white for year round, or multi color for the Holidays and we are offering them to our funders at 50% off what our MSRP will be!

Great for all Retailers who want this type of ambiance without having to plug it in and use electricity.

Businesses who don't want to fight with cords or outlets

hotels, bars, restaurants who want to add a little sparkle and romance without using extension cords or outlets.

Meet the Team


Risks

Minimal if any. I have been working with and importing solar fairy lights from this factory for over 5 years. They produce only quality products which is why I chose them for this new design. It is tried and tested so I can't think of a risk with your funding.  My business is design importing  so all funders WILL get their product.

FAQ

INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

When will my order ship?

Our mission is to get Solbrite shipped to your door ASAP! Once our campaign ends, we need 20-30 days for production, and approx. 15 days for them to ship to us. Once we have them, we will ship to you the next day! Of course, we will update you immediately if anything changes along the way.

How will my order be shipped? How much is shipping? Do you ship worldwide?

USPS is our carrier of choice.  It saves us money and therefore saves you money.

Shipping rates vary depending on the size of your order and where it is being sent. Shipping starts at $5 to US, $11.00 to Canada and $17 for everywhere else.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

You will be responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT that may be applied to your order. Please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% in the US and varies internationally

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.

Can I return or exchange the product after the purchase?

You bet, that’s how confident we are in our product! If you are not fully satisfied with your purchase, you will have 30 calendar days to return or exchange your purchse from the date you received it. If you found defects in material and workmanship. 

Please contact: info@solbrite.com

Please note that our return/exchange policy does not cover the damages caused by accident, misuse, abuse, product modification or neglect.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

As a supporter, we understand you may have questions and we are happy to help answer them! We are currently receiving a lot of inquiries, but we make sure to try our best to respond to you as fast as possible! Please contact info@solbrite.com with any questions you might have.

WE NEED YOUR HELP!

If you are not a fan of fairy lights and don’t feel a need to own them, that’s ok!   But PLEASE either help us spread the word to others that can use these OR make a $5.00 contribution to help us go toward our production costs.  And with that $5.00, your name will be on our "Special Thanks" page on our website-www.solbrite.com.  Thank you all so much for your support!

story:
Sure, the new Apple Pencil can help you make some beautiful, intricate, designs on your new, expensive, larger than life iPad and whatnot, but it is no match for what you’re about to see… 

Introducing the Mega Awesome All-in-1 (did we say awesome?) Pen! This pen will take you to whole new levels, get you doing things you never thought were possible! Check it out for yourself! 

About this project

When you support our project, you help to fill up some cool backpacks with essential school supplies for an underprivileged kid in Portugal! Every child is entitled to an education and we should strive to make sure that every one of those children is as prepared for school as possible. Our mission is to fill as many backpacks as possible with essentials for the school year (all items that will be placed in backpacks can be found below!).  

It is hard to comprehend what this means when it’s represented simply as data. It should be as modest as: there’s a kid in need, let’s lend a hand! So that’s what it comes down to. There are children in Portugal that could use your helping hand, as there are unfortunately many other children in many other places, but this is just another small stepping stone to support the sweet, tiny, smiling faces of our world.  

Here's what's in each backpack!

• Backpack
 • 3 x Notebooks
• Loose-leaf Paper
• Pencil Sharpener
• Pack of Highlighters
• Pack of Pencils
• Pair of Scissors
• Pack of Erasers
• Pack of Markers
• Pack of Colored Pencils
• Shatterproof Ruler
• Pack of Glue Sticks
• Pencil Pouch
• Pocket Folder
• Basic Calculator
• Pack of Crayons
• Pen Corrector
• Binder
• Hand Sanitizer
• Copy of “The Little Prince”
• Some Mega Awesome 50-in-1 Pens!
(this list is subject to change as we meet more goals)

We are budgeting €50 per backpack just in case of sold out items or prices going up after the "start of the school year sales". However, all money will be utilized in buying supplies for the kids. We are seeking potential sponsors of supplies that may decrease some of these prices, in which case we'll be able to get even more backpacks! 

Our goal of €5,000 is set with the aim to supply 100 kids with packed backpacks! 

TL;DR:You back us, get some Mega Awesome All-in-1 Pens, and help buy school supplies for a kid in need. It's a win, win! 

FAQs

1. Why Portugal? Unfortunately, there is not a shortage of kids in need. My boyfriend and I currently reside in Portugal and it was the best place for us to start. Hopefully we find ourselves capable of doing this in many other countries across the world.

2. How did this idea come about? My boyfriend has spent many summer weeks volunteering at a summer camp (CFT) for underprivileged children. Last summer (2014), the summer camp bid their farewell and closed down due to lack of government funding. Bruno will forever be heartbroken over the loss of this camp as it was not only a humbling learning experience for him, but also a wonderful escape for all the kids that don’t have the same opportunities as their peers. It would require substantial budgeting changes from the government or a large outside investor to get the camp going again. In comparison, this project seems little but is my tribute to my boyfriend, to those kids, to those volunteers, and to that camp. Also, it’s a 25th birthday present to myself.

3. What age group will these backpacks be for? 18.2% of kids in social institution care facilities are 6 - 12 years old. These are kids who should be beaming with excitement for the new school year, much like many of us were when we went shopping for new school supplies with our parents. However, many of these institutions can barely keep up with providing the basics and often rely on donations.

4. How will we distribute the backpacks? Our plan is to purchase and pack the backpacks. Then distribute to the various institutions across the country (concentrating on smaller ones that don’t get as much support as others). The actual number of different institutions we get to vary on the amount of funds we raise. We will keep this page updated as we distribute the backpacks!

5. Are the pens really that awesome? Pretty much. Each purchased pen puts a smile on our faces and hopefully on a wee kid’s face too!

Further Information

If you'd like to help support underprivileged children in Portugal in other ways, check out this site: http://www.iacrianca.pt/index.php/en/institute/... 
Unfortunately, it does not provide the information in English but you can send an e-mail asking for further information. 
Of course, you can always go to: www.supportunicef.org/donate and donate to children in need all over the world!

story:
Hi


Who am I ?

My name is Ivan , I'm 18 years old student and I'm racing Downhill (extreme mountain bike sport) In these months I am training hard and preparing myself for World Cup race.But I and my parents we have lack of money because of my and my sisters school fees and also grandmothers medical fees.

I work as hard as I just can , to fulfill my dream but I does not have enough money. I've got part time job and my parent are trying to support me too . Unfortunately, this is still not enough .

Why I ride ?

When I was 8 years old my father took me to Freestyle motocross . When I saw these riders flying upside down in the air , they've became my heroes. Since that night I knew that one day I would become one of them, an extreme sport athlete. No matter if will ride motocross , motocross freestyle or even downhill . But I knew that adrenaline sport are part of me . Unfortunately I was just dreaming about it and watching all motocross videos , imaging myself riding because we cannot afford a dirt bike .

Later when I was 13 years old , my school mate showed me Downhill racing. I fell in love with it.  I grabbed my old my from supermarket and went to the forest on a hill to try all that stuffs I was in videos . That day I came back home with broken wheel and a big flat tire . I realized that my bike isn't build for this  kind of riding. After 2 years I finally bought my first downhill bike . I went on couple local races , later on National Cup where I had a great results , I finished 6th and  it was only my first big race. From that point I'm racing at national cups every season . And Downhill became part of me .

Downhill racing  is a passion for me, and so I love to go as far as possible in the World Cup.

It's my dream , my deepest goal to became professional downhill racer .

Some people doesn't know what downhill exactly is so I'm posting highlights from last year world cup.


How the funds will be used ?

  • I will upgrade my race bike
  • I will pay my school fees
  • I will pay my road to World Cup race


To improve, I partake in multiple tournaments during the season, one of which is international. That is why I am looking for financial aid. No matter how much you decide to contribute, you will help me and I will be grateful.

Thanks in advance!


I'm working on my new website , so if you decide to contribute I will place your logo on my site .

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Angelos Papakonstantinou and I am the founder of Bookingmng.com. As a software engineer and being occupied with sailing since 1996, I have developed a passion for the sea. As a result, I have combined the two true passions of my life and created Bookingmng.com aiming to transfer some of the energy, the peace and the amazing feeling of sailing to every one who might be interested in exploring this opportunity
     
  • Booking Management (bookingmng.com) is an innovative platform which aims to bring the Travelers, the Yacht owners and Skippers together, so that the chartering can become easy, matching the needs of each Traveler with the type of yacht which best corresponds to them.

    Every yacht owner or Skipper can register easily and fast through the website of Booking Management (bookingmng.com). The procedure is completed with the submission of an annual fee. No extra commissions are charged.

    From their end, the owner or skipper can determine certain criteria, such as the empbarkation port and possible destinations, as well as the availability

    The Traveler on the other hand, may register for free and may search for yachts fulfilling his own criteria.

    The system matches the request with the available options and an email is sent to all Yacht owners of Skippers matching the criteria set. Provided that the Yacht Owner or skipper accepts the request, an email is sent to the Traveler providing him with all the available options. Once the Traveler makes his final choice, his contact details are sent to the Yacht Owner or Skipper and the booking is completed between the two parts without interference from Booking Management.
     
  • The first version of the project is very simple and lacks some features that would make it even better and more attractive to future clients, such as: Additional services offered, a wider database, a more attractive interface, etc.

     

What We Need & What You Get

With the funds raising we intend to cover basic needs for our platform:

  • 20.000 eur will be the annual salary for a software engineer who will develop an app for iOS and Android smartphone to increase the ease of use for our users.
  • 10.000 will be used for a Marketing Campain which will cover Europe, USA, Russia and Japan
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we intend to continue with our site as it is - since it is already designed in a mobile friendly way and invest the rest of the funds for marketing campains as described above

 

What are the benefits for the users?

From the Yacht Owner or Skipper point of view, Booking Management empowers its registered users to get in touch with clients who are interested in making their dream vacation true. Moreover, no commissions are applied. The Yacht owner / Skipper is informed via email for any incoming request which matches the criteria set by the Yacht Owner / Skipper , who may then accept / decline it.

From the Traveler point of view, Booking Management is a platform which guarantees that each individual will find his dream yacht easily, fast and without any additional charges, since the use of the platform is for free! In addition to this, all the details provided in the website are real and recently updated, so that from our side, we may be sure that all our clients have up-to-date and accurate information.

So, as you may see, Bookingmng.com is a project which aims to change the way that things are done in this market. Till now, the Brokers involved in the chartering business were charging commissions for their contribution, which had an impact on both parties - yacht owners / skippers and travellers. 

With Bookingmng.com we aim to make it easier for both parties to get in touch and thus make it easier for the traveller to book the yacht of his/her dreams in a lower price (since no commissions are applied) and for the yacht owner / skipper to build his clientele in a easier way.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • One of our main values is quality. This is an indisputable fact that we will stick to. We wish for any client to get what he sees in the brochure. As a result, when expanding to a global market, we will need to ensure that the yachts included in our site are exactly as described. For this reason, we aim to run checks to ensure that all the data imported by the yacht owners / skippers is accurate and exact. This means that a partner will need to travel around to perform these checks.
  • The project is innovative and thus not something that the average person is accustomed to. For this reason, it needs to be communicated through marketing channels 
  • The economic crisis has affected tourism in various ways. Due to the cost-cutting process that the average person is forced to, the volume of bookings is lower compared to past data
  • The chartering business is tightly related to the weather conditions. As a result, if the weather is bad, any bookings at this period of time will be cancelled.  

     
  • Our team is very qualified and shares the same core values: quality, customer-orientation, clarity, transparency, technology, innovation, thinking out of the box.
     

Other Ways You Can Help

You may support us even without financially contributing to this campaign. How?

  • Access our site (www.bookingmng.com) to find out more about us
  • Spread the news about our platform. We are sure that you and your acquaintances will love it as much as we do!
  • You may use the Indiegogo share tools to encourage an acquaintance to participate
  • Like us on Facebook

We would like to thank you for your interest. You can contact us at any given moment at info@bookingmng.com. We would love to hear from you!
