The procedure is completed with the submission of an annual fee. No extra commissions are charged.From their end, the owner or skipper can determine certain criteria, such as the empbarkation port and possible destinations, as well as the availabilityThe Traveler on the other hand, may register for free and may search for yachts fulfilling his own criteria.The system matches the request with the available options and an email is sent to all Yacht owners of Skippers matching the criteria set. Provided that the Yacht Owner or skipper accepts the request, an email is sent to the Traveler providing him with all the available options. Once the Traveler makes his final choice, his contact details are sent to the Yacht Owner or Skipper and the booking is completed between the two parts without interference from Booking Management. 
The first version of the project is very simple and lacks some features that would make it even better and more attractive to future clients, such as: Additional services offered, a wider database, a more attractive interface, etc. 


What We Need & What You Get
With the funds raising we intend to cover basic needs for our platform:

20.000 eur will be the annual salary for a software engineer who will develop an app for iOS and Android smartphone to increase the ease of use for our users.
10.000 will be used for a Marketing Campain which will cover Europe, USA, Russia and Japan
If we don't reach our entire goal, we intend to continue with our site as it is - since it is already designed in a mobile friendly way and invest the rest of the funds for marketing campains as described above


 
What are the benefits for the users?
From the Yacht Owner or Skipper point of view, Booking Management empowers its registered users to get in touch with clients who are interested in making their dream vacation true. Moreover, no commissions are applied. The Yacht owner / Skipper is informed via email for any incoming request which matches the criteria set by the Yacht Owner / Skipper , who may then accept / decline it.
From the Traveler point of view, Booking Management is a platform which guarantees that each individual will find his dream yacht easily, fast and without any additional charges, since the use of the platform is for free! In addition to this, all the details provided in the website are real and recently updated, so that from our side, we may be sure that all our clients have up-to-date and accurate information.
So, as you may see, Bookingmng.com is a project which aims to change the way that things are done in this market. Till now, the Brokers involved in the chartering business were charging commissions for their contribution, which had an impact on both parties - yacht owners / skippers and travellers. 
With Bookingmng.com we aim to make it easier for both parties to get in touch and thus make it easier for the traveller to book the yacht of his/her dreams in a lower price (since no commissions are applied) and for the yacht owner / skipper to build his clientele in a easier way.
 

Risks & Challenges

One of our main values is quality. This is an indisputable fact that we will stick to. We wish for any client to get what he sees in the brochure. As a result, when expanding to a global market, we will need to ensure that the yachts included in our site are exactly as described. For this reason, we aim to run checks to ensure that all the data imported by the yacht owners / skippers is accurate and exact. This means that a partner will need to travel around to perform these checks.
The project is innovative and thus not something that the average person is accustomed to. For this reason, it needs to be communicated through marketing channels 
The economic crisis has affected tourism in various ways. Due to the cost-cutting process that the average person is forced to, the volume of bookings is lower compared to past data
The chartering business is tightly related to the weather conditions. As a result, if the weather is bad, any bookings at this period of time will be cancelled.   
Our team is very qualified and shares the same core values: quality, customer-orientation, clarity, transparency, technology, innovation, thinking out of the box. 


Other Ways You Can Help
You may support us even without financially contributing to this campaign. How?

Access our site (www.bookingmng.com) to find out more about us
Spread the news about our platform. We are sure that you and your acquaintances will love it as much as we do!
You may use the Indiegogo share tools to encourage an acquaintance to participate
Like us on Facebook

We would like to thank you for your interest. You can contact us at any given moment at info@bookingmng.com. We would love to hear from you!

story:
Summary

Hi, we're Mike and Graham. Mike is a blogger and YouTuber, and Graham helps to run a mail order business specialising in all kinds of weird and wonderful magical and new age goodies.

 

Every year we go away, experiencing pubs - we've done Hull, Leeds, countless little villages, but our favourite place is Robin Hood's Bay in North Yorkshire. We're going for 3 nights in November, taking in a stop at Whitby while we're there.  And we'd love  for you to get involved!

 

We're putting the trip up for sponsoring, from a third of a pint, right up to headline sponsors.  You can be a sponsor of the trip, getting your name the sponsor t-shirts that we'll be wearing, and you'll be featured on Mike's blog and video channel too!

 

It's just a bit of fun of course - but what's wrong with helping to create a bit of fun? :)

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're asking for £500 (in an ideal world) to pay for the trip, transport costs, and spending money while we're there.  We're going in November when it's going to be cheaper, so we can keep costs down.

 

We have tons of perks for you, and the great thing is that you can get involved from just £1!  Yes, you can sponsor a third of a pint of beer, and you'll get your name on the sponsor t-shirt just for that.  Amazing, but true.  By default what we'll have printed is your name will be from your Indiegogo account, but if possible we'll try to get in touch to ask if you have an alternative - but be aware that we'll be up against it time-wise to get the t-shirts printed so if we do email, expect to have to respond quickly if you want a custom name.

 

So, if you want to sponsor a swift half, a pint (for either Graham or Mike - choose your favourite!), a round, or even a bed for the night, you can make that happen.  Check out the perks.

 

If we don't hit our target, that's fine, but every pound we do raise will go towards creating some great experiences.

 

Mike has done a successful Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign before, the Travelling Book Project, which enabled over twenty travelling journals to be sent around the world, visiting places such as the UK, Ohio, Las Vegas, Australia, and Germany.

 

We do also have some stretch goals - if we hit £1000 we'll look at sending beer mats to certain levels, and beyond that we'll look at unlocking more stretch goals!!  If we get a silly amount of money we may well produce the sponsor t-shirt for some supporters also.

 

Risks & Challenges

Risks - well, in life, there are always risks. Probably the biggest risk is that for you to get your name (or logo, if you're going for a big perk) onto the sponsor t-shirt we need those names in as soon as possible. We'll be using whatever name you use to support the project (and we do reserve the right to exclude any names which are a bit rude, sorry for that) but we'll need logos or special requests in asap to make them happen. Worst comes to worst - you'll be missed off the t-shirts. This will be a last resort, of course.

If we don't get anywhere near the target, we might have to rethink the t-shirts - the cost of printing 2 t-shirts for us isn't huge but is still a chunk of cash, so if we can't do it we may go for a low-budget option, like having your names stapled to a normal t-shirt.  No, I'm not looking forward to it either.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think this is an awesome project but not for you, that's fine.  But don't forget that you can use the Indiegogo share tools to share the project with friends, that would be lovely too :)

 

We have enabled "InDemand" so that donations can be given after the campaign ends.  Any money which rolls in afterwards will go towards future trips :)

 

Other Stuff

We ought to say that being a sponsor doesn't mean that we recommend or endorse you or your organisation in any way (although we're very grateful to you for sponsoring us!!!)

 

For those thinking about this as a business marketing proposition (haha), my blog - thoggy.blogspot.com - has had 25,000 views over its life, and according to Feedburner has currently over 40 subscribers. My YouTube channel - youtube.com/ravenswingthog - has 21,000 views and 99 subscribers. In the past I've been pleased to work with various brands and products such as Illumibowl, Little Party Parcels, Virtually Sorted, and Randomise.

story:
English & German version available.

 

The ButtHeater

The ButtHeater consists of a washable cover made of fine velour or polyester and the soft heating element. The heating element is composed of a foam-bearing element and the thin heating-wire net. The combination of cover and heating element forms the seat cushion with integrated heating blanket. In the package is a powerful Li-battery which provides energy for several hours of heat supply. All components are approved for the European market and are CE approved.

The ButtHeater adapts perfectly to any seating or chair and thus guarantees the best sitting comfort with guaranteed warm legs and butt.

The ButtHeater is easy to fit into any backpack or bag and can be taken anywhere for outdoor activities.

Not only we from the developer team, but also our friends and family, who tested the ButtHeater, where more than enthusiastic about the product. This is our greatest motivation and confidence to successfully launch the product.

More at www.buttheater.de

Where to use?

Everybody experienced it…. Dreamlike blue sky, you sit in the café, a beer garden, sports club or you are on tour in the nature, but unfortunately it is too cold to enjoy the atmosphere. This has happened too often to us! We now offer the solution. With the ButtHeater, freezing during chilling is a thing of the past. The smart designed heating wire net is arranged in such a way that heat from the seat cushion is radiated from the lower back region along the butt almost to the knee. The integrated heating blanket provides heat to the thighs, while at the same time ensuring that the heat remains on the body and is not released into the open air.

The Buttheater is therefore perfectly designed for outdoor activities or a visit to a restaurant in the open or under chilled rooms.

ButtHeater - battery seat cushion with a heated blanket - homely warmth to go

In contrast to a conventional heat blanket or power-operated heat seat cushion, which is used exclusively at home, the ButtHeater can be carried everywhere. Whether in the restaurant, beer garden or at sport events, the ButtHeater will keep you warm.

The powerful lithium-ion battery with a power supply of 32 watts and 5,200 mAh provides energy for several hours of heating. The intelligently arranged heating wire net converts the electrical power into heat energy and provides it gently to the body. It creates a pleasant warmth comparable to the warmth of a tiled stove.
The carefully tested ButtHeater battery seat cushion with integrated heating blanket has a modern design and complies with all safety standards. Thanks to the CE Certificate, all risks could be excluded.

Health benefits

The ButtHeater also warms you at minus degrees and can therefore have a health promoting effect. In this way, the warmth helps, among other things, relieve back pain or symptoms of arthritis. Should the wet-cold weather require sickness-related bed rest, the Buttheater will assist you during the regeneration. The rechargeable battery guarantees warmth in turn and ensures that the heat sink can be heated for long periods without long interruptions.

This is not a medical device, with any physical discomfort, we strongly recommend to see a doctor.

The next outdoor activity will come soon

Whether you're in to watch a football match, a carriage ride through the snowy winter wonderland or relaxing with a delicious cup of tea on the balcony - a rechargeable heating pad & heating blanket from the quality brand ButtHeater is the best heating solution for active people. No longer expected, the soft pillow can be rolled up comfortably and stored in a bag for the next use.

The initiators

The ButtHeater is a product from the SINNIKO Group. SINNIKO is a German-Chinese company that carries out industrialization projects for its customers. The company was founded in 2015. For more information, visit www.sinniko.com.

The SINNIKO team wants to get involved with the ButtHeater for the first time on end customer distribution (B2C). So far, we have no experience in this segment, which is why we are trying to gain some insight due to this campaign.

The product is our answer against freezing legs and butt's in the beer garden, outdoor activities or at home on the balcony. Together with our partners, we have developed and tested the ButtHeater. The results are very promising and especially the girls like it a lot! Let’s get it launched…

Der ButtHeater

Der ButtHeater besteht aus einem waschbaren Bezug aus feinem Velour oder Polyester und dem weichen Heizelement. Das Heizelement setzt sich aus einem Schaumstoffträgerelement und dem dünnen Heizdrähtegeflächt zusammen. Die Kombination aus Bezug und Heizelement bildet das Sitzkissen mit integrierter Heizdecke. Mit im Packet ist ein leistungsstarker Li-Akku der mehrere Stunden lang Energie zur Wärmeentwicklung liefert. Alle Komponenten sind für den Europäischen Markt zugelassen und CE geprüft.

Der ButtHeater passt sich jeder Sitzgelegenheit ideal an und garantiert somit besten Sitzkomfort bei garantiert warmen Beinen und Po.

Eingerollt passt der ButtHeater einfach in jeden Rucksack oder Tasche und kann somit überall mitgenommen werden.

Nicht nur wir aus dem Entwicklerteam, sondern auch unsere Bekannten, Freunde und Familie, die Gelegenheit hatten den ButtHeater zu testen, sind von dem Produkt mehr als begeistert. Das ist unsere größte Motivation und Zuversicht, das Produkt erfolgreich zu Launchen. 

Mehr dazu auf www.buttheater.de

Anwendungsbereiche

Wer kennt es nicht? Traumhaft blauer Himmel, du sitzt im Kaffee, Biergarten, Sportstätte oder bist auf Tour in der Natur, doch leider ist es zu kalt, um entspannt die Atmosphäre zu genießen. Zu oft ist uns das schon passiert! Wir haben jetzt die Antwort auf kalten Tage. Mit dem ButtHeater gehört frieren beim chillen der Vergangenheit an. Das intelligent ausgelegte Heizdrahtgeflecht ist so angeordnet, dass vom unteren Rückenbereich über den Po bis fast zu den Kniekehlen, Wärme vom Sitzkissen abgestrahlt wird. Die integrierte Heizdecke gibt dabei Wärme an die Oberschenkel ab und sorgt gleichzeitig dafür, dass die Wärme am Körper bleibt und nicht nach Oben ins Freie abgegeben wird.

Der Buttheater eignet sich daher optimal für Outdoor Aktivitäten oder einen Gaststättenbesuch im Freien bzw. unterkühlten Räumen.

ButtHeater Sitzkissen & Heizdecke - heimelige Wärme to go

Im Gegensatz zu einer herkömmlichen Wärmedecke oder strombetriebenen Wärme-Sitzkissen, die ausschließlich in den eigenen vier Wänden ihren Einsatz findet, kann der ButtHeater überall mitgenommen werden. Ob im Restaurant, Biergarten oder bei Sport Veranstaltungen im Freien oder Stadion, der ButtHeater garantiert für wohlige Wärme.

Der starke Lithium-Ionen-Akku mit einer Leistung von 32 Watt und 5.200 mAh liefert Energie für mehrerer Stunden. Das intelligent angeordnetem Heizdrahtgeflecht wandelt die elektrische Leistung in Wärmeenergie und gibt diese schonend an den Körper ab. Es entsteht eine angenehme Wärme, vergleichbar mit der Wärme eines Kachelofens.

Das sorgsam geprüfte ButtHeater Akku Sitzkissen mit integrierter Wärmedecke hat ein modernes Design und entspricht allen Sicherheitsstandards. Dank des CE Prüfsiegel konnten alle Risiken ausgeschlossen werden.

Gesundheitliches Plus für unterwegs

Neben den angenehmen Temperaturen, die eine ButtHeater selbst hartnäckigen Minusgraden zum Trotz verlässlich offeriert, zeichnet sich das Produkt für draußen und drinnen als gesundheitsfördernde Investition aus. So vermag die Wärme das ButtHeaters, Rückenbeschwerden oder Symptome einer Arthritis punktuell zu lindern. Sollte das nasskalte Wetter seinen Tribut und krankheitsbedingte Bettruhe fordern, unterstützt eine Akku Heizdecke die körpereigene Regenerierungsphase nachhaltig. Der schnell aufladbare Akku garantiert Wärme im Handumdrehen und sorgt dafür, dass die Wärmedecke über einen längeren Zeitraum ohne große Unterbrechungen wärmen kann.

Es handelt sich hierbei nicht um ein medizinisches Gerät, bei körperlichen Beschwerden ist in jedem Fall ein Arzt aufzusuchen.

Das nächste Outdoor kommt bestimmt

Egal, ob beim anstehenden Fußballspiel, während einer Kutschenfahrt durch das verschneite Winterwunderland oder beim Entspannen mit einer schmackhaften Tasse Tee auf dem Balkon - ein Akku Heizkissen & Wärmedecke der Qualitätsmarke ButtHeater stellt die ideale Wärmelösung für Aktive dar. Benötigen Sie die praktische Funktionalität Ihrer Akku Heizdecke wider Erwarten nicht mehr, lässt sich das weiche Kissen bequem zusammenrollen und in einer Tasche für den nächsten Einsatz aufbewahren.

Die Initiatoren

Der ButtHeater ist ein Produkt aus der SINNIKO Gruppe. SINNIKO ist ein Deutsch-Chinesisches Unternehmen, das für seine Kunden Industrialisierungsprojekte realisiert. Gegründet wurde das Unternehmen 2015. Mehr dazu auf www.sinniko.com.

Das SINNIKO Team will sich mit dem ButtHeater zum ersten Mal auf Endkundenvertrieb (B2C) einlassen. Bisher haben wir in diesem Segment keine Erfahrungen weshalb wir versuchen über diese Kampagne erste Erkenntnisse zu sammeln.

Das Produkt ist unsere Antwort gegen frierende Beine und Po's im Biergarten, bei Outdoor Aktivitäten oder Zuhause auf dem Balkon. Zusammen mit unseren Partnern haben wir den ButtHeater entwickelt und getestet. Das Resultat hat uns so begeistert, dass wir mittels dieser Kampagne die Marktresonanz abfragen und die eingespielten Gelder für weitere Marketingmaßnahmen sowie den Aufbau von Vertriebswegen in Deutschland einsetzen wollen.

Sollte das nasskalte Wetter seinen Tribut und krankheitsbedingte Bettruhe fordern, unterstützt eine Akku Heizdecke die körpereigene Regenerierungsphase nachhaltig. Der schnell aufladbare Akku garantiert Wärme im Handumdrehen und sorgt dafür, dass die Wärmedecke über einen längeren Zeitraum ohne große Unterbrechungen wärmen kann.
Es handelt sich hierbei nicht um ein medizinisches Gerät, bei körperlichen Beschwerden ist in jedem Fall ein Arzt aufzusuchen.
Das nächste Outdoor kommt bestimmt
Egal, ob beim anstehenden Fußballspiel, während einer Kutschenfahrt durch das verschneite Winterwunderland oder beim Entspannen mit einer schmackhaften Tasse Tee auf dem Balkon - ein Akku Heizkissen & Wärmedecke der Qualitätsmarke ButtHeater stellt die ideale Wärmelösung für Aktive dar. Benötigen Sie die praktische Funktionalität Ihrer Akku Heizdecke wider Erwarten nicht mehr, lässt sich das weiche Kissen bequem zusammenrollen und in einer Tasche für den nächsten Einsatz aufbewahren.
Die Initiatoren
Der ButtHeater ist ein Produkt aus der SINNIKO Gruppe. SINNIKO ist ein Deutsch-Chinesisches Unternehmen, das für seine Kunden Industrialisierungsprojekte realisiert. Gegründet wurde das Unternehmen 2015. Mehr dazu auf www.sinniko.com.
Das SINNIKO Team will sich mit dem ButtHeater zum ersten Mal auf Endkundenvertrieb (B2C) einlassen. Bisher haben wir in diesem Segment keine Erfahrungen weshalb wir versuchen über diese Kampagne erste Erkenntnisse zu sammeln.
Das Produkt ist unsere Antwort gegen frierende Beine und Po's im Biergarten, bei Outdoor Aktivitäten oder Zuhause auf dem Balkon. Zusammen mit unseren Partnern haben wir den ButtHeater entwickelt und getestet. Das Resultat hat uns so begeistert, dass wir mittels dieser Kampagne die Marktresonanz abfragen und die eingespielten Gelder für weitere Marketingmaßnahmen sowie den Aufbau von Vertriebswegen in Deutschland einsetzen wollen.

story: Join our NEW 2017 Haiti campaign at https://www.hipporoller.org/haiti
story_txt: Join our NEW 2017 Haiti campaign at https://www.hipporoller.org/haiti

story:
Airlines wait times are only getting longer and I am here to tell you about a solution that will revolutionize the way we board and deplane airplanes.  If you have traveled on an airplane, then you know exactly what I am talking about.  The long wait you cannot avoid getting on and off the airplane.  Every flight, every airline and every zone has the same problem.  You hurry to get in line only to find yourself waiting to get through several segmented lines.  You have the line to scan your ticket, then a line in the connector hallway, and then a line when stepping on the plane and another to find your seat, and one more to place your bag and get seated.  And this all happens after you spent 40 minutes waiting for your zone to be called.

Often times we spend more time waiting than actually on our flight.  This fact is exactly how I came up with my solution.  A few years ago I realized I was waiting longer than I was flying.  Then I started to research and I realized that the airlines are only making money when airplanes are flying.  So the airlines want a solution just as badly as the disgruntled flier.  And this was the beginning of my journey.

Several months and over 2,100 hours of researching, simulating, testing, and prototyping, later, Dynaerobridge, a jet way that provides multiple access points to aircraft, has sparked the interest of airports and was selected as first-place winner of Discovery Day, a research competition hosted by the Office of Undergraduate Research at Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University, Florida on April 13. Dynaerobridge was also the recipient of the People’s Choice Award at the “Launch Your Venture” Entrepreneurship Expo at Embry-Riddle’s College of Business on April 12.

I want you to see the vision behind this venture, so I’ve explained more about it below. You’ll find out WHAT I am doing, WHEN I am doing it, WHO I am, WHY this campaign matters so much, and HOW you can help.


Last Spring I worked with Airline Optimization and Simulation System experts to test the time savings capability of Dynaerobridge. We tested Dynaerobridge in worse case scenarios to see the minimum amount of boarding and deplaning time that could be saved if airlines adopted this innovative jet bridge. Using our proprietary method, it takes on average, 7 to 9 minutes  to board 137 passengers with carry-ons through the front and rear door of a Boeing 737-700. This time savings is ground breaking considering that it currently takes airlines 30-40 minutes to board the same number of passengers. Similarly, using Dynaerobridge, deplaning 137 passengers only takes on average, 5 to 7 minutes.  Again, this is revolutionary!  


Dynaerobridge is an add-on system that can be attached to existing jet bridges, allowing passengers to board or disembark an airplane through multiple access doors, simultaneously. Dynaerobridge offers airlines and airports worldwide a cost-effective solution to increase efficiency, customer satisfaction, and profitability.


As you can see from the video, by removing the issue of that gridlock as everyone enters through the same door,  Dynaerobridge makes it easy for everyone to get on and off the plane fast and safe.


Most air travelers have common story of misery about their experience during the boarding process through a single door.  But that is about to change. Dynaerobridge will allow passenger to exit the aircraft through the access door closer to their seat, removing the need to exit the aircraft through a single door, which is usually at the forward side of the aircraft. With Dynaerobridge, passengers with tight connecting flights can exit the aircraft in time to catch their next flight.

The usage of Dynaerobridge means that you would be able get to your gate 10 minutes before departure and still be able to catch your flight. It means less missed connecting flights, easy boarding for the handicapped, elderly, those traveling with infants, more time in the air and less waiting, happier customers, more revenue for airlines, lower ticket costs for those who like to fly with low cost carriers, and overall a more seamless flying experience for everyone: pilots, operators, flyers and flight attendants.  And this is what we have been looking for so long.  A solution that pleases every party while remaining safe, cost effective and enjoyable.

The purpose of this campaign is to raise  money to create further test the design and engineering features of Dynaerobridge. This will be accomplished through  the development of a scaled model prototype. Once the design and engineering testings are complete, the next phase will be to enter into licensing agreement with companies who already manufacture jet ways.

The prices for jetways  can go anywhere between $350K to $4M   so in order to begin manufacturing Dynaerobridge myself, I will need at least $5M. Although I will be amazed and humbled if I could raise that amount here on Indiegogo,  at this initial stage, I am considering licensing Dynaerobridge so it can get to airports as soon as possible.  

From my end, I have single handedly funded this project from design to getting a patent. That is because because I believe in the Dynaerobridge’s potential of making air travel less stressful for frequent air travelers. You too can contribute to see this dream come true!


I have taken the time to get nearly everything in place before launching this campaign. I took the risk up front by delaying the launch of this campaign until I believed it was ready, to lessen the risk to my backers. I have worked with industry experts to test the Dynaerobridge’s time savings, and the results are remarkable. There is little or no risk here. As explained earlier, Jet ways cost anywhere from $350K to $4M each so my intention is not to start production. Rather, my goal is to raise enough money to develop a demonstration prototype, which will be used to pitch to those who have the means to make the Dynaerobridge a reality such as airport and airlines.  I have the backing of a great team so I don't predict many obstacles here.  But there is always the unknown. I will face every obstacle with the same tenacity and perseverance that I have had from the start.


Money is not everything. If you are still reading this, it means that you are interest in seeing Dynaerobridge become something that can be seen at every airport and I really appreciate you for that. You can help me reach my funding goal by sharing this campaign using Indiegogo share tools on your social media page so we can get Dynaerobridge trending.


First off, yes my real name is Dynamite.  So you can imagine the pressure I feel with a name like that. (kidding) Dynamite originates from the Greek word – “Dunamis” which means power.  So my goal is to use my strength in problem solving, my devotion to learning and my passion for helping others, to make this come to life.

I was born in the war-torn part of northern Nigeria but I immigrated to the USA in 2010 to pursue my passion for aviation. Currently, I am an aerospace engineering senior at Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University, Florida. I am concentrating in aeronautics with minors in aeronautical studies, aviation safety, and commercial space operations. I have worked on several aerospace projects including a Single Person Spacecraft (SPS), as well as a low –orbital, Satellite Imaging System.  I have  also played the role of chairperson for the design, construction and development of Eco-dolphin, a fleet of three Autonomous Underwater Vehicle, designed to monitor coastal environments and help researchers study underwater life. 


Because it will be unrealistic and of no use to ship a Dynaerobridge to each supporter, I had to come up with a smart and creative way to reward Dynaerobridge's fans for all their support and donations. I am very blessed to have the support of great artists from different parts of the world who have agreed to help me out with my perks. These artists see the potential in Dynaerobridge and its potential to change the way we board and exit airplanes that they all have gone  out of their ways to release the rights of their work at no additional cost. In order words, you are free to use the perk(s) you get through this campaign for anything you like because you will not be infringing on, or violating the artist's copyrights. 


Description:

Now you have the best Happy Birthday Greetings Video for your loved ones. With your support of $15 towards Dynaerobridge, Miss DragonFly will make you a video like the one in the sample above, and you’ll receive it in  full HD, with background music included.

What’s needed to make your video:

  • Age on the Cake
  • Birthday celebrant’s name
  • Sender’s name
  • Your wordings to go on the small card which has sender’s name
What will you get:

  • Full HD video 1920 x 1080
  • Delivered in MP4 format
  • Background music included ( you can provide your's if you  don't like the one used in the same)


Description:

For your support of $20, you can get up to 200 words recorded by a professional voice over actor. This perk is great for those looking for voice overs for phone greetings. narrations, online projects, audio books, business training tutorials, Youtube videos, etc. The voice over artist will record exactly what you give him so ensure that you proof read your script as no check will be made for  grammar  before recording.

What is not permitted:

Please be aware that I cannot offer voices that includes any of the following:

  • Multiple voices
  • Fake testimonials
  • Sexual content
  • Swearing
  • Inflammatory content towards specific organizations, people or groups
What you will get:
  • Up to 200 words professionally recorded 
  • Delivered in MP3/WAV format

Note: This perk is only for up to 200 words so you'll need to order more perks for scripts longer than 200 words. Example: you will need to get two perks for a script of 300 words. Also, the voice over does not include background music. 


Description:
Make a caricature or cartoon to capture your special moment  or use it as your social media profile picture. This perk is also perfect for a gift to your friends, family or coworkers. It won't fail to put a smile on somebody's face. 
What I'll need from you:
  • A good quality photograph
  • Specify whether you want a  cartoon portrait- with normal body size as shown in 1, or a caricature drawing - with big head and small body or drawn as 2. 
What you will get:
  • Half body or head to shoulder cartoon/caricature with  simple background drawing with 1600 X 1600px size
  • JPG format photo


Description:

Do you love your pet? Do you really love your pet? Do you really, really, love your pet? Ok maybe you don't love your pet that much but know someone who does. This is a perfect gift to give a pet an honor in the family. For your support of $25, you can get this. All you have to do is send me high quality photograph of your pet preferably from head to chest.

What will you get:

  • 1 figure head to chest portrait of your pet in 8000 pixels
  • Delivered in JPG/PNG
  • Includes colors in illustration
  • Printable file resolution



Nothing beats caricature cartoon. This perk is a great surprise gift idea. It is also a perfect gift item for that person you don't know what to get. This is the only reward with different prices so be sure to read the description and prices before choosing a perk. For your support of $25, $35, $40 or $50, you will get a style of caricature that uses clean lines, and sharp colors for a fun, cartoonish effect as seen in the sample above. 

Prices:

  • 1 person caricature  in BLACK & WHITE. ---------------- $25
  • 1 person caricature  in COLOR ----------------------------- $35
  • 2 persons caricature in BLACK & WHITE ----------------$40
  • 2 persons caricature in COLOR ----------------------------$50
 What you will get:
  • Head and shoulders hand drawn caricature
  • Delivered in JPG and PNG format
  • Print ready 300dpi
Photo tips for the best Caricature possible:
  • Clear picture of entire head and shoulders
  • Person(s) should be well lit (no dim or dark night shots)
  • Person(s) should be smiling! (or wearing whatever expression you want in the piece)



Cement your love in awesomeness! Impress your special love with this amazing video that tells your love story in a popup style... it is witty, cute, and unique! It will certainly be a video to remember.  You can email it to him/her, post it on his/her FaceBook, twitter, instagram page, or play it at dinner! Support Dynaerobridge with $35 and make someone feel special and loved.
This perk is perfect for:
  • Just to say I love you..
  • Anniversary
  • Birthday
  • Surprise gift 
What I'll need from you:
  •  3  photos or 3 short video clips of up to 9 seconds each 
  • short message to place on the front of the book
  • short message to show at the end of the video.
  • Your name (as you want it to appear in the video)
What you will get a full HD 1080p video with your messages, and videos or photos sent to your email. 


Give your pet an honor in the home by creating a splendid art gallery from your favorite pet photograph. Choose this perk and send me your image in good quality and I'll turn it into a top-notch oil painting which you can frame or hang on the wall. Note: the $35 is for a one-figure oil pet drawing. If you want a drawing of more than one pet together, say a cat and dog then you'll need to order two perks ($70) etc. 
What you will get:
  •   Oil painting of your pet(s)
  • Delivered in JPEG, PNG, and PSD formats
  • Portrait in 8 x 10''  300dpi ready for print on canvas or art paper


Here's another awesome gift idea. Turn your photo into a cartoon picture! Besides surprising someone with a cartoon of themselves, there is a lot you can do with this perk. You can:
  • Print it , frame it, put it on your desk, or use it as your computer/phone wallpaper or screen saver.
  • Create custom invitation cards such as birthday, graduation, anniversary,  etc.
  • Use it as social media profile picture for FaceBook, Twitter, Instagram and so on.

After completing the payment process, e-mail me the photo you wish to turn into a cartoon.The photo should be high resolution; it should show a single person in the foreground (head or head and shoulders is preferred but, you can also send a full body photograph). Choose a photo with a good light and no blur.

 You will get a ONE PERSON HEADSHOT  of  1800 x 1800  pixels, jpg file.


I feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read this campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping me spread the word.  I have spent the last few months working hard to bring my vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute. Thanks to all my generous supporters!  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. I will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped me achieve.

even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. I will continue to keep you posted
on what your donation helped me achieve.

story:
«Map&Life» is:

 

More about «Map&Life»

     

 

Activity

If you want to gather a team of people for certain activities, but don’t have enough people who would join you – just add your activity into the system, connect with a map (optional), set privacy settings, and other users will instantly see your mark on the map (or list). In this section you can easily share your pictures, files, comments, discussions, news, and in the end of the event, participants will be able to evaluate and share their experience.

Also, you can make a request for any other activity around you.

Events

You can see those activities that are taking place at this moment around you. For example - your friends went to the beach. If you have an authorized access to that event in the system, you can read discussions, comment, view published photos and files.

Help

Let's say you have an accident on the road, or you get into an uncomfortable situation in a strange city (or country). Just put your request mark on the map and people nearby you will be notified that you need help. There is also an option to make a quick mark (in the case of the attempted assault, life threatening situations, etc.).

Discussions

Any topics discussion, including questions related to assistance, tips and news. You can share your opinion; get your friends’ opinion, and users’ around you.

Advertising

Advertising is the only source of income of our project, which is why we will encourage our active users who are viewing it. In the project it is very limited. There will be no forced views, banners, pop-up menus, or advertisements that cover the entire screen. There will be allowed only the advertising that may be interesting to you, complies with all project rules and laws of the country in which you are located. If you will notice an advertisement label on the map near you, or you might see it on the list - viewing this ad will give you nice benefits in form of a free participation in raffle prizes, special promotions and many other advantages.

You can also publish in agreement with us your own advertisement.

Promotions

Special labels next to the user location are generated either randomly or for certain points; they allow user to get valuable prizes and awards. For example, you get valuable rewards for participating in 100 events or view 500 commercials.

Special locations

Locations, where user has more chances to get prizes, bonuses and other nice benefits.

Meeting

The system will prompt you to use a dating service. After your consent it will search for the most suitable for you candidates located close to you. Places with the most suitable candidates will be marked with a special label on the map.

It may be interesting

Creation of special labels that inform user about what took place here before, what kind of interesting events or activities, or what's going on at this place frequently, and other interesting facts.  

 

User has following opportunities:

 

Security, data protection and privacy

We pay significant attention to one of the most important points - data security, both at the stage of system development, and during its operation. We attract the best experts in information security, use strong encryption algorithms and advanced data protection methods. We do not share user data to third parties and securely protect them. Information on dating service is only available to potential partners.

Our team

Our team members are high-level professionals, who have graduated from prestigious schools, worked in leading companies and employed in management positions. Our team at this moment is represented by programmers, designers, information security experts. We are confident in our project’s success. All the technology that we use is feasible: we developed the key algorithms of the system, database structure, system testing prototype and its design. Of course, something still needs to be processed, analyzed, improved; something needs to be created from scratch; the creation of the project will take some time, but it will be created.

The money that we collect will be spent on salaries of our employees, full staff recruitment, rent of the servers, and advertising campaign.

Our plans for the future are - to develop and improve this project, to work hard for the public good.

Rewards

We offer unique and valuable rewards for you:

 

Thank you for your attention to the project. The awards we offer in exchange for your investment are very promising and unique. In case of success, and we will achieve it, what you get is more valuable than what you have invested.

Special thanks to those who supports our project, who became part of it. We won’t let you down, and will not disappoint you! Our team will keep you informed of all stages of the project, its’ features, and of course - success!

story:
Puede ver la versión en español más abajo.

 

About my wife and me

 

     We have just started to built our dream: we have bought the land that we have been waiting for so long. Now we can start building our own Hotel. And we want to share this dream, good feelings and good times with all of you. Have you ever been sleeping and having fun in a hotel that you have contributed to built? I’m sure never. This is your chance. Feel in our private paradise like you are at home. Welcome.

 

Montse & Jaume, the owners.

 

About the place     

 

Have you ever been to the Dominican Republic?

  • If the answer is yes I’m sure you know that this is a really wonderful country, with an exciting nature, paradisiac beaches, sunsets for falling in love, and wonderful people.

 

Spectacular beaches like “Playa Bonita”

 

Sunsets to fall in love

 

Wild and virgin corners

 

  • If the answer is no, what are you waiting for? You will never have a better chance to get into the paradise.

 

 

 

  • But this time forget about All Inclusive mega-structures. We offer you an unforgetable experience in Las Terrenas, in a small hotel with 10 rooms, with a personal treatment and where we will personally advise you about travel and fantastic places to visit. You will discover the authentic Dominican way of live.

 

  • Also, here in Samaná, from January to March you will be able to observe humpback whales in their spectacular trip to the hot and calm caribbean ocean water

 

 

About the Hotel

 

     Right now we are working in the plan and adjusting the construction budget. The hotel is situated 400 meters from the beach named Playa Punta Popy, in Las Terrenas, in the north coast of Dominican Republic.

 

 

The houses will be built in a creole-victorian style, very similar to this 3D recreations:

 

 

You will find:

  • 8 double rooms of 31 square meters each with 7 square meters of terrace, complete bathroom with shower, big closet, queen size bed, air conditioning and private external shower.
  • 2 double rooms with the same characteristics as the other ones but with a private external jacuzzi.
  • Free wi-fi
  • A swimming pool with a wide place to sunbath or simply rest in the comfortable loungers.
  • Private, guarded and free parking.
  • 24 hours surveillance.
  • Common area for breakfast and bar service under an spectacular and cozy palapa.

 

 

  • Big smiles. Shoes are optional.
  • Punta Popy Hotel will only allow guests over 16 years old and will not accept any kind of pets.

 

Let’s go

 

     We need the funds for the total construction of the hotel. The construction will start in December 2018 - January 2019 and will take 6 or 7 months. We will be ready to receive our guests and friends in September 2019.

    This will be a living project that you can follow in our instagram (hotelpuntapopy). We will update once or twice a month with pictures and/or videos the evolution of construction so you can see the results of your collaborations and you can start the countdown for your holidays.

     Right now we are ready to show you the project blueprints that we have just finished:

 

Overview.

 

View in sections.

 

Overview 3D recreation.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

     If you just can't contribute or it doesn’t fancy to you that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • We will really appreciate if you can share this campaign with friends in your social media. 
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools that you can find on the right upper corner of this campaign.

Thank you very much. See you in Las Terrenas. We will be waiting for you at Punta Popy Hotel.

 

 

 

Sobre mi y mi mujer

 

Hemos empezado a construir nuestro sueño: ya hemos comprado el terreno que tanto tiempo hemos estado esperando. Ahora podemos empezar a construir nuestro propio hotel. Y queremos compartir este sueño, estos sentimientos, y este gran momento con todos vosotros. Has estado alguna vez durmiendo y disfrutando en un hotel que has ayudado a construir?. Estamos seguros de que nunca. Esta es tu oportunidad. Siéntete  en nuestro paraíso  privado como si estuvieras en tu casa. Bienvenido.

Montse y Jaume, los propietarios.

 

Acerca del lugar   

 

Has estado alguna vez en República Dominicana?

  • Si la respuesta es si estamos seguros que sabes que se trata de un país precioso con una naturaleza exultante, unas playas paradisíacas, unas puestas de sol que enamoran y una gente maravillosa.

 

Playas espectaculares como Playa Bonita

 

Puestas de sol para enamorarse

 

Rincones salvajes y virgenes para descubrir

 

  • Si la respuesta es no, a qué esperas? No tendrás ninguna oportunidad mejor para disfrutar del paraíso.

 

 

Pero esta vez olvídate de los megacomplejos de todo incluido. Te ofrecemos una experiencia inolvidable en Las Terrenas, en un pequeño hotel con 10 habitaciones, con un trato personalizado y donde te asesoraremos sobre las excursiones y sitios fantásticos que conocer. Descubrirás el auténtico estilo de vida dominicano.

 

Además aquí en Samaná, desde el mes de Enero hasta el mes de Marzo se pueden observar las ballenas jorobadas en su viaje hacia las calientes y tranquilas aguas del caribe.

 

 

Acerca del Hotel

 

Ahora mismo estamos trabajando en los planos y ajustando el presupuesto de construcción.

El hotel está situado en Las Terrenas, provincia de Samaná, al norte de la República Dominicana y a 400 metros de Playa Punta Popy.

 

 

Las casas estarán construidas al estilo criollo victoriano muy parecidas a estas recreaciones en 3D :

 

 

Estará compuesto de:

  • 8 habitaciones dobles de 31 m2 cada una con 7m2 de terraza, baño completo con ducha, armario grande, cama doble tamaño queen, aire acondicionado y ducha exterior privada.
  • 2 habitaciones superiores de iguales características que las anteriores pero con jacuzzi privado exterior.
  • WiFi gratis.
  • Piscina con amplias zonas para tomar el sol y relajarse en cómodas tumbonas.
  • Parking privado gratis vigilado.
  • Vigilancia 24 horas.
  • Zona común de desayuno y servicio de bar bajo una espectacular palapa.

 

 

  • Los zapatos son opcionales.
  • El Hotel Punta Popy será un hotel sólo para mayores de 16 años, y no se aceptarán ningún tipo de mascotas.

 

Empezamos !!!

 

   Necesitamos los fondos para la construcción total del hotel. Empezará a construirse entre Diciembre de 2018 y Enero de 2019, y la construcción durará entre 6 y 7 meses. Tendremos todo listo para nuestros clientes y amigos para Septiembre de 2019.

   Este será un proyecto vivo, que podréis seguir dia a dia en nuestro instagram (hotelpuntapopy). Iremos actualizando una o dos veces al mes con fotos y videos la evolución de la construcción. Así podréis ver el resultado de vuestras colaboraciones y podréis ir haciendo la cuenta atrás para vuestras vacaciones.

   Actualmente os podemos enseñar los planos generales que acabamos de terminar:

 

Vista general.

 

Vista en secciones

 

Vista general en recreación 3D

 

Otras formas en que puedes colaborar

 

A lo mejor tu no puedes contribuir en nuestra campaña o simplemente no te apetece, pero te agradeceríamos muchísimo que la compartas en tus redes sociales, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, o que compartas el link a todos tus contactos de watsapp, para que tus amigos y familiares nos conozcan. Gracias.

Puedes utilizar también las herramientas de Indiegogo que tienes en la esquina derecha superior de esta campaña.

Nos vemos en Las Terrenas. Te esperamos en el Hotel Punta Popy.

story:
--- PLEASE EMAIL US YOUR SHOE SIZE AFTER COMPLETING YOUR PURCHASE --- Are you thinking of buying in multiples? Let me know how many Sole-Safes you would like and I will create a special perk just for you ---

Introducing the Original Sole-Safe, a smart and effective way to tuck away some back-up cash while trotting the globe. Keep yourself safe from pickpockets and have that cash that pays for your trip to the next consulate, your hotel, or a replacement passport.

  

Sole-Safe, the insole that doubles as a hiding spot for your back-up cash just in case your wallet goes missing.

I trotted the globe for many years, and, like anyone who loves to travel, spent many a days worrying about the safety of my hard earned cash.     

             

During my travels, I met numerous people who lost all their money, credit cards, and passport. Some fell victim to a pair of nifty long-fingers where others simply forgot part of their luggage while getting on or off a bus, plane, train or ferry. 

Having a few bills tucked away in a place that is least likely to fall into the hands of the criminal minded can make all the difference.

Sole-Safes are made from genuine leather and water resistant fabric. Both sides, left and right, have a pocket sewn under. 

Lost your wallet on a crazy night out? Have that cab fare hidden in your Sole-Safe!

        

Sole-Safes make great gifts for: 

  • Anyone who loves to travel, may it be your children, friends, or classmates. 
  • Your elderly parents touring Italy or spending their winters in a more pleasant climate.
  • Snowbirds (that's a Canadian thing :))
  • Exchange students. 
  • Business travellers who go to places of lesser safety.
  • NGO's and volunteers who try to make the world a better place. 
  • Really anyone can benefit from a little extra safety pretty much anywhere in the world.
  • Think Christmas: Sole-Safes make great stocking stuffers!

Volunteering in Peru or teaching English in Shanghai? Sole-Safe is for you!

On beer tour in Europe! Dude, you need Sole-Safe!

Exploring Uzbekistan or Bhutan? Don’t leave without Sole-Safe!

Sole-Safes are safest on your feet. So if you take your shoes off to enter that temple in Chiang Mai don’t leave them out for the taking! 

         

Other ways to benefit from Sole-Safes are:

  • Getting stuck in a disaster zone. 
  • You spent all your cash on your stag or bachelor party in Las Vegas and find yourself "Hangover" style in the wrong part of town, your wallet is missing, and the only thing you are wearing are your shoes.
  • Being involved in an accident while travelling.
  • Your credit card is short $50 on that 800 Dollar pair of shoes you really want. Then you suddenly remember that you have some cash hidden in your shoe.
  • You simply want to make sure that your children will never get stuck somewhere in a situation where they cannot make their way back home.
  • If the world is your playground....

Living in a large metropolis? Are thieves and pickpockets part of your landscape? You don't need to travel to justify a pair of Sole-Safes! All you need is to live in a not-so-safe-kind-of-place. 

 

Stinky money?

We tested Sole-Safes for several months traveling through Europe and Asia and found that there was no unpleasant smell on the bills we walked on. However, if you should have concerns based on your own stinky feet being stinkier than mine or those of my friends, you can always use a small ziplock bag to protect your hard earned cash from money munching bacteria. But then again, better to have some stinky money than have no money at all...

The Dont's

We do not recommend inserting credit cards into our product or over-stuffing it with money. However, a photocopy of your travel documents may be wise to add as a backup to assist with their replacement in case of loss.

Sole-Safe does not condone the illegal import/export of money or counterban.

If you should be so unlucky that you do lose the content of your Sole-Safes, we from Sole-Safe shall, of course, not be held responsible under any circumstances.

All our packaging will be PLASTIC FREE!!! Sole-Safe is for a clean environment, everywhere! Please reduce your use of plastic products while travelling. Plastic is poison.

Sizes

Clearly state your shoe size in an email to us! You can use US/Canadian, UK, or Euro sizing, or measure your feet in centimeters or inches. 

Sole-Safe comes in sizes of i.e. 5-6, 7-8, 9-10, 11-12 etc.. You may need to trim your Sole-Safes slightly for that perfect fit. A sizing pattern is included in your package.

What We Need & What You Get

Phase 1

The dream of any entrepreneur is always to start with a big bang. I have learned throughout my life that it pays to be patient and plan in stages. So here is my plan for phase 1:

  • Raise CAD$12,000 to be able to go back to Thailand and purchase at least 1000 genuine leather insoles.
  • Purchase enough water resistant fabric to be able to have all 1000+ Sole-Safes completed.
  • Have marketing materials and plastic-free packaging printed.
  • $12,000 is not much but will get me going. I might not be able to take much profit at this point, if any, but it will be enough to get the ball rolling.

At this point, I am able to source out manual labour to an experienced individual with a sewing machine, or small sewing shop.

Phase 2

To be able to set up my own shop in Thailand with only CAD$12,000 is rather unrealistic and hence calls for phase 2:

  • Once I have established my systems and produced the first 1000+ units, I will step up my marketing strategy and advertise Sole-Safe with the goal of 1000+ orders per month.
  • I will advertise Sole-Safe to stores as well as online.
  • This is also where I will be able to commit to renting a space, buying equipment like sewing machines and cutting tables, and hiring my own team; a seamstresses or two, a shipper, and someone to process incoming orders.
  • But first things first, let’s focus on phase 1 for now.

What you get in return for backing my campaign is a super deal on the pre-purchase of your Sole-Safes.

The Impact

I truly believe in my idea and being able to jumpstart it on Indiegogo would mean that I am actually creating a viable business that allows me to pay fair, living wages to the people I am working with, while equally making and honest living to support my own family.

Risks & Challenges

My main challenge is that I will not get enough orders to be able to immediately manufacture in Thailand. To set up shop there, I will need approximately 1000 pre-orders. And even at that point it will be a tight squeeze.

However, regardless of how many Sole-Safes I am able to pre-sell through my Indiegogo campaign, I guarantee you your purchase. I have been an entrepreneur and craftsman for most of my adult life and am more than happy to make every single Sole-Safe in my living room until all orders have been satisfied.

So even though my preference is to create a company that offers opportunities to low income families in Thailand earning a fair, living wage, I have no problem with getting my own hands involved in production.

Returns

If we accidentally sent you the wrong size, or if there is anything wrong with your Sole-Safes, we will send you a replacement free of charge and you are welcome to keep the pair that we sent you in error. Clear proof of damage or wrong sizing must be included in your documentation. I.e. a photo with a measuring tape next to your unaltered Sole-Safes or pictures of inadequate stitching will do the job.

If, by accident, you ordered the wrong size we would like to suggest that you gift the erroneously ordered pair to friend or family member and order a new pair at your own expense. Your return shipping charges in addition to our ridiculous $10 you-ordered-the-wrong-size-return-fee adds up to pretty much the same price of a new pair. So make sure you order the right size. Our price guarantee will make sure that you will pay no more than you paid for your initial purchase, even if the Perk you chose should not be available any longer. 

Please expect normal wear and tear, nothing lasts forever. However, you should be able to get great mileage out of your purchase.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share my campaign with your family, friends, clients, customers and coworkers. Please share through your social network in any way you feel comfortable and as many times as you like. 

Please share share share…

Thank you's

Big thanks go out to my friends Richard, who was my cameraman, and Grant, who gave me such a fantastic product review in my video. Also, I would like to thank everyone who believed in me and supported my efforts in this campaign. A huge thank you to the generous couple who gifted me their vintage sewing machine so I was able to make my prototypes. And of course, thanks to my super hot girlfriend who put up with me during all my ups and down while working on this exciting, new project. Happy trails everyone...
story_txt:
--- PLEASE EMAIL US YOUR SHOE SIZE AFTER COMPLETING YOUR PURCHASE --- Are you thinking of buying in multiples? Let me know how many Sole-Safes you would like and I will create a special perk just for you ---Introducing the Original Sole-Safe, a smart and effective way to tuck away some back-up cash while trotting the globe. Keep yourself safe from pickpockets and have that cash that pays for your trip to the next consulate, your hotel, or a replacement passport.  Sole-Safe, the insole that doubles as a hiding spot for your back-up cash just in case your wallet goes missing.I trotted the globe for many years, and, like anyone who loves to travel, spent many a days worrying about the safety of my hard earned cash.                  During my travels, I met numerous people who lost all their money, credit cards, and passport. Some fell victim to a pair of nifty long-fingers where others simply forgot part of their luggage while getting on or off a bus, plane, train or ferry. Having a few bills tucked away in a place that is least likely to fall into the hands of the criminal minded can make all the difference.Sole-Safes are made from genuine leather and water resistant fabric. Both sides, left and right, have a pocket sewn under. Lost your wallet on a crazy night out? Have that cab fare hidden in your Sole-Safe!        Sole-Safes make great gifts for: 
Anyone who loves to travel, may it be your children, friends, or classmates. 
Your elderly parents touring Italy or spending their winters in a more pleasant climate.
Snowbirds (that's a Canadian thing :))
Exchange students. 
Business travellers who go to places of lesser safety.
NGO's and volunteers who try to make the world a better place. 
Really anyone can benefit from a little extra safety pretty much anywhere in the world.
Think Christmas: Sole-Safes make great stocking stuffers!
Volunteering in Peru or teaching English in Shanghai? Sole-Safe is for you!On beer tour in Europe! Dude, you need Sole-Safe!Exploring Uzbekistan or Bhutan? Don’t leave without Sole-Safe!Sole-Safes are safest on your feet. So if you take your shoes off to enter that temple in Chiang Mai don’t leave them out for the taking!          Other ways to benefit from Sole-Safes are:
Getting stuck in a disaster zone. 
You spent all your cash on your stag or bachelor party in Las Vegas and find yourself "Hangover" style in the wrong part of town, your wallet is missing, and the only thing you are wearing are your shoes.
Being involved in an accident while travelling.
Your credit card is short $50 on that 800 Dollar pair of shoes you really want. Then you suddenly remember that you have some cash hidden in your shoe.
You simply want to make sure that your children will never get stuck somewhere in a situation where they cannot make their way back home.
If the world is your playground....
Living in a large metropolis? Are thieves and pickpockets part of your landscape? You don't need to travel to justify a pair of Sole-Safes! All you need is to live in a not-so-safe-kind-of-place.  Stinky money?We tested Sole-Safes for several months traveling through Europe and Asia and found that there was no unpleasant smell on the bills we walked on. However, if you should have concerns based on your own stinky feet being stinkier than mine or those of my friends, you can always use a small ziplock bag to protect your hard earned cash from money munching bacteria. But then again, better to have some stinky money than have no money at all...The Dont'sWe do not recommend inserting credit cards into our product or over-stuffing it with money. However, a photocopy of your travel documents may be wise to add as a backup to assist with their replacement in case of loss.Sole-Safe does not condone the illegal import/export of money or counterban.If you should be so unlucky that you do lose the content of your Sole-Safes, we from Sole-Safe shall, of course, not be held responsible under any circumstances.All our packaging will be PLASTIC FREE!!! Sole-Safe is for a clean environment, everywhere! Please reduce your use of plastic products while travelling. Plastic is poison.SizesClearly state your shoe size in an email to us! You can use US/Canadian, UK, or Euro sizing, or measure your feet in centimeters or inches. Sole-Safe comes in sizes of i.e. 5-6, 7-8, 9-10, 11-12 etc.. You may need to trim your Sole-Safes slightly for that perfect fit. A sizing pattern is included in your package.What We Need & What You GetPhase 1The dream of any entrepreneur is always to start with a big bang. I have learned throughout my life that it pays to be patient and plan in stages. So here is my plan for phase 1:
Raise CAD$12,000 to be able to go back to Thailand and purchase at least 1000 genuine leather insoles.
Purchase enough water resistant fabric to be able to have all 1000+ Sole-Safes completed.
Have marketing materials and plastic-free packaging printed.
$12,000 is not much but will get me going. I might not be able to take much profit at this point, if any, but it will be enough to get the ball rolling.
At this point, I am able to source out manual labour to an experienced individual with a sewing machine, or small sewing shop.Phase 2To be able to set up my own shop in Thailand with only CAD$12,000 is rather unrealistic and hence calls for phase 2:
Once I have established my systems and produced the first 1000+ units, I will step up my marketing strategy and advertise Sole-Safe with the goal of 1000+ orders per month.
I will advertise Sole-Safe to stores as well as online.
This is also where I will be able to commit to renting a space, buying equipment like sewing machines and cutting tables, and hiring my own team; a seamstresses or two, a shipper, and someone to process incoming orders.
But first things first, let’s focus on phase 1 for now.
What you get in return for backing my campaign is a super deal on the pre-purchase of your Sole-Safes.The ImpactI truly believe in my idea and being able to jumpstart it on Indiegogo would mean that I am actually creating a viable business that allows me to pay fair, living wages to the people I am working with, while equally making and honest living to support my own family.Risks & ChallengesMy main challenge is that I will not get enough orders to be able to immediately manufacture in Thailand. To set up shop there, I will need approximately 1000 pre-orders. And even at that point it will be a tight squeeze.However, regardless of how many Sole-Safes I am able to pre-sell through my Indiegogo campaign, I guarantee you your purchase. I have been an entrepreneur and craftsman for most of my adult life and am more than happy to make every single Sole-Safe in my living room until all orders have been satisfied.So even though my preference is to create a company that offers opportunities to low income families in Thailand earning a fair, living wage, I have no problem with getting my own hands involved in production.ReturnsIf we accidentally sent you the wrong size, or if there is anything wrong with your Sole-Safes, we will send you a replacement free of charge and you are welcome to keep the pair that we sent you in error. Clear proof of damage or wrong sizing must be included in your documentation. I.e. a photo with a measuring tape next to your unaltered Sole-Safes or pictures of inadequate stitching will do the job.If, by accident, you ordered the wrong size we would like to suggest that you gift the erroneously ordered pair to friend or family member and order a new pair at your own expense. Your return shipping charges in addition to our ridiculous $10 you-ordered-the-wrong-size-return-fee adds up to pretty much the same price of a new pair. So make sure you order the right size. Our price guarantee will make sure that you will pay no more than you paid for your initial purchase, even if the Perk you chose should not be available any longer. Please expect normal wear and tear, nothing lasts forever. However, you should be able to get great mileage out of your purchase.Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share my campaign with your family, friends, clients, customers and coworkers. Please share through your social network in any way you feel comfortable and as many times as you like. Please share share share…Thank you'sBig thanks go out to my friends Richard, who was my cameraman, and Grant, who gave me such a fantastic product review in my video. Also, I would like to thank everyone who believed in me and supported my efforts in this campaign. A huge thank you to the generous couple who gifted me their vintage sewing machine so I was able to make my prototypes. And of course, thanks to my super hot girlfriend who put up with me during all my ups and down while working on this exciting, new project. Happy trails everyone...

story:
We are a team of two professional product designers from Bombay - Jugal Mistry and Rahul Mistry

We love to travel and create off-beat and innovative products from indegenous resources that we come across in our travels.

All our products are original designs and we sell them on our own eCommerce portal. We've been doing this successfully since last 4 years.

The Hemp Craft (THC) was inspired from a similar exploring expedition.

This is a picture from our trek to Annapurna Base Camp in Nepal where we got introduced to the Hemp industry and were overwhelmed by the passion and dedication of the Hemp farmers there.

Despite of the exceptional environmental blessings of this plant, Hemp textile is getting replaced the synthetic fibers even in their own regions and their livelihood is being threatened. People of these already poor villages have only one know-how, that is, to produce Hemp.

That is when we decided to bring Hemp to a global platform and design international quality products, thus reviving the industry and saving the planet in whatever little way we could.

So back our campaign and help us create more amazing Hemp products.

 

Project Status:

We have completed prototyping the bag designs and finding the sources of every raw material that goes into manufacturing it, so your TashiPack is ready to start production the moment the campaign ends.

Funds raised from this campaign will go towards buying the Hemp fabric in bulk. Since they are manufactured in remote areas, shipping and logistics is our major challenge which a bulk order can solve.

Timeline:

We will go into production as soon as we receive the funds (approx. May, 2018).

We will start shipping the backpacks in June, 2018.

Risks & Challenges:

There are no foreseeable challenges or obstructions in getting your TashiPack backpack to you.

Even if the campaign does not reach the funding goal, we will abosrb the additional expenses and you will still get your backpack at the same cost.

Donation:

30% of our profits will be donated to various open-roof schools in the eastern Himalayan villages in Nepal.

Pictures and videos of the said donation will be posted here once we execute all the orders and close the campaign.

FYI:

  • Industrial grade hemp is not marijuana. Yes, it's the same plant though.
  • No. It does not contain THC or any other intoxicants.
  • No. You cannot smoke your TashiPack. Why would you, anyway?

Follow us on instagram!

Visit our website

story:
Domein Reynaert

Domein Reynaert is geboren uit de liefde voor fermentatie.
Na een opleiding tot Zytholoog (biersommelier) zijn we begonnen met het thuis brouwen van ons eigen bier. Bij vele vrienden viel het in de smaak.
Door het opvolgen van het fermentatieproces begon de liefde te ontluiken voor ambachtelijke bereidingen (bier, wijn, sake, ...).
Omdat we in onze toenmalige woonst in Melsele hiervoor te krap behuisd waren gingen we op zoek naar wat meer plaats. Dit vonden we in Beveren, vlak bij Vrasene. Een huis met tuin en een stukje landbouwgrond waar we aan onze hobbies konden uitwerken.
Weigerend om het klein te zien is toen Domein Reynaert opgericht, vanwege onze affectie met het Waasland was de naamskeuze snel gemaakt.
Er werd begonnen met ons eerste bier: "Nobel", naar koning Nobel uit de sage "Van den Vos Reynaerde". (De koning is de eerste burger van het land, toepasselijk dus om ons eerste bier naar hem te dopen)

De vele positieve commentaren en een vlotte verkoop gaven ons de kans om daarnaast ook uit te komen met ons tweede bier: "Ysengrin", de eerste klager aan het hof van koning Nobel.

Dit alles hebben we zelf gedaan, de bieren zijn we gaan brouwen in Brouwerij 't Kroontje in Denderbelle... Maar zouden graag nu de stap wagen om een eigen micro-brouwerij met proeflokaal op te richten, en zo Beveren (met z'n rijke brouwerij geschiedenis - http://www.bloggen.be/brouwerijenwaasland ) eindelijk terug zijn eigen brouwerij te geven!

Eigen inbreng

Over de afgelopen 2 jaar hebben we elke eigen euro in ons huis en het domein gestoken. Met de nodige bankleningen hebben we alles kunnen verbouwen.
Nu onze beide bieren op de markt zijn (en we plannen hebben voor meer) vonden we de tijd rijp om uit te kijken om onze bieren ook daadwerkelijk in onze eigen achtertuin te kunnen maken.

Hoe willen we dit doen?

Om deze plannen uit te voeren hebben we goed rondgekeken naar de juiste oplossing voor onze situatie. 
Hoeveel hebben we nodig?
  • € 12.000,- Gebouw voor proeflokaal en productieruimte


  • € 5.000,- Inrichting van productieruimte
  • € 15.000,- Brouwinstallatie, gisttanks & klein materiaal


  • € 2.500,- Beginstock grondstoffen


Dit brengt ons op een totaal van € 34.500,- welke we moeten investeren om alles klaar te krijgen voor de opstart en houdt nog geen rekening met diverse kleine kosten.
Van dit bedrag hebben we al een deel kunnen bekomen van familie en vrienden, maar voor het grootste stuk willen we graag de community betrekken.

Wat geven we jou ervoor terug?

We hebben als dankbetuigingen enkele rewards gepland:
  1. € 5,- : Een bedankings e-mail en registratie voor onze online nieuwsbrief
  2. € 15,- : Een glas van Domein Reynaert, dat je in het proeflokaal mag afhalen samen met een gratis consumptie ter plaatse. (+ reward 1)
  3. € 20,- : T-Shirt, op te halen in ons proeflokaal, bovenop reward 2
  4. € 25,- : T-Shirt, Glas en 1 bier, verzonden via Kiala naar een punt in jouw buurt.
  5. € 50,- : MUUR. In ons proeflokaal reserveren we 1 muur waar jouw naam zal worden gegraveerd bij iedereen die ons vanaf dit bedrag steunde (+ reward 3)
  6. € 75,- : Brouwer voor een dag! Je wordt uitgenodigd om een dagje mee te komen brouwen. (afhankelijk van beschikbaarheid) (+ reward 5)
  7. € 100,- : Beer Taster. Elk experiment, speciaal brouwsel of colab roepen we jou op, op een door ons gekozen dag, om het bier te onderwerpen aan jouw smaak en beoordeling. (+ reward 5) (max 15)
  8. € 150,- : Launch Party! Je zal worden uitgenodigd om samen met een vriend(in) deel te nemen aan de lancering van ons eerste thuisgebrouwen bier. Receptie, bierdiner en afterparty. Na afloop neem je een van de eerste lokaal gebrouwen bakken mee naar huis!
  9. € 180,- : Beer Taster + 1. Zelfde als reward 7, en breng telkens een vriend mee!
  10. € 250,- : Eerste bier van de maand. Kom levenslang elke maand een gratis biertje drinken in ons proeflokaal! (+ reward 5) (bij begin nieuwe maand vervalt de vorige maand, exclusief speciale, experimenten en/of colab's)
  11. € 360,- : Bakje (b)hier! Kom jaarlijks een volledige bak bier uit ons assortiment ophalen (24x33cl, mag gemixed, exclusief leeggoed en uitgezonderd speciale, experimenten en/of colab's).
  12. € 500,- : Bakje (b)hier Spécial! Zelfde als reward 11, maar ook voor speciale, experimenten en/of colab's (let wel, kom tijdig want OP = OP!).
  13. € 800,- : My Taste, My Beer! Stel samen met ons een bier samen! We brouwen dit bier en brengen het op de markt met de door jou gegeven naam en met jouw naam en foto op het etiket (wil je dit liever niet? Dan doen we dit niet). (+ reward 5)
  14. € 1.000,- : Gist tank. We graveren jouw naam in één van onze gisttanks en vermelden op het etiket van het bier dat het dankzij jou tot stand kwam! (max 5)
  15. € 2.000,- BUNDLE! Reward 14 + 13 + 12
  16. € 5.000,- Dank je om zo in ons te geloven! Neem voor toe te zeggen contact met ons op en we werken een reward uit die reflecteerd wat dit voor ons betekent!
Hoe verdelen we het geld?

Wat als er geld over is?
Als er nog fondsen over zijn, worden die gebruikt voor de uitbouw van ons terrein en ons biergamma. We kunnen ervoor zorgen dat we voldoende capaciteit hebben (brouw, warme kamer, koude kamer, stockage) en natuurlijk voor beleving. Ontvangen van scholen/groepen om hen wegwijs te maken in de wereld van het bier.
Wat als we niet aan het beoogde bedrag geraken?
Dan gaan de plannen nog steeds door!
We zullen blijven brouwen en sparen voor het proeflokaal en de brouwerij! Alle rewards zullen beschikbaar blijven om uit te voeren (behalve rewards 5, 10, 12 en 13. Hiervoor zoeken we een passend alternatief. Reward 8 zal wel doorgaan met een bak gebrouwen bij 't Kroontje als -take home gift-).
Maar we hopen dat dit niet nodig zal zijn.

Impact

Als deze crowdfunding campagne lukt, kunnen we Beveren terug een brouwerij geven! Honderden jaren brouwgeschiedenis zullen terug tot leven komen in het proeflokaal en iedereen kan dan weer van plaatselijk gerstenat genieten!

Risico's

Natuurlijk zijn er risico's verbonden aan deze crowdfunding.
Maar geen waar we geen weg rond zullen vinden.
Mocht het toch gebeuren dat we niet het nodige kapitaal bijeen krijgen, dan zullen we voort blijven doen zoals we nu reeds bezig zijn, en sparen om toch aan een proeflokaal te geraken.

Andere manieren om te helpen?

Je bent financieel niet in de mogelijkheid om ons te steunen op dit moment? Geen probleem! Je kan ons nog op verschillende manieren helpen, bvb:

  • Heb je nog memorabilia van oude Wase brouwerijen? Je mag deze altijd doneren of in bruikleen geven voor de opsmuk van het proeflokaal.
  • Kom geregeld een biertje drinken vanaf we open zijn.
  • Groene vingers? Een grote tuin vereist meerdere handen. Als je ons wilt komen helpen, steeds welkom!
  • Deel deze crowdfunding met je vrienden! Hoe meer zielen, hoe meer vreugd.
