€ 360,- : Bakje (b)hier! Kom jaarlijks een volledige bak bier uit ons assortiment ophalen (24x33cl, mag gemixed, exclusief leeggoed en uitgezonderd speciale, experimenten en/of colab's).
€ 500,- : Bakje (b)hier Spécial! Zelfde als reward 11, maar ook voor speciale, experimenten en/of colab's (let wel, kom tijdig want OP = OP!).
€ 800,- : My Taste, My Beer! Stel samen met ons een bier samen! We brouwen dit bier en brengen het op de markt met de door jou gegeven naam en met jouw naam en foto op het etiket (wil je dit liever niet? Dan doen we dit niet). (+ reward 5)
€ 1.000,- : Gist tank. We graveren jouw naam in één van onze gisttanks en vermelden op het etiket van het bier dat het dankzij jou tot stand kwam! (max 5)
€ 2.000,- BUNDLE! Reward 14 + 13 + 12
€ 5.000,- Dank je om zo in ons te geloven! Neem voor toe te zeggen contact met ons op en we werken een reward uit die reflecteerd wat dit voor ons betekent!

Hoe verdelen we het geld?
Wat als er geld over is?
Als er nog fondsen over zijn, worden die gebruikt voor de uitbouw van ons terrein en ons biergamma. We kunnen ervoor zorgen dat we voldoende capaciteit hebben (brouw, warme kamer, koude kamer, stockage) en natuurlijk voor beleving. Ontvangen van scholen/groepen om hen wegwijs te maken in de wereld van het bier.
Wat als we niet aan het beoogde bedrag geraken?
Dan gaan de plannen nog steeds door!
We zullen blijven brouwen en sparen voor het proeflokaal en de brouwerij! Alle rewards zullen beschikbaar blijven om uit te voeren (behalve rewards 5, 10, 12 en 13. Hiervoor zoeken we een passend alternatief. Reward 8 zal wel doorgaan met een bak gebrouwen bij 't Kroontje als -take home gift-).
Maar we hopen dat dit niet nodig zal zijn.

    Impact
Als deze crowdfunding campagne lukt, kunnen we Beveren terug een brouwerij geven! Honderden jaren brouwgeschiedenis zullen terug tot leven komen in het proeflokaal en iedereen kan dan weer van plaatselijk gerstenat genieten!
    Risico's
Natuurlijk zijn er risico's verbonden aan deze crowdfunding.
Maar geen waar we geen weg rond zullen vinden.
Mocht het toch gebeuren dat we niet het nodige kapitaal bijeen krijgen, dan zullen we voort blijven doen zoals we nu reeds bezig zijn, en sparen om toch aan een proeflokaal te geraken.
Andere manieren om te helpen?
 Je bent financieel niet in de mogelijkheid om ons te steunen op dit moment? Geen probleem! Je kan ons nog op verschillende manieren helpen, bvb:


Heb je nog memorabilia van oude Wase brouwerijen? Je mag deze altijd doneren of in bruikleen geven voor de opsmuk van het proeflokaal.
Kom geregeld een biertje drinken vanaf we open zijn.
Groene vingers? Een grote tuin vereist meerdere handen. Als je ons wilt komen helpen, steeds welkom!
Deel deze crowdfunding met je vrienden! Hoe meer zielen, hoe meer vreugd.

story:
When one travels for a vacation, the desire is that everything is an authentic reflection of your destination's culture. From tours, fun in the sun, nightlife and cuisine, the goal is to experience a new culture.

Picture a perfect vacation world; one that is authentic and unique to you. Where you can delight in a personalized boutique hotel experience that is the ultimate modern expression of the cultural experience you came for and an individualized, consistent world class service you can trust.

Where upon arriving, you find that you did not just book a stay, you booked an EXPERIENCE.

My friends that is the La Cultura Hotels experience.

A hotel experience that is for the traveler, one to stimulate the wonderlust in you. And better yet, a culturally friendly hotel experience dedicated to giving back to its local communities and environmentally friendly processes.

86% of individuals travel to experience a new culture, yet many brand hotel's are nice but 'cookie cutter' and finding the 'right' independent hotel can be difficult. 

Become an early supporter today by donating to our revolution of what a leisure hotel experience should be. A clean and simple booking process, your room: an authentic and modern expression of your destination and its culture and heritage, your experience: personal and unique. The ultimate unparalleled celebration of life!

We aren't just bringing a new hotel brand, we are pioneering the next evolution in leisure hotel brands, a brand that is about YOU.

By donating today and supporting our pioneering of the next evolution in leisure hotels, you receive some awesome EXCLUSIVE and LIFETIME discounts as well as you will be updated every step along the way!

We are almost there and just need a little of your support. Donate Today, and be part of our REVOLUTION  to make the hotel stay about the traveler's experience again!

Hi, my name is Cebert. As a frequent traveler I have always held a love of experiencing the culture, history, adventure, beauty, and exploration of the destinations I have visited. But as I travel I consistently notice a challenge, I must choose between a trusted international or US branded hotel and their service while forgoing the authenticity or do I select an authentic and unique hotel and trust reviews?

As a long time hospitality leader, it's been my passion to provide personalized experiences to tens of thousands of guests as part of various brands, and so I thought, 'Why not combine, those two passions, those and two concepts?'

The love of exploring unique destinations, an authentic and unique hotel experience plus consistent personalized service across diverse locations you, the traveler, are looking forward to visit.

It's my personal pleasure to bring this new, revolutionary, and guest centric leisure boutique brand to you and look forward to sharing awesome cultures and personalized world class service that you can trust. 

 

 

Right now the project concept has been fully developed and is ready for execution. We have already selected our first location, a beautiful property only steps from the beach, and have an agreement in principal that will be contracted in the next few days! 

So what will your contribution go towards?

Well, we will complete the final stage of the interior. Basically decor, locally sourced artwork, our first 'photo spot', and licensing. More or less the final items every hotel completes to begin welcoming guests and creating an experience of a lifetime.

 

So what is the risk for this project? Relatively minimal.

The first of our locations was selected for its consistent tourist demand, diverse culture, appeal to diverse and unique travelers, and its demand from both international and domestic travelers. These variables help to insulate the project economically from the most harmful unforeseen circumstances.

The real challenge...winning over new guests. But this you our contributors and supporters can help make super easy! The more you share our campaign the more travelers we will connect with!

story:
A Bee Revival Keyring From Revive a Bee

Habitat loss and industrial farming have had a severe impact on bee populations. We want to change that and help give bees a fighting chance. Our bee revival keyring is all about making a change on an individual level to help bees as a whole, much like a worker bee foraging for precious pollen to return to the hive.

You can find out about everything we do here:

https://reviveabee.com/

Our bee thirst aid kit helps bees in three simple but highly effective ways.

  • Each keyring is filled with Invertbee, specifically designed for consumption by bees this fructose, glucose mix is perfect fr getting a tired bee back to the hive
  • Our wildflower seed paper packaging is the best way we could think of helping bees gain back some of their diminishing habitats
  • We want our keyring to be a talking point that encourages healthy discussion about the current situation we face with harmful chemicals and failing legislation

 

 

So make sure you're always ready to save a tired, thirsty bee with a little energy boost, seeing it safely on its way home.

  • Revive a Bee was established by Paul and Ed in April last year with the hope to raise awareness around the plight of bees globally
  • You will be able to secure priority purchase of our new black and gold bee revival keyrings accompanied by wildflower seed paper packaging
  • By purchasing a bee revival keyring you will be gaining the ability to rescue a bee in need with no resources in sight but most importantly you will be adding to the growing number of bee guardians taking a stand to defend our tiny little friends

Our Mission 

  • We have been planning to create a black and gold design for some time now but we want to allow people to get their orders in early and help us achieve our goal quicker
  • Any perks will be honoured even if we don't reach our total so you don't need to worry

 

 

Your Impact

  • By purchasing our bee revival keyring you'll be helping to make a change on so many levels, supporting bees by planting our wildflower seed paper and saving any tired bees you see on your travels
  • You will also be contributing towards helping us create the resources and education on our already growing site

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help bees but our perks aren't suitable there's still lots of ways to help bees and support Revive a Bee.

Head over to our website to learn how to create bee-friendly gardens and learn more about bees as a whole:

https://reviveabee.com/blog/

Learn more about our other bee guardians and share photos and stories about everything bee:

https://www.facebook.com/ReviveABee

https://www.instagram.com/ReviveaBee

story:
ENOUGH OF THE IMPORTED PLASTIC TABLES. 

TAILGATE WITH AMERICAN WOOD.

 

FratWood began building custom tables for fraternities in 2017. What originally started as a few fraternity brothers building tables in a sketchy garage quickly turned into something so much more. Our first bulk order was to a fraternity at Indiana University, and after a small hiccup with the drug dealing neighbors, freight fraud, and a police escort to our garage, the tables made it safe and sound to Indiana and FratWood was born.

 FratWood was a good idea, even Billy McFarland agreed. After pitching FratWood to Billy, he offered us a jaw-dropping amount of money to make FratWood the biggest fraternity table and beer dye company the United States had ever seen. One month later, after several insufficient wire transfers, Fyre Festival blew up and Billy was arrested. FratWood lived on. 

Now, FratWood is the leading wooden tailgating table company. FratWood builds luxury wooden tailgating tables for the men and women who want to make a statement with their wood, not with plastic.

Our mission is to fight imported plastic by bringing American wood to tailgates. We knew this wouldn't be possible with a poorly made table... so we teamed up with one of the top woodworkers in Oregon and designed a beautiful, unique, foldable and transportable wooden table. Be proud of what you’re part of and represent it right. Life is short, might as well show off your wood.

LONG LIVE THE FRATWOOD

http://www.fratwood.com

 

 

FRATWOOD TABLES

 

Right now, we offer the House Table. The House Table is our big boy, meaning this table is thick and durable:

  • Table Length: 8 feet
  • Table Width: 4 feet
  • Table Height: 30 inches 
  • Table Weight: 150lbs  
  • Folded dimensions: 4 feet x 4 feet x 6 inches  
  • Surface Wood: Washington State Birch 
  • Leg and Apron Wood: Oregon Wild Douglas Fir 

We offer the House Table either NAKED or CUSTOM.

 

NAKED


 

Just as the name suggests, this table is naked. No stain, no print, just the table. We want to give our customer the ability to buy our tables NAKED, not just to offer a cheaper price for the House Table, but to allow a 100% customizable experience. With the NAKED option, customers can paint their own table, cover it with stickers, pictures, you name it. Create your own masterpiece, and send us photos by messaging us through our Instagram (@fratwood). Your photo could be featured on our Instagram. 

Price: $699.99

 

CUSTOM

Our CUSTOM House Table comes with your choice of stain and logo. We hand-stain the table and then print your logo directly onto the wood surface using state of the art UV LED Printing Technology. The table is then finished with a protectant coat. The CUSTOM House Table is truly a work of time, precision, and art.

Price: $899.99

 

*We do not condone standing, sitting, jumping, or placing any weight of over 80lbs on our tables as this could be dangerous and result in damage or destruction of the table as well as personal injury.*

 

Why are we raising money? 

There are three reasons why we are raising money: 

  1. To fund the prototyping and production of our new Tailgater Table
  2. To fund official NCAA/Greek Life licensing
  3. To build a CUSTOM Table design studio on our website

 

1. The Tailgater

We are incredibly excited about the Tailgater Table for many reasons. It is no secret that our House Table is large, heavy, and sturdy. The House Table is meant to be that way. However, we wanted to design a table that is more easily transportable than the House Table. The Tailgater is exactly this table. It will be smaller, lighter, and thinner than the House Table, and fold up into something that looks like a wooden briefcase. The perfect tailgating table...

  • Table Length: 5 feet
  • Table Width: 2 feet
  • Table Height: 26 inches 
  • Table Weight: 50lbs  
  • Surface Wood: Washington State Birch 
  • Leg and Apron Wood: Oregon Wild Douglas Fir 

 

2. Official NCAA/Greek Life licensing 

The process of becoming officially licensed by the NCAA and Greek Life Organizations is time-consuming and expensive. Part of the money that we raise through this funding campaign will go toward this process. Our goal is to eventually have our tables featured in Greek Life newsletters, collegiate alumni magazines, and school stores all over the United States. We want to be able to offer our customers tables with their school logos. 

 

3. CUSTOM Table design studio on our website  

Wouldn't it be nice to be able to design your dream table right on our website? We think so too. We envision a CUSTOM Table design studio where our customer can choose their stain, the school/greek life logo of their choice, as well as the option to upload logos and experiment with placement on the table surface. When tailgates are full of unique, CUSTOM FratWoods, oh what a day that will be.

story:
Patent Pending

Patent Pending

The traditional toothbrush has two critical flaws. First, it is home to millions of bacteria, including fecal matter. We're not okay with our toothbrush being dirtier than our toilet seat, and we're willing to bet that you're not okay with that either. The second flaw is that the traditional toothbrush is far from being carry-friendly. Tired of carrying your toothbrush in a plastic bag? So were we.

We have spent the past 2 years redesigning the toothbrush from the ground up to create a toothbrush that keeps itself clean and minimizes size so that you can take it anywhere.

The Switchbrush opens and closes seamlessly with the push of a button. With each close of the head, the UV light is activated to disinfect your brush head. Keep it in your purse, backpack, or anywhere else you'd like and it'll be germ free every time you brush. Brushing with water you don't trust in a different country? No need to throw your brush away after your trip. The Switchbrush will sanitize your brush upon returning and in between each brush while you're there.

We built the Switchbrush for people who live their lives on the go. Why? We are travelers, campers, and guys who want to brush their teeth halfway through a good date. It is important for us to have a toothbrush that is easy to take with us, wherever we're going.

UVC Light Sanitation Technology 

UVC disinfectant technology has been used since the early 1900's to disinfect drinking water in countries throughout Europe. UVC sanitation deactivates harmful microorganisms through a physical process in which wave lengths penetrate the bacteria. When bacteria and viruses are exposed to UV light, they are unable to reproduce. 

UV light even works against organisms responsible for cholera, polio, typhoid, hepatitis and other bacterial, viral and parasitic diseases. 

UVC sanitation technology is powerful enough to be used and trusted by hospitals. We think that your mouth deserves a "hospital clean" too.

Caring for Your Toothbrush (What the Other Guys Say)

Caring For Your Switchbrush

  1. Switch Open
  2. Brush
  3. Switch Closed (Sanitize)

Yup, its that simple.

The American Dental Association recommends replacing your brush head every 3-4 months.  "Toothbrushes have been shown to harbor bacteria (including fecal coliform bacteria that can be released into the air when the toilet is flushed or can be spread to the toothbrush when the owner touches a contaminated surface before handling his or her brush)..."

Jeklo recommends that you adhere to the ADA recommendation to change your brush head every three months, but not for fear of germs. Newer bristles brush better and are less harsh on your gums. So take care of your mouth by getting a replacement head, and Switchbrush will make sure your bristles are sanitized until you do.

If at any time you need more, get your replacement heads at GoJeklo.com.

Made to Go with You, Wherever You Go.

The Switchbrush is only 3.5 inches long when folded. The sleek design makes the Switchbrush incredibly transportable and makes it the ideal product to bring with you for any adventure. Keep it in your pocket, your purse, or your backpack, and have it with you when you need it most.

Each Charge Lasts Over a Week

 The Switchbrush comes with a wall charger that conveniently magnetizes to the body of your brush. The brush charges quickly and lasts for over a week's worth of brushes.

No Hassle

Traditional tooth bushes are awkwardly long and require additional products to protect your bristles. There are products on the market to cover your toothbrush head, and recently, other products have come along to sanitize your toothbrush. The Switchbrush effectively combines your toothbrush, your cover, and your sanitizer into one commonsense solution. 

The Bristles

Dentists recommend that you brush with soft bristles. The Switchbrush head has ultra soft bristles surrounded by soft silicone bristles so that you can take care of your gums, while you clean your teeth.

 PLAY

The sleek design makes the Switchbrush incredibly transportable and makes it the ideal product to bring with you for any adventure. Keep it in your pocket, your purse, or your backpack, and have it with you when you need it most.Each Charge Lasts Over a Week The Switchbrush comes with a wall charger that conveniently magnetizes to the body of your brush. The brush charges quickly and lasts for over a week's worth of brushes.No HassleTraditional tooth bushes are awkwardly long and require additional products to protect your bristles. There are products on the market to cover your toothbrush head, and recently, other products have come along to sanitize your toothbrush. The Switchbrush effectively combines your toothbrush, your cover, and your sanitizer into one commonsense solution. The BristlesDentists recommend that you brush with soft bristles. The Switchbrush head has ultra soft bristles surrounded by soft silicone bristles so that you can take care of your gums, while you clean your teeth. PLAY

story:
Production Updates 

Status (Updated 6/30/2020)

-All tools are assembled!

-International tools are check into our fulfillment center and are being shipped out

-Domestic tools (up to Order #218) have all been shipped, more recent orders will be shipped out as they are placed

Cheers!

FoldAwayHook

While these trying times can lead to a lot of uncertainty and anxiety, it can also bring out the best in people and lead to new innovations that can change the future.  Inspired to find our own way to contribute, we leveraged our ability to engineer tools to solve everyday problems to design a solution to help.

In a few hours, we quickly engineered a no-touch hook that we could laser at home out of wood.  Through local marketing, in a few days, we were able to give away 1,200+ tools to the local community.  However, we soon recognized that people need a safer tool made out of better material.

We would like to introduce you to FoldAwayHook, our 7th crowdfunding campaign. We will be running this as a 20-day campaign and are leveraging our USA based manufacturers that we have worked with on past projects to ensure fast delivery.


 

Engineered Safety: Fold-Away Feature, Side Guards and Brass Hook

 What sets our tool apart is the fold-away feature with internal Teflon side guards paired with a Brass Hook. 

 

Fold-Away Feature

The fold-away feature sheaths the hook into the body of the tool. Single piece tools do not store the contact surface leaving things it is exposed to such as your pocket, keys or counters. Stay safe and tuck it away!

.

 

 

 

Teflon Side Guards

Two internal Teflon side guards ensure that the hook does not touch the body of the tool when storing into the handle. 

Brass Hook

The no-touch hook is designed out of brass.  Research completed by the American Society for Microbiology, has firmly established helpful properties of copper and brass surfaces. 

 

Stop Feature

A uniquely designed pivot point with an O-ring allows the brass hook to flip out similar to a pocket knife and ensures that the tool remains in the open or closed position.

 

Exploded View

 

Everyday Uses

Use our tool to protect yourself whether you are out and about shopping or when opening packages delivered to your home.

Door Opener

Button Pusher

Touchscreens

Box Opener

Keypads

Bag Carrier

Keyring Carry

 

Our Commitment to You

We know that there are certain concerns around transparency, communication, and delivering on crowdfunding campaigns. We think it is important to share some reviews we have received on our six past successful campaigns to further emphasize the importance we place on keeping our backers updated. You are putting your monetary trust in us and it is our goal to make sure that you know exactly where we are in the delivery process.

EverRatchet: View Campaign

EverRatchet Clip: View Campaign

“This has been the most professional IGG campaign I’ve participated in. Thanks for doing it right!” - Josh G.

I’ve backed nearly a hundred crowdfunded campaigns over the last six years and this is, by far, the best-run one I’ve backed. I wish that some of the radio-silent creators I’m still waiting on would take to heart Brian’s approach to communicating what’s going on, as in update #9. (And, of course, that things appear to be going really well doesn’t hurt matters… ;)” – Andy D.

“Reordered.  Just wanted to let you know, I’ve contributed to over 10 Indiegogo campaigns.  You were by far the best in terms of communication and project management.”  – Mike P.

“Not only a great product you are providing, but also formidable campaign management. I encouraged everyone I know with interest in such tools to support the campaign. Again, thank you very much for such a great tool.” – Manuel T.

“This is staying on my key ring forever! Overall this has been the BEST run campaigns on Indiegogo. Brian is simply fantastic! He’s the gold standard for developers and campaigners. There are many who could learn from him.” – Anand J.

“The quality of this tool is very nice and it will definitely fit in well with my EDC. Thanks for showing good production, operation and delivery standards.” – John W.

“3 HUGE, LOUD CHEERS for Brian and family on the wonderful progress! Thank you all for your commitment, long hours of hard work, and vision. You’re creating a support useful tool for EDC.” – Dean W.

"You are the exemplar in how to run an Indiegogo campaign. If the ratchets arrive on time, this will restore my faith on crowdfunding. Great communication, very professional!” – Theray W.

 

Specs and Dimensions

 

Timeline

Custom Lasering on > 10x Units

Looking for 10x or more custom tools custom lasered with your logo? Reach out to us via Indiegogo messages or at contact@GearInfusion.com to get a visual of your logo on our tool.

 

Please Help Us Spread the Word

We are working hard to get our project out there but we ask that you please share with friends and family that could use this tool to keep them safe when going about their day.

Please Note:

Safety Note: We are not making any claims that this will reduce, remove, treat.  It is strongly recommended that you follow CDC/WHO guidelines for contact isolation or cleaning the tool after use.

International Order VAT Note: Please be aware that based on your location, VAT (Value Added Tax) may be required to be paid on the value of the incoming product. Please do your diligence to understand these charges ahead of time and expect to pay the total of these charges upon delivery/pickup.

Brass Patina: The hook on the FoldAwayHook can be expected to patina or change in color and finish over time. This is natural for brass and it can be restored/cleaned per many online resources or it can be left as is.

Other:

The term "FoldAwayHook" is a Trademark belonging to Gear Infusion/Concept 180, LLC

The term “Gear Infusion” is a Registered Trademark belonging to Gear Infusion/Concept 180, LLC

story:
Learn more: https://www.instinctbackpack.com

Instinct Modular Packing System includes 6 different modular Incubes to organize ALL your travel essentials in seconds. Save your time for travelling. 

 

 

 

 

 

Instinct Backpack is the most thoughtful and innovative backpack designed for travelers, photographers, businessman and commuters. It is not just a bag for holding things. It handles every item like an assistant with the revolutionary Instinct Packing System and 6 functional "Incubes".  Also, an App! It does things other backpack can't. Because it suits your needs no matter where you go and what you do. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Powered by Velcro, Instinct Packing System create a modular packing experience for you to customize your backpack compartments with the 6 different functional Incubes. You can move around your toiletries, electronics and cables, dirty and clean clothes, camera and lens, shirt and tie, passport and cards just as easy as you move the apps in your smartphone.

 

The Toiletries Incube keep all your toiletries organised and keep your shower gel inside a water repellent pocket, so that everything in your backpack won't get wet.

 

The Electronics Incube keep all your cables, chargers, SD cards, Memory sticks well organised into a small compact space. You can now work everywhere with this and your laptop.

 

 

The Wet & Dry Clothes Compression Incube is just amazing no matter you are traveling, swimming, going to gym, etc. It has two sides. One side, which made of water-proof fabric, can keep your wet towels or clothes. Flip to the other side, the durable mesh side can store your clean clothes. It even compress your clothes to give you extra space.

 

The DSLR incube is perfect for all photographers, no matter you are professional or not. When it is attached inside your backpack, you can place it next to the side opening for easy access to your camera. When you keep your backpack at hostel, you can carry it as a camera bag by attaching the removable shoulder strap.

 

 

The shirt & Tie Incube is a must for all who work at office or meet clients. No need to wear your shirt and tie everywhere on the street or on the plane because it can keep your shirts tidy and straight inside your backpack. With this, you can now go to gym or running before work.

 

 

The RFID-Blocking Passport Incube protects your cards and passport from all the advanced thieves. Never let your cards read by others. It also looks very smart, right?

 

 

 

 

 

So what makes it so great? It's a long story but let's start with the backpack itself. The name is Instinct is given because of the smooth and seamless user experience. The instinctive pockets are right by your side no matter what you need.

 

Instinct Backpack gives you the smoothest travel experience. Each pocket or compartment has its special function for your need. 

 

Top protective pocket:

 

Side opening:

The Instinct Packing System together with side opening enables instant access to your items. You can even place your most wanted Incube next to the side opening for better accessibility. 

 

Collapsible Shoe compartment:  

Whether going to gym or traveling, you just want to separate your dirty shoes from your clothes and other stuff. The shoe compartment is here to help.  

 

Hidden Laptop and tablet compartment: 

Tech gear like laptop, tablet is a must to all digital nomads. The separated laptop compartment gives quick access in every occasion just not to the thieves because of the anti-theft zipper-hidden cover. It fits a laptop up to 17.5" and an iPad/tablet up to 10.5".  

 

Safety Pocket:  

Safety is very important during a trip. The Safety Pocket keeps your money and cards close to your back.

 

Suitcase Mode:

Instinct Backpack can also be your suitcase. You can carry it conveniently in the way you like. Roll up the cover and it will become a hand carry. 

You can carry whatever way you want. Or let your suitcase do the heavy duty by attaching it tightly with Velcro sticking in between the handle bars.

All the Instinctive functions give you a smooth experience of handling all your needs just right by your side.

 No more standing in front of the ticket machine.


 

 

 

Of course, we think about that. Except the Anti-theft Zipper-hidden Laptop compartment mentioned above, Instinct Backpack also has safety reflective strip for cyclers and a Theft-deterrent buckle for the side opening.

Theft-deterrent buckle at side opening make jobs really hard for thieves. 

 

 

 

 

Have you ever used a rain cover? It covers the whole backpack and you cant take anything from your backpack. Therefore, we make Instinct Backpack water repellent.

 

The durable 900D Nylon fabric can protect your items with the PU and extra water repellent coating.  The zippers are water- repellent too.

Every details of Instinct Backpack looks gorgeous. Who say that aesthetics and functionality cant applied together? 

 

 

How does the Incubes Velcro work?

The Velcro of the Incubes are attached at the back of Toiletries, Electronics, DSLR and Shirt & Tie Incubes. They can be stuck inside the backpack which has a special surface. However, RFID-Blocking passport Incube and Wet & Dry Clothes Compression Incube do not have Velcro because of their own functions.

 

 

 

 

It is your ultimate travel companion APP with built-in packing list, destination weather and socket type information, etc. It even comes with notifications to make sure you are well prepared for the trip. It is at a beta version which means we will add even more functions to connect the backpack during further development.

 

Instinct APP features

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We sum up a calculation of how much Instinct Backpack should worth by adding up all the functions and Incubes/bags included in Instinct Backpack Ultimate Total Set.

 

 

 

 

We are both frequent travelers and designers. We love traveling and taking photos. However, we love innovation and design more than everything. We believe lives can be a lot easier with innovations, so we create a lot of stuff to help. We hope you like Instinct Backpack. Support us, so that we can continue to create more exciting stuffs.

story:
Welcome to the Future of Cycling Safety

We love cycling. We would cycle anywhere and everywhere if we could. It's great exercise, it lets us see more of the world around and it's good for the environment. And because we love it so much, we want to make your bike trips as comfortable and safe as possible. Whether you are riding in good or bad weather, in the day time or after sundown, along the main road or on a mountain path, good lighting is essential for your safety and the safety of others — and a reliable and bright bike tail light can, in fact, save a life.

 

This is Raz Pro 

Raz is a smart bike tail light built for safety and designed for an exceptional group cycling experience. Fitted with 12 full color high-brightness LEDs, brake and bump alerts, ambient light sensors and the first of its kind auto group-sync feature, Raz will keep you fully visible day and night.

 

Raz Pro Keeps You Safe

A tail light’s main job is to keep you seen — and Raz Pro is an expert. The light’s spectacular 270-degree beam angle and 60 Lumens of brightness make sure you are seen from up to 1,000 meters. This makes the light a great choice for daily commuters and anyone cycling along the main roads or off the beaten track. 

 

8 Light Modes

 

It's ideal for commuters looking to make their daily trips safer.

 

Helmet-mounted lights are another great back-up option as they're more visible than seat post lights. RAZ is also compatible with helmets: it can be mounted higher than an under-seat light for improved visibility in the heavy traffic.

 

Raz Pro is a Team Player 

Raz Pro comes with an innovative auto group-sync feature that will instantly set all the Raz Pro lights in your group to the same flashing pattern adding an extra safety layer to your team ride. As Group-Sync kicks in automatically*, you get to set off on your cycling journey right away without spending time on complicated setups. You will be able to customize the feature as well choosing one of the two team-sync options: join freely or use team code.

 *in order for the light pattern to sync, your Raz Pros need to be set to the same mode. 

 

Perfect for team rides

 

Fully visible day and night​

 

Auto Brake Alerts​

  • Multiangle detection
  • Hypersensitive detection

 

The most advanced brake sensor technology

The Raz Pro adopts the highest accuracy 6-axis motion-based position detection technology, which makes it different from most brake tail light on the market. This means you can mount the Raz Pro at different angles — and it would be the perfect fit even for an inclined frame.

More accurate with enhanced algorithm

Raz pro is set up with different braking algorithm under different riding occasions. Thus enhances the brake sensitivity and reduces the brake misjudge. 

 

And that's not all

Raz Pro is not just a tail light: it’s packed with intelligent sensors and back-up features for a truly comfortable ride: Light Sensor, Auto Brake Alerts, Road Bump Alerts and Auto Wake-Up. 

 

Light Sensor

Raz Pro knows when it's dark and knows when it's bright. It will automatically turn on and off depending on the outside conditions letting you focus on the road ahead. If you are not using your bike for over 4 minutes, the light will turn off automatically to save battery. 

 

Auto Wake-up 

Raz Pro is ready when you are. Simply hop on the bike and start moving and the light will turn on automatically — no buttons to press or settings to tweak with.

 

Road Bump Alerts

Raz Pro is an explorer. Heading off the main road? No worries, Raz got your back. The Road Bump Alert feature will make the light turn white every time you encounter a bump in the road warning the cyclists behind you. 

 

Sync with Discovery Pro GPS Unit

Simply pair the Discovery Pro bike computer with Raz Pro via Bluetooth and the Discovery Pro's warning light will instantly sync with the Raz Pro and adopt the same color and lighting mode.

 

Full-Color Daytime Light

Raz is versatile. You can pick and choose between a full range of color options for the light via the Shanren Sports App. Here, you can also adjust the flashing modes and select preferred patterns.

 

80 hours on a single charge

Raz Pro can be easily charged with its handy magnetic charger and won't need to be recharged for another 80 hours of standard use — which is plenty for both daily commute and long relaxing bike rides. 

 

Installation & Mounts

Raz Pro comes with a Twist & Lock mount and optional brackets for seat posts, saddles or helmets. You will be able to fix the tail light in place in no time and it will stay securely in its place even throughout the bounciest of rides. 

 

Design

It took us over 3 years to develop, engineer and design Raz Pro. We have taken the time to bring the product to life subjecting it to rounds of rigorous testing and gathering feedback from prototypes to make further improvements. The manufacturing of every single Raz requires 60 seconds of laser etching, extensive waterproofing (IP68) and extensive performance and endurance tests. As a result, you are getting a bike light that will be a reliable companion for all your bike trips, no matter the weather or terrain.

 

 

Specifications

Model: SR-BTL20

Connection: BLE4.0

Battery: Rechargeable Li-battery

Recharge: Magnetic charging

Recharge time: 2 hours

Work time: 24-80 hours

Brightness:60lm

Waterproof: IP68

Size: 41X41X19mm

Weight: 20g

APP support: Shanren Sport

IOS & Android devices: iOS 7.0 or later, Android 4.3 or later.

 

Meet Shanren

Our story began in 2012 as three young professionals from the fields of electronics, products development and the internet started a company named SHANREN.  The name of our company reflects one of our key principles: people living in harmony with nature — and, as a tech company, we incorporate this principle into the design and functionality of our products: innovative high level fitness and health tracking devices for cycling enthusiasts.

Over the 7 years on the cycling market, we have reengineered our company time and time again to keep up with the growing demands of the cycling industry and opening new avenues for innovation. Our breakthroughs in heart rate analysis and motion algorithm have helped thousands of cyclists worldwide and we hold several patents in this and the related fields.

Jan 2019: We launched the Di-pro GPS bike computer on Indiegogo.

May 2019: We brought the Beat 20 ECG heart rate monitor to Kickstarter.

2016: We received a 1.5-million-dollar Pre-A round investment.

Yet, throughout our journey, our core values have remained the same. We are still a young team of cycling enthusiasts working hard to make your next bike trip even better. We meet you where you are and get you where you need to go, and along the way, we are committed to innovation, quality and great cycling experiences.

 

Campaign Timeline

Whether you are riding in good or bad weather, in the day time or after sundown, along the main road or on a mountain path, good lighting is essential for your safety and the safety of others — and a reliable and bright bike tail light can, in fact, save a life. This is Raz Pro Raz is a smart bike tail light built for safety and designed for an exceptional group cycling experience. Fitted with 12 full color high-brightness LEDs, brake and bump alerts, ambient light sensors and the first of its kind auto group-sync feature, Raz will keep you fully visible day and night. Raz Pro Keeps You SafeA tail light’s main job is to keep you seen — and Raz Pro is an expert. The light’s spectacular 270-degree beam angle and 60 Lumens of brightness make sure you are seen from up to 1,000 meters. This makes the light a great choice for daily commuters and anyone cycling along the main roads or off the beaten track.  8 Light Modes It's ideal for commuters looking to make their daily trips safer. Helmet-mounted lights are another great back-up option as they're more visible than seat post lights. RAZ is also compatible with helmets: it can be mounted higher than an under-seat light for improved visibility in the heavy traffic. Raz Pro is a Team Player Raz Pro comes with an innovative auto group-sync feature that will instantly set all the Raz Pro lights in your group to the same flashing pattern adding an extra safety layer to your team ride. As Group-Sync kicks in automatically*, you get to set off on your cycling journey right away without spending time on complicated setups. You will be able to customize the feature as well choosing one of the two team-sync options: join freely or use team code. *in order for the light pattern to sync, your Raz Pros need to be set to the same mode.  Perfect for team rides Fully visible day and night​ Auto Brake Alerts​
Multiangle detection
Hypersensitive detection
 The most advanced brake sensor technologyThe Raz Pro adopts the highest accuracy 6-axis motion-based position detection technology, which makes it different from most brake tail light on the market. This means you can mount the Raz Pro at different angles — and it would be the perfect fit even for an inclined frame.More accurate with enhanced algorithmRaz pro is set up with different braking algorithm under different riding occasions. Thus enhances the brake sensitivity and reduces the brake misjudge.  And that's not allRaz Pro is not just a tail light: it’s packed with intelligent sensors and back-up features for a truly comfortable ride: Light Sensor, Auto Brake Alerts, Road Bump Alerts and Auto Wake-Up.  Light SensorRaz Pro knows when it's dark and knows when it's bright. It will automatically turn on and off depending on the outside conditions letting you focus on the road ahead. If you are not using your bike for over 4 minutes, the light will turn off automatically to save battery.  Auto Wake-up Raz Pro is ready when you are. Simply hop on the bike and start moving and the light will turn on automatically — no buttons to press or settings to tweak with. Road Bump AlertsRaz Pro is an explorer. Heading off the main road? No worries, Raz got your back. The Road Bump Alert feature will make the light turn white every time you encounter a bump in the road warning the cyclists behind you.  Sync with Discovery Pro GPS UnitSimply pair the Discovery Pro bike computer with Raz Pro via Bluetooth and the Discovery Pro's warning light will instantly sync with the Raz Pro and adopt the same color and lighting mode. Full-Color Daytime LightRaz is versatile. You can pick and choose between a full range of color options for the light via the Shanren Sports App. Here, you can also adjust the flashing modes and select preferred patterns. 80 hours on a single chargeRaz Pro can be easily charged with its handy magnetic charger and won't need to be recharged for another 80 hours of standard use — which is plenty for both daily commute and long relaxing bike rides.  Installation & MountsRaz Pro comes with a Twist & Lock mount and optional brackets for seat posts, saddles or helmets. You will be able to fix the tail light in place in no time and it will stay securely in its place even throughout the bounciest of rides.  DesignIt took us over 3 years to develop, engineer and design Raz Pro. We have taken the time to bring the product to life subjecting it to rounds of rigorous testing and gathering feedback from prototypes to make further improvements. The manufacturing of every single Raz requires 60 seconds of laser etching, extensive waterproofing (IP68) and extensive performance and endurance tests. As a result, you are getting a bike light that will be a reliable companion for all your bike trips, no matter the weather or terrain.  SpecificationsModel: SR-BTL20Connection: BLE4.0Battery: Rechargeable Li-batteryRecharge: Magnetic chargingRecharge time: 2 hoursWork time: 24-80 hoursBrightness:60lmWaterproof: IP68Size: 41X41X19mmWeight: 20gAPP support: Shanren SportIOS & Android devices: iOS 7.0 or later, Android 4.3 or later. Meet ShanrenOur story began in 2012 as three young professionals from the fields of electronics, products development and the internet started a company named SHANREN.  The name of our company reflects one of our key principles: people living in harmony with nature — and, as a tech company, we incorporate this principle into the design and functionality of our products: innovative high level fitness and health tracking devices for cycling enthusiasts.Over the 7 years on the cycling market, we have reengineered our company time and time again to keep up with the growing demands of the cycling industry and opening new avenues for innovation. Our breakthroughs in heart rate analysis and motion algorithm have helped thousands of cyclists worldwide and we hold several patents in this and the related fields.Jan 2019: We launched the Di-pro GPS bike computer on Indiegogo.May 2019: We brought the Beat 20 ECG heart rate monitor to Kickstarter.2016: We received a 1.5-million-dollar Pre-A round investment.Yet, throughout our journey, our core values have remained the same. We are still a young team of cycling enthusiasts working hard to make your next bike trip even better. We meet you where you are and get you where you need to go, and along the way, we are committed to innovation, quality and great cycling experiences. Campaign Timeline

story:
Maps of paddling in N.B.

My experience on this project

    •    Professional Geographic Information Systems Specialist that has 5 years experience in Field of Forestry, Agriculture, Aquaculture and apprentice Forester & Forest technician since 2002.

    •    Will offer the 4 rivers mentioned in the campaign has a series of pdf maps. this will be made available on my website.

    •    These maps havent been updated since the 60's and are slowly being forgotten! Paddling in N.B. is very important, especially for our tourists and locals. The maps proposed around outdoors recreation such has: Canoeing, Kayaking, Camping, Angling, Outfitting and more should be well used. Your help makes the product exist, which by supporting our local traditional values in house, these maps will be pdf guides of these waterways, they compliment a safe and pleasant waterways navigation in the areas. 

The objectives

    •    The $$$$$ is towards the purchase of software from Esri. This project is ongoing since 2011 and has been very complex with ought the proper tools. The software in question is called ArcDesktop and is my personal forte. This being said the Esri software works very well for creating maps; they are a leaders in this industry.

    •    Perks you all get the a sample historic map, this in a pdf version. May need  PDF reader to view? They will be on my site for access: www.FiddleheadCanoes.ca

The Impact

    •    The impact are the amount off people & our industry, which will benefit from the river maps greatly.  Indirectly this  will help the local economy in Tourism & Recreation paddle down or rivers, Angling & Outfitting and more may benefit from these maps indirectly. Plus show casing our waterways in our province leaves a pleasant image of New Brunswick!

    •    The layers have been made, what is in need is an layout of how they look finalization". The software will make a presentable map. The four rivers will be framed at a optimum scale, which Esri software does fairly efficiently, the export to pdf format after words will be framed by orientation of sequential flow of water.

    •    In an abstract, simple manner example: "The bear has been killed and I need to basically prepare the hive to the clients liking". What I mean is all the maps have been made electronically. Personal work, source of time and investment have been done since 2011. The hard part comes ahead, making it presentable in a pdf form which is practical; this is the objective for paddling our waters pleasantly. We only need one gesture from all of you to finalize our Common goal!

Risks & Challenges

    •    To make the maps properly, the Software is crucial. the work ahead implicates has much taught and time towards concepts, which has already been placed in today. My efforts so far at current time, holds 3000+ hours in work. This project is at finalization stage if the proper tools are made available. The right tools make the job easier. If our goal isn't matched we will try again and refund the funds!

    •    Personally wish to thank you All for your time and gestures! For the Associations, the Agencies, Local Companies , the individuals whom which support was crucial and those who know who they are; a big Thank You!! goes along for your support.

Regards Remy Reyjal GIS.S F.T

Apprentice Forester & Owner of Fiddlehead Canoes

www.FiddleheadCanoes.ca

story:
Us. Our Story. Our Project. Your Help!

Who we are:

  • Pedro, 24 years old, student of Accounting and Auditing
  • Gonçalo, 23 years old, student of Management
  • João, 26 years, student of Tourism and History
  • We are three portuguese students that traveled around the Europe in 2017. We have been in countries like Spain, France, Italy, Hungary, Czech Republic, Austria, Germany and United Kingdom.

What we want:

Take a tour of the World in 50 days and launch the book "Around the World in 50 Days".

Our route in 2018:

1 August : Coimbra and Oporto (Portugal)

2 August  - 4 August  : Milano and Venice (Italy)

5 August  - 6 August : Ljubljana (Slovenia)

7 August - 8 August : Zagreb (Croatia)

9 August - 10 August : Sofia (Bulgaria)

11 August - 14 August: Tbilisi and Batumi (Georgia)

15 August - 18 August: Baku (Azerbaijan)

19 August - 23 August:  Astana (Kazakhstan)

24 August - 2 September: Beijing and Shanghai (China)

3 September - 8 September: Tokyo (Japan)

9 September - 20 September: Hawaii, San Francisco and New York (USA)

21 September: London (UK)

22 September: Oporto and Coimbra (Portugal)

 

Trip Expenses:

 

We will use the money raised in the campaign to:

  1. Transport
    • ​​Oporto to Milano - 40€ x 3 = 120€ (airplane)
    • Milano to Venice - 35€ x 3 = 105€ (train)
    • Venice to Ljubljana - 25€ x 3 = 75€ (bus)
    • Ljubljana to Zagreb - 18€ x 3 = 54€ (bus)
    • Zagreb to Sofia - 220€ x 3 = 660€ (airplane)
    • Sofia to Tbilisi - 200€ x 3 = 600€ (airplane)
    • Tbilisi to Baku - 120€ x 3 = 360€ (airplane) 
    • Baku to Astana - 200€ x 3 = 600€ (airplane)
    • Astana to Beijing - 350€ x 3 = 1050€ (airplane)
    • Beijing to Shanghai - 100€ x 3 = 300€ (airplane)
    • Shangai to Tokyo - 300€ x 3 = 900€ (airplane)
    • Tokyo to Honululu (Hawaii) - 450€ x 3 = 1350€ (airplane)
    • Honululu to San Francisco - 200€ x 3 = 600€ (airplane)
    • San Francisco to New York - 100€ x 3 = 300€ (airplane)
    • New York to London - 500€ x 3 = 1500€
    • London to Oporto - 50€ x 3 = 150€
      • TOTAL = 8724€
  2. Food and daily expenses​
  • ​It is very difficult to get a totally accurate budget on this point.
  • However, we promise to describe all the expenses we make and in case there is money left, that same money will be donated!
  • 3 people, 3 meals a day (breakfast, lunch and dinner) and entry into some cultural places (the tickets of this places will be offered in our perks)!
  • 3 people x 40€ x 50 days = 6000€
  1. Stay
    • Milano (1 night for 3 people): 75€
    • ​​Venice (3 nights for 3 people): 400€
    • Ljubljana (2 nights for 3 people): 180€
    • Zagreb (2 nights for 3 people): 130€
    • Sofia (2 nights for 3 people): 110€
    • Tbilisi (4 nights for 3 people): 220€
    • Baku (4 nights for 3 people): 220€
    • Astana (5 nights for 3 people): 250€
    • Beijing (5 nights for 3 people): 400€
    • Shanghai (5 nights for 3 people): 325€
    • Tokyo (6 nights for 3 people): 500€
    • Usa (11 nights for 3 people): 1500€
      Total Aprox: 4500€

TOTAL = 8724€ + 6000€ + 4500€ = 19224€

Will we be able to go around the world in 50 days?

 

Why is this trip and its publication important to us?

  • With this trip we'll can do three of the most important things in life:
    • Travel 

       
    • Meet new cultures

       
    • Help charities with donating book profits

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to travel the world in 50 days. Helping us means helping people around the world: how?

  • Our perks give you the opportunity to help someone at the other side of the globe
    • YOU CHOOSE OUR GOOD DEED!




       

Partnerships

We have the support of AINANAS, a portuguese site with almost 1.000.000 followers!

The Ainanas will publish our adventure by sharing our videos and photos in the official site.
http://ainanas.com/

 

- We are trying more partnerships with Portuguese and international companies. In case we get sponsorships, the money we have the most will also be donated to charity.

 

The Impact of "Around the World in 50 days"

 

In addition to traveling and getting to know new cultures we will do economic studies and comparisons about different factors in each country such as:

  • The price of water and food

     
  • Ice Creams Around the World


     
  • Evaluation of the country's gastronomy (and the country's coffees!)

     
  • Evaluation of the hospitality and friendliness of the people

     
  • Price of public transport

     
  • Photos of the best places in each country

 

The Book: "Around The World in 50 days"

- The book will be produced by a portuguese editor.

- The cover of the book will be drawn, free of charge, by a portuguese designer who accepted to be part of our project.

- We'll start creating the book when we get back from the trip. We promise to be as fast as we can, but we have not yet been able to define the date of launch.

- The profits from the book will be donated to charity.

- We chose Unicef ​​to receive the money from the book

 

Other Ways You Can Help Our Project!

"Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help"

  • Yes, it's true! In that case you can follow our adventure and share our social accounts:
    • Instagram:
      • www.instagram.com/goncaloffmarques/,-  (@goncaloffmarques)
      • www.instagram.com/jpcabral91_/  - (@jpcabral91_)
      • www.instagram.com/pedrodcsimoes/ - (@pedrodcsimoes)
    • You'll view the best Sunsets Around the World for free! Just following us!

​And please, use the Indiegogo share tools!! :D

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Sebastian and I am a travel fanatic. I come from 12 years working in the travel industry as a Reservations Agent first and as Contract Manager after. 

The aim of our campaign is to collect funds to start an Inclusive Travel Company that will take travel booking to a whole new level. 

Imagine having to organise a tailor made itinerary fully customised to your travel needs. Either that you are an individual, a travel agent or a private company, you will have at your full disposal a  solution with more than 150 different suppliers all in one place through a platform that designs the itinerary for you, and with you. Flights, Hotels and Apartments, Activities, Excursions and Tours, Car Rental, Transfers, Travel Insurance and much more all in one to deliver you the perfect holiday, all tailor made, in just a few clicks! One website, one email, one payment! 

Pantarei Travel's platform will also have a dedicated area for the LGBT+ community at the beginning of the project, where all the destinations have been tested as LGBT+ tolerant and are safe to travel to, making it easier for the LGBT+ traveler to travel with peace of mind. As it grows, Pantarei Travel will add other options for people with different requirements, from food intolerance, to adults traveling with children, or those who prefer to choose an eco friendly vacation, or an adults only hotel, and many more. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for 73k€ to invest in technology and marketing. The marketing campaigns are projected to reach an audience that is in constant expansion. 
  • We will have unique and exciting perks for all those who help us make a difference, such as invaluable insights from travel industry experts, and even a 90 minute Skype session directly with me, the founder, to help you book the holiday of a lifetime! With Pantarei Travel, of course!
  • If we do not reach our goal, the funds will be used to create a more basic structure, nevertheless, still keeping in mind our main social goal of inclusion.

The Impact

Your contribution to the project will really make a difference, to you and to the world:

  • It will allow you to create personalized holidays in just a few clicks, saving you hours of research. 
  • It will become the main port of call for those who struggle finding holidays that reflect their lifestyle, or simply who they are. The dedicated LGBT page, as well as those dedicated to adults only, food preferences and intolerances, eco-friendly and so on will make a difference; they will be a tool of inclusion. All the properties and activities in each section are carefully selected, which means that whichever your need, or special request will never be too much to ask. We have you covered so you can travel with complete peace of mind.
  • We want to be inclusive, 'normalize' the market, and give everyone the opportunity to travel equally, and believe that this is an important action to take in our times.

Risks & Challenges

Our project does not come without risks or challenges, in an over-competitive world, and one that still faces diversity on many levels.

To overcome these risks and challenges, we are working together with different organizations around the world to help us promote travel, and especially LGBT travel, and have put together a team of travel experts who constantly monitor the market and trends to make sure every destination shown on our platform is safe and enjoyable, as well as catered for according to the specialization of the market request.  Most importantly, we are investing in technology that helps us be very competitive in the market, constantly comparing prices with competitors. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone may be able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, there are many ways you can do this, and don't forget you can also use the Indiegogo tools! Find us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter.

Your contribution to the project will really make a difference, to you and to the world:

It will allow you to create personalized holidays in just a few clicks, saving you hours of research. 
It will become the main port of call for those who struggle finding holidays that reflect their lifestyle, or simply who they are. The dedicated LGBT page, as well as those dedicated to adults only, food preferences and intolerances, eco-friendly and so on will make a difference; they will be a tool of inclusion. All the properties and activities in each section are carefully selected, which means that whichever your need, or special request will never be too much to ask. We have you covered so you can travel with complete peace of mind.
We want to be inclusive, 'normalize' the market, and give everyone the opportunity to travel equally, and believe that this is an important action to take in our times.


Risks & Challenges
Our project does not come without risks or challenges, in an over-competitive world, and one that still faces diversity on many levels.
To overcome these risks and challenges, we are working together with different organizations around the world to help us promote travel, and especially LGBT travel, and have put together a team of travel experts who constantly monitor the market and trends to make sure every destination shown on our platform is safe and enjoyable, as well as catered for according to the specialization of the market request.  Most importantly, we are investing in technology that helps us be very competitive in the market, constantly comparing prices with competitors. 

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand not everyone may be able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, there are many ways you can do this, and don't forget you can also use the Indiegogo tools! Find us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter.

story:
My passion for knives spans 25 years. The design influence around the Kilij is based on the sword of the same name, which has origins dating back to the rule of Genghis Khan and the Ottomans. I wanted to utilize the attributes of the Kilij's profile, with a modern twist that would make it appear unobtrusive when carried in the pocket.

SLEEK DESIGN & PREMIUM MATERIALS

The Kilij is made with precision and attention to detail. Your support will help get the first production run going. As backer, you receive the following benefits:

  • Savings from the retail price
  • Free shipping within the U.S.
  • A first hand look at the production process  

 

Features:

  • S35VN blade steel offers excellent edge retention and corrosion resistance
  • Ball-bearing pivot provides smooth flipper deployment
  • Carbon fiber inlay 
  • Contoured titanium handles allow for a comfortable grip
  • 3D machined titanium pocket clip provides secure, tip-up carry
  • Blue anodized pivot collar, back spacer, and pocket clip 
  • Jimping on the thumb ramp and flipper tab for improved grip and control

Specs:

  • Overall Length: 8"
  • Blade Length: 3.5"
  • Blade Thickness: 0.16"
  • Blade Material: CPM-S35VN
  • Rockwell Hardness: 60 HRC
  • Blade Grind: Flat
  • Finish: Bead Blast
  • Edge Type: Plain
  • Handle Length: 4.5"
  • Handle Thickness: .59"
  • Weight: 4.7 oz.
  • Handle Material: Carbon Fiber/Titanium 
  • Frame Material:  6AL4V Titanium
  • Lock Type: Frame Lock (with hardened lock-bar insert & over travel stop)
  • Pocket Clip: Right-side, Tip-up Carry
  • Opening Mechanism: Flipper

Designed in California, made in China.

 

What's in the box

Backers for the Kilij receive:

  • Kilij 
  • Carry case & microfiber pouch 
  • Certificate of Authenticity 

 

What to expect if the campaign is funded

It will take 1-2 weeks for the funds to clear through Indiegogo. Once funds are released, a purchase order will be placed with my factory partner and production will get started within the week after funds are cleared.

Expected Timeline Once Funded:

  • Funds to clear through Indiegogo: 1 - 2 weeks after the campaign ends
  • Preparation and Production Run: Approximately 7 weeks
  • Shipment from China to California Port: 1 - 2 weeks
  • Prep rewards: 1 week
  • Ship to backers: 3 - 5 days (depending on location within the U.S.) up to 2 weeks (depending on the country)

 

Risks & challenges

I have worked tirelessly to create a high quality product. This isn't my first time executing a large scale campaign, and while I have taken the precautions necessary to ensure seamless execution of production and delivery, certain factors such as delays may occur. If we come across any hurdles, be assured that you will be informed every step of the way.

 

Important notice to all backers

  • Knife laws vary by state and country. Please understand the laws in your respective area prior to making a contribution toward the campaign
  • International backers are responsible for shipping and applicable duty 
  • Due to legislation, I am unable to ship to Canada or the U.K.

 

Help spread the word

Whether you're a backer or know someone that would enjoy the Kilij, I would be grateful if you shared this campaign on social media and help spread the word!
