story:
The Campaign

We’re Ethan and Conner Borlé, brothers from Alberta, Canada. We started a small residential construction business together in 2014 that we named “Borlé Bros. Contracting Corp.” I know, creative right? 

We’re eager to start 2019 off with a bang and reach our goal of bringing healthier, durable, energy efficient, and AFFORDABLE homes to the average person.

We want to show you how a modern home can and should be built, so that together we can drive architects, designers, builders, governments and code regulation authorities to do more to ensure we all have better homes to live in.

And we’re going to start off by building a tiny house on wheels to one of the highest, most respected standards in the building industry. And then we’re going to give it away to one of our Indiegogo supporters!

We’re running an all-or-nothing campaign. That means, if we don’t reach our funding goal, we don’t take any of your money. Your credit card is only charged if we reach our target by our chosen end date. So, you don’t have to worry about winning a half completed tiny house that doesn’t live up to the hype. We only want to go forward with the project if we know we can do it right.

Continue reading to learn how you can support the campaign and win the tiny house for yourself. If you want to know even more visit our webpage (HERE) for loads of additional information!

Contest Rules

Contest open to residents of Canada, with the exception of Quebec, who are at least 18 years of age. To enter, make a pledge that is identified as including entry to the contest. Then show us why you should win the house by posting your short story, video, or other artistic work to Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram and tag @borlebros, or send your entry to us by email to tiny4u@borlebros.ca. Contest ends on February 18th, 2019 at 11:59 AM MT and judging will take place thereafter. Prize shipping destination must be within mainland Canada and directly accessible by continuous paved road from the shipping origination point. Limit one (1) entry per person. Only one (1) prize is available throughout Canada. Prize valued at approximately $125,000. Odds of winning depend on the number of entries received and the ability of an entry to achieve a high score. For full contest rules, visit www.borlebros.ca.

Targeting LEED Certification

One of the central tenants of our project is to go way beyond what a code-built house is today.

We want to blow this standard out of the water so we’re targeting LEED Certification, a third-party verified building rating system. So, you’ll know it’s a scientifically verified, better building.

LEED, or Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design is the most used green building rating system in the world. LEED helps drive the creation of healthy, highly efficient and cost-saving structures through an adaptable credit system which spans an array of building related issues. To reach our goal of becoming LEED Certified we’ll be addressing such things as:

Water Efficiency

Energy & Atmosphere

Material & Resources

Indoor Environmental Quality

Innovation

If we are successful, we will have the first ever tiny house on wheels to achieve LEED Certification in the WORLD!

To learn more about LEED for Homes click here.

The Impact

The impact of our campaign might seem clear, one deserving individual is going to walk away with a fully functioning tiny house, and a stellar one at that!

But we hope the campaign has a farther reaching and longer lasting impact than that. You see, most of us are living in sub-optimal conditions and we don’t even know it! We’ve been in these conditions for so long we just don’t realize what are homes and workspaces are doing to us.

  • Feeling tired all the time? It could be because there is not enough ventilation in your home, leading to lower oxygen levels, or perhaps the lighting isn’t designed with your natural circadian rhythm in mind.
  • Contaminants in the air can make us fall ill more frequently, causing us to miss work and time with our families and friends.
  •  Productivity levels are lower in these poorly designed environments.
  • Buildings have a negative impact on the environment, not just when they are being built, but every day they operate afterwards.
  • Many of us experience chronic stress due to the never-ending mortgage payments, utility bills, and maintenance expenses that arise with home ownership.

We hope to show as many people as possible that they don’t have to put up with these typical symptoms of a “sick” building. And we want to help people get into these healthier buildings by making all our planning documents available at a fraction of their actual cost, literally less than 1% of what we’re paying for them! We’re also focusing on a smaller, more adaptable design to keep the build costs low and in recognition of the fact that more square footage does not equal more happiness.

The Team

We’ve teamed up with multiple companies and professionals in the field to make sure our design is the best it can be. 

 
 

Anthony G. Cameron | Architect, AAA, SAA, MRAIC, M.Arch., B.A.

Anthony, founder of Left Hand Architecture & Design Inc. will be bringing his creativity to our tiny house project. His responsibilities include the design of the building envelope, architectural details, and selection of materials and finishes to ensure we use sustainable products that will keep the occupants healthy. Anthony will be bringing not only his creative and collaborative approach to the team but also Passive House training through the Canadian Passive House Institute.

http://www.lefthandarch.com/

 

https://www.integralgroup.com/

Integral Group is global network of design professionals collaborating under a single deep green engineering mandate. They have offices across North America, United Kingdom, and Australia, and have been involved in some of the greenest buildings on earth, including the Tah.Mah.Lah Net Zero Residence and the Exploratorium in San Francisco, both of which received LEED Platinum Certification. Three of our team members are from this internationally respected design firm. They Include:

Melanie Ross | Associate Sustainability

Melanie will be our sustainability expert. With over 10 years' experience in the field and leadership roles in numerous industry groups, Melanie is an invaluable source of knowledge and passion for the Tiny House Project.

Sergio Martinez | P.Eng.

Sergio will provide the electrical design of the tiny house. He aims to offer simple and intuitive controls to a complex electrical system that includes multiple points of generation and use, all while ensuring its function in a variety of locations and weighing possible changes in future use.

Tara Ellis | EIT, LEED Green Associate

Tara rounds up Integral Group’s contribution to our team as the mechanical designer. She will work on solving the issues of water collection, storage, and waste and making sure the tiny house is able to maintain a comfortable environment for its occupants.

 

https://www.ecoammo.com/

Kristin Tollovsen | Associate, Project Manager, BSc, LEED AP BD+C, LEED for Homes Green Rater, LEAN Yellow Belt, WELL AP 

Andriana Beauchemin | Associate, Project Manager, BA Distinction, LEED AP Legacy, LEED AP Homes, LEED for Homes Quality Assurance Designee, Green Rater, Certified Energy Advisor, LEAF AC, LEAN Yellow Belt

Andriana and Kristin from Eco Ammo will be working on an Alternative Compliance Pathway for Tiny Homes on Wheels in the LEED Certification System. This would allow, not just us, but all builders to build third party verified, high-performance and sustainable tiny homes.

https://ecosynergy.ca/

AMELIE CARON | MSc Building Science, Arch.Tech, Principal, NRCan Energy Advisor, LEED for Homes Green Rater

Amelie, founder of EcoSynergy, completes our design team. Amelie is a Building Scientist who will act as our Green Rater and Verification Expert. She’s been in the Construction, Energy Performance and Sustainability Industry for over sixteen years. She is an Architect Technologist, and completed her Masters in Building Science from Danube University in Austria.  She is particularly skilled in creating and building cost effective, eco-friendly, high performing homes, multi-units and commercial buildings.

She has worked on several High-Performance Building Projects (including Net Zero Energy) and is experienced in the analysis and implementation of building envelope, systems and design elements.

Our team includes some of the foremost experts in high-performance and sustainable design. We believe this will be the best designed tiny house on the planet.

Oh yeah, and then there's us too!

www.borlebros.ca

Ethan Borlé graduated from university in 2013 with a Bachelor of Commerce and cofounded Borlé Bros. Contracting Corp. shortly after with his brother in 2014. While managing the day-to-day aspects of the business Ethan also pursued further education in the field, completing a Diploma in Renewable Energy and Conservation in 2017. Additionally, he is continually updating his knowledge through training provided by the Canadian Green Building Council and the US Green Building Council and received his LEED Green Associate accreditation, also in 2017. He has also presented twice at the Building Lasting Change Conference hosted by the CaGBC in the Emerging Green Professionals Innovation Challenge.

Conner Borlé helped found BBCC in 2014 while pursuing a Bachelor of Secondary Education. He graduated in 2015 with a Major in Physics and a Minor in Mathematics. During his first year of teaching he was nominated for the Edwin Parr Teacher Award for Outstanding New Teachers and won in his school division.  As a teacher, Conner recognizes the importance of education in driving change and is spearheading the educational component of our tiny-house campaign. His goal is to complete the successful campaign with not just one tiny-home winner, but an entire host of people ready to demand more from their homes, the professionals who build them, and the governments who permit them.

Design Requirements

As stated, we’ve got some specific goals we want to achieve with this tiny house build, including LEED Certification. But to give you a better idea of what the end product will be like, we’re going to share some of the design requirements that the team will use to guide their work on the project.

  • The tiny house should be as self-contained as possible, providing its own energy, water, and waste treatment/storage. Accomplished via the use of solar energy, rain water harvesting and storage, composting of organic wastes, etc.
  • These systems should be interactive, much as one might describe a solar energy system as grid-interactive. The idea is that when the owner chooses a long-term home for the unit, they can install extra storage on site for water, electricity, etc. The house must be able to take from these sources when required but to also feed into these sources when over-producing.
  • The tiny house should provide as many of the typical comforts of a home as possible.
  • The unit must be future ready so that it can be paired to an electrified tow vehicle, such as those under development by several companies.
  • It must be durable and resilient to withstand the stresses of frequent movement and a large variety of climatic conditions.
  • The structure should be within reasonable weight and size limitations to enable easier transportation without the requirement of special permits.
  • The design should focus on perfecting the envelop and mechanical systems of the house while allowing for flexibility in appearance and build-out so that it can be easily adapted for different circumstances, such as an increase in size, placement on a permanent foundation, and other changes.

 

What We Need

This is breakdown of all the costs associated with the successful campaign and tiny house build.

You’ll notice that there are three sections we included in the budget that we valued at zero:

  • Create Crowdfunding Campaign Promotional Videos
  • Getting the Word Out! (Running Ads)
  • Crowdfunding Campaign and Mailing List Management

We wanted your campaign contribution to go directly to the tiny house, not the operating expenses of the project. So, we’re covering all the costs associated with these aspects of the campaign ourselves with a combination of investments of money from ourselves and our company, and a whole lot of unbilled labour hours working towards a successful campaign.

 

Perks

We’ve gone with four different pledge levels to cover the whole cross section of interest levels for campaign backers. Which one do you fit into?

 

 

 

 

 

 

Support the Campaign $10.00 - You love the goal of the campaign, to educate people about healthy, energy-efficient, and more durable homes. You think it’s a great cause, but you really have no interest to live in a tiny house. This pledge lets us know you think we’re on the right track but that you’d like someone else who could really use and appreciate the tiny house to win it. This pledge package does not allow you to enter the “Tiny House for You!” Contest.

Contest Entry $50.00 - You’d love to have a tiny house for yourself! You don’t have plans or the means to build or purchase one yourself anytime soon so winning one is about the only way you could get a tiny house of your own. This pledge package allows you one submission into the “Tiny House for You!” Contest. (Please see the contest rules and explanation for more details.)

Contest Entry and Basic Design Package $150.00 - You’ve been planning to purchase or build a tiny house some time in the future. Winning one would put you way ahead schedule, but even if you don’t win, you’d sure like to learn how to build one of the most highly and best designed tiny homes available. This pledge package allows you one submission into the “Tiny House for You!” Contest. (Please see the contest rules and explanation for more details.) In addition, you will receive the completed design documents for our tiny house build. Including architectural drawings, mechanical and electrical diagrams, and material lists. Over $50,000.00 in value! You can use these to build your own tiny house or give to a builder who can do it for you.

Contest Entry and Full Design Package $300.00 - You’ve been planning to purchase or build a tiny house soon. Winning one would put you ahead schedule, but even if you don’t win, you’d sure like to learn how to build one of the most highly and best designed tiny homes available. This pledge package allows you one submission into the “Tiny House for You!” Contest. (Please see the contest rules and explanation for more details.) In addition, you will receive the completed design documents for our tiny house build. Including architectural drawings, mechanical and electrical diagrams, material and vendor lists, price list, schedule, LEED Certification documents and reports, and our Third Party Verification reports. You'll also receive a half hour of consultation over the phone on how you can adapt our design for your own use. In all its over $60,000.00 in value! You’ll never find a better deal to design your tiny home. You can use these to build your own tiny house, give to a builder who can do it for you, or use these plans as the basis to build a permanent foundation, not so tiny house.

We’re running an all-or-nothing campaign, or fixed-amount campaign. That means, if we don’t reach our funding goal, we don’t take any of your money. Your credit card is only charged if we reach our target by our chosen end date. So, you don’t have to worry about winning a half completed tiny house that doesn’t live up to the hype. We only want to go forward with the project if we know we can do it right.

Timeline

Risks & Challenges

We’re not asking you to fund any old ordinary tiny house build, because most tiny homes are built the same way that regular homes are built, and this typically leaves a lot to be desired. We want it to be extraordinary, and that means our costs are going to be higher than the typical design and build for a tiny house and in turn that we need to raise more money from more people to complete a successful campaign. So, our two big challenges in this regard is to reach a lot of people with the campaign and convince those people that this project is something worth funding.

Our last major challenge…can we actually do it? To ensure that we can meet our very ambitious goals we’ve assembled a team of industry experts from a variety of highly respected companies who’ve worked together before and completed many successful projects in the past that have reached these same high standards. Check out the Team Section to meet these individuals and companies and check out the links below to some of the projects they’ve worked on previously:

https://www.integralgroup.com/projects/?fwp_pro...

https://www.ecoammo.com/green-building-certific...

https://ecosynergy.ca/our-portfolio/

http://www.lefthandarch.com/portfolio-calgary-r...

Finally, as discussed earlier, we are aiming to achieve LEED Certification for our tiny house. This is a hard-enough task in and of itself as not every building that works towards this designation achieves it. But to add to this difficulty the current LEED Rating system doesn’t recognize mobile structures such as the one we are planning. So, not only do we have to achieve enough credits in the rating system to get certified we also have to convince the certification body that our structure is worth recognizing and is in alignment with LEED’s end goal of reducing a building’s environmental impact.

Again, our team is essential in overcoming this challenge. We are designing this project as if we will be applying for LEED Certification whether we can do so in the end or not. No matter what, we’ll still have an extraordinary home. And with EcoAmmo on our side, a company extremely experienced with coordinating with Green Business Certification Inc. (GBCI), we have a greatly improved chance of achieving this goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to support our campaign in more ways and make sure we reach our goal to ensure you have a chance to win the tiny house? Get the word out by telling your family, friends, and acquaintances about what were trying to do. And use our social media links below to like, share and follow us and to give a virtual shout out to your internet peer group about the campaign.

Remember, if you want to know even more visit our webpage (HERE) for loads of additional information!

Kristin Tollovsen | Associate, Project Manager, BSc, LEED AP BD+C, LEED for Homes Green Rater, LEAN Yellow Belt, WELL AP 
Andriana Beauchemin | Associate, Project Manager, BA Distinction, LEED AP Legacy, LEED AP Homes, LEED for Homes Quality Assurance Designee, Green Rater, Certified Energy Advisor, LEAF AC, LEAN Yellow Belt
Andriana and Kristin from Eco Ammo will be working on an Alternative Compliance Pathway for Tiny Homes on Wheels in the LEED Certification System. This would allow, not just us, but all builders to build third party verified, high-performance and sustainable tiny homes.

https://ecosynergy.ca/
AMELIE CARON | MSc Building Science, Arch.Tech, Principal, NRCan Energy Advisor, LEED for Homes Green Rater
Amelie, founder of EcoSynergy, completes our design team. Amelie is a Building Scientist who will act as our Green Rater and Verification Expert. She’s been in the Construction, Energy Performance and Sustainability Industry for over sixteen years. She is an Architect Technologist, and completed her Masters in Building Science from Danube University in Austria.  She is particularly skilled in creating and building cost effective, eco-friendly, high performing homes, multi-units and commercial buildings.
She has worked on several High-Performance Building Projects (including Net Zero Energy) and is experienced in the analysis and implementation of building envelope, systems and design elements.
Our team includes some of the foremost experts in high-performance and sustainable design. We believe this will be the best designed tiny house on the planet.
Oh yeah, and then there's us too!

www.borlebros.ca
Ethan Borlé graduated from university in 2013 with a Bachelor of Commerce and cofounded Borlé Bros. Contracting Corp. shortly after with his brother in 2014. While managing the day-to-day aspects of the business Ethan also pursued further education in the field, completing a Diploma in Renewable Energy and Conservation in 2017. Additionally, he is continually updating his knowledge through training provided by the Canadian Green Building Council and the US Green Building Council and received his LEED Green Associate accreditation, also in 2017. He has also presented twice at the Building Lasting Change Conference hosted by the CaGBC in the Emerging Green Professionals Innovation Challenge.
Conner Borlé helped found BBCC in 2014 while pursuing a Bachelor of Secondary Education. He graduated in 2015 with a Major in Physics and a Minor in Mathematics. During his first year of teaching he was nominated for the Edwin Parr Teacher Award for Outstanding New Teachers and won in his school division.  As a teacher, Conner recognizes the importance of education in driving change and is spearheading the educational component of our tiny-house campaign. His goal is to complete the successful campaign with not just one tiny-home winner, but an entire host of people ready to demand more from their homes, the professionals who build them, and the governments who permit them.
Design Requirements
As stated, we’ve got some specific goals we want to achieve with this tiny house build, including LEED Certification. But to give you a better idea of what the end product will be like, we’re going to share some of the design requirements that the team will use to guide their work on the project.

The tiny house should be as self-contained as possible, providing its own energy, water, and waste treatment/storage. Accomplished via the use of solar energy, rain water harvesting and storage, composting of organic wastes, etc.
These systems should be interactive, much as one might describe a solar energy system as grid-interactive. The idea is that when the owner chooses a long-term home for the unit, they can install extra storage on site for water, electricity, etc. The house must be able to take from these sources when required but to also feed into these sources when over-producing.
The tiny house should provide as many of the typical comforts of a home as possible.
The unit must be future ready so that it can be paired to an electrified tow vehicle, such as those under development by several companies.
It must be durable and resilient to withstand the stresses of frequent movement and a large variety of climatic conditions.
The structure should be within reasonable weight and size limitations to enable easier transportation without the requirement of special permits.
The design should focus on perfecting the envelop and mechanical systems of the house while allowing for flexibility in appearance and build-out so that it can be easily adapted for different circumstances, such as an increase in size, placement on a permanent foundation, and other changes.

 
What We Need
This is breakdown of all the costs associated with the successful campaign and tiny house build.

You’ll notice that there are three sections we included in the budget that we valued at zero:

Create Crowdfunding Campaign Promotional Videos
Getting the Word Out! (Running Ads)
Crowdfunding Campaign and Mailing List Management

We wanted your campaign contribution to go directly to the tiny house, not the operating expenses of the project. So, we’re covering all the costs associated with these aspects of the campaign ourselves with a combination of investments of money from ourselves and our company, and a whole lot of unbilled labour hours working towards a successful campaign.


 

Perks
We’ve gone with four different pledge levels to cover the whole cross section of interest levels for campaign backers. Which one do you fit into?

 
 
 
 
 
 
Support the Campaign $10.00 - You love the goal of the campaign, to educate people about healthy, energy-efficient, and more durable homes. You think it’s a great cause, but you really have no interest to live in a tiny house. This pledge lets us know you think we’re on the right track but that you’d like someone else who could really use and appreciate the tiny house to win it. This pledge package does not allow you to enter the “Tiny House for You!” Contest.

Contest Entry $50.00 - You’d love to have a tiny house for yourself! You don’t have plans or the means to build or purchase one yourself anytime soon so winning one is about the only way you could get a tiny house of your own. This pledge package allows you one submission into the “Tiny House for You!” Contest. (Please see the contest rules and explanation for more details.)

Contest Entry and Basic Design Package $150.00 - You’ve been planning to purchase or build a tiny house some time in the future. Winning one would put you way ahead schedule, but even if you don’t win, you’d sure like to learn how to build one of the most highly and best designed tiny homes available. This pledge package allows you one submission into the “Tiny House for You!” Contest. (Please see the contest rules and explanation for more details.) In addition, you will receive the completed design documents for our tiny house build. Including architectural drawings, mechanical and electrical diagrams, and material lists. Over $50,000.00 in value! You can use these to build your own tiny house or give to a builder who can do it for you.

Contest Entry and Full Design Package $300.00 - You’ve been planning to purchase or build a tiny house soon. Winning one would put you ahead schedule, but even if you don’t win, you’d sure like to learn how to build one of the most highly and best designed tiny homes available. This pledge package allows you one submission into the “Tiny House for You!” Contest. (Please see the contest rules and explanation for more details.) In addition, you will receive the completed design documents for our tiny house build. Including architectural drawings, mechanical and electrical diagrams, material and vendor lists, price list, schedule, LEED Certification documents and reports, and our Third Party Verification reports. You'll also receive a half hour of consultation over the phone on how you can adapt our design for your own use. In all its over $60,000.00 in value! You’ll never find a better deal to design your tiny home. You can use these to build your own tiny house, give to a builder who can do it for you, or use these plans as the basis to build a permanent foundation, not so tiny house.
We’re running an all-or-nothing campaign, or fixed-amount campaign. That means, if we don’t reach our funding goal, we don’t take any of your money. Your credit card is only charged if we reach our target by our chosen end date. So, you don’t have to worry about winning a half completed tiny house that doesn’t live up to the hype. We only want to go forward with the project if we know we can do it right.
Timeline

Risks & Challenges
We’re not asking you to fund any old ordinary tiny house build, because most tiny homes are built the same way that regular homes are built, and this typically leaves a lot to be desired. We want it to be extraordinary, and that means our costs are going to be higher than the typical design and build for a tiny house and in turn that we need to raise more money from more people to complete a successful campaign. So, our two big challenges in this regard is to reach a lot of people with the campaign and convince those people that this project is something worth funding.
Our last major challenge…can we actually do it? To ensure that we can meet our very ambitious goals we’ve assembled a team of industry experts from a variety of highly respected companies who’ve worked together before and completed many successful projects in the past that have reached these same high standards. Check out the Team Section to meet these individuals and companies and check out the links below to some of the projects they’ve worked on previously:
https://www.integralgroup.com/projects/?fwp_pro...
https://www.ecoammo.com/green-building-certific...
https://ecosynergy.ca/our-portfolio/
http://www.lefthandarch.com/portfolio-calgary-r...
Finally, as discussed earlier, we are aiming to achieve LEED Certification for our tiny house. This is a hard-enough task in and of itself as not every building that works towards this designation achieves it. But to add to this difficulty the current LEED Rating system doesn’t recognize mobile structures such as the one we are planning. So, not only do we have to achieve enough credits in the rating system to get certified we also have to convince the certification body that our structure is worth recognizing and is in alignment with LEED’s end goal of reducing a building’s environmental impact.
Again, our team is essential in overcoming this challenge. We are designing this project as if we will be applying for LEED Certification whether we can do so in the end or not. No matter what, we’ll still have an extraordinary home. And with EcoAmmo on our side, a company extremely experienced with coordinating with Green Business Certification Inc. (GBCI), we have a greatly improved chance of achieving this goal.
Other Ways You Can Help
Want to support our campaign in more ways and make sure we reach our goal to ensure you have a chance to win the tiny house? Get the word out by telling your family, friends, and acquaintances about what were trying to do. And use our social media links below to like, share and follow us and to give a virtual shout out to your internet peer group about the campaign.
Remember, if you want to know even more visit our webpage (HERE) for loads of additional information!

story:
Creamos experiencias por rutas auténticas e  insólitas. Nos gustan los contrastes, y queremos mostrarte las miles de caras de México. Déjate llevar & sorprender.

Podrás reservar tu viaje solo o en grupo. 6 viajeros pueden subir a bordo de Manifiesto Hostelbus dónde nosotras te recibiremos como anfitrionas atentas y viajeras expertas!

De hecho ya puedes reservar unos de los tres viajes que tenemos como recompensa de esta campaña. 


 

Viaje 1:  Día de Muertos en Michoacán
31/10/2019 al 03/11/2019

Viaje 2 : Jalisco/Riviera nayarit

Viaje 3 : 

Además preparamos otras recompensas para fondear esta aventura. Si no puedes viajar con nosotras, quizás te guste recibir por correo una postal cada mes. O quieras una tote bag "Deja el Pinche Plástico" para que se entienda bien el mensaje. Colecciona los pins? Tenemos el más cool de todos para ti: seguro encontrarás algo a medida de tu deseos. Puedes también adquirir cupones para futuros viajes : se vienen + fechas & experiencias increíbles.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


For additional information about Manifiesto Hostelbus & our story, visit our website

story:
Creating a new breed of fly rod was not easy. We've been working on these rods for more than a year. We did it using proven technology and high quality material, while having a lot of fun. Now we hope that the result will give you as much fun as we had all along this epic journey.

 

 

 

 

We started by reviewing the rods that we liked to fish and the best rods on the market...and then challenged our selves to reinvent and improve. We went back to the drawing board and listed what mattered most to fishing enthusiast. That's when the fun really started!

We broke the proverbial mould to bring you rods of great performance and outstanding quality. We're extremely excited with the result, and we have a feeling you will enjoy it too.

Introducing the F8 FASTTEK, the most technologically advanced fly rod. 

 

 

The F8 FASTTEK comes fully loaded with amazing tech.

 

The FLY TREKKER proprietary composite matrix stabilizes the rod so that your cast can be precise at any distance.

ExoMatrix keeps your rod crisp so that you can keep your loops tight and precisely deliver your fly in any stream conditions. 

 

Made from precisely tuned blanks, the FASTTEK rods enhances vibrations to make sure that you feel the softest of bites and never miss a fish.

Landing the fish is not the only thing that matters, but lets face it…the exhilaration of setting the hook and netting a fish is what makes any of us giggle like a kid during our fishing adventures. 

 

The F8 rod was designed with great versatility in mind. Provided with a kit of weight adjusted end caps, the rod can be balanced with any reel.

You can customize the swing weight of your rod to fit your large arbor reel or your more compact low profile reel.

 

 

 

ACTION:      Mid fast action

FEATURES:

  • ExoMatrix Technology, for precision at every distance
  • MagnaFeel Technology, for optimized strike feel
  • Perfect Balance end cap kit
  • Four piece explorer design
  • Hard Chrome micro guides
  • Ultra High Grade corrosion resistant anodized reel seat
  • Half wells cork handle on 4,5, 6 weight models
  • Full wells cork handle on 8+ weight models
  • Salt water safe 

FINISH:

 Translucent deep blue over composite matrix

WARRANTY:

 FLY TREKKER 25 Year Warranty

 

 

 

We are committed to giving 1% of our revenue to organizations that promote and actively work for the conservation of the resources we benefit so greatly from. With your help and support, we look forward to give back so that future generations can enjoy our beloved fisheries, oceans and fresh water resources as much as we do.

 

 

*Canadian prices estimated based on current exchange rate.

 FLY TREKKER Ships Worldwide

 

 

 

 

FLY TREKKER is a young up and coming company built on years of composite product development.

The founders of FLY TREKKER cumulate more than 30 years of high performance sports product development.

The founders, Philippe Jeanneau and Philippe Koyess, have been responsible for the invention of numerous important products, namely in hockey.

During their work in hockey, the two Philippe have been credited with several patents that changed how hockey sticks where made and performed.

Moreover,  the guys worked closely with top Professional hockey players to customize the feel and performance of their sticks.

Working with players like: Sidney Crosby, Alex Ovechkin, Patrice Bergeron and Carrey Price allowed the guys to get critical feedback in the creation of the best hockey stick technologies.

Today, FLY TREKKER is incorporating performance enhancing technologies in fly fishing rods to create the most technologically advanced rods.

The new tech such as ExoMatrix, MagnaFeel and Optimal Balance are directly derived from hockey stick tech that allowed Pro players to shoot faster, be more precise and have better puck control and feel.

 

 

Thanks for checking out our project, have a look at the rewards and let us know if you have any questions!

story:
Our Story

It began with a 12 year partnership between my wife Rebette, myself, and the most extraordinary dog I have ever known. We registered him as Jacques Louis Bordeaux Lafayette, or simply “Jacques” to his friends.

As Jacques matured to his eventual 109 pounds, it became increasingly difficult to get him into and out of our SUV safely. In the early years he could easily jump both ways. But as he grew older, we were increasingly concerned seeing the too frequent bumps and that his legs endured against the hard surfaces, and the challenges he began having climbing or jumping into our vehicle. The more often we observed these uncomfortable impacts on his body when jumping onto the pavement, the more certain we were that we needed a solution.

THERE MUST BE A BETTER WAY?

Of course, once he was in the cargo area other issues became obvious. His conventional mattress did little to dampen vibration, or noise and temperature changes coming through from below. The sun coming through the windows not only heated the compartment but also heated up his dark brown coat. He nearly always showed signs of stress from this, so getting in and out was just part of the overall problem. 

In the search for a better way, our first effort was Rebette and I teaming up to hoist him, sometimes backing up to a high curb to get a little head start on the lifting; the second stage was to use a booster he could use on the way up, and the third was to purchase a portable ramp that stored in a zippered bag. What does a person do with the dog while using two hands to open and position the portable ramp?

These “better ways” introduced their own set of new problems. Once he was in place, Jacques was still bothered, uncomfortable and affected by the increased temperature, even in the winter. While the portable ramp helped him get in and out, it had to be stowed in the rear passenger seat, eventually causing damage from the movements of the vehicle. The portable ramp wasn’t ideal, but it was all we had. We were fortunate to never be in a crash because both Jacques and the ramp could have easily become airborne.

WHEN NECESSITY BECAME THE MOTHER OF OUR INVENTION

Our initial idea for the InYaGo! system sprang from these harsh realities. There was simply no system designed to protect our Jacques or simplify the situation. There were bits and pieces, but they were cumbersome, took up too much space, or rendered the vehicle unusable for routine needs and did little to protect Jacques or provide us some added convenience.

In his last years Jacques contracted a kidney disease that eventually ended his life. We were fortunate well before that time to have developed a functional InYaGo!™ prototype that made this time so much more tolerable for him when he was being transported. During that time with the prototype in place, our SUV was still available for routine uses because our system is stationary, and Jacques could rest comfortably in his domain while in transit. 

We are compelled to bring to market our patented solution for these unmet needs in memory of an extraordinary canine partner. He always greeting us with enthusiasm, was always eager to please, and a welcome constant in our day-to-day lives.

 

One-of-a-Kind

InYaGo! will be the only stationary dog ramp in the marketplace. There are currently several less-than-optimal choices of rigid and foldable ramps and stairs which are heavy, cumbersome and typically fold at two or three hinged locations stored in a zippered bag, weighing anywhere from 12 to 20+ pounds. A product like InYaGo! does not exist on the market, and our design is patented.


What We Need & What You Get

To bring InYaGo! to market, the first phase will require engaging a local engineering firm that we have previously identified to provide a fully engineered design with scale model prototypes. The second phase will include creating molds, acquiring manufactured components, manufacturing and assembling 1000 units.

Our estimate of the initial investment necessary to achieve this goal during the first 12 months is $548,000. The first phase of this investment, ($88,000), will cover the costs of development and the second phase will require an additional $460,000 to bring 1000 units to market.​

 

How You Can Help 

  1. Sign Up for updates on continued InYaGo™ product development, campaign news, press releases and fundraising milestones.

  2. Spread the Word by tapping into your dog-network, groomers, vets, rescue groups or other dog organizations you trust. Use any of our campaign share tools to help others learn about our incredible product!

  3. Make a Donation! Contribute to our campaign for access to exclusive discounts, unique premium perks, donations to the animal charity of your choice, and other special rewards!

story:
I-Keeper is an innovative product design to protect people 's luggage. With the development of society, the security of luggage would be a problem that we needed to concern as it becomes essential.

For this purpose, we designed I-Keeper to solve the safety issue.

As tourism development growing over these years, people are traveling than ever before. When suitcases become indispensable, safety would be a problem that we needed to concern. Luggage is convenient but sometimes, it is not. 

 We may face many problems while traveling

I-Keeper is a vacuum suction device, the steel wire of it first hitch onto the luggage and then you can set up a password to lock the luggage. After that, the suction device will fix to the floor and connect with the luggage base on its vacuum principle. Besides, the I-Keeper attains 80 kg vacuum suction which is difficult to destroy by tools.

 Beginning in July 2019, We conducted a test by setting twenty I-Keeper in different locations, such as the shopping center, subway station, and Airbnb. Nevertheless, it was 100% secure as none of the products were destroyed. 

I-Keeper not only retains the benefit of traditional locker but also solves the shortcomings of it, including insufficient storage space and limit location.  

  

 

Undeniably, the valuables inside of the luggage are costly. Through the development of luggage within different brands, it turns luggage from the necessity to luxury goods gradually. Therefore, we should not place luggage in public areas negligently as it is dangerous. Except for applying         I-Keeper in luggage protection, you can use it in the bicycle, stroller or pet as well.

I-Keeper is the first product that applies the combination lock into a vacuum suction device. We sincerely hope this product could bring peace and comfort to your life.

 

I-Keeper adopts the vacuum principle to create a suction device which is a safe and stable technology through our testing. In New York, there is a man challenge to climb the building from the ground floor to the 58 floors using suction devices. Eventually, he succeeded in this challenge. This story told us this brave man trust the security of suction device as he risked life to do it.

Moreover, the applications of suckers are extensive use in the industry. The breakthrough of the I-Keeperis applied the industrial sucker to create daily goods that bring convenience to people's lives.

We think of creating a new business opportunity needs to solve the problem that is long-standing in society. When we come up with this idea, we realized that the circumstance of people placing luggage in public areas casually become severe. Below photos were shooting in different locations on the same day. We guarantee those photos are 100% real. As a result, the situation seems worse than we imagined and those photos tell us we should pay attention to keep luggage safe.

Below is the overall crime ratio statistic of these cities 

 (count by per 100 000 population) 

  • Hong Kong - 827

  • Tokyo          - 1074

  • New York   - 2036

  • Paris           - 11983

  • London      - 8932

  • Toronto      - 4331

 

  • On-The-Go  Protection 

  • Non-exposed sucker, which increases its durability.

  • Structure assembly – able to replace the components of product

  • Stretched steel wire

 

Easy to use-only 3 steps

1. Press the button to pull out the steel wire depends on your luggage size. 

2. Press another button to pull up the handle after fixing I-Keeper on the floor or any smooth surface.

3. Press the handle to lock the vacuum sucker to complete the whole procedure.

I-Keeper is appropriate for indoor or outdoor use. For example, you can use this product to prevent strangers open the door when staying at a hotel. Some thieves may know well to the hotel door locks and know how to unlock it. Therefore, you should adopt measures against theft to keep your safety.

I-Keeper changes the weaknesses of the traditional locker. With no restrict storage location, you can enjoy the day with no barriers. The breakthrough point of this product applies the technique of vacuum suction to the anti-theft device. As long as using the vacuum suction device properly, the protective effect would more powerful than using other locks.

We had to go through a lengthy design process, try various materials, and perform numerous tests.

The first time we held the product in our hands we knew it was different, we just feel it is perfect, the quality, the right weight, the sleek design and the sense of security. 

FORSETI is a new brand for designing luggage and related protective devices. As far as we know, the problem of luggage security is considered as a concern by people all the time. Therefore, we decided to solve this problem which is why our brand start. We hope our product able to change people's lives for the better and break the boundaries. We have designed, improved and tested countless times until created ''I-Keeper'', an innovative protective product.

Travel has become a way of life that turns luggage into a necessity in people's minds. Therefore, we believe that the I-Keeper will popularize from now on or even spanning the world. All of you are the members of the team and bringing power to us. Thank you for your support.

 We already applied for patent protection to the I-Keeper.

Risks and challenges

I-Keeper is the result of a year of the project. During the period of research, we’ve had issues with the design of the product. As we have to ensure every customer feels safe when using our product, it was very important to have a sturdy design. For this reason, we have to work with a lock manufacturer to investigate which structure along with materials could maximize the effectiveness of the I-Keeper. After the product design is performed, we have tested countless times until it attains our expectations. Another challenge we faced is finding the appropriate manufactory to produce the product due to I-Keeper is an innovative product that you’ve never heard. For that, we did a lot of research as well as communicated with different manufacturers. Now, we are ready to get the ball rolling. This is our first Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign, we need your support to launch this safe, convenience and innovative safety device. Sometimes unforeseen barriers may appear, like shipping delays or production delays. However, we will pull out all the stops to minimize those possible risks.

I-Keeper is an innovative product design to protect people 's luggage. With the development of society, the security of luggage would be a problem that we needed to concern as it becomes essential.For this purpose, we designed I-Keeper to solve the safety issue.As tourism development growing over these years, people are traveling than ever before. When suitcases become indispensable, safety would be a problem that we needed to concern. Luggage is convenient but sometimes, it is not.  We may face many problems while traveling
I-Keeper is a vacuum suction device, the steel wire of it first hitch onto the luggage and then you can set up a password to lock the luggage. After that, the suction device will fix to the floor and connect with the luggage base on its vacuum principle. Besides, the I-Keeper attains 80 kg vacuum suction which is difficult to destroy by tools. Beginning in July 2019, We conducted a test by setting twenty I-Keeper in different locations, such as the shopping center, subway station, and Airbnb. Nevertheless, it was 100% secure as none of the products were destroyed. I-Keeper not only retains the benefit of traditional locker but also solves the shortcomings of it, including insufficient storage space and limit location.     Undeniably, the valuables inside of the luggage are costly. Through the development of luggage within different brands, it turns luggage from the necessity to luxury goods gradually. Therefore, we should not place luggage in public areas negligently as it is dangerous. Except for applying         I-Keeper in luggage protection, you can use it in the bicycle, stroller or pet as well.
I-Keeper is the first product that applies the combination lock into a vacuum suction device. We sincerely hope this product could bring peace and comfort to your life. I-Keeper adopts the vacuum principle to create a suction device which is a safe and stable technology through our testing. In New York, there is a man challenge to climb the building from the ground floor to the 58 floors using suction devices. Eventually, he succeeded in this challenge. This story told us this brave man trust the security of suction device as he risked life to do it.Moreover, the applications of suckers are extensive use in the industry. The breakthrough of the I-Keeperis applied the industrial sucker to create daily goods that bring convenience to people's lives.We think of creating a new business opportunity needs to solve the problem that is long-standing in society. When we come up with this idea, we realized that the circumstance of people placing luggage in public areas casually become severe. Below photos were shooting in different locations on the same day. We guarantee those photos are 100% real. As a result, the situation seems worse than we imagined and those photos tell us we should pay attention to keep luggage safe.Below is the overall crime ratio statistic of these cities  (count by per 100 000 population)

story:
We design multi-use outdoor shades and hammocks. After many tests, changes and feedback from our users, we are really excited to bring you the first generation of Shadeeco sunshades. We want to be able to put Shadeeco in the hands of all outdoor lovers so they can enjoy the outside as much as possible.

 

 

We have joined all of the best parts of going on an adventure into a single package. Never again struggle to find your hammocks or find a space to fit that huge pop up shade; Shadeeco has you covered!

 

 

Our sunshade isn't stored in just any bag, it comes in a 40L hiking backpack, designed with the adventurer in mind. We want you to be able to take your shade to the most remote spots on earth!

 

 

Once you reach your perfect spot, set up your sunshade in under 10 minutes. Adjust your shade to any angle to make sure you and your family are protected from harmfull UV rays but still enjoying the nice breeze. These are just some of the benefits:

 

 

Not only are you able to spend the entire day protected in the sun with Shadeeco, you can also convert both the blanket and the top-shade into double hammocks in minutes

 

 

Shadeeco is best enjoyed with good company. That's why we also made it modular. You can attach two or more Sunshades so you and your friends can enjoy the outdoors and the shade together.

 

 

 

While living in Playa del Carmen Mexico with my wife, we were going to the beach almost every day but we always had the same problem…Shade. More specifically the lack of quality shade on the beach.

 

I know it might sound a bit cheesy but that night I had a dream about a shade that you could take anywhere no matter how extreme and would also transform into hammocks so that you could also take those amazing beach naps.

A couple of months later we were back living our normal lives in Arizona when I decided to try creating this vision I had. I have always loved building things so prototyping was a blast even when the wind beat me up several times.

After many tries and countless redesigns, we finally had the product that I dreamed of. I knew that I wanted to make a product that would fufill all of the needs people have at the beach. Why bring 5 different things in your car when you can just grab a bag with everything you would need and GO! 

 

It has been over 3 years since the start of Shadeeco. During this time the company and its products have developed into something we are very proud & excited to launch to outdoor enthusiasts! 

It has been quite the journey and we want to share some of Shadeeco's history with you, so let's take a trip down memory lane.

Below are some of the first sketches for the convertible sunshade - hammock 

 

 

Once we had transformed this idea into a viable design it was time to start prototyping. The first couple of prototypes we created using whatever could be found around the house. 

Below is the evolution of our prototypes

 

 

We were ready to test this prototype anywhere from the beach to the park to see how we could improve the product. 

 

Below are some images of our team testing out the Shadeeco Shade- Hammock

 

We even took it to the snow, and all we can say is hammocks and skiing are a great combination! 

 

Once we had tested our product multiple times, we went through an iteration process to make sure every part of the product was of the highest quality possible. After much time testing and improving our product we are really happy with our final product and are stoked for you to join the Shadeeco family.  

We can't wait to see what adventures you will take Shadeeco on!

story:
PHOTON-X

Photon-X is designed to serve you during your outdoor activities.

Need to illuminate a huge cave, a mountain, or the Moon? ...Ok, probably the last one is a bit too much, but maybe with the next model...who knows... For now, you will get at least a blinding 16 000 lumens, which is probably enough for...anything. A pair of high quality car headlights can shine at 5000 lumens, so imagine more than 3 car's brightness...in your hands.

Are you stuck in a rainstorm during your nighttime hiking? This flashlight will much likely to help you a lot to find some cover, as it will be water resistant. Or, if you are made of stainless steel, just go on...

 

 

-Wow, 16 000 lumens? For how long?

Unlike other flashlights, this eye-cooking brightness is not a turbo mode. Even the current prototype can run on maximum brightness as long, as the battery lasts, without overheating, or burning your hands. Yes, other high-performance flashlights really get hot. This one stays comfortable to hold.

 

-In the video, you said it will have "variable beam angle". What does this mean?

Well, a wider light beam is ideal for indoor, or short distance usage. A narrower beam, however, can illuminate things being at greater distances. Photon-X will have 5 beam angle settings to fit your needs anytime.

 

-You have also shown "Intelligent Brightness Control" in the video, but haven't explained it in details.

That is a really useful and interesting feature under development, let me tell more about it now:

16000 lumens is great, if you are looking for something far away from you, but if you suddenly point the lamp to a closer target, it becomes really disturbing. Well, in most cases, you would have to turn the brightness down, and finally up again, but Photon-X can do it automatically, and as you can see in  the video, it is already very quick and smooth.

However, this feature still need some improvements, until the flashlight hits the market.

And of course, both with Intelligent Brightness Control turned on or off, brightness will be adjustable by multiple levels.

 

-This sounds great, but hey, 16000 lumens need a lot of battery power... What about battery life, will I have to bring a nuclear reactor with myself in the forests?!

A high-capacity lithium-ion battery pack will be built into the aluminum body, and as I've already mentioned in the video, the flashlight will have at least 60 minutes runtime, on MAXIMUM BRIGHTNESS! Or...probably more, even if the final product is brighter. But 60 is guaranteed. No other flashlight on the market can shine so long at this brightness. Does not sound good enough? Turn the brightness down to 700 lumens, and you will get a whopping 24 hours. This is the maximum brightness of an average tactical flashlight.

In other words, you can charge up your phone 10-15 times with Photon-X's buit in usb port, and still have some juice left.

Oh, and it will be powerful enough to start a car engine! We will make a small external add-on to make it possible.

 

-Ok, go on with the exterior...

CNC machined, high quality, hard type ("airplane grade") aluminum. It will be light compared to its size, and durable. Yeah, and Photon-X will have active cooling, and water resistance.

 

 

-What is your plan, if you get the money? Do you really have a plan?

Of course, yes!

    1: Organize a small group of partners and get ready to solve all tasks as fast as possible.

    2: Design the final product's exact appearance. (It will look cool, of course!)

    3: Design, and develop all custom made parts and tools.

    4: Make a few flashlights in their final form for further testing.

    5: Start manufacturing and shipping in small quantities to be sure everything works well.

    6: Speed up manufacturing process.

    7: Develop more external accessories to enhance the product's functions, and get ready for the next flashlight... I think we might have to make some seriously bright things for bikers too...

 

Developing and manufacturing a product like this from scratch is really expensive for such a small team as ours. Please support us by donating, and sharing our Indiegogo campaign!

We have a great concept, a working prototype, and we really have intrepidity to make it real!

story:
WHY DO WE NEED ANOTHER TRAVEL BOTTLE?

  • Do you want to minimise how much you carry when you...travel, or go the gym, or go for a swim, or go camping, or take the kids out for the day?
  • GET FULL VALUE and be able to squeeze out every drop from a bottle.
  • Easy to clean - reuse it over and over again!
  • TRAVEL FRIENDLY - no leakage and complies with all luggage requirements.

2 SQUEEZY is the ONLY bottle on the market that can save you time, money and help you organise your life and travel much easier!


WHAT IS SO GOOD ABOUT 

2 SQUEEZY?


1.  2-IN-1 unique dual chamber bottle.  This allows 2 different contents to be stored in the 1 bottle at once.  This halves the number of bottles you display or carry around.

Halve the number of bottles you need

Each chamber holds up to 48ml (1.6oz) of content, this totals to 96ml (3.2oz), which complies with the standards for carry on airplane luggage. 

2 sides, 2 different contents, approved for carry on luggage


2.  SOFT SILICONE material of 2 SQUEEZY is durable and makes it easy to dispense liquids right down to the very last drop, even while stuck on the wall.  

It is 100% BPA free and dishwasher safe.  So it is versatile, suiting all sorts of liquids from shampoos and moisturizes, to baby oil and thick sunscreens, to sauces and pureed baby food.  Once finished, it can be put in the dishwasher (top rack).

EASY TO SQUEEZE & DISHWASHER SAFE


3.  SUCTION CUP on the back allows 2 SQUEEZY to bestuckon most surfaces temporarily. 2 SQUEEZY can be used while being stuck on the wall, or it is easily removed from the wall.

STICKS ON WALLS


4.  DRIP FREE  which is why even when 2 SQUEEZY is stuck on a wall vertically with the lid opened, the contents will not run out.  Even contents that are as thin as oil will not leak unless pressure is applied to the bottle.


DRIP FREE & NO WASTAGE


5.  LEAK-PROOF lid design of 2 SQUEEZY is ingenious as it is designed with 3 layers to prevent leakage.

100% LEAK PROOF


6.  WIDE OPENING at either side of the bottle makes it easy to fill 2 SQUEEZY and easy to clean.

EASY TO CLEAN & FILL


7.  'WHAT'S INSIDE?' COLLAR  Forgot what you put in each side? 2 SQUEEZY has it covered!  The outer collar of the bottle can be twisted to be set onto the correct label.  If your label isn't already printed, there are blank labels for you to write your own.

MARK YOUR BOTTLES WITH 2 SQUEEZY'S AMAZING COLLAR FUNCTION


SO...It's simple, 2 SQUEEZY is the smartest, safest, most convenient product that will  save you time, money, stress and luggage space.

Lets face it, we all use moisturizers, shampoos, creams, ointments and gels to keep us looking nice and refreshed and ready to step out of the house.  

But why have all the clutter in your bathroom or luggage?

BE SMART.  Get  2 SQUEEZY and travel light and live smart.

Spread the word to help get 2 SQUEEZY into production and in a few months you will have your own.


RISKS & CHALLENGES

2 SQUEEZY is the first of its kind because of the dual chamber design, so it has taken several months to get the right prototype.  The manufacturer and I have been closely working together for almost a year.  They are experienced in silicone product production internationally. 

I understand that there still can be unexpected issues which could impact on production and delivery times which is why I have added time to my shipping schedule to endeavor we hit the delivery dates. You have my word that you will be kept up to date on my project wall.

International shipping rates may fluctuate depending on the economy however, I will notify you immediately if there are any changes.

After several testings and alterations, I have a product which is ready to be produced.  Everything is in place, as soon as I reach my goal, production can begin of 2 SQUEEZY.


IN SHORT

*  This is a simple, smart and efficient product that will make you think how you ever lived without it.

*  Your bathroom will be clutter free.

*  Travelling will be made 10x easier and you will never have to worry about stuffing your bag with hair products, creams and gels, and hope they fit luggage requirements.

2 SQUEEZY will save you time, space and money.

Simple.




Start choosing your perks NOW!

BE SMART.  Get  2 SQUEEZY and travel light and live smart.
Spread the word to help get 2 SQUEEZY into production and in a few months you will have your own.


RISKS & CHALLENGES

2 SQUEEZY is the first of its kind because of the dual chamber design, so it has taken several months to get the right prototype.  The manufacturer and I have been closely working together for almost a year.  They are experienced in silicone product production internationally. 
I understand that there still can be unexpected issues which could impact on production and delivery times which is why I have added time to my shipping schedule to endeavor we hit the delivery dates. You have my word that you will be kept up to date on my project wall.
International shipping rates may fluctuate depending on the economy however, I will notify you immediately if there are any changes.
After several testings and alterations, I have a product which is ready to be produced.  Everything is in place, as soon as I reach my goal, production can begin of 2 SQUEEZY.

IN SHORT
*  This is a simple, smart and efficient product that will make you think how you ever lived without it.
*  Your bathroom will be clutter free.
*  Travelling will be made 10x easier and you will never have to worry about stuffing your bag with hair products, creams and gels, and hope they fit luggage requirements.
2 SQUEEZY will save you time, space and money.
Simple.









Start choosing your perks NOW!

story:
Laz'R Lure is a fast, easy, and rewarding way to get into the world of making fishing lures. You simply open the kit, pop out the pieces, put them together, and fish! Kids love ‘em--- adults love ‘em--- but most importantly, FISH love ‘em!

The designs of the Streamer Series of lures is based on well-known streamer fly patterns:

The Worry Wort (Warden’s Worry)
Your Sharona (Miss Sharon)
The Mick Pocket (Mickey Finn)
Casper’s Beard (Grey Ghost)
Ken’s Winnebago (Kennebago Smelt)
The Boss Man (Supervisor)
Spectre Noir (Black Ghost)
Mini Mud (Muddler Minnow)
The Hobbit’s Foot (Matuka)

Last April, we had a booth at the Maine Sportsman trade show, and had nearly 200 kids stop by to build a free lure! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=95_Sbfx1dZY

Laz’R Lure’s unique body shape makes them suitable for many different types of fishing action, including spin fishing, fly fishing, trolling, twitching retrieves, erratic crankbait movements, and strike-inducing spinning.

Over the course of testing, we’ve caught large and smallmouth bass, rainbow, brown and brook trout, perch, pickerel, pike, and crappie!

Laz’r Lure was created and developed by Richard deCosta, a registered Maine guide with nearly 40 years of experience in fishing, fly tying, and lure building. Our laser team, headed by Len Ludnum, has over 16 years of laser-based production experience. Our lure design artist Edward Luterio is one of the best in the business, and is well-known not only for lure design, but for amazing nature art and murals. Our manufacturing process is so refined and efficient that our lure kits can be created at a fraction of the cost of traditional lures! Imagine, nine beautiful wooden fishing lures for less than $12!

By following the instructions included in each kit, or video instructions online, these lures can be put together in minutes and fished IMMEDIATELY. Because they are built up from 9 layers of birch plywood the finished lures are TOUGH. By adding a coat or two of epoxy sealer you can be sure they will last for MANY fishing seasons to come.

Laz'R Lures can be fished in many ways. Here are a few popular options.

Our first run of kits was produced in the winter of 2016. We’ve fished them all over New England throughout this Spring, Summer, and Fall, caught schools of fish, and developed a few refinements for future runs, and now we're ready to take the next steps. We have several new series of kits to design and produce, including lures based on baitfish, bugs, and saltwater species.

This round of funding will enable us to:

  • Purchase a desktop laser cutter and lure action tester to aid in rapid prototyping and iterative testing
  • Pay for a laser printer so we can do our own label printing
  • Pay for the design and final artwork for the next three series of lures
  • Buy the birch plywood and packaging supplies
  • Pay for laser time to cut the parts and lure graphics
  • Pay for extra kits that can be sent out to potential retailers, distributors, and partners
  • Pay for marketing and promotional items and online advertising

Our Budget in a Nutshell

Any funds raised beyond our goal will be put to use in further marketing, and R&D for future kits. Thank you all for your continued support. Tight lines!

story:
UNIQUE DESIGNS & GRAPHICS

Our team of artists and designers are working hard to create cool and unique designs to give our griptapes that extra "WOW" Factor. All our designs are hand drawn, edited and finalised at our offices in Cyprus.

Our designers try to theme all our designs and incorporate the latest trends, to offer a range of griptapes to suit skaters from across the globe.

 

HIGH QUALITY PRINTING

Printing on griptape is much like printing on paper. You need to use the correct materials and printing methods to ensure the final product has the right colours and details expected from a high quality printed product.

Over the past 6 months we have been working and testing various printing methods and griptape materials. We want to ensure that our designs are transferred from digital format to a physical print without losing the colour and detail of the original design.

Unlike other companies, we have opted for a high quality digital printing method, that gives full colour & detail to our griptape graphics. We print 100's of griptape samples to ensure we are 100% happy with the print quality, before rolling out the final product.

 

TRIED AND TESTED GRIPTAPE

We have teamed up with one of the worlds leading suppliers of skateboard griptape. With over 12 years experience, we are sure that our griptapes will be of the highest quality and the perfect addition for your new skateboard.

We use a high quality griptape that will provide a solid base for our graphics and will offer amazing grip and durability whilst skating. All our griptapes are perforated at no extra cost!

 

LURE APPAREL - STAND OUT IN A CROWD

With such cool and unique designs it only makes sense to create an apparel range to match our griptapes. Whether you are skating the park or street, hanging out with friends or heading to a party, our apparel designs are sure to stand out and turn some heads.Like with our griptapes, we have opted for high quality garments that allow us to transfer our digital designs into an awesome clothing range with bright colours and detailed graphics.

 

 

WHATS IN IT FOR ME?

Most campaign backers ask, whats in it for me? And that's totally understandable.

As a supporter of our campaign you will have access to some awesome perks, that include exclusive designs and prices only available on Indiegogo. You will be one of the first people to receive our new range of products and will have some of the coolest griptape on the streets.

Without your support we wont be able to share our cool and unique products with skaters and awesome people across the globe.

We already have more cool, amazing designs ready to hit the market. Your contributions to our campaign will allow us to get our products and designs to distributors and shops around the world, so you will be able to pickup a LURE griptape anytime anywhere.

 

WHAT PEOPLE THINK

We wouldn't offer a product without testing it first. Some of our local skaters and Social Media Competition winners were lucky enough to get their hands on some of our samples. They put them to the test, here's what they had to say;

"Designs are fire and also is really good quality grip - Charis Pantelides, Facebook User"

"Dope Graphics and nice Grip - Nikolas Ioannou, Local Skater"

"Gotta say.. Best designs I've seen. Really killing them - Robbie Quinn, Facebook User"

"...The graphic is soooooo amazing seriously.. From the all the griptapes that I've had this one is without a doubt my favourite of all time! - benziefrogzie, Instagram Winner"

"Love the Graphics, Skates nice, where can i buy them? - Yassin, Local Skater"

 

SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY

Team: Skateboarding is a way of life and plays a big part in many people's everyday routines. For some lucky few, their talents are noticed by big brands and manufacturers who support them in a professional career. 

Pro skaters help to drive skateboarding forward and inspire other young people to take part in the sport. One of our major goals is to establish a Pro Skate team, that can inspire future generations of kids to skateboard. We hope our team can promote skateboarding on an international level and develop skateboarding at a local level.

Environment: We believe that it is important to protect the environment and the planet we live on. We make sure that all our manufacturing processes have minimum effect on the environment and adhere to strict regulations set out by local authorities.

 

DISTRIBUTION

Are you a shop or distributor? Are you Interested in stocking Lure Supply Co Products?

Contact us directly for future product ranges and wholesale pricing.

info@luresupplyco.com
