story:
In this world of beautiful gadgets, where you have sleek smart phone, watches and so many beautiful everyday carry items. Why compromise on an EDC (every day carry) light. Why it has to be big, heavy and bulky with limited functionality.

Qto-X, hands free, world’s first, an elegant tiny rechargeable lamp with multiple functionalities. A perfect Fit, finish and feel to compliment your style. A magnetic auto on/off compact solution to let you works hands free and save your time and energy. In simple words, we have created a powerful, high quality, multi-functional lamp/lantern so everyone can carry it in your pocket.

 

       

The smallest in the outfit’s Qto-X measures just 60 mm X 14 mm. A simplified compact design that you can comfortably hold it in your palm, drop it in your pants pocket, a bag pouch or slip into your backpack without any problems. That makes it ideal to keep on hand, whether you’re just hanging with neighborhood friends, spending a day out around the city, or hitting the trails for a weekend adventure.

Comes with a magnetic base charger holder, carabiner and wrist strap which allow end-users to magnetically attach, hook or tie it up for various mounting options, making the Qto-X much more useful gear.

Our mission- to revolutionize the light market to have lighting gadgets with multiple functionalities in compact  sizes.  

Why Qto-X, a Light for Your Needs:

  • Convenience: A light is useless if it's a hassle to carry every day.
  • Ease of use:  What's important is that your light should functions as easily as possible to you.
  • Weight factors: Lights are one important EDC tool that you’ll never want to skimp on.
  • Power Outages: A dark elevator, a movie theater or just about any typical daily-life situation. Even the smallest lights can be a major help in a power outage.
  • Tasks in the dark: Breaking down on a dark highway in the middle of nowhere, or trying to fix something underneath your car even in broad daylight can be a hassle without a light of some sorts.
  • Identifying dangers : If you’re ever left in the dark, for any reason, you can shine your light into dark, murky areas, dark corners and dark approaches.
  • Excellent : You’re left in the dark and better be darn sure to have a light source in your pocket. Carrying your EDC light can make a world of difference when depending on light to guide your way through a variety of situations.
  • Peace of Mind: Lastly, a light source provides you with peace of mind. Knowing that you’ll have a reliable light source in your pocket.

It’s very important to have compact size, hassle free light source so everyone feel safe and secure every night.

Qto-X uses Origional CREE, XP-G2 LED which delivers up to 20% more lumens per watt. Combining high light output, reliability and efficacy, XP-G2 is optimized for directional, high-lumen applications, from indoor and outdoor activities. 

    Hard anodized coatings provide specific advantages on aluminium used for engineering components, with the properties of light weight and ease of machining plus a hard surface. 

    "Why should I carry an extra light when my phone has one?"

    this is by far the most common question we get from people. It's also a perfectly valid one. Why should we carry an extra piece of light that would just weigh down our pockets, when the phone we carry with us all the time can perform all the lighting tasks we need in normal situations?

    It is simple "You would bring an umbrella without a thought for a very less chances of rain, so why wouldn't you carry a light for a 100% chance of darkness every night?"

                                                                                                                                     EXPLODED VIEW

    BEAUTIFUL CHARGER HOLDER

                                                                                                                    EASY CHARGING

    THREE COLORS OPTIONS

              

                                                                                                                                SOS MODE

    LANTERN MODE

                                                                                                                SIZE COMPARISON

    Smart phones, flashlights, table lamps and other similar product have been invented for some specific purposes, everyone of these are perfect and full fill their sole purpose.

    In other hand Qto-X is multipurpose light source, which can come real handy in many other situations where most of other light source product cant.

    Here is a list of few functions and uses comparisons-

    Best pocket lamp/lantern you can find- Qto-X, a super cool and compact size that can run for 40 mins on high mode and give you a 360 diffused moon light with just one 10180 li-ion battery! Amazing invention for campers, emergency, work light  and even just for your candle dinner or bed time light! Great for reading and enjoying a cup of tea in the dark!

    To ensure it can handle the outdoors, it’s IP44 rated, so you can use it in the middle of inclement weather, with a durable construction that will allow it to handle the occasional bumps and drops.

    Perfect gift for outdoor adventurer, backpacker and your loved ones.

                                                                   TIME LINE

     

    We are here on indiegogo because this is the best, largest and most professional focus group in the world!

    We believe in crowdfunding community and we are super-excited to join Indiegogo after 1 successful projects on Kickstarter.

    Last years, we introduced on Kickstarter the Qto-X-  the world's first hands free magnetic lamp. The campaign raised 120% above target and our young company received a huge infusion of energy to continue extend the features of our products. With the help of amazing backers, It gave us a lot of confidence and resources to continue.  

    And now, we are truly excited to join Indiegogo with our new improved, offering for the first time a game-changing product "Qto-X" not only for adventurers but also for the general daily usage, travelers, college students and for those who always fixing the world.

     

    ABOUT TEAM

    In simple words, we love technology and we really are passionate about it. we are based in Troy-Michigan with a small team of designer and engineers, with one sole purpose to bring fashionable, minimal and multipurpose product with the best finishes and material possible.

     

                                                                                                                             PROTOTYPE STAGES

    Risks and challenges.

    Please do understand that some countries may have higher shipping charges than others specifically on the tracking enable courier. Local import taxes and duties may vary from regions to regions and custom clearance & process fee may occur depends on local regulations. As we are doing everything we can to make Qto--X affordable to everyone, we will not be able to cover the charges and expenses mentioned above. In recent years the regulations toward shipping electronics with batteries have become an issue for delayed or returned shipments.  In case of a returned shipment due to this reason, we will try and work out the best solution for you. 

    We endeavor to keep our promise to fulfill the product(s) delivering schedules to all our backers. From our design teams we never stop pushing the quality of our products toward perfection.  For this reason we cannot completely eliminate any risk of delay as we'd like to present the products at their best.  However looking at the current status of the trial and testing samples we are very positive, we have invested tons of effort in order to make sure we will be able to deliver the Qto-X on time but,  is always on the lookout and many unexpected things can happen .
    The factory we selected has decades of experience in producing high quality product and we have made prepared many samples and carefully selected material suppliers and shipping companies. Backup plans are in place and we promise to make our up-most efforts to reduce any delays that might arise to minimum.

     

    Please support our project. Thank YOU!

     

    FAQ-

    What is "Qto-X Hands Free" means?

    Qto-X uses a switch which activates with magnetic pressure at the bottom side, it works on ferromagnetic materials, these include iron, nickel, cobalt, some alloys of rare earth metals etc.

    Does Qto-X need cleaned, polished, or any kind of specific material to work?

    No, it does not. Qto-X simply work on any surface, wet or dry, cracked, dirty, rough textured or even in any bad conditions. Just make sure it has to be ferromagnetic materials.

    Is Qto-X water & dust proof?

    yes, Qto-X is IP44 rated can bear bad weather conditions.

    Is Qto-X rechargeable?

    Yes, Qto-X is rechargeable and comes with a charge which also work as a carrying holder for it.

    Which Battery does Qto-X uses?

    Battery we are using is 10180 Li-ion (rechargeable) which has more than 500-600 times life cycle.

    How long is battery and or LED life?

    Battery we are using is 10180 Li-ion (rechargeable) which has more than 500 times life cycle and CREE XP G2 can last you anywhere from 25,000 to 50,000 hours or even more.

    What's the brightness of the light (lumens) and expected duration of use per full charge?

    it will be High mode- 120 lumens, low mode- 30 lumens. run time 40 minutes on high mode and approx 3 hours on low mode.

Amazing invention for campers, emergency, work light  and even just for your candle dinner or bed time light! Great for reading and enjoying a cup of tea in the dark!To ensure it can handle the outdoors, it’s IP44 rated, so you can use it in the middle of inclement weather, with a durable construction that will allow it to handle the occasional bumps and drops.Perfect gift for outdoor adventurer, backpacker and your loved ones.                                                               TIME LINE We are here on indiegogo because this is the best, largest and most professional focus group in the world!We believe in crowdfunding community and we are super-excited to join Indiegogo after 1 successful projects on Kickstarter.Last years, we introduced on Kickstarter the Qto-X-  the world's first hands free magnetic lamp. The campaign raised 120% above target and our young company received a huge infusion of energy to continue extend the features of our products. With the help of amazing backers, It gave us a lot of confidence and resources to continue.  And now, we are truly excited to join Indiegogo with our new improved, offering for the first time a game-changing product "Qto-X" not only for adventurers but also for the general daily usage, travelers, college students and for those who always fixing the world. ABOUT TEAMIn simple words, we love technology and we really are passionate about it. we are based in Troy-Michigan with a small team of designer and engineers, with one sole purpose to bring fashionable, minimal and multipurpose product with the best finishes and material possible.                                                                                                                          PROTOTYPE STAGESRisks and challenges.Please do understand that some countries may have higher shipping charges than others specifically on the tracking enable courier. Local import taxes and duties may vary from regions to regions and custom clearance & process fee may occur depends on local regulations. As we are doing everything we can to make Qto--X affordable to everyone, we will not be able to cover the charges and expenses mentioned above. In recent years the regulations toward shipping electronics with batteries have become an issue for delayed or returned shipments.  In case of a returned shipment due to this reason, we will try and work out the best solution for you. We endeavor to keep our promise to fulfill the product(s) delivering schedules to all our backers. From our design teams we never stop pushing the quality of our products toward perfection.  For this reason we cannot completely eliminate any risk of delay as we'd like to present the products at their best.  However looking at the current status of the trial and testing samples we are very positive, we have invested tons of effort in order to make sure we will be able to deliver the Qto-X on time but,  is always on the lookout and many unexpected things can happen .The factory we selected has decades of experience in producing high quality product and we have made prepared many samples and carefully selected material suppliers and shipping companies. Backup plans are in place and we promise to make our up-most efforts to reduce any delays that might arise to minimum. Please support our project. Thank YOU! FAQ-What is "Qto-X Hands Free" means?Qto-X uses a switch which activates with magnetic pressure at the bottom side, it works on ferromagnetic materials, these include iron, nickel, cobalt, some alloys of rare earth metals etc.Does Qto-X need cleaned, polished, or any kind of specific material to work?No, it does not. Qto-X simply work on any surface, wet or dry, cracked, dirty, rough textured or even in any bad conditions. Just make sure it has to be ferromagnetic materials.Is Qto-X water & dust proof?yes, Qto-X is IP44 rated can bear bad weather conditions.Is Qto-X rechargeable?Yes, Qto-X is rechargeable and comes with a charge which also work as a carrying holder for it.Which Battery does Qto-X uses?Battery we are using is 10180 Li-ion (rechargeable) which has more than 500-600 times life cycle.How long is battery and or LED life?Battery we are using is 10180 Li-ion (rechargeable) which has more than 500 times life cycle and CREE XP G2 can last you anywhere from 25,000 to 50,000 hours or even more.What's the brightness of the light (lumens) and expected duration of use per full charge?it will be High mode- 120 lumens, low mode- 30 lumens. run time 40 minutes on high mode and approx 3 hours on low mode.

story:
Nowadays, outdoor activities emerge as a modern life style and more and more people are pursuing a better experience with it. It is not unusual for us to find out that bringing GPS, walkie talkie, camera, video camera and all other necessary electronic devices become a real burden. Also, under extreme environment such us -22 ℉ in snow mountain or 140 ℉ in desert, the stability of all these devices become a real challenge.

With two years hard work and all our passion, SHOWPRO team devotes to provide outdoor activity enthusiasts the world’s first multifunctional Hybrid DMR (Digital Mobile Radio) Walkie Talkie Camcorder in high performance. The whole process was very challenging in both design and the technology development. But we made it. We are creating a new landscape in the camcorder industry and a new era, where people can enjoy outdoor activities safely and also share their fun experiences with others!

 

 

In fact, SHOWPRO is not only suitable for outdoor activities, but also can be applied to security work. Most of the functions are actually very suitable for use in the field of security. 

 

 

We started the idea of SHOWPRO and developed the first version in 2015, through decent amount of tests we eventually have it in real with even more amazing features:  

1. Super handy size& weight for carrying.

2. Added keypad for easy radio frequency set up.

3. Laser light which can help user to target an object when they are taking pictures.

4. Flashlight for emergency at night.

 

The SHOWPRO team is a passionate team with around 100 team members, the engineering team with more than 15 years of R&D experience has specilized in security industry. We earned our reputation through working with British Police Offices in years, both quality and designs are well guranteed. Now we eventually manage to develop it into commercial market to bring you more fun and security.

FAQ

Q1. Are you offering a warranty?

Yes. All SHOWPROs come with free 1-year warranty. You can email us for more details: support@showpro-tech.com.

Q2. Will there be  IOS or Android App?

Yes. Both IOS and Android apps will be released, we will announce the released date soon. 

Q3. Does SHOWPRO come with a memory card?

Yes.All SHOWPROs come with one changeable external 32GB memory card.

Q4. When does it get shipped?

The estimated shipping date is April 2017. 

Q5. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties ?

Backers will be responsible for all additional taxes or duties; Please check your country's import duties before placing orders. It should be 0% in US and varies internationally.

 

Risks and Challenges

We will have physical samples of SHOWPRO by the end of Dec, and we are confidently look forward to have production done by April. More details (including any delay) will be updated in our page timely.

Spread the word

If you can't contribute, you can still help us enormously just by sharing our campaign through your personal networks! Big thank you!

story:
Early prototyping and development.

+20 years of combined experience, 7 guys, 3 countries, 2 continents
..... one product to make.
 

We have a full, experienced team ready to make sure every step of production goes smoothly and efficiently. 

Our team of seasoned engineers and product developers dedicated all their skills knowledge to make Drofie the best aerial camera you can ever get. 

Dear Backers, we welcome you to participate in our referral program. You can refer your friends by sharing a referral link with them directly or posting it on your social media or blogs and get extra perks. 

How it works?

1. First, you have to get your referral link that will help us to understand how many backers were referred by you. Click here to find out how to get your link.  

2. Click here to download pictures, videos and GIF files. 

3. Write a post on social media, send a direct message to your friends or make a post about Drofie on your blog. (#Drofie)

4. After the campaign ends we will collect and analyze information about your referrals and add extra perks to your order as follows:

1-2 referrals: Set of extra propellers.

3-5 referrals: One extra battery.

5-10 referrals: One extra battery + One Carrying case.

Over 10 referrals: We will refund your contribution and ship your perk for free. 

Our team is comprised of seasoned entrepreneurs, product developers, robotic engineers, and supply chain experts with more than 20 years of entrepreneurial and manufacturing experience, so rest assured the product will exceed your expectations.

We have done a decent work, so the risks are minimal. We have finished R&D stage and have a working proof of concept. We already negotiated a large manufacturer who committed timely production setup and delivery. 

What you are seeing is a prototype/proof of concept, so the final product may be slightly different from what you see but will be definitely supreme quality.

story:
If you are a Senior or C level business executive who's values time and likes to travel smart, we at Atlas Rush are building smart travel assistant for you. 
 

What is Atlas Rush?

 
Access Atlas Rush from the Apps, SMS or Email.
Your go-to partner for flights, hotels, bnbs, trains, buses, nearest wifi spots, places to eat and literally anything they need when they travel for work. 
 
 
 

What you get from monthly subscription?

 
All the research. All your bookings
We do all the research to find you the best hotels, the best flights, best places to visit, , and on-ground transport at the cheapest price. Planning your itinerary is our job, you focus on your business.
 
 
Dedicated Personal Support
Get instant personal support on all your questions  and needs with fast responses on flights delays , emergencies and plan updates. Connect with us via app, SMS, letters, emails, Slack, Whatsapp, Facebook, etc, we will assist you where ever you go.
 
 
Local Support
Personalised concierge for you to find the best places to eat, drink and other destination activities. Business trips wont be boring anymore.
 
 
Insights and Reporting
Dashboard to manage all the trips and expenses for your company with centralised billing and trip management. You can plan your travel expenses in advance and cut cost.
 
 
Save time of your Employees
Easiest way to manage all the travel needs of your employees without having to burden your office managers, administrators and executive assistants. Trust Atlas to manage the travel for your business and let the employee focus on your core business.
 
Does Atlas sound like the solution you have been looking for? Go ahead back our concept, we promise to build a good product you can rely for all your business travel plans. 

 

How can I contribute?

We have perks, pick one perk to try us out. If you don't like our service, we will refund your contribution. 
 
To make your contribution,  signup here (It will take 1 min)
->>  https://goo.gl/forms/7RCjhpFpZsoqau032
 
Explore Atlas: 
http://atlasrush.webflow.io/
 
Website Coming soon, stay tuned: http://atlasrush.com/
 
To become beta customer, sign up here: https://goo.gl/forms/7RCjhpFpZsoqau032

story:
About

   Traveling is great and fun but it can cause a strain on your neck that can be very painful, caused from car seats to plane seats that do not take your neck into consideration. That’s why the extra cushioning of travel neck pillows is a warm welcome. Travel neck pillows is important for every time you spend propped up on a chair for long hours or just needed to rest your head for a quick nap. Perfect not just when you travel, as office chairs aren't kind to your neck and lower back either. Incorporating neck pillows into working hours gives your neck a little more love than you normally do and can save from unnecessary pain or doctor's bills. 

The Comfy Travel Pillow is a travel neck pillow that is portable and made to give your neck extra support when needed to reduce the stress and pain from traveling or extended sitting. The neck is always having to carry the weight of your head and it is important that the strength and alignment of the neck is maintained with care throughout one’s lifetime. It's actually nice to take some of the weight off as a travel neck pillow does that for the neck. 

A travel neck pillow is a portable pillow that is made to give your neck extra supportwhen needed to reduce the stress and pain from traveling or extended sitting. The neck is always having to carry the weight of your head at all times and it is important that the strength and alignment of the neck is maintained with care throughout one’s lifetime. It's actually nice to take some of the weight off as a travel neck pillow does that for the neck.

   Modern life daily habits often involve poring over a screen for long hours or spending a good amount of time on the move from one place to another and it easy to neglect some of the body muscles that are strained in the process. The neck is often at risks as it is a screen age, this travel pillows offer comfort and assistance to simple activities that will enhance hours spent sitting while still offering comfort. The uses of the travel neck pillows are as follows: 

  • Traveling - always needed during hours of traveling in the car or other transportation
  • At the Office - relieve tension while working on your computer at work. Use the softness and comfort to help extend your day. 

  • As a Pillow in bed - use it in the bed to enhance the comfort of your home pillows. This travel neck pillow is designed to be flexible not only in use but with the fact that it can be opened up and attached to a pillow to give an extra prop. 

  • Seat Back Cushion - while you sit It is important to be mindful of sitting positions to help your spine to stay aligned correctly. Office chairs can be uncomfortable after sitting for hours. 

  • Nap Taking - a quick nap in the middle of the day is refreshing and we often find ourselves looking for comfortable ways to rest our heads whether at work or at school. With the travel neck pillow, your nap does not have to be uncomfortable even at your desk. The flexible and foldable design of the pillow makes it so that it can easily be converted to suit the purpose of making a desk nap more comfortable.

  • Listen to Music - relaxing music helps with relaxation. The design of this travel neck pillow takes listening to music into consideration and provides a space for it. No worries about where to keep your phone or how to place your earphone wires when using the travel neck pillow.


    Portable: Foldable and small enough to make it very portable and easy to carry around with you in your bag or snap-on attachment. So compact, it's the height of an average cell phone.



                                                                            3 Quick Steps

     

    Portable and convenient 

    easy to bring everywhere


                                                                    Read to Use
    Relaxing: The music function allows you to play your favorite soothing tunes whenever you want, undisturbed by anyone and without disturbing others. 

    Comfortable: The Comfy Travel Pillow is soft and comfortable just as you would want your pillow to be. Great for a quick nap or a full night's sleep. 

    Friendly fabric: Made with breathable pure cotton that provides easy handling and comfort for your skin while you use it. 

    Everyone should experience the Comfy Travel Pillow not only for the extra comfort it gives to your neck when travelling and makes traveling so much more pleasurable but for long days at work as well. Those work hours spent seated will be more comfortable by providing cushioning and comfort to the lower back area, assisting you in keeping yourself aligned.  

    The Three-layer structure is breathable and sweat-absorbing, waterproof and dirt-proof with memory sponge buffered layer. 




    Ergonomic design, 13cm support, full cervical spine, U star around neck protection, long time bow work does not feel tired.



  •                                                            Adjustable

        We are turning to you, Kickstarter and it's extraordinary community for help raising funds. These funds will cover the costs of manufacturing and distributing the initial run of our Comfy Travel Pillow to travelers worldwide. To show our appreciation, we are offering our Travel Neck Pillow at a remarkable savings that's exclusive to Kickstarter. 



    Size 

    Size 





     

    Risks and challenges

       Comfy Travel Pillow as been designed and molded into multiple working prototypes with remarkable ratings. Our manufacturing partner has been in the business for over three decades while having successfully fulfilled thousands of designs and products. They are ready and well equipped for full distribution of the Comfy Travel Pillow. We are very comfortable stating that we don't anticipate any situations that could delay delivery, however we promise to keep you abreast should anything unforeseeable arise.

    Comfy Travel Pillow

    Shantou Baihao Technology Co., Ltd

    No. 457(1), South of Chengjiang Road Mid, Guangyi Longhualongtian, Chenghai District, Shantou City, Guangdong Province.

    Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

    Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
Thank You for taking time to look at my project.

The Respect Card is a Discount Card I designed & I use The Respect Card everyday and Save Money every Time I show #Respect.  As The Respect Card Community grows, we will be able to Offer Bigger and Better Promotions.

I have been Supporting Local Suppliers, Businesses & Charities and I have built up a Community of Members in the Riviera Maya and with your Help I would like to expand #Respect to new places with new People.

I currently work from home and my biggest expense is printing cards so if i reach my goal i need to purchase an industrial printer, recruit staff and build a #Respect Team

Click these links for more information about #Respect & Lennon

https://www.Instagram.com/TheRespectCard/

https://Twitter.com/TheRespectCard

https://www.Facebook.com/TheRespectCard/

https://www.Instagram.com/NoLennonNo/

I appreciate 1 USD (£0.65) has more value in certain Countries and is a lot of Money and can feed a Family in some places.  If you can’t make a pledge, I would Welcome any Feedback, Advice or Sharing my story on Social Media so more People know about #Respect

The video I have made explains most of my Idea but please feel free to ask any questions.

Thanks,

Stuart

story:
The GERRY RIG:

Simply Twist, Pull, and Place®

 

I developed The Gerry Rig while showering in a federal prison in Texas. When I realized the universal appeal for such an invention, I contacted INVENTHELP for help in making this idea into a real-life product. After enlisting the help of my fellow inmates, we designed a product that would not only meet our needs, while incarcerated but also be of use to the millions of people who find themselves navigating cramped shower spaces. That is college students, military personnel, tiny house and RV owners, business travelers, gym-goers, so forth and so on. The list is quite long. There is definitely a need for The Gerry Rig, a device used to help promote the organization, protection, and accessibility of various personal items and showering necessities in particulary small shower stalls.

Specifically, while incarcerated, I found that the confined shower stall left me with no room to store personal items and toiletries in a convenient and easily accessible manner. Making efficient use of the limited space within the small shower areas, my invention would fulfill the need for a means of storing, protecting, and organizing a wide range of personal care items and other accessories so that they would be within easy reach while showering in a particularly small or confined shower space.

The appealing features of The Gerry Rig would be its novelty, portability, space-savings, convenience, compact design, and ease of use and installation. The Gerry Rig could be easily transported to a shower stall, where it could be suspended from a shower rod, article of clothing, or possibly mounted to the shower stall via suction cups.

 

What's Needed:

The amount of funding I need is $25,000.

This money will be used toward the purchase of the Premium Package offered by InventHelp. We have already created a marketing plan, a preliminary patent search, and have a patent pending on my invention.

InventHelp, for $16,900, will create the following, and more, for my invention. For instance (this isn't an exhaustive listing):

  • Preparation of color New Product Submission Brochure that includes a 3D graphics illustration;
  • InventHelp Data Bank: Attempt to match invention with company stated areas of interest. Submission of New Product Submission Brochure to companies in the InventHelp Data Bank. (Companies that would potentially market and manufacture invention.)
  • Preparation of Press Release and posting to an online publicity distribution service.
  • Inclusion of my invention information in the InventHelp VirtualTrade Show and in the Virtual Invention Browsing Experience (VIBE).
  • Preparation of a Virtual Invention Presentation (VIP), a video containing 3D renderings and the computer generated animation highlighting the main function and use of my invention. 
  • Prototype model: Preparation of the computer aided drawings (CAD) of invention and creation of one prototype model, in white ABS plastic.
  • The remaining funds will go towards incorporating a Limited Liability Company (LLC), developing video and print marketing tools, and developing a professional logo and product packaging.

With your minimum donation of $10, you will be one of the first to receive a finished GERRY RIG for your own enhanced shower experience. 

If I do not achieve the funding goal as hoped, I will donate the funds to REACHING OUT FROM WITHIN, www.rofw.org and THE EAST HILL SINGERS (Arts in prison) www.artsinprison.org/the-choir.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please use the Indiegogo share tools and spread the word that change is coming. And remember, fortune favors the bold. So, be bold. Don't just dream. Live it.

story:
An ultra-thin portable fire pit that fits in your pocket.

When stored, it is the size of a smartphone and only 5 mm thick.

Innovative, lightweight, and portable—this stylish and easy-to-use portable fire pit is the perfect partner for solo camping, bicycle camping, hiking, fishing, and other casual outdoor excursions.

 

THE BRAND LABO is a startup that works with local workshops and manufacturers to build innovative products that deliver new value and revitalize local economies.

For this project, we teamed with Plan Co., Ltd, which operates the specialty aluminum brand [ALUMINO]. The company is based in the manufacturing town of Yao, Osaka.

 

An ultra-compact portable fire pit
that fits in your pocket
【ALPHA BONFIRE】

Great for:

・Fishing or touring trips

・Starting a fire while a solo camping 

・Having a light, convenient bonfire stand that fits in your pocket

・Enjoying the outdoors in style

・Those looking for a beginner-friendly, easy-to-use bonfire stand

 

Smartphone-sized and only 5 mm thick
You may even forget you are carrying it

When stored, the ALPHA BONFIRE is only 5 mm thick.

Sized like a smartphone, it can be easily stored in pockets, pouches, and other small spaces.

Now you can carry your bonfire stand like you carry a wallet.

 

 

Ultra-compact and specialized for solo camping

Want to cook with and enjoy the flames of a small bonfire?

The ALPHA BONFIRE's ultra-compact size is perfect for such occasions.

The ash pan, which doubles as a storage cover, protects surfaces from the heat of the bonfire. This lets you use the ALPHA BONFIRE on tables and other surfaces, making it a convenient option that is also friendly to those new to camping and the outdoors.

 

Knife, fork, fire chopsticks, and grill plate
Many possibilities in one portable unit

The ALPHA BONFIRE is much more than a bonfire stand. 

Within just 5 millimeters, it also contains a knife, fork, fire chopsticks, and grill plate. No need to carry extra and unnecessary tools.

Enjoy the outdoors with freedom and style.

The grill plate supports three different heights so that you can adjust it to best fit your cooking and grilling needs.

 

Refined, calculated design

The side plate air holes circulate air efficiently and are in the shape of the ALPHA BONFIRE logo.

The receptacle contains the inverted word "ALPHA," which projects onto the surface below when lit. 

With a subdued elegance, it brings a wonderful aesthetic to any space.

 

 

Made with corrosion-resistant, rust-proof stainless steel

The 1 mm stainless steel is highly corrosion-resistant, allowing for long and frequent use. The stainless steel contains chromium, which oxidizes into a protective film that prevents iron oxidation and rust.

 

Use cases

Motorcycle and bicycle camping.

Fishing, hiking, and the outdoors.

Use it with aluminum rice cookers or sierra cups.

Or to cook a steak on the grill plate.

Let a small bonfire bring your space to life.

 

Product summary

Retail price (planned): ¥10,400 yen (shipping and tax excluded)

Material: Stainless steel (thickness 1 mm)

Dimensions: 147 x 69 x 5 (mm)

Contents: 1 bonfire stand, grill plate, knife, fork, fire chopsticks, band

Manufacture: Yao, Osaka, Japan

* The knife is stored within the grill plate. Be careful when removing it.

* As hairline processing assumes use with fire, only one side of each bonfire stand part is processed.

* Please note that the specifications of the packaging and fire chopsticks may change. Any changes will be reported beforehand in the activity report.

 

Rewards

ALPHA BONFIRE 1 unit

1) [Super Early Bird Discount] (Limit 50) ¥10400 → ¥8,840 15% OFF

2) [Early Bird Discount] (Limit 100) ¥10400 → ¥9360 10% OFF

3) [Standard Discount] (Limit 500) ¥10400 → ¥9880 5% OFF

 

ALPHA BONFIRE 2 units

4) [2-Set Super Early Bird Discount] (Limit 50) ¥20800 → ¥16640 20% OFF

5) [2-Set Early Bird Discount] (Limit 100) ¥20800 → ¥17680 15% OFF

6) [2-Set Standard Discount] (Limit 500) ¥20800 → ¥18720 10% OFF

 

 

Development background

Due to the recent impact of COVID-19, the demand for outdoor activities has risen sharply.

Even for bonfire stands, a wide variety of products exist on the market.

I love the outdoors and often go camping. I found myself wishing that I had a product like the ALPHA BONFIRE.

Our mission was to create new value and help revitalize local economies.

We began to design and develop a new, never-before-seen bonfire stand.

At this time, we discovered Plan Co. Ltd. Their high level of technical expertise connected with our mission, and we decided to work together.

Situated in the Japanese manufacturing town of Yao, Osaka, Plan Co. Ltd. operates [ALUMINO], a brand specializing in aluminum. The company handles everything from planning and development to manufacturing, packaging, and shipping.

The ALPHA BONFIRE units are not mass-produced. Each item is a hand-finished work of craftsmanship, passion, and soul.

We hope that the flames of your own ALPHA BONFIRE can help share this craftsman's spirit with you.

 

Schedule

April - ALPHA BONFIRE Indiegogo launch

End of May - ALPHA BONFIRE Indiegogo ends. Begin production.

June - Begin delivery.

 

How the funds will be used

The funding from this project will be used to fund the development and operating costs for the ALPHA II, which is currently in its planning phase.

We will continue to contribute to society through regional revitalization and the creation of innovative value. Thank you for your support.

 

Press kit

To help spread the word about this project, we have provided download links containing images and videos.

Your cooperation in spreading the word is much appreciated.

*Note: The images and video are royalty-free. Please use them freely.

 

▼ Press kit ▼

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Bc5n6W-qNk2IljvM1U-byPMRPMcrFV47?usp=sharing

 

▼ YOUTUBE URL ▼

https://youtu.be/8BGJ__u2vsY

story:
Whether for busy days in the city or for business-related or vacation-focused traveling, the Nördepack is the adaptable, strong, comfortable and compact travel and work bag that lets you work and travel anywhere, whenever you need, with a bag that lets you carry all your essentials.

We live in a borderless world. Work and business have become global and so has to enjoy life—and both have become intertwined. Being in London in a business meeting doesn’t mean that you can’t be on that very night taking the next flight to Bangkok, where you’re building a local tourism business, and to relax in the next weekend in Chiang Mai, only to then hop on another plane to check how your part in a coffee plantation in Colombia is doing while planning to work from Cartagena for the next few weeks, enjoying the Caribbean sun and beaches.  

 

So you’re working and playing, making the most of life, and you’re always on the move—which is why the Nördepack Travel + Work Bag is the right bag to be there for you as you live your life on-the-go.

The Nördepack won’t just make you look and perform like a million dollars in professional and work-related environments. As a travel bag, it will also be the perfect sidekick.

You’d think that a compact travel + work bag like Nördepack couldn’t carry all that you need, but that’s where we want to offer you even more value. 

Nördepack lets you carry your fresh shirt and other clothes, underwear, toiletries, notebook, coffee thermos, tablet, and even your travel pillow. Seriously!

With its multiple inner pockets, a mesh pocket, foldable mesh storage, and smartly designed compartments, the Nördepack will keep everything neatly separated and organized.

Plus, you can use the Nördepack’s clothing bag, shoe bag, side strap, and shoulder bag add-ons to have even better storage capacity.

The Nördepack is designed to adjust to your needs and situation. Use the side compression straps to transform the bag from a carry-on backpack to a daypack or use them to hold your jacket or pillow. The Tailor-made premium aluminum alloy hook—for the unexpected needs that the MacGyver in you may have on the road.

Its large storage capacity is impressive, can expand from 24L to 34L

It comes with a roller bag band, to make it ready for a flight, a train or a bus ride.

A side handle and a shoulder strap, blending comfort with elegance—it will make you look great in any fancy environment where an important meeting requires you to use a briefcase

 

A side pocket that allows you to store your charger, mouse and/or wallet—while giving you access to them without having to open the living compartment, so you won’t risk losing your personal effects

Versatile way of being carried—however you prefer to take it, whether using its hidden shoulder strap, comfort shoulder strap, adjustable chest strap, or comfort handle, since each specific situation requires a specially adjustable way of carrying your bag

 

Ergonomics design with comfortable padded shoulder strap 

Safety reflecting logo, to ensure that any drivers see you if you’re walking at night

YKK water-proof, safe and unbreakable zippers (one with a key hole), to keep everything inside the bag, clean and dry, even when it rains

Rain-proof cover, which you can use to cover the bag in case you’re out when raining or snowing—because a traveler’s life is not just about sunny landscapes and margaritas

Anti-theft pocket and passport pocket—where you can keep your most important traveling documents and some cash at hand while ensuring that they don’t get stolen or lost

 

Hidden hook to keep a small bag or a flashlight safely hanging—because you need to be ready for anything

The Sling Bag is designed to fit inside the Nördepack’s main compartment. It can as an organization bag or Sling Bag. The size is perfect to store all your traveling essential. Let you explore the city more freely. The size is fit for iPad mini, notebook or your digital camera

 • 800D nylon exterior with PU coating

• Quick-access laptop pocket (fits up to 15.6” laptop)

• Clamshell opening main compartment for spacious storage and easy packing

• Quick-access large front pocket with small inner compartment

• Multiple internal pockets for accessories

• Foldable mesh pocket

• Padded top and side handles for versatile carrying

• Zippered, expandable water bottle holder

• Padded shoulder strap and EVA back panel for enhanced comfort

• Chest strap for comfort and stability

• Side compression straps for stability and security

• Optimized to meet international and domestic carry-on luggage size limits

• YKK zippers and Duraflex plastic hardware

• Dimensions: 18.5" x 11.8" x 5.9" expandable 2”

• Weight: 3.5 lbs (1.6kg)

• Volume: 24 -34 L


 

Nordkapp is the reason behind the rise of Nördepack with the coordinates of 71 degrees, 10 minutes, 21 seconds North. Nordkapp has picturesque scenery of polar days and polar nights. Many have come to know it as the end of the earth as well as the end of the world. That presents people with infinite possibilities and hope. You might have gotten the chance to be at the most bustling parts of Nordkapp or the loneliest one to spend your time aloof from the crowd. At the same time, you might have ventured further, passing through the various mountains of different designs and crossing the beautiful rivers, and fields that promote the landscape to other parts of this splendid location. However, you will realise that you have never really been to the end of Nordkapp. So is Nördepack. 

The “ ö ” of Nördepack represents our curiosity to discover this world.    

Risk&Challenge

We've already shipped all Kickstarter Pledges as schedule on May 2019.

Feel free to reach out at info.nordepack@gmail.com if you have any questions.

story:
When we go shopping or anywhere sometimes we have to leave the child or pet inside of the car. Often, we forget them inside the car, when the weather is hot and the windows are closed, these cause the temperature inside the car to rise quickly to a high temperature, accompanying that high temperature is CO2 and moisture, which leads to reduce of oxygen inside the car to the point of consuming it completely.

Keeping your car windows closed with a child or pet after a while leads to oxygen deficiency, high carbon dioxide and water vapor (humidity) even if the weather is cold.

These factors lead to the death of the child or pet inside the car within a short period of not more than 15 minutes.

If you have to leave the child or dog in the car, you must take one of the following steps to keep them alive:

Leaving a part of the window open, this may expose the vehicle to risks such as theft or otherwise, of course this method is unsafe.

Either put the child or petprotection device by sound alert to the presence of a child or a pet inside the car that may be at risk of death.

Features

story:
Imagine you have a car accident, or your car breaks down while driving. Unfortunately, it can happen to anyone at anytime on the road.

In the case of an accident you are likely to be in a state of shock and confusion, nervously trying to figure our what to do next.

You have to act IMMEDIATELY - secure yourself and everyone else around you by placing a warning triangle to warn others of the crash ahead.

Now try to build the warning triangle quickly and correctly in your shocked state!  Chances are you are going to have a hard time.   

 

For over half a century we have used the same kind of warning triangle. Since then, numerous safety and functional improvements have been developed for cars. However, the warning triangle has remained the same - a flimsy design that people struggle with.

 

SAFETREE® is the solution to this problem. An automatic deployable warning triangle ready to use with a simple flick of the wrist.

 

                               

Stored in a practical SmartBag, the SAFETREE® is ready to be immediately used in any emergency situation. Secure an accident site or warn others of a breakdown ahead without wasting valuable time.

Our SAFETREE® is QUICKER, EASIER AND MORE VISIBLE compared to a standard warning triangle. Integrated LED lights improve visibility for both day and night, allowing other drivers to spot you sooner. With the simple push of a button, the hazard and signal lights switch on.

 

SAFETREE® is the additional guardian angel that can be used in a wide variety of areas:

● We have designed SAFETREE® so that it can be quickly and easily stowed in any trunk using a practical SmartBAG.

● The core of the SAFETREE® is made of sturdy steel and aluminum to keep the structure stable and give it the ability to withstand strong wind.

● The fabric is made of reflective polyester fibers, and is waterproof. Sizes and colors are aligned with safety standards. 

● The LED lights are waterproof as well. Both the flashlight and the LED of the body are powered by AA batteries. We have included a storage space for emergency batteries in the SmartBAG.

SAFETREE® is a registered trademark of MAYER OS INNOVATIONS GMBH, a start-up company that has set itself the goal of implementing the latest technologies for daily needs. 

We highly appreciate every feedback and requests regarding SAFETREE®. 

Visit us on http://www.safetree.net

If you have something you want to share with us, please feel free to write us any time at office@safetree.net

SAFETREE® needs your help to fully come to life. Prototypes and pre-production units were financed by ourselves. But the time has come, that we currently face high upfront expenses regarding tooling, certification, studies and minimum quantity purchases.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our goal is to completely recreate a system that is over 50 years old in order to provide more security in everyday life. It is important for us to keep the use as simple as possible while still guaranteeing safety requirements and maximum effectiveness. 

Unfortunately, despite continuous technological upgrades in vehicles to prevent road hazards, accident statistics provide clear indications of a steady increase in accidents worldwide. 

Addressing the need for an upgrade in safety equipment, a functional product with a new technology is long overdue. 

The SAFETREE® warning triangle is the simple and practical solution to this problem.

story:
Featured in...

Us

We are a husband, wife and foster fail family who have been traveling the globe for the past 6 years capturing the beauty of the world through photos and videos. We traveled in search of adventure. In search of culture and animals. In search of beauty, luxury and love. And in search of food. Lots of food. But no matter where we went, every hotel we stayed in compromised our values in some way. We were desperate for somewhere we could happily give our money to. 

We are both long term vegans for the animals, for the environment and for our health. We are environmentalists who are passionate about sustainable living. And we are animals lovers who ache to help strays and injured animals more than we are currently capable. 

So at the beginning of 2018 we quit doing what we love; taking photos, capturing the world and exploring, so we could create something important, something essential and a place that we love. And so, PlantLife was born.

Why

This campaign is so incredibly important because the travel industry is not keeping up. We need to take steps to make EVERYTHING about our world more sustainable and more compassionate.

By backing PlantLife you will be helping us, to not only build the very first hotel of its kind, but you will also be demonstrating to the world and the travel industry that truly responsible, sustainable and compassionate travel is possible without having to stay in a straw eco-lodge without electricity. 

 

Where

Cloaked in the disguise of a seemingly secluded oasis, miles from civilisation, PlantLife will, in fact, be conveniently located on the west side of Thailand's vegan paradise island of Koh Phangan. We will be near the village of Srithanu, Zen beach, Hin Kong and a short distance from Koh Phangan's main pier. This beautiful island already has a huge amount of vegan restaurants and eateries to cater for the existing eco-conscious and compassionate community.  

At the foot of a mountain and surrounded by national park, our luxury paradise location will provide breathtaking scenery in every direction. Nestled under tall coconut palms, among an abundance of native fruit trees and flower bushes, PlantLife will be the perfect setting for a tranquil and secluded luxury experience.

 

What We Need & What You Get

There’s no doubt this is a HUGE project, and it’s the largest crowd funding campaign for a hotel, EVER. We’re asking for your support to raise a whopping $870,000 - It’s a whole lot of money so we need a whole lot of people to get involved. 

PlantLife is a collaborative project that we have been developing for just over a year. This means that instead of VC’s providing a capital injection, we’re essentially sharing the company between a few invested parties.

Our collaborative structure means we’ve managed to reduce our initial startup costs by a whole bunch, as well as introducing new and exciting collaborative ideas by some pretty passionate people. 

Where the money will be going

​So you're probably thinking, so what do you need us for?... Well there are a lot of other expenses that we will need to cover in order to get PlantLife off the ground.

 

What if we do not meet our target?

If we do not meet our target before the campaign ends, unfortunately, the campaign will be cancelled, you will all be refunded and we will have to attack this mountain from a different angle. Because we need so many people to be involved in this campaign, it means that you’ve got to share the hell out of this link! - otherwise it will take much, much longer to complete the project. We are determined and tenacious. We know there may be bumps and hurdles along the way, but we are confident that PlantLife will become a reality.

What if we get overfunded?

Overfunding opens us up to the possibility of increasing our current land-plot size, which will allow us to build more villas. Any extra money that we raise will also give us a little extra padding to fall back on, which would be incredibly helpful as a new company. 

 

Guests & Memberships 

 

Vegan Jasmine Members

Along with the Jasmine membership perks, your contribution will help to share the deliciousness of veganism. We will take to the streets with persuasive vegan goodies and attract the masses by giving them away for free! Every Vegan Jasmine Member will be represented by a delicious vegan cupcake and given to an an unsuspecting member of the public!

Eco Jasmine Members

Along with the Jasmine membership perks, your contribution will help clean up our planet little by little. Every time someone becomes an Eco Jasmine Member we will pick up 1 bin bag of trash, removing it from Thailand's beautiful scenery. 

For-The-Animals Jasmine Members

Along with the Jasmine membership perks, your contribution will brighten the day of a stray. Every time someone becomes an Eco Jasmine Member, we will dedicate 15 minutes of love and play to a stray animal in need. 

 

 

Vegan Lotus Members

Along with the Lotus Guest perks, your contribution will help show the world how veganism can improve your health and vitality. We will storm the local fitness clubs with delicious and healthy vegan treats and entice the exercise enthusiasts by nourishing them for free! Every Vegan Lotus Member will be represented by a delicious healthy treat and given to an an unsuspecting fitness fanatic!

Eco Lotus Members

Along with the Lotus Guest perks, your contribution will help reduce our plastic use one step at a time. We will visit a local fruit and veg market in Bangkok that is notorious for excessive plastic bag use, and hand out free reusable bags to unsuspecting shoppers. For every Eco Lotus Member, we will give away 10 reusable bags. 

For-The-Animals Lotus Members

Along with the Lotus Guest perks, your contribution will bring a shelter animal one step closer to finding their forever home. For every For-The-Animals Lotus Member, we will head to our local animal shelter to photograph and film an animal who has been especially difficult to find a forever home for. We will send 1 beautiful paw-trait and a 15 second video to the shelter for them to use to showcase the animals' personality to a whole load of potential forever families. 

 

 

Vegan Coconut Members

Along with your Coconut Guest perks, your contribution will help support animal shelters and the individual animals who are in desperate need of love and attention. For every Vegan Coconut Guest that backs us, a PlantLife founder will spend a day volunteering at an animal shelter, feeding, playing, cleaning and generally caring for sick, injured or caged cat and dogs.

Eco Coconut Members

Along with your Coconut Guest perks, your contribution will help us to demonstrate and bring awareness to the impact of climate change. For every 5 Eco Coconut backers, we will organise a free film screening in Bangkok showcasing a hard hitting and informative, environmental documentary Film.

For The Animals Coconut Members

Along with your Coconut Guest perks, your contribution will bring us one step closer to unveiling worldwide animal abuse and the environmental and public health importance of a global shift towards veganism. For every 5 For-The-Animals Coconut backers, we will organise a free film screening in Bangkok showcasing a hard hitting and informative, vegan documentary Film.

 

 

 

Our Partners 

PlantLife will be a collaborative project; this means that instead of VC’s providing a capital injection, we’re essentially sharing the company between a few invested parties. Our collaborative structure means we’ve managed to reduce our initial startup costs by a whole bunch, as well as introducing new and exciting collaborative ideas by some pretty passionate people.

The invested collaborators will be as follows:

         - A Thai construction company with knowledge on how to implement eco and solar practices into the build.

         - A Thai architect experienced in designing eco conscious and sustainable buildings.

         - The land owner.  

And our on board consultants will help us ensure that we are as eco friendly and solar efficient as possible.      

 

The Impact

Think about the last time you went to a luxury hotel... or any hotel for that matter. Think about all the tiny details that you may not have noticed at the time. The plastic use, energy use, food wastage or even the type of food served at the hotel. Every tiny detail, even down to the impact that hotel has on its local community adds up. From a lot of seemingly small decisions that that hotel has made somewhere down the line, one big impact and footprint is created. 

 

Experiences

We are focused on offering our guests authentic travel experiences that enrich our local community and give our guests memorable travel experiences. All of PlantLife's experiences are centred around Thai culture, our local community, sustainable living, animal welfare and the plant based lifestyle. For our full list of experiences, head over to our website. 

https://www.plantlifehotel.com/experience 

 

Restaurant 

PlantLife restaurant will be a luxury, plant based dining experience. Our extensive menu boasts healthy and delicious dishes created with fresh, seasonal and local ingredients. We will tailor our menu for each season. 

Check out our full menu at our website address below:

www.plantlifehotel.com/restaurant

But here are a few pages for a taster...

 

Animal Residents Care

(A long but necessary explanation!)

ALL of our animal residents will be neutered, spayed & vaccinated with no exceptions. 

Donations are often the only way shelters & sanctuaries survive. This means that, unfortunately, many of these shelters are so underfunded that the animals end up living in cramped and miserable conditions. We have seen this first hand and it is very sad to see. Although these animals are better off in these shelters with the medical care that they need, they are often still cooped up. 

We have met and spoken to animal shelters and rescuers on Koh Phangan in regards to adopting animals who are most in need of a home; think of us as a halfway home for animals that are recovered, vaccinated, neutered/spayed and awaiting their forever home! All of these animals will be adoptable if guests take a shine to them. We will facilitate this with the help of animal shelters and relocators here in Thailand. This will enable us to keep adopting animals. 

We will have a full-time, animal carer on-site, dedicated to ensuring that the animals are well looked after. We will also have an animal safe zone on the premises with a quarantine zone (similar to a small veterinary surgery) and emergency medical supplies and vaccinations. We will be partnering with local vets to give our animals routine check ups and vaccinations on a regular basis.

Unlike most sanctuaries with limited space and resources, our animals will be free to roam the 19,200 sqm area; we have nooks, hideaways and shrouded areas for them to explore and play. PlantLife will be surrounded by a very tall and cat-proof perimeter wall, to ensure that the animals are kept safe and sound on our premises, and to ensure that no potentially sick animals can wander on site before they have been treated and vaccinated.

We know that cats are natural hunters and we will be taking all the steps we can, to make sure this does not impact our natural wildlife. All cats will wear bell collars to minimise any unfortunate incidents. We will also be taking all the measures possible to keep any potentially dangerous critters such as snakes off the premises and away from our guests and animal residents. 

We believe it is important for our guests to understand why we do what we do, and to remember that we are not a petting zoo, or a place where the animals serve as entertainment for us. We will provide our guests with information and education on the plight of feral & free-roaming animals & their affect on wildlife.

 

Cat Food

Although we aim to be 100% vegan in every aspect of our hotel operations, cat food will be one area in which we will not be able to be totally vegan, for fear of compromising our cats’ health. Dogs can be fed a plant based diet and are not obligate carnivores. They can, and do, thrive on a properly formulated vegan diet including foods like rice, sweet potatoes, carrots, lentils and other plant-based foods. In fact, one of the longest lifetime lengths recorded for a dog is 27 years or 189 years in dog years, was from a dog named Bramble who was vegan and her story is quite famous!

Cats, however, are hyper carnivorous (or obligate carnivores) and require taurine found in meat to keep them healthy. In an ideal scenario, animals would catch their own food, and would not be contributing to the environmental and ethical factors that cause concern in animal agriculture, but sadly, domesticated animals like cats, are dependant on us for everything that is important in their lives, including food. Unfortunately, this means we would need to provide our cats with a source of animal based protein to keep them healthy. The small consolation we take here, is in the fact that most cat and dog foods do not come from animals being slaughtered to feed cats and dogs, but rather from by-products from animals being killed to feed people (i.e. made from animal proteins which are not allowed to be sold as human ‘food’). 

We know that vegan cat foods are being developed, but we don't believe that there is one on the market at this time has been proven to keep cats healthy and happy. If an option like this does become available we will be open to considering it, if it is locally available and proven (without doubt) to be sufficient for cat's health.

This is something that we’ve tackled with personally and as a business. The issue is, PlantLife will be situated on an island in the gulf of Thailand, Koh Phangan - being able to ship potentially viable vegan cat food hundreds of miles across multiple transportation is not sustainable. Currently, the closest supplier is Singapore, but the product testing and customer feedback that we’ve read through extensively, doesn’t make this a product that we would be happy to feed our animals.

 

Imagine arriving at a lush, luxury paradise on a beautiful tropical island....

... You’re welcomed by a warm and friendly team and handed a chilled lemongrass tea and a fragrant warm towel to refresh you after your long journey.

... Imagine the sweet smell of jasmine and orchids whilst you enjoy the plush, authentic and traditional surroundings. You notice the low hum of a therapeutic pur radiating from a small, furry cat curled up on a colourful woven cushion beside you; greeting you like an old friend into their safe haven. Imagine walking the path through the abundant and vibrant hotel grounds, you approach your villa and pluck a fresh and juicy rose apple from a tree at your doorstep. You enter what will be your home for the next few days and notice the soaps, the lotions, the furnishings, even the dressing gowns and beach bags in your room are ethical and vegan. You enjoy the cool air; a welcome refuge from the warm morning sun. Imagine knowing that you can enjoy the refreshing, cool air and warm water from a rainfall shower worry-free, because this hotel runs entirely on solar energy and renewable water sources.

... Imagine wandering to the restaurant with a rumbling tummy, knowing that whatever you order will be completely guilt-free in more ways than one; nutritious, delicious and cruelty-free. You wander through lush palm and fruit trees and spy a fluffy clowder of kittens warming themselves in a patch of sun under a flowering banana tree.

...Imagine being accompanied to the hidden botanical library cafe by a wise & peaceful soi dog, after enjoying a refreshing dip in the luxurious, chemical-free swimming pool.

... Imagine sinking into your soft bed after an evening under the stars and fairy lights, watching your favourite movie in the company of kind, like-minded people and PlantLife’s furry residents. You relax further into your bed and think about your long day exploring this heaven that you have been excited about for so long.

... Imagine just before you close your eyes to rest, you look across the room and see a small bundle curled up in a Thai wicker basket; your new friend on your first day at PlantLife.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • What happens if we don't reach our target? Rest assured, if we don't reach our target your money will be refunded. If this happens, then sure, that would suck, BUT it wouldn't necessarily be the end of PlantLife... The more you share this video and campaign and the more we can show some tangible numbers demonstrating how interested we know you guys will be in a hotel like this, then the easier it will be for us to attain funding from other sources such as VCs if necessary. 

 

  • Implementing solar power will be difficult won't it? To properly implement solar panels in the most effective way, it is a great idea to integrate them into the build rather than add them later, which is what we are doing. However, not all construction companies know how to do this effectively. This is why we have Phangan Solar on board to help advise us on things such as effective insulation, which will help us down the line to ensure we do not waste any power and how to properly integrate the solar panels into the hotel build. The electricity grid on Koh Phangan is pretty temperamental, so solar will be quite a reliable power source in comparison, considering the consistency of sunny days in Thailand. We will also have batteries to store solar power for use throughout the night. However, in the unlikely scenario that the batteries run out, we will have back up power. 

 

  • Isn't Koh Phangan a party island? Yes and No. Koh Phangan was first inhabited by Monks who were impressed by the island's spiritual energy. This sparked the beginning of the spiritual community who live by kind and gentle practices such as ahimsa, which is the concept of non-violence towards other humans, animals and the land. This community is now predominantly on the West side of the island where many vegan cafes and yoga retreats are situated (and where PlantLife will be built). This community began the respectful, spiritual and ceremonial celebration of the full moon on Koh Phangan. In recent years, however, Full Moon Parties have been come to be known as something very different. These parties mostly take place on the South East of the island in Haad Rin. Although this presents itself as a threat, and despite, unfortunately, being disruptive to the South East of the island, these parties are not a threat to the peaceful West side of the island. Koh Phangan has its own strict zoning system in place to protect the island and ensure these party areas do not grow. In fact, the disruptive nature of these parties is actually prompting the Thai authorities to implement more and more measures to help conserve the environment and communities on Koh Phangan and have, for example, recently banned ‘unfriendly activities’, such as fishing, fish feeding, anchoring on coral reefs, construction on the beach, and walking on the seabed on the islands (implemented in July 2018). So yes, there are full moon parties on Koh Phangan (on the other side of the island), but we are confident that, as travellers are becoming more conscious and authorities are becoming stricter with disruptive tourism, that these parties will become less and less over time, leaving Koh Phangan a relatively untouched, unspoilt and quiet island with many eco practices. 

 

  • Why is the resort not on the beach? We believe being situated a short distance from the beach will allow us to achieve a secluded paradise oasis. The majority of beach areas have at least some population, therefore factors such as noise pollution, potential litter, already occupied beaches and music from restaurants and hotels will be totally out of our control in these areas. This secluded piece of land gives us an opportunity to create a completely peaceful, spacious and secluded environment. But, don't worry! We know that a holiday isn't a holiday without the ocean, so we will be providing free shuttles (7 minute ride) to Srithanu beach (aka Zen beach) 3-4 times daily and bicycle hire will be available if you would rather a short cycle.

 

  • But you don't have experience in building hotels...  It is true that neither of us have experience in building or managing a hotel. However, our travels have given us extensive and valuable insight into what makes a memorable and remarkable hotel. We know that we are exactly our target audience, which puts us in the unique position of knowing exactly what our guests want. Many hotel operators or developers do not have this insight; we believe this is why many hotels fail to be personable, responsible and memorable. However, we know that there are many inner workings of a hotel build and operation that we will need help with. This is why we are hiring a strong and passionate team to help us develop, build & operate PlantLife.

 

  • What if I don't like animals? The emphasis at PlantLife will be that our guests are never forced to interact with the animals, if they do not choose to, and vice versa. The smart architecture of the whole resort will be designed around the animals. The animals will have nooks, hideaways and beds all over the resort, so guests can choose to interact with the animals when and if they like. We will also have an ‘animal & guest lounge area’, where both animals and guests can relax together on hammocks, daybeds and furnishings if they want to. The interior will be carefully designed to create a luxury, cohabit space for both guests and resident animals. The guests will not be obliged to, but will have the option to invite the animals into their rooms during the day or night to enjoy the space together. Villas will utilize smart architecture to integrate the animals and facilitate guest interaction. The animals will not be trapped in any place where they are forced to interact (like many cat cafes), so there is no forced interaction both ways.  

 

  • But I'm not vegan... Don't worry, our menu has so much variety and lots of plant based meat, so you won't even know the difference; you might even feel healthier by the end of your stay, which is an unusual bonus at the end of a luxury holiday!   

 

  • What if Im allergic to cats or dogs?! Fear not! 2 of our villas will be designated for guests with dander allergies. They will be dander free zones!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but there are still ways you can help! 

Share share share! Let's make some noise with this campaign. The more you share, the more chance there is of PlantLife becoming a reality, whether we make our target or not. Sharing our campaign on social media or even by word of mouth will go a long way to helping us reach our goal. 

Want to donate more or get your hands on a bigger piece of the vegan pie? Please contact us at info@plantlifehotel.com

www.plantlifehotel.com

https://www.instagram.com/plantlifehotel/

http://www.facebook.com/plantlifehotel

https://twitter.com/PlantLifeHotel
