This allows for an all-temperature range as well as an ultra-light all-polymer design. Moreover, when the pump’s not in use it doesn’t generate any parasitic drag.  THE COMMAND CLUTCHThe clutch is controlled from the handlebar via a standard shifter cable routed along the bike’s frame and through the center axle of the wheel. It has three positions:1. Inflation: Air Inflation through air release valve (Tire Inflation Valve).2. Mid Rest: Nothing happens here, just keep riding as usual. 3. Deflation: Torque-modulated air-inflation through Air Pump actuation. THE HUB BODYThe lightweight oversized design with large flanges allows for building ultra-strong wheels. In 7075 T6 aluminum and light weight carbon fiber, the body is also designed for an optimized all-weather-proof (living in Belgium, we know what extensive mud damage looks like!). THE FREEWHEELTo be released in both Shimano 11x and SRAM XD versions, it provides over 130 engagement points… Nice, isn’t it?! WHAT ELSE?Obviously, we’ve designed our hub for easy maintenance. We’ve also included safety features to easily overcome any problems during your ride. Very frequently asked questions (VFAQ)1) But…how much does it weigh?The number 1 question everyone asked.We are not yet disclosing our concrete weight data until our final engineering for production is complete. What we can say is that we are on target for the hub of a delta weight of 350 g (12.35 oz) over typical OEM hub (what you get on your new bike). For the air-reservoir on the rim, it’s ~200 g (7oz) more.So, it’s heavier than your current hub… yet before you stop reading, just consider first that on a bike we are all first concerned about added weight because:
It increases the amount of energy we need to put when pedaling.
It makes the wheel feel more sluggish due to increased moment of inertia.
For 1, it doesn’t take long to realize that a mountain bike is much slower in pavement than a road bike not because it’s heavier, but because it has a much larger rolling resistance! Strap yourself an 8 lbs backpack when road biking and you can try testing this going uphill, straight or down.So for mountain biking, rolling resistance is a major factor to your energy expenditure, and the amount of energy “wasted” by a tire at the wrong pressure can be really significant, easily over 15% on large tire. Remember this happens while climbing, rolling over flats and even downhill!  So in a typical ride, with our Hub you will end up spending less energy overall! For 2, most of the added weight is in the center of the wheel, of which ~ 150 g are non-rotating mass.  Then the air-reservoir is actually supporting tire at low pressure and also providing a very strong shock protection to the rim.  This enables you to mount lighter, more efficient tires and also light but delicate rims.  A fully optimized wheel has a similar moment of inertia but with lower rolling resistance. 2) Why does it cost so much?Because it is very costly to manufacture...Well, making a very large but still light-weight hub that can withstand all the punishment mountain biking can inflict requires the use only the best materials and processes available. The main structure of the hub that you can see is fully collaborated with European CNC partners (with USA negotiations underway). It’s not just made of your average 7075-T6 Aluminum (which is made in China. Oops!) but also it’s sourced from the most reputable USA providers. Similarly for the carbon fiber hub-body and the rest of the stuff that one cannot see from the outside.   3) And… are there other advantages to the WhiteCrow Hub beyond tire pressure regulation?Yes, the oversized nature of the hub allows us to build wheels with shorter spokes in a wide “cantilever”. This results in much stiffer wheels, which are more energy efficient and handle better in rough terrain.  Note how SRAM highlights this feature in its new Boost standard; we do Boost and much better still!  Also, the freewheel has over 130 engagement points (or less than 2.7 deg), this provides a very “tight” feeling with a practically-immediate return of pedaling power to get you out of any tricky situation.  Go ahead and check the internet to see how many competitors do better than us!  Awesome benefits The journey - We need you Now!Late 2013 --Initial idea under the shower after a night-ride across a muddy Belgian forest.Feb 2014 -- First Patent Application.March 2014 -- First engineering studies.  Industrial engineer Mathijs Verstraete joins, followed by bike wheel expert Rob Bruyndonckx. 1st iteration project starts in collaboration with the multidisciplinary industry research lab “Sirris” resulting in a complete conceptual mockup of the design.Oct 2014 -- WhiteCrow Tech SA established.Dec 2015 -- Award-winning industrial designer Etienne Brandt joins the team. Funds for further engineering and prototyping secured from reputable startup investor, The Faktory. Jan 2016 --  Enlisting of VKC, an experienced materials laboratory specialized in the automotive industry, and continued collaboration with Sirris and other selected engineers.June 2016 -- Field tests of WhiteCrow Hub start. Our field tests include all types of terrain,  bikes ridden by strong riders.June - Nov 2016 --  Large amount of prototype iterations to develop and test all the brand-new internal active elements of the hub. At this point we have used all the kinds of CNC, molding & advanced 3D printing prototyping technologies available in Europe.Dec 2016 -- All internal active tire-pressure regulation components work and assembly architecture demonstrated.Jan 2017 -- Crowdfunding campaign We are small team, this Indediegogo campaign is the key enabling us to move this truly brand new technology towards production.Your support is of utmost importance to jumpstart a fresh journey in mountain bike innovations.Jan - March 2007 - More lab R&D to optimize the internal pump construction, Extensive all-weather field testing.April 2017 - First public field tests of the hub available to the press. Ramp up for pre-production.June 2017 -- Projected shipping of the first batch to crowdfunding participantsSept 2017 -- Projected shipping of regular production The rewards  A team of bike enthusiasts   Xavier Serret, WhiteCrow Tech Founder  An insatiable bike rider, a multidisciplinary engineer, an inventor and a tenacious entrepreneur, Xavier held C-level positions at fintech companies such as InsuCom and FinMetrics and is also the owner of several patents in the domains of data authentication, encoding and protection since 2004. Etienne Brandt, Award-winning industrial designerBoasting an Academy Award (Oscar) for technical achievement on his pioneering work on high-end drones, Etienne is also a fanatic in all things with 2 wheels and no engine. Rob Bruyndonckx, Wheel building Expert, Founder of SwoothRob is a Belgian master wheel builder collaborating with the international competition team of GT, the European team of Kona and many others. Mathijs Verstraete, Industrial EngineerA product and application engineer, Mathijs has written many publications and is a professional in automotive air filtration, acoustics and creative concept development. He is, of course, another fanatic mountain biker.                  A token for our seed investorWhiteCrow Tech has been accepted as the 2015 batch of The Faktory - a private tech startup accelerator and seed investment fund founded by Pierre L’Hoest, the Belgian entrepreneur known for his TV slow motion technology company, EVS (Market Capital of 443,1M€ as of 3rd Jan 2017 -- MorningStar.com).Since late 2013, The Faktory has invested in 11 companies and brought products and services to international niche markets in the areas of consumer electronics, high-technology, gaming and apps, drones, SaaS and IoT products.The company has a team and mentors who come from all walks of life with professional experience in different countries. Furthermore, The Faktory partners with Boldstart Ventures, based in NYC, who oversaw the successful exits such as Divide (acquired by Google), GoInstant (acquired by Salesforce) and Rapportive (acquired by Linkedin).With their professional and financial supports, we received a real boost in the R&D phase and iterated our product design into its fine-tuned stage today. All we need next is your support to launch the production and have the first batch delivered to mountain bike enthusiasts out there!

story:
A SUMMARY

FOR REAL VALUE PLEASE READ THOUGH THIS

The art of real driving – OUR PASSION

The art of driving eludes most people all their life.

Most drivers simply do not ever understand the art of driving nor are they aware of the wonderful experience to master and apply good driving skills.

At Rallystar Motorsport Academy in South Africa we refine top ranking competition driver's skills, train beginners saving them (especially the parents) huge amounts of money in the process.

Our youngest student was 14 and the eldest 79.

We evaluate aspiring race - and rally drivers as well as navigators to confirm potential, or suggest another career. This is a great money saver as a lack of potential usually ends with an expensive accident, while we either manage to prevent damage or suggest a non-start well before damage occurs.

At our new venue our revised course will include training and educating young people to become safer and better drivers. A community service long overdue in South Africa.

The owner of the Rallystar Motorsport Academy, Leon Botha, is a multiple rally champion and has been involved in the sport for more than 40 years.

His enthusiasm for the sport and his passion for driving, is legendary and makes him a deserving recipient of your contribution. To listen to him speak about the art of driving and his passion for the sport, is worth the effort and money. Just for interest sake, he also offers a motivational business course, “Rally your business to success!”

Rallystar Motorsport Academy operated successfully at its previous venue, for more than 14 years until mid 2016 when the premises was sold.

After the sale, advanced negotiation for an alternative venue came to nothing, which was a great disappointment to all.

Leon then decided to take a sabbatical until he could find the “right spot” to reopen and run the business on, but took a firm decision not to re-start the business if he did not have the resources to apply his experience and make it work properly.

This would require a substantial amount of money and therefore this honest effort to raise the required funds through Indiegogo crowd-funding.

This humble but much needed effort relies on the support of people like yourself, who realized the importance of people being made aware of training to drive well!

Due to the lack of enough economically active people in South-Africa we need to admit that it is virtually impossible to raise the funding we need - which is why we truly depend on your generosity.  

Through the years, running Rallystar, Leon has paid millions in "school fees"  and has done more for the sport and for driving skills, than most people who weer involved in motorsport.

He truly deserves your support (no matter how big or small).

Leon says: “When I started Rallystar Motorsport Academy in 2002 there was no handbook, no guidelines or rules on which I could base this type of business, and goodness knows, I paid heavily for the lessons I had to learn!"

"This is why I decided that I would only restart Rallystar again, if I could afford to purchase the right equipment and do proper preparation of the tracks. If I can not get the right things in place, the maintenance of the cars will simply be too expensive and so will continuous preparation and maintenance of the roads be.”

"I want to make Rallystar a memorable experience for all involved!” he said and continued; “I have now successfully negotiated a fantastic new premises, much better and more convenient than the rugged “old” Rallystar – although I loved every inch of that ground!"

He added that, "This time around I know how to start, what to allow and what not, how to control drivers  and how to save the cars from damage - because I wrote the only handbook!”

“The new venue is in the perfect location, with diverse entertainment, accommodation for the customers, workshops and fantastic roads for us to work with.”

“This will be magic!” he added, “any real driver’s dream!”

Although the deal has been signed and sealed the venue may only be revealed once we are ready to start, which is also a reason for this urgent appeal.

The moment we reach the minimum startup funding, we will tell you all about this venue!

You will love it!

Did we mention that there is a nature reserve right next to the “new” Rallystar premises where the family can go for game drives, while the brave hearts drive rally cars.

There will be bicycle and horseback rides as well as other forms of entertainment - such as Hot Air Balloon-trips etc.

Rallystar will be a bucket list MUST for every tourist who aspires to experience Africa.

 

YOUR SUPPORT

We can not stress the importance of your support enough - your contribution will help re-establish this great academy in a country where its function is essential.

We will also invest our own funds, but this kite can only fly properly with your support.

You can help us achieve our new goals and at the same time contribute to road safety and help us create jobs in a country where unemployment is touching on the 60%.

There is always a demand for good drivers in the job market! HELP US, TO HELP THEM!  

We have in the past also trained quite a number of overseas visitors who came to South Africa specifically for this purpose and in most cases they insisted on being trained by the master of the game himself, Leon Botha.

You will find that over and above the good perks as incentive, we will apply your contribution wisely and effectively.

 

WHAT IS IN IT FOR ALL?

There is no two ways about it - if you want real holiday and business value – I mean real value for your Dollar, Pound or Euro - South Africa is where you will find it.

South Africa - is without doubt one of the most beautiful countries in the world. This is where you can see the perfect combination of human talent in development, the shortcomings of our society and at the same time - a few kilometers out of the cities - the grace and goodness of The Creator.   

A place where you can once again find a little peace for the soul, relax and enjoy the best of both worlds without spending tear-jerking amounts of money!

At the writing of this proposal - your One Dollar’s worth fluctuated between 12 and 15 Rand - which means that about $8 - yes eight Dollar will buy you a decent steak in an up-class restaurant!   

A return trip to South Africa from the USA will cost you approximately $750, while a return trip from London to Johannesburg will cost you anything from £400 or €450. (Rates calculated on 8 September 2017 and flight estimated costs for May 2018)

Can you beat that?

Fact is, almost anyone can afford to visit this wonderful country.

Your visit to the Rallystar Motorsport Academy is important  - as we would love to entertain you and give every qualifying contributor the best experience ever, but it is not essential.

We will appreciate every contribution and will try to give you the acknowledgement you deserve.

Please note: The perks for this offer will be valid until the end of 2020!

Better than that - no one can do!

PAY BACK…

If by end 2020 if you have contributed $500+ but could not visit us and you will not be able to do so in the near future, then - we will pay back 25% of your contribution within six months after a written confirmation that you can not take up the perks.

Of course you may keep the cap and shirt if you qualified for it!

If you make a smaller contribution - you will still receive excellent and exclusive perks from us, to show our appreciation and who knows - we may still see you around and offer you special prices when you pay us a visit.

WHY DO WE DEPEND ON YOUR HELP?

As said - it is almost impossible to raise this sort of money in South Africa due to circumstances, which is why we appeal for your appreciated assistance.

With the required funding we will be able to establish a state of the art facility and run a number of proper rally- and training cars.

We will be able to start up without raising the full amount - and will extend and improve the quality of our service as we progress.

If you have a petrol head and heart and agree to assist we will be able to develop everything we need right from the start.

 

IN RETURN FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION

 

THE +$500 CLUB

Every person who contributes $500 or more will receive a fantastic treat when they visit South Africa. * (see the affordable rates above @ "What is in it for all?".)

When you visit we will collect you from Johannesburg International Airport (OR Tambo) and if you have arranged to spend the first night at the Rallystar facility, it will be at a very special rates.

(*Note you may transfer these benefits to anyone with a valid driving license)

 

THE 500+ EXPERIENCE - during your visit at the Rallystar Facility.

Soon after you have settled down, your Rallystar  Self-drive Experience will start.

You will be allowed to drive a genuine rally car after a short lecture and recce run over the track. (You may of course pay in for the same drive even if you now contribute less, but visit our facility)

THE QUESTION IS…

Can you drive a rally car memorizing instructions, executing one while listening to the next...??  

You will have an experienced navigator/instructor at your side and you will have to listen to the machine-gun-tempo instructions coming your way, listening to a new instruction, while executing a previous one, judging speed, applying power at the right moments, reducing speed where needed and at the same time keep the car on the route!

A REAL LIFE EXPERIENCE

Then - goodness gracious hold me tight - after your "self-drive" an expert will take you around the track for a "Hot-seat" spin at proper rally speed,  giving you a proper look at real rallying!  

Keep in mind there will be more adventures such as Hot-Air ballooning, cycling or jogging through a game reserve or you and the family can enjoy a game drive on the same premises.

We will go out of our way to make your visit worthwhile and exciting.

If you have your tour and itinerary in place and do not need our assistance - no worries, we still love you!

This will be a true Africa experience and you will never forget a day or two at Rallystar.

After you have done what you came to do at Rallystar we will help you get on your way to enjoy the rest of your stay in our great country and we will always be as close as your phone, if you need any help or advice while you are in South Africa.

Remember we know this place and have the contacts to make your stay memorable.

OTHER SERVICES:  Car rentals and other services can be arranged at your request.

If required we will introduce you to the best tour organizers in our beautiful country.

ACCOMMODATION WHILE VISITING RALLYSTAR.

Your accommodation for the night spend with us will be at reduced rates if you book during the week(bookings essential), while lunch on action day will be on the house and to top it all, all $500+ contributors will receive an exclusive  RALLYSTAR 500+ CLUB CERTIFICATE,  plus a special embroidered cap and shirt as token of our sincere appreciation.   

If you can not visit us soon after your contribution - the certificate of appreciation, cap and shirt will be couriered to you if you free if you are a Club $500+ member or if are willing to pay the approximate $35 in costs, if your contribution was less than $500 - but we would love to hand it to you personally!

Any larger contribution will be much appreciated and we are willing to negotiate special perks for special situations – but remember every Dollar, Pound, Rand or Euro  will help us reach our goal and fulfill our cause.

ALTERNATIVE CONTRIBUTIONS

Every contribution will be acknowledged - any contribution $10 will receive a special Rallystar certificate of acknowledgement. This is a electronic version that you can print out on your side - no courier.

A contribution of $50 will receive an embroidered Rallystar Cap (Courier cost to be paid by contributor) and a Bronze certificate of appreciation as souvenir - to be printed on your side.

$100 will receive a Rallystar T-Shirt, an unique cap (Courier cost to be paid by contributor) and an appropriate Silver certificate. This category will also receive a special discount on our prices when they visit us in future.

$250 will receive a Rallystar T-Shirt, an uniqueEmbroidered cap (Courier cost to be paid by contributor) and an appropriate Gold certificate. This category will also receive a special discount on our prices when they visit us in future.

 

$500+ will receive a Club 500+ Rallystar Rally/racing Shirt, an Embroidered 500+  cap (Courier free) and a Platinum certificate and a complete Rallystar Self-drive experience when you visit us in South-Africa plus many other advantages.

This category will also receive a special discount on other adventures we organise while you do the Africa Bucket list thing!

GENERAL

If we do not reach the targeted amount we will start at slightly lower profile and build up the business as we manage to obtain more funds.

South Africans funding this project must please contact us directly to arrange their bonus packages and booking times.

Special rates available for groups and fantastic corporate fun-days can be arranged!

WHAT DO WE NEED?

In order to set up this facility the way we want it to be, we need  funding for U$195 000

 

HOW WILL THE FUNDING BE SPEND?

One of the biggest expenses will be the development and treatment of the tracks to reduce dust and compact the surface in an Eco-friendly way. This is also a contractual condition from the landowners to which we have agreed.

Just to put the Environmentalist's hearts at ease, hardly any bush or tree will be affected and the environment will be improved if anything.

Rallystar won an evironmental award from the controlling body of motor-sport in South Africa while it was still situated at the previous premises. We are very environmentally conscious.  

Almost 50% of the funding will go towards replacement rally vehicles.

Leon is adamant to start with the best quality cars with durable suspensions. This was Rallystar's biggest expense and weakness during our first 14 year run and will now be eliminated.

The aim is to purchase cars of the same make or at least two each of the same make to reduce the spares we need to carry.

If all the money is not raised Rallystar will start off with fewer vehicles and purchase more as the time goes by and finances allow.  

A good second-hand water truck (to contain the Africa dust) will be bought. This is an essential part of the setup to ensure dust control and will also be used to wet grassy areas and trees.

We will acquire the best safety equipment to ensure the safety of all involved.

The recreation facility directly at the track area needs to  be upgraded to give everybody a great experience. This will also cost a fair amount of money - around 15% of budget

A portion of the funding will be obviously be applied to cover the costs for your perks and to make sure you or your nominated guest enjoy great times with us!

We will make it worthwhile for you and prove that we deserve your trust.

THE IMPACT OF THIS VENTURE

The Rallystar Motorsport Academy will contribute to local communities.

We employ local people from the area during events, we also do some training and involve the community in the sport.

The venue will draw national and international currency to the area.

Most of all – if we  put this project together the way we hope and aim for, we will improve driver skills and quality of driving in South Africa and elsewhere.

It needs to be said that while Rallystar Motorsport Academy operated from its previous site, we trained a substantial number of  international competition drivers.

Tourists always loved the facility and we promise – you will all be crazy about the new one.

CONCLUSION

We are here to give you more adrenaline driven excitement than you ever had behind the steering of a car.  We will make a trip to South Africa worthwhile or create the best present you can give any motoring enthusiast!

We will inform contributors who want to know, about special tourist packages to our beautiful country.

The tour can include other “adventures” such as Hot Air ballooning, white water rafting, bungee-jumps, game drives etc. at other venues. We have contacts form Cape Town to our Northern Borders.

See us as your friends and contact in South Africa.

NOWHERE IS TOO FAR…

Nowhere is too far to travel these days and Africa is one continent you have to visit before you depart from earth.

The exchange rate is totally in your favor and you will receive incredible value for your money!

A few Pound, Euro or Dollar get you here and back!

They say Africa is where it all started – come have a look!

Come enjoy the trip of a lifetime and top it all -  drive in a real rally car on the African Continent.

Bucket list - TICK!

Please spread the word and get your friends to join in.

We will appreciate every bit of help - even if you can not come visit - please help us.

Rallystar and Africa is fun, but even more so if you bring a few friends with.

We will be ready and waiting to receive you!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell and share this with your friends. Tell them all about this great opportunity to become part of an incredible journey and let them contribute to a great cause.

Please use the Indiegogo-sharing facility – that will help us too.

That brings us to the end of this proposal but to the start of a great relationship that will help us develop a worthwhile venture.

We truly hope that we have convinced you to contribute - no matter how small.

Thank you from our Rallystar Hearts - hope to see you soon - so we can make this wonderful gesture up to you!

THE QUESTION IS…
Can you drive a rally car memorizing instructions, executing one while listening to the next...??  
You will have an experienced navigator/instructor at your side and you will have to listen to the machine-gun-tempo instructions coming your way, listening to a new instruction, while executing a previous one, judging speed, applying power at the right moments, reducing speed where needed and at the same time keep the car on the route!
A REAL LIFE EXPERIENCE
Then - goodness gracious hold me tight - after your "self-drive" an expert will take you around the track for a "Hot-seat" spin at proper rally speed,  giving you a proper look at real rallying!  
Keep in mind there will be more adventures such as Hot-Air ballooning, cycling or jogging through a game reserve or you and the family can enjoy a game drive on the same premises.
We will go out of our way to make your visit worthwhile and exciting.
If you have your tour and itinerary in place and do not need our assistance - no worries, we still love you!
This will be a true Africa experience and you will never forget a day or two at Rallystar.
After you have done what you came to do at Rallystar we will help you get on your way to enjoy the rest of your stay in our great country and we will always be as close as your phone, if you need any help or advice while you are in South Africa.
Remember we know this place and have the contacts to make your stay memorable.
OTHER SERVICES:  Car rentals and other services can be arranged at your request.
If required we will introduce you to the best tour organizers in our beautiful country.
ACCOMMODATION WHILE VISITING RALLYSTAR.
Your accommodation for the night spend with us will be at reduced rates if you book during the week(bookings essential), while lunch on action day will be on the house and to top it all, all $500+ contributors will receive an exclusive  RALLYSTAR 500+ CLUB CERTIFICATE,  plus a special embroidered cap and shirt as token of our sincere appreciation.   
If you can not visit us soon after your contribution - the certificate of appreciation, cap and shirt will be couriered to you if you free if you are a Club $500+ member or if are willing to pay the approximate $35 in costs, if your contribution was less than $500 - but we would love to hand it to you personally!
Any larger contribution will be much appreciated and we are willing to negotiate special perks for special situations – but remember every Dollar, Pound, Rand or Euro  will help us reach our goal and fulfill our cause.
ALTERNATIVE CONTRIBUTIONS
Every contribution will be acknowledged - any contribution $10 will receive a special Rallystar certificate of acknowledgement. This is a electronic version that you can print out on your side - no courier.
A contribution of $50 will receive an embroidered Rallystar Cap (Courier cost to be paid by contributor) and a Bronze certificate of appreciation as souvenir - to be printed on your side.
$100 will receive a Rallystar T-Shirt, an unique cap (Courier cost to be paid by contributor) and an appropriate Silver certificate. This category will also receive a special discount on our prices when they visit us in future.
$250 will receive a Rallystar T-Shirt, an uniqueEmbroidered cap (Courier cost to be paid by contributor) and an appropriate Gold certificate. This category will also receive a special discount on our prices when they visit us in future. $500+ will receive a Club 500+ Rallystar Rally/racing Shirt, an Embroidered 500+  cap (Courier free) and a Platinum certificate and a complete Rallystar Self-drive experience when you visit us in South-Africa plus many other advantages.
This category will also receive a special discount on other adventures we organise while you do the Africa Bucket list thing!
GENERAL
If we do not reach the targeted amount we will start at slightly lower profile and build up the business as we manage to obtain more funds.
South Africans funding this project must please contact us directly to arrange their bonus packages and booking times.
Special rates available for groups and fantastic corporate fun-days can be arranged!
WHAT DO WE NEED?
In order to set up this facility the way we want it to be, we need  funding for U$195 000
 
HOW WILL THE FUNDING BE SPEND?
One of the biggest expenses will be the development and treatment of the tracks to reduce dust and compact the surface in an Eco-friendly way. This is also a contractual condition from the landowners to which we have agreed.
Just to put the Environmentalist's hearts at ease, hardly any bush or tree will be affected and the environment will be improved if anything.
Rallystar won an evironmental award from the controlling body of motor-sport in South Africa while it was still situated at the previous premises. We are very environmentally conscious.  
Almost 50% of the funding will go towards replacement rally vehicles.
Leon is adamant to start with the best quality cars with durable suspensions. This was Rallystar's biggest expense and weakness during our first 14 year run and will now be eliminated.
The aim is to purchase cars of the same make or at least two each of the same make to reduce the spares we need to carry.
If all the money is not raised Rallystar will start off with fewer vehicles and purchase more as the time goes by and finances allow.  
A good second-hand water truck (to contain the Africa dust) will be bought. This is an essential part of the setup to ensure dust control and will also be used to wet grassy areas and trees.
We will acquire the best safety equipment to ensure the safety of all involved.
The recreation facility directly at the track area needs to  be upgraded to give everybody a great experience. This will also cost a fair amount of money - around 15% of budget
A portion of the funding will be obviously be applied to cover the costs for your perks and to make sure you or your nominated guest enjoy great times with us!
We will make it worthwhile for you and prove that we deserve your trust.
THE IMPACT OF THIS VENTURE
The Rallystar Motorsport Academy will contribute to local communities.
We employ local people from the area during events, we also do some training and involve the community in the sport.
The venue will draw national and international currency to the area.
Most of all – if we  put this project together the way we hope and aim for, we will improve driver skills and quality of driving in South Africa and elsewhere.
It needs to be said that while Rallystar Motorsport Academy operated from its previous site, we trained a substantial number of  international competition drivers.
Tourists always loved the facility and we promise – you will all be crazy about the new one.
CONCLUSION
We are here to give you more adrenaline driven excitement than you ever had behind the steering of a car.  We will make a trip to South Africa worthwhile or create the best present you can give any motoring enthusiast!
We will inform contributors who want to know, about special tourist packages to our beautiful country.
The tour can include other “adventures” such as Hot Air ballooning, white water rafting, bungee-jumps, game drives etc. at other venues. We have contacts form Cape Town to our Northern Borders.
See us as your friends and contact in South Africa.
NOWHERE IS TOO FAR…
Nowhere is too far to travel these days and Africa is one continent you have to visit before you depart from earth.
The exchange rate is totally in your favor and you will receive incredible value for your money!
A few Pound, Euro or Dollar get you here and back!
They say Africa is where it all started – come have a look!
Come enjoy the trip of a lifetime and top it all -  drive in a real rally car on the African Continent.
Bucket list - TICK!
Please spread the word and get your friends to join in.
We will appreciate every bit of help - even if you can not come visit - please help us.
Rallystar and Africa is fun, but even more so if you bring a few friends with.
We will be ready and waiting to receive you! Other Ways You Can Help
Please tell and share this with your friends. Tell them all about this great opportunity to become part of an incredible journey and let them contribute to a great cause.
Please use the Indiegogo-sharing facility – that will help us too.
That brings us to the end of this proposal but to the start of a great relationship that will help us develop a worthwhile venture.
We truly hope that we have convinced you to contribute - no matter how small.
Thank you from our Rallystar Hearts - hope to see you soon - so we can make this wonderful gesture up to you!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jodi Nichols and I was a co owner of JK Hikes in Berthoud Colorado.

I love hiking with Llamas and love the changes that happen when people have this experience.  I have watched a mother and teen age son who weren't getting along leaving with a new heart connection.  People celebrate birthdays.  Mothers and daughters sharing a special day.

On overnights there is nothing better then waking up to Llamas cushing spread out among the trees.

  Colorado is heaven on earth place to hike, add Llamas and a once in a lifetime experience is created.

In less then a year we had over a 400 person waiting list for a day hike.

Facebook took off with a 1,000 hits per day.

https://www.facebook.com/llamallamadingdonghikes

I have a current meet up waiting for me to plan hikes.  Colorado Hiking with Llamas.

New name is LLama Llama Ding Dong Hikes.

Lunch with a Llama ( 20 people , 10 llamas, @ $50 each = $1,000 )

Meet the Llama

Wedding and Team building.

I have a place to keep the Llamas and a truck and trailer.

 Need funds to purchase Llamas , saddles , harness, and Liability insurance.

Girl Scouts troops have asked for our help and many others.

Amazing to watch people have this experience. 

Even people not on our hike see us coming and want to take pictures.  A bucket list.

Please help me finish what I started.  Visit the The Facebook.

story:
BACK THIS PROJECT

Our Patented rotating buckle not only allows for easy transformation between backpack and duffle bag but also makes it one of the most comfortable bags on the market.

The buckles allow the shoulder and hip belts to move freely keeping the paq in the most ergonomic position as you walk.
 

 

Do you offer a warranty?
Yes. While we are a start up we will absolutely stand behind our product and offer a warranty on our bags.
Can I return my bag if I don't like it?
Unfortunately we can not accept returns on Indiegogo perks as this money allows us to go to our factory and order the initial run of Paq Bags.
How big is the Paq Bag?
The Paq Bag has a volume of 40L and measures 22in x 14in x 9in (56cm x 36cm x 23cm) which is the maximum carry on dimensions for most international airlines.
What size laptop will it carry?
The bag laptop sleeve can hold most 17in laptops with maximum dimensions of 16.8in x 13.10in.
The front tablet sleeve can carry a new 13" 2017 Apple MacBook Pro or most tablets with a screen size less than 13in.
Shipping Information
We are proud to offer free shipping in the USA and discounted International shipping. In the USA, shipping will be sent via ground by UPS, USPS, DHL or Fedex. For international shipping, your order may be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. Our prices do not include VAT, GST, or any of the other various duties and taxes. You will be responsible to pay these.

Paq bags was created by reinventing something that you didn't even know needed to be reinvented. We turned the simple buckle into a 360 degree rotating buckle and designed the perfect travel bag around these buckles.

Paq Bag founder, Matthew Jensen, created the buckle in 2011 and was granted a patent in 2015. Travel and backpack enthusiast Alex Howard joined the team to help design a travel bag that would be both functional and revolutionary. After creating the first round of prototypes, Alex set off on a month long journey to Peru to test the bag first hand. Since then, prototypes have traveled all over the world and with each new journey came new ideas to better the bags. They had designed the perfect travel bag, but something was still missing.

Tech guru and fellow traveler, Chase Bell, made the team complete and helped spread the word and launch the company. Countless hours have been spent by this group of travelers and entrepreneurs to bring you the perfect travel bag.

Now it's your turn to get a Paq and see the world.

We want to be completely transparent with you guys about our product and our campaign.

We have been working at this launch for multiple years now, and we are working with a major reliable factory in Vietnam to bring you the product at the highest quality and on time. We won't name names, but this factory works with some major brands and even has a track record of bringing other highly successful crowdfunded bag projects to market on time.

Unfortunately, in this world things can go wrong, but we are hoping they do not and it runs smoothly. The worst case for you as a backer is that there is a delay in you receiving your backer reward.

We have been, and will continue to do everything in our power to make sure everything is on time, but want to thank you in advance for being understanding if there is a delay.

Let's talk some specific hypotheticals:

If this campaign is tremendously successful (20,000+ backers), our factory has promised they can make as many bags as we need, but there may be issues. For instance, we could use up the stock of the shell material, and would have to wait for the textile factory to make more for us.

Another source of uncertainty is navigating shipping container, and import issues. We anticipate this will be straight forward, but it is not something we can handle ahead of time. Shipping companies don't like to talk to you until you have an actual shipment you need to make.

story:
AS FEATURED IN

   

Magazine Issue 131 June/July 2018

 

 

THUMB SAVER

 

LEVEL WIND SYSTEM


For Sport, Game, Deep Drop & Jig Fishing


Every now and then a new idea comes along and surprises even the most seasoned fisherman!

THUMB SAVER is designed and developed in Australia to assist the angler to lay line evenly onto a reel. Whether the line is Braid, Mono or your favorite wind on leader, the THUMB SAVER lays it level and even across the spool with "NO" Thumb, Finger, Hand or Skin contact!

The THUMB SAVER takes the pressure off the angler getting the perfect line lay on the reel every time with minimal effort during the fight or when clearing the lines!

With tested line-out speeds of over 30 knots the pivoting arm system reacts smoothly and effortlessly for all those Big Fish Blistering Runs!!

From Inshore Sport Fishing for Mackerel, Kingies and Coral Trout to offshore jigging for Doggies, Deep Drop fishing for Swords or Trolling for the Elusive Grander Marlin!

Any Inshore or Offshore Sport Fisherman will know the importance of getting an even line lay across a reel that doesn’t have a mechanical line guide. The THUMB SAVER will minimize the risk of losing that fish of a lifetime by laying your line level and even across the spool even under high adrenaline conditions!

Suited for the expert, weekend warrior, Charter Boat operator or simply any person getting started in the Sport Fishing game! When used correctly THUMB SAVER eliminates the risk of cuts, burn, and spool build up break-offs.

Charter Boat Operators please take note, you should be the most excited to have your clients using THUMB SAVER as this is the ideal safety product. With a few basic steps, simply attach the THUMB SAVER to your favorite rod and reel combination and enjoy stress free fishing!

Application: Suited for Conventional reels ranging in sizes from 20 to 80 Wide.

Suited for Rod Fore Grips ranging in sizes from 25 mm up to 50 mm in diameter.
 
Suited for Braid, Mono, Fluorocarbon, Dacron and Wind on Leaders ranging in sizes from 2 lb Light game through to 400+ lb Heavy Game

THUMB SAVERS unique 360 degree clamping system is designed to gently yet firmly grip and spread an even amount of pressure around the rod’s fore grip.

The THUMB SAVER Level Wind System is built to with stand whatever mother nature can throw at it!!


The KIT Includes:

The Pivoting Arm fitted to the Top Mounting Plate, Bottom Plate and two Quick Release Straps constructed from toughened high-grade Nylon.
It comes fitted with a maintenance free sealed Stainless-Steel Roller Bearing, One Fuji Heavy duty interchangeable rod tip guide, a Stainless-Steel Guide locking nut, and a set of how to instructions.

An ergonomically designed rest positions the anglers thumb comfortably with a natural fighting grip on the rod. A simple left and right motion of the arm and guide will direct line evenly across the spool!  To suit different anglers, simply release the straps, slide the THUMB SAVER to the desired forward or aft position, and re-tighten!

The THUMB SAVER is built to handle the corrosive outdoor environment. At the end of your fishing session simply rinse along with your normal rod and reel wash down routine!

The THUMB SAVER has a hole in the thumb rest to be used for stowing your rod and reel combo at the end of the day, providing a convenient place to hook or clip to under light tension.

The THUMB SAVER is developed in Australia as the brainchild of three Australian mates who live in Bendigo, Victoria, Australia. 

We only require orders for 250 units to get production started, so we'd love you to get on board!!

Simply attach the THUMB SAVER to your rod and enjoy stress free perfect line lay.

 
 

 

What you watched  is the precision engineered pre-production prototype  being tested.  Notice  how easy it is to lay the line on the spool perfectly without any hand or thumb contact using braid. It works fantastic. 

THUMB SAVER FITTED AND STOWED

Watch how the THUMB SAVER performs when the line runs out at high speed.

 

P

 

We are ready to go to production. To do this we need contributors to order a  small number of THUMB SAVERS in advance using our perks, 

What We Need & What You Get

We need USD$25000 or approximately 250 Fishermen to order a THUMB SAVER using our EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - SAVE 20%  Perk

This will be used to produce the precision  tooling, manufacture, assembly and fulfillment of 250 units. Order our EARLY BIRD SPECIAL and be one of the first in the world using the THUMB SAVER.

The Impact

Thumb Saver will minimize the chances of losing that big fish as it will enable you to lay your  line perfectly and easily under high adrenaline  conditions without injuring your thumb. This is a must for any Sports or  Game Fisherman. Its also ideal for Charter Boat Operators dealing with novice  Fishermen. No more burns or cuts.  Its the ideal safety product for anyone using Braid line.

 

We would love you to HELP US reach our goal.

Spread the word to all your friends and family. Its also an excellent gift idea.  If you know anyone that loves fishing or runs a fishing charter let them know. 

Use the Indiegogo share tools! Share our Facebook,Twitter and YouTube links  with your followers.

 

And ......

if your interested in making some extra money check out this generous reward program.

 

 Tell your friends and family about our  THUMB SAVER Indiegogo page and if they order a THUMB SAVER  - you get  10% of tracked amount with no limits!.

 The question is how?

Step 1. Start the referral by logging in! If you don’t have an account they take  2 minutes to set up and they are FREE!  Create an account by signing up here.

Step 2. On the campaign page, below the ‘Funds Raised’ Bar there are sharing buttons, the  one on the right hand side that looks like this  gives you a unique link.

Step 3. This link is personal to you, share it everywhere and for everyone who uses your link and goes on to back a perk, results in a successful referral!

A successful referral gets you  10% on each perk  ordered and fulfilled.  No limits!!.  Share and send your unique link to your friends. When they back us on Indiegogo through your unique link, you receive cash back.

For more details on how to refer: Click here.

 

Who are We?

Three Aussie blokes who got  together in Bendigo, Victoria, Australia to develop and bring to market the  THUMB SAVER -  Level Wind System

Andy Wallace- Fisherman and inventor. Otherwise known as "The Oracle".

Brad Day - Pro Fishermen and fellow inventor with a  really nice boat; 

Dino Appla - Retired  Rocket Scientist, and co-inventor.

 

And we teamed up with  Mike Burke, JAMB Systems Pty Ltd  - our Industrial Designer and Manufacturer to develop the THUMB SAVER.

 

Technical Details

What will the Production version of THUMB SAVER look like?

Exactly  the same as the pre-production prototype that was fully tested and viewed in our video's but will include some minor improvements not noticeable.

What will THUMB SAVER be made of?

The Thumb Saver will be constructed from durable nylon materials and stainless steel components specially selected for harsh outdoor environments. It features a highly responsive sealed ball bearing unit selected for minimal possible friction and greatest possible feel on the line to maintain your angling experience. A super tough interchangeable heavy duty Fuji Guide is supplied to protect the line and avoid wear or damage.

WHO'S MANUFACTURING?

We are. Our team mate Mike Burke from Jamb Design Solutions is appointed to design and manufacture all tooling and equipment necessary for us to fulfill all orders of the THUMB SAVER.

 THUMB SAVER is Australian Invented, Designed and Made

 

Risks and Challenges

Risk

Virtually none. We have successfully produced and  fully tested the  pre-production prototype. as seen in the earlier videos. Before we designed and  built the pre-production version,  we built a proof of concept prototype so we could thoroughly test the concept . We know it works; simple as that. Watch the video.

Manufacturing THUMB SAVER is a no brainer. All tooling and manufacturing costs have been fully quoted.  We are ready to go!

Here's an image of the first assembled pre-production prototype when it was first made and assembled.

Challenges

In the case for our straps design, the compounds available for 3D machining required for prototyping them, meant the material was harder or stiffer than we intended in our design.  

Even though they worked,  they were harder to tighten up or loosen. In our manufactured version, we will be using a softer more durable material.  So we have resolved to allow time for fine tuning in the tooling phase of our project to make them work. Based on our design, we know it can be done because its been done before.  Worst case scenario is that we supply off-the shelf straps that will do the job.

That's why we have asked you to allow us up to 3-4 months shipping from the end of our campaign to allow us sufficient time to make the tooling and fine tune the dies to final production quality, before we can place our first production order and then ship direct to you.

Please be patient, we will keep you informed regularly as we progress from when we start making the  tooling, right through to our first production order.

 

AS FEATURED IN

   

BlueWater Boats & Sportfishing magazine Issue 131 June/July 2018

AND...for those who are wondering if THUMB SAVER is IGFA legal, here is  an opinion from Tim SImpson, Editor / Publisher of BlueWater Magazine;Trustee of the Billfish Foundation (TBF) and Representative of The International Game Fish Association (IGFA)

Follow us on

Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/thumb.saver.enterprises

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/thumbsaver

YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZhqfWST3eSer2...

THUMB SAVER FITTED AND STOWED



Watch how the THUMB SAVER performs when the line runs out at high speed.

 

P
 
We are ready to go to production. To do this we need contributors to order a  small number of THUMB SAVERS in advance using our perks, 

What We Need & What You Get
We need USD$25000 or approximately 250 Fishermen to order a THUMB SAVER using our EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - SAVE 20%  Perk

This will be used to produce the precision  tooling, manufacture, assembly and fulfillment of 250 units. Order our EARLY BIRD SPECIAL and be one of the first in the world using the THUMB SAVER.
The Impact
Thumb Saver will minimize the chances of losing that big fish as it will enable you to lay your  line perfectly and easily under high adrenaline  conditions without injuring your thumb. This is a must for any Sports or  Game Fisherman. Its also ideal for Charter Boat Operators dealing with novice  Fishermen. No more burns or cuts.  Its the ideal safety product for anyone using Braid line.
 

We would love you to HELP US reach our goal.
Spread the word to all your friends and family. Its also an excellent gift idea.  If you know anyone that loves fishing or runs a fishing charter let them know. 


Use the Indiegogo share tools! Share our Facebook,Twitter and YouTube links  with your followers.

 
And ......
if your interested in making some extra money check out this generous reward program.

 

 Tell your friends and family about our  THUMB SAVER Indiegogo page and if they order a THUMB SAVER  - you get  10% of tracked amount with no limits!.
 The question is how?
Step 1. Start the referral by logging in! If you don’t have an account they take  2 minutes to set up and they are FREE!  Create an account by signing up here.
Step 2. On the campaign page, below the ‘Funds Raised’ Bar there are sharing buttons, the  one on the right hand side that looks like this  gives you a unique link.

Step 3. This link is personal to you, share it everywhere and for everyone who uses your link and goes on to back a perk, results in a successful referral!
A successful referral gets you  10% on each perk  ordered and fulfilled.  No limits!!.  Share and send your unique link to your friends. When they back us on Indiegogo through your unique link, you receive cash back.
For more details on how to refer: Click here.
 
Who are We?

Three Aussie blokes who got  together in Bendigo, Victoria, Australia to develop and bring to market the  THUMB SAVER -  Level Wind System

Andy Wallace- Fisherman and inventor. Otherwise known as "The Oracle".
Brad Day - Pro Fishermen and fellow inventor with a  really nice boat; 
Dino Appla - Retired  Rocket Scientist, and co-inventor.
 

And we teamed up with  Mike Burke, JAMB Systems Pty Ltd  - our Industrial Designer and Manufacturer to develop the THUMB SAVER.

 
Technical Details
What will the Production version of THUMB SAVER look like?
Exactly  the same as the pre-production prototype that was fully tested and viewed in our video's but will include some minor improvements not noticeable.
What will THUMB SAVER be made of?
The Thumb Saver will be constructed from durable nylon materials and stainless steel components specially selected for harsh outdoor environments. It features a highly responsive sealed ball bearing unit selected for minimal possible friction and greatest possible feel on the line to maintain your angling experience. A super tough interchangeable heavy duty Fuji Guide is supplied to protect the line and avoid wear or damage.

WHO'S MANUFACTURING?
We are. Our team mate Mike Burke from Jamb Design Solutions is appointed to design and manufacture all tooling and equipment necessary for us to fulfill all orders of the THUMB SAVER.
 THUMB SAVER is Australian Invented, Designed and Made

 
Risks and Challenges
Risk
Virtually none. We have successfully produced and  fully tested the  pre-production prototype. as seen in the earlier videos. Before we designed and  built the pre-production version,  we built a proof of concept prototype so we could thoroughly test the concept . We know it works; simple as that. Watch the video.

Manufacturing THUMB SAVER is a no brainer. All tooling and manufacturing costs have been fully quoted.  We are ready to go!
Here's an image of the first assembled pre-production prototype when it was first made and assembled.

Challenges
In the case for our straps design, the compounds available for 3D machining required for prototyping them, meant the material was harder or stiffer than we intended in our design.  

Even though they worked,  they were harder to tighten up or loosen. In our manufactured version, we will be using a softer more durable material.  So we have resolved to allow time for fine tuning in the tooling phase of our project to make them work. Based on our design, we know it can be done because its been done before.  Worst case scenario is that we supply off-the shelf straps that will do the job.
That's why we have asked you to allow us up to 3-4 months shipping from the end of our campaign to allow us sufficient time to make the tooling and fine tune the dies to final production quality, before we can place our first production order and then ship direct to you.
Please be patient, we will keep you informed regularly as we progress from when we start making the  tooling, right through to our first production order.
 

AS FEATURED IN
    
BlueWater Boats & Sportfishing magazine Issue 131 June/July 2018

AND...for those who are wondering if THUMB SAVER is IGFA legal, here is  an opinion from Tim SImpson, Editor / Publisher of BlueWater Magazine;Trustee of the Billfish Foundation (TBF) and Representative of The International Game Fish Association (IGFA)

Follow us on
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/thumb.saver.enterprises
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/thumbsaver
YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZhqfWST3eSer2...

story:
Introduction

I am Peter Bengyel, one of the owners and founders of SOS Infocard. Like other start-up companies we consider turning to the bigger markets important and essential. We won a health care innovational award in 2015 (with the support of Sanofi) and we managed to obtain a smaller financial resource as well in 2017. We are looking for our future partners who would join us in Europe and in the global markets as distributors. As well we would like to find business partners - let them be risk investors or angels - who recognize the opportunity in our project and could provide the necessary financial background to our appearance in the market. We have just submitted a tender called H2020 to the European Union and we have been waiting for the result with high hopes. At the moment, we are working on the ux design of the platform which will presumably debut in February 2018.

The system developed by our team can be easily introduced, it is user-friendly and its usefulness can be justified already in the shortrun. Our company has been developing the SosInfocard system for 3 years, which is a global, online, medical document handling system with an emergency card. We won the most innovative healthcare technologies development ofthe year award in 2015 and our contractual partner is the Hungarian rightsholder of the Hungarian Commercialhouse Inc. and the ISIC Interational student ID network that works under the trademark of UNESCO. Our current testusers are mainly organizations or private individuals who recognize the importance of security, healthawareness and personal care and who have already experienced that S.O.S. Infocard provides solution to numerous problems in practice as well.

The essence of the key concept is that in case of a possible accident the personal data(including a person to call in case of emergency) and the medical data (e.g. illness, allergy,intolerance, medicines, blood type,etc.) of the person involved can be read immediately from a personal emergency card (which is a bank card-sized plastic card ) ( No personal document or ID contain these data and children do not have these kind of documents yet)

Everyone has a personal account in our online system, where medical documents can be stored , e.g. medical evidence, final medical report, measurable medical data (blood pressure,blood sugar, weight, height, etc. ) as well as other documents determined by the user or other person with given permission.

story:
The Backpack

The Hybrid backpack has left the backwoods and set its sights on the big city. Geared towards urban dwellers, the bags hard shell protects your valuables from roving packs of street toughs, and helps maintain a slim profile, making it easy to slip through ever-pushy crowds. Zippered pockets and pouches help you stay organized and (relatively) sane.

Features

  • hard shell constructed in ABS plastic, the same material used on motorcycle helmets.
  • padded computer and tablet pouch  
  • ventilated padding that conforms to your back
  • zippered side pocket for smartphone / music player
  • protective rain cover
  • dimensions: 16" x 12" x 6"
  • weight: 3 pounds

story:
Featured In

 

INTRODUCING

 

DPCVR EDC Starter Pack

 

DPCVR at a Glance

 

The Best Gear Is Kind You Have With You

Whether you're going to class, into a board meeting, or relaxing at your favorite coffee shop. DPCVR works with the bag you use everyday and adds an impressive layer of functionality with minimal impact to your daily routine.

 

Easily Fits Into Most Bags

 

Low-Vis? How about NO-VIS?

 

Background

The concept for Deep Cover (DPCVR) came about close to two years ago while trying to figure out a good way to conceal and carry off-body. Carrying on-body is no-doubt the preferred choice when prudent and possible, but not every scenario and environment is going to lend itself to On-Body CCW.

We started looking and found the market to be laden with bags made specifically for the Off-Body Carry of a firearm. The strong majority of these bags are very tactical in nature and project the fact that the wearer is carrying a firearm. The intent of carrying concealed is to remain as low-profile as possible... using a bag the broadcasts it’s contents seems rather counter-productive to that effort.

Granted, some of those bags are very well designed and look great. However, it's a single bag and asking it to work in every environment and every situation is a tall order and it simply can't do it all. The choices are vast, but the good options are limited.

    The requirement to switch from one bag to another on a daily basis and even throughout the day at times is very real. Expecting one bag that’s equipped for off-body carry to fit in to each scenario is just unrealistic.

    Instead of trying to make one bag to rule them all, we thought, “How about we keep the bag and make something to work WITH IT.” 

    The spark had ignited the fire and it was time to move.

    We set some goals for the product:

    • It had to work with any bag.
    • Allow immediate access to a firearm or other contents of the product.
    • Conceal the contents of the product even when the bag is open.
    • Be easily switched from one bag to the next.

    This is when we decided to focus our efforts on a common feature between most bags, the laptop compartment. Designing for this area alone allowed us to focus on making Deep Cover as versatile as possible, able to work with numerous bags and with as many accessories as could be thrown at it. All the while maintaining the ability to quickly access anything stored inside.

    Whether you want your items to sit a little lower or a little higher, further forward or further back, maybe you're a lefty or righty, it doesn’t matter. We made DPCVR to fit YOU. We designed it to meet YOUR needs, to work with YOUR bags, and fit seamlessly into YOUR lifestyle.

       

      Features

       

      Faux Front Pocket for Quick-Access

       

      Ultra-Concealed

       

      Quick Access with nearly any bag.

       

      Fully Customizable

       

      Even Works with Velcro Accessories

       

      Use Your Own Bag

       

       

      Specifications

      Weight is important and we didn't want Deep Cover to add any unnecessary bulk to your bag. So, we chose lightweight materials and minimized weight of the accessories to bring the combined weight of the DPCVR EDC Starter Pack in under 700 grams.

      The Frame is strong and durable, made of a Polycarbonate/ABS blend. It provides mounting locations for your MOLLE gear and helps DPCVR act as it's own compartment within your bag.

      The Sleeve conceals the frame and everything attached to it. It has a faux-front pocket that allows immediate access to what's inside as well as a zippered top when you need to swap out accessories. The interior is lined with microfiber and the exterior shell is durable while not being abrasive. It won't hurt any electronics stored beside it. aka Your Laptop is Safe.

      The Large EDC Pouch is great for loose items and bulkier ones. It has exterior loops and a divided interior compartment to help organize your gear and keep everything tidy.

      The Single Tool Pouch is good for a spare magazine, a tourniquet, a flashlight, pepper spray, or multi-tool. It has an elastic band that grabs the item and keeps it in place.

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      What's Next For MIDRAT?

      With DPCVR laying the foundation and the solid backing of a community interested in what we do, we plan to invest heavily in developing more products like this. This includes establishing a base of operations, hiring people who share our passion, and investing in tools and equipment to condense prototyping and testing timelines.

      We plan to grow the DPCVR ecosystem, by continuing to develop and offer accessories that provide an array of capabilities to help you make DPCVR as custom tailored to your needs as possible.

      What other accessories would you like to see? Let us know in the comments!

       

      Shipping Information

      Orders placed now will begin shipping in April 2019. Actual ship dates may vary. Worldwide shipping fees exclude GST, VAT, equivalent taxes and customs duties. GST and VAT, if any, will be collected from backers at the time of delivery.

       

      Questions?

      If you have any questions feel free to leave us a comment or email us at dpcvr@midrat.co.

      We'll be happy to do what we can to help out!


      Partnerships

      Interested in a distribution partnership? Contact us at dpcvr@midrat.co

story:
La diversité d’une équipe de co-fondateur

La rencontre des expériences métiers au profit d’un modèle vraiment à part.

Paravecmoi c’est l’association d’un pro du marketing, d’un expert reconnu du voyage et d’un développeur fou et brillant.

La réussite d’un projet tient d’abord à la vision au modèle économique mais surtout à la qualité de l’équipe et à la complémentarité des talents, c’est ça Paravecmoi : Michel, Michel Yves, Anthony et Hephais

Paravecmoi est plus qu’une simple intermédiation entre voyageurs solo, nous considérons que le voyage qui est déjà le premier poste de vente sur le web, constituera demain la principale source d’expérience de vie et d’épanouissement individuel. 

En contribuant à notre projet vous pouvez participer avec nous à la révolution de l’expérience voyageur. Il n’est jamais devenue aussi simple de voyager et cela le sera plus encore, il n’est jamais devenu aussi simple d’être photographe et cela le sera plus encore mais rencontrer le co-voyageur idéal n’est pas toujours évident. Paravecmoi a l’ambition de se positionner à la confluence des désirs des voyageurs. En proposant de nouveaux usages, tout en rassurant et en améliorant l’estime de soi. Paravecmoi s’inscrit dans un cercle vertueux, celui du partage, le partage du voyage et le partage de l’expérience de voyage. Paravecmoi rends les gens plus heureux et change leur vie en leur permettant de partager leurs émotions « in real life » et « full web »
 

Nous avons besoins de 50 000 euros (voir plus)


Cette somme a pour but de nous faire connaître encore plus et d’augmenter le nombre de nos inscrits.

L’acquisition de notoriété est un parcours qui demande du temps, de l’organisation et de moyens financiers (paiement des campagnes, acquisition d’espace, organisation d’événements)

Avec cette somme nous avons l’intention de recruter de jeunes stagiaires en tourisme et évènementiel passionné (e) s par notre projet. Nous ne pouvons pas réussir sans avoir avec nous le cœur et les esprits de nos jeunes générations. Paravecmoi est un projet pour vous et par vous. 

Paravecmoi à l’intention de développer des voyages à thèmes autour du sport et de la rencontre. Nous utiliserons également cet argent pour produire des voyages inédits.

Créer, animer et faire connaître, voici ce à quoi vous contribuerez si vous rejoignez l’aventure.

Si nous n’atteignons pas l’objectif, les fonds nous permettrons de recruter en priorité des passionnés souhaitant nous rejoindre.

 

Paravecmoi a obtenu le grand prix du produit de l’année au salon international du
tourisme de Rennes, finaliste du concours Créacc, Paravecmoi est accompagné par
initiative Bretagne et labélisé BPI French Tech


A l'issue du premier trimestre 2017, les sites leaders du tourisme ont enregistré une
augmentation des ventes inégalée depuis quelques années.
Il y a fort longtemps que l'e-tourisme n'a enregistré de telles performances. Selon les
données publiées ce jour par la Fédération de l'e-commerce et de la vente à distance
(Fevad), au 1er trimestre 2017, les ventes des sites leaders du voyage ont bondi de 14%.
Une forte croissance, donc, qui s'inscrit dans un marché de la distribution de voyages
porteur (+7%, selon le baromètre des Entreprises du Voyage).

 

Paravecmoi à déjà inscrit plus de 4500 voyageurs , et augmente de 20% par mois son
Traffic sur le web. Nous avons déjà reçu plus de 5000 photos de voyageurs sur notre page
Facebook.


Risques & Défis


C’est avant tout notre expertise croisée dans tous les domaines du marketing, au
développement et au tourisme qui nous permettra de réussir notre pari et de faire de
paravecmoi une réussite, votre réussite.
C’est souvent le manque de compétences en interne qui oblige les startup à externaliser et
souffrir d’une dépendance en production, ce n’est pas notre cas
Le bonheur ne vaut que s’il est partagé, pour le voyage c’est la même chose, s’extasier seul
devant la beauté du monde est terriblement frustrant.
Si vous faites le bilan, les plus belles relations naissent dans le partage des moments
intenses.

 

Si vous ne pouvez pas nous aider financièrement,


Vous pouvez en revanche, vous inscrire gratuitement sur paravecmoi.fr, parler de notre initiative autour de vous, acheter un voyage au prix, nous envoyer vos photos de voyage ou encore partager notre page sur les réseaux sociaux. Chaque nouvel inscrit, chaque partage, tire notre concept vers le haut, et si vous y croyez, il n'y a aucune raison que votre entourage ne le fasse pas. Alors un grand, profond et sincère MERCI !

Selon lesdonnées publiées ce jour par la Fédération de l'e-commerce et de la vente à distance(Fevad), au 1er trimestre 2017, les ventes des sites leaders du voyage ont bondi de 14%.Une forte croissance, donc, qui s'inscrit dans un marché de la distribution de voyagesporteur (+7%, selon le baromètre des Entreprises du Voyage). Paravecmoi à déjà inscrit plus de 4500 voyageurs , et augmente de 20% par mois sonTraffic sur le web. Nous avons déjà reçu plus de 5000 photos de voyageurs sur notre pageFacebook.
Risques & DéfisC’est avant tout notre expertise croisée dans tous les domaines du marketing, audéveloppement et au tourisme qui nous permettra de réussir notre pari et de faire deparavecmoi une réussite, votre réussite.C’est souvent le manque de compétences en interne qui oblige les startup à externaliser etsouffrir d’une dépendance en production, ce n’est pas notre casLe bonheur ne vaut que s’il est partagé, pour le voyage c’est la même chose, s’extasier seuldevant la beauté du monde est terriblement frustrant.Si vous faites le bilan, les plus belles relations naissent dans le partage des momentsintenses. Si vous ne pouvez pas nous aider financièrement,Vous pouvez en revanche, vous inscrire gratuitement sur paravecmoi.fr, parler de notre initiative autour de vous, acheter un voyage au prix, nous envoyer vos photos de voyage ou encore partager notre page sur les réseaux sociaux. Chaque nouvel inscrit, chaque partage, tire notre concept vers le haut, et si vous y croyez, il n'y a aucune raison que votre entourage ne le fasse pas. Alors un grand, profond et sincère MERCI !

story:
Hello!  The GoGo Guide team is made up of Americans and Russians who have taken part in international exchange programs as language partners, tutors, and/or students.  We care passionately about cross-cultural communication and helping different people get along through mutual understanding.  Language and cultural knowledge are key to understanding people from other cultures, so we have created GoGo Guide to help people learn and connect with each other and improve their linguistic and cultural skills. 

We want to help tourists and foreign students make meaningful connections within their host cultures.  We want to help interested locals meet foreigners in their cities.  We want to encourage cultural exchange and help people to competently speak foreign languages. 

The GoGo Guide App will involve an interactive map, which users can use to find friends, language partners, tutors, guides, and professional language teachers in their city.  Users can create or join groups, earn money by helping or tutoring others, and learn about or organize local events.  The main goal of the app is face-to-face interaction between users.  Users can find others who can help them improve their language skills in a variety of languages, or just find someone who can help them find their way around an unfamiliar city or country.  The goal is not only the improvement of language skills, but also the development of cross-cultural friendships. 

The goal of this funding campaign is to fund the programming and development costs for the creation of the GoGo Guide App.  We have already identified a team of ready programmers.   Once we reach our funding goal, we expect to have our App launched within three months! 

We have identified our funding costs as $15,000, which will pay our team of programmers for their time developing the GoGo Guide platform.  The idea and the plan for GoGo Guide are ready to go.  We want to develop the app as quickly as possible and launch our app within three months after our funding campaign.  If we do not reach our goal, the funding will still go toward the programming costs of the app, but the development of the app will be slower as we continue to raise funds. 

If you contribute to our campaign, we will give you two main perks.  First, you will have access to an advertisement-free version of GoGo Guide for life.  And second, you will be able to earn money with GoGo Guide as a guide or tutor without paying any commission to GoGo Guide. 

Even if you can’t contribute, please tell other people about our project!  The app will start in major cities, but we hope to expand to college towns and tourist destinations throughout the world.  Please spread the word about GoGo Guide at your university, to your friends, and to multicultural organizations in your city! 

Help us promote international friendship and understanding today!

story:
Read about the MS5 on EverydayCarry.com:

To address the unexpected nature of everyday life, we've created a stylish EDC kit that can be taken anywhere and includes important tools, like a USB charger or GPS tracker, water filter, knife, gas burner, tinder, paracord, and more, so that you can survive even the worst situations.

 

Made from the highest quality materials, this EDC (Everyday Carry)/Camping essentials kit contains items and features that can help save your life if you find yourself lost, separated, or in a desperate situation away from society, all within a minimal sized with a wooden box that can even be used as tinder. Everything fits into your choice of metallic blue, leather, or carbon fiber finish container, and can include (some features/items are optional), a USB charger or GPS tracker, a water filter, a knife, fishing tackle including hooks, floats, line, and a sinker, a magnesium stick, a USB drive to store important documents, sewing needles and safety pins, an arrowhead that can be used to make a spear, hexagon heads, a wire saw, 30 feet of 550 paracord, and more, including the supplemental folding grill in some kits. The EDC is incredibly small and can fit in your pocket and act as a phone holder for your table, car, or anywhere you go. If you are an outdoor enthusiast who enjoys activities like Camping , Hiking, Hunting, Fishing, You should remember the importance of survival preparation and You will love your new MS5.

 

Folding Grill:

 

More photos and information on our website: www.MotionGrade.com
