story:
Introducing STÆTION

STÆTION (STAETION) is exclusively designed as a piece of docking furniture with the following features:

  • Multiple Docking Station (Wireless or Cable Charging of your Smartphone, Smartwatch - especially Apple Watch, Power Bank, Trackers & more) - DOCKING VIDEO LINK - 00:27

  • Double Holder for Watching Movies (Landscape Mode for Smartphone & Tablet) - MOVIE VIDEO LINK - 00:32

  • Ambient Smart LED Light (On/Off, Dimming Effect, Multi Color Ambient) - LED VIDEO LINK - 00:17


       



  • Fully Portable (able to charge multiple devices wherever you are thanks to the integrated Power Bank)


        


Meet STÆTION

Today everyone wants to use the newest technology designed for staying connected with family and friends, watching the latest movies and using multiple apps in our everyday lives. For this purpose we are using our smartphones, smartwatches, trackers and other smart devices. All of these accessories need to be charged almost every day.

However with necessary charging our living space is losing harmony, clarity and other aesthetic aspects. With this in mind STÆTION was created to be a fully multi-functional Docking Station with a strong focus on exclusive design.

If you wish to have a rest, you can simply close your STÆTION and enjoy the moment in a nice relaxed atmosphere...

...whenever you wish, you can Watch Movies in landscape mode position and have a full access to your devices during charging time.

For your comfort we also integrated a Smart LED Ambient Light into the STÆTION as a possible replacement of your traditional desk lamp.



With the dimming effect you can select the light intensity to suit your moods...

...and the LED multicolor function helps you to arrange the desired atmosphere for every moment.

Additionally, in the watching mode position you can simply change the STÆTION to be your desk clock or alarm clock using the different kinds of already existing applications (e.g. Dock Clock for Android, Rise & Shine for iOS). 

EASY Grip & Stability

Thanks to the integrated EASY Grip system you have quick and easy access to your smartphone. Additionally a gap between back of your smartphone and the dock bottom part allows you to put your fingers slightly under your phone.

The Micro-Suction Cup Technology holds your phone and the whole STÆTION secure.



Docking Everywhere

Thanks to the compact design and the integrated massive Power Bank with 10.000 mAh you can use all of the STÆTION features everywhere.


Store Everything

Down storage space of your STÆTION is primary  constructed for charging  smartphones.

However you choose those mobile devices you want to store or charge in the upper storage space (for specifications please see the chapters below).

Alternatively you can store also your jewelry and mechanical watches in the upper storage space if you wish.



STÆTION Materials

On the way from the idea to the first functional prototype many different natural materials have been approved in order to meet the design and construction requirements.


Finally we chose Aluminium as a native environmentally friendly material because of its stability and excellent optical properties in brushed surface form. We also chose Wood as a very light construction material with great properties and with its peaceful and soothing effect without compromising its durability. Wood as a surface material also presents its organic natural beauty.

                         

For creating STÆTION we use only certified wood (FSC and PEFC) from sustainable forestry and STÆTION is originally designed and handmade in Austria, Europe.

All another materials (e.g. LED lights, electric cables, switcher, power bank etc.) are certified to meet all necessary regulation.

STÆTION Specifications

STÆTION was designed to fit neatly and elegantly in your everyday life from work spaces to your home. The minimalistic pure shape and the high position of the double storage space allow you to store additional stuff i.e. books under your STÆTION.

                           

Storage space dimensions for the top case are 7,2 in (184 mm ), 4,1 in (105 mm) and 1,6 in (43 mm) - without Apple Watch Docking part.

Schematic presentation of STÆTION with different features and example mobile devices are shown in the following figure.

1 - Tablet; 2 - Tablet charging cable; 3 - Cover of the storage space; 4 - Apple watch; 5 - Apple watch docking cable; 6 - Power bank; 7 - Tracker or fitness band; 8 - Docking station for apple watch; 9 - STÆTION body; 10 - Aluminium design strip; 11 - Apple iPhone 6 Plus; 12 - Alternative charging cable for your smartphone; 13 - Power Battery Bank; 14 - Main charging cable; 15 - Smartphone docking station bed; 16 - Switchers for LED light; 17 - Wireless charger; 18 - Cover of the down storage space; 19 - LED light; 20 - STÆTION aluminium pod

The big advantage of the STÆTION is the easy way to replace the standard USB charging cables in case you buy a new smartphone or if you need some special connectors.


Smartphones Compatibility

Basically the STÆTION is designed to be used with every smartphone from any producer.

       


Wireless charging of your smartphone (Qi Standard) is already integrated (STÆTION Freak Edition and STÆTION Power Edition). However, if your smartphone does not support the wireless charging you can use also your original charging cable instead.


In the figure below you can see the integrated function of wireless charging (left) as well the alternative cable charging (right). There is opportunity to disconnect the wireless charging function if you wish.


So, the only one limitation for your smartphone is the space inside of the down part of the STÆTION.

      

However, as you can see at the following pictures there is also enough space for the biggest smartphones (inclusive iPhone 6 Plus).

     


STÆTION Editions

Depending on your needs you can choose from three STÆTION editions with different configurations.


In the STÆTION Start Edition you are using your own charging cables (dashed black line in the figure). STÆTION Freak Edition and the STÆTION Power Edition (as well as the STÆTION Power Early Bird) will be delivered with 2 integrated USB charging connectors (high-speed and standard speed) for your devices.

From Idea to Prototype

At the beginning there was an idea to store our smartphones and all accessories in one simple box. Then we thought about it: "Wouldn’t it be great to watch the videos at the same time?" "And how about the wireless charging?" "Let's make it more beautiful." "I wish I could have a light." "I want to take it with me!" etc. In last few months all of these ideas and some more have been integrated into the final design presented in this campaign. Here are some of the pictures, we have made down the road to the first working STÆTION prototype.


Choose Your STÆTION

We have created STÆTION to be fully functional docking station in exclusive design. Please choose your favorite STÆTION according to your needs.





Every version is combined with brushed aluminium pad and horizontal aluminium strip in the middle of the double storage space.

Interior Design

For the STÆTION Start Edition and STÆTION Freak Edition you can choose from three different interior decorations - absorbing black, semi gray, and deep purple.


For the STÆTION Power Early Bird and STÆTION Power Edition there are also three interior variations offered - deep purple, semi gray and light gold yellow.

Shipping


Timeline


                 


Perks


Team

Matus started his career at the Department for Design and Furniture Constructions at the Technical University in Zvolen, Slovakia. After his second PhD-Study at the ETH in Zurich, Switzerland he is owner and CTO of Dascanova GmbH in Vienna, Austria.

Tomas is an expert in the woodworking industry and he managed and coordinated research & development in three departments of companies in Austria for 10 years. Together with Matus they started the first Indiegogo Campaign with a CleKee Project in 2014.

Many thanks go to our big group of supporters: Micha, Eliska, Alejandro, Ulrich, Tomas, Lenka, Balint, Clemens, Hajni, Janka, David, Miro, Palo, Mari, Shotty, Sophia, Kubci, Anny, Orsi, Judit, Balaz, Betti & Balaz, Claudia & Helmut.


BIG THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT

Thank you for your interest and your support of this project. Every STÆTION as original handmade product in this campaign will be delivered with the production number, production date and with Certificate of Authenticity.

story:
My brother and I (Joe and Matt) the owners of our Surfboard Surf Shop. Surfing has been our passion since We were little boy. My brother and I both joined the Navy and served 20 years. We are both disabled Veterans but we don’t let that slow us down. 
We started building surfboards because we love surfing, the ocean, the waves, and the community. We have so much experience from our Military careers that we decided to go at it on our own. 
We have ran a successful business for 5 years in the state the Navy dropped us both off ( Virginia) after consulting our families we thought it best to get closer to family and we moved the business. 
This move was tough on us, our families, and our businesses of course. We lost a few big ticket items in the move that have set us back a little. We also are owed a large sum by a surf shop that should go out of business and it seems recouping those funds will either take a long time or not at all. Not getting paid for product you made is tough to swallow. 
We are resilient and are working hard to recoupe these losses. We have so many exciting and new plans for us to engage in our community. Such as, Surf for Autism, surf for the cure, we also repair used boards and give back to unfortunate children who want to learn to surf, or we give the boards to the Disabled Veterans Surf club so they can take veterans with all sort of ailments surfing.  

What We Need & What You Get

We have set a realistic goal of raising 130,000.00 to move our company forward and open the surf Shop by spring  

     We will use the funds if received to rebuild our sign, repair our displays, lighting, paint, and a required changing room. Also, fill our Apparel racks with our branded items 

       Last, my brother and I are honest hard working  guys that spend everyday to see this dream come true, it’s hard for us to ask but we just need a little push. We though that people who have been where we are before might be kind enough to help through purchasing our product. 
 

what do you get, we will discount our shirts and make surfboards in exchange for your contribution  

What impact will your contribution have? 

Our new building is in the middle of a thriving surf community we help young kids with finiding ways to stay busy and out of trouble. We do internships for the High school to help our local kids in the schools Job program. We teach them business skill and hand skills, also we discuss how important continuing education is. We additionally work internships with the College Intern Program of Florida to help kids understand business prior to entering the work force  

  • Our reduce, reuse, reclaim program bring in surfboards that people don’t want or don’t need anymore and we rebuild them and donate to causes so that we can do our part to keep these old boards out of landfills and into young peoples hands. 
  • We also build boards for other business aiding them in product to sale. .
  • We plan to employ wonderful young adults to work in the Surf Shop and give surfing lessons, this is great for them to have summer jobs, and work and learn from two hard working passionate retired Chief Petty Officers USN who can offer guidance on business and the required work ethics in today’s society. 

What are we up against? 

We are lacking the funds to continue to build out our spaces and to provide our town with an honest quality service. We never thought that  at the end of a good 5 year run while working both at the Navy and shop full time for 3 years that we would be in a position to need a nudge. If we were to receive assistance we would be able to generate more income and pull right out of this and into profit. The other side to this is if we do not reach our goal we will use any funds to keep moving forward and will donate a portion to the Disabled Veterans of America.

  • The fact that we have been in business for 5 years shows that we are capable and talented business men in our field. We have a large coastal clientele that would love for us to be around to help keep building their futures also. 
  • With the funds requested we will ensure that equipment is replaced, materials purchased, branded sale items purchased as we’ve seen before these item get returns. We intend to keep leaning forward no matter the outcome. We have strong work ethics, good moral code, and the will to be sure we do not get here again. ( we will start by not moving again) 
  • our lesson learned. Moving a business is much more than changing building and bringing you stuff to it. It require capital and attention to detail. Now we know. Additionally, we learned a valuable lesson on payment as a posed to consignment. We will get paid on future purchases from Surf Shops.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you contribute, no worries, we are still extremely grateful and only ask If you know anyone that would be willing to help a couple of young retired veterans trying to stay afloat then we ask you to please pass the word , use the indiegogo share tool ! 
 

Last, I want to say what an amazing tool for people to use no matter their outcome. To be able to ask someone for funds but offer a product in return to help yourself is amazing. 
 

Thank you from Joe and I your kind support is of significant value to us. 
Thank you
story_txt:
My brother and I (Joe and Matt) the owners of our Surfboard Surf Shop. Surfing has been our passion since We were little boy. My brother and I both joined the Navy and served 20 years. We are both disabled Veterans but we don’t let that slow us down. We started building surfboards because we love surfing, the ocean, the waves, and the community. We have so much experience from our Military careers that we decided to go at it on our own. We have ran a successful business for 5 years in the state the Navy dropped us both off ( Virginia) after consulting our families we thought it best to get closer to family and we moved the business. This move was tough on us, our families, and our businesses of course. We lost a few big ticket items in the move that have set us back a little. We also are owed a large sum by a surf shop that should go out of business and it seems recouping those funds will either take a long time or not at all. Not getting paid for product you made is tough to swallow. We are resilient and are working hard to recoupe these losses. We have so many exciting and new plans for us to engage in our community. Such as, Surf for Autism, surf for the cure, we also repair used boards and give back to unfortunate children who want to learn to surf, or we give the boards to the Disabled Veterans Surf club so they can take veterans with all sort of ailments surfing.  
What We Need & What You Get
We have set a realistic goal of raising 130,000.00 to move our company forward and open the surf Shop by spring  
     We will use the funds if received to rebuild our sign, repair our displays, lighting, paint, and a required changing room. Also, fill our Apparel racks with our branded items 
       Last, my brother and I are honest hard working  guys that spend everyday to see this dream come true, it’s hard for us to ask but we just need a little push. We though that people who have been where we are before might be kind enough to help through purchasing our product.  
what do you get, we will discount our shirts and make surfboards in exchange for your contribution  

What impact will your contribution have? 
Our new building is in the middle of a thriving surf community we help young kids with finiding ways to stay busy and out of trouble. We do internships for the High school to help our local kids in the schools Job program. We teach them business skill and hand skills, also we discuss how important continuing education is. We additionally work internships with the College Intern Program of Florida to help kids understand business prior to entering the work force  

Our reduce, reuse, reclaim program bring in surfboards that people don’t want or don’t need anymore and we rebuild them and donate to causes so that we can do our part to keep these old boards out of landfills and into young peoples hands. 

We also build boards for other business aiding them in product to sale. .

We plan to employ wonderful young adults to work in the Surf Shop and give surfing lessons, this is great for them to have summer jobs, and work and learn from two hard working passionate retired Chief Petty Officers USN who can offer guidance on business and the required work ethics in today’s society. 

What are we up against? 

We are lacking the funds to continue to build out our spaces and to provide our town with an honest quality service. We never thought that  at the end of a good 5 year run while working both at the Navy and shop full time for 3 years that we would be in a position to need a nudge. If we were to receive assistance we would be able to generate more income and pull right out of this and into profit. The other side to this is if we do not reach our goal we will use any funds to keep moving forward and will donate a portion to the Disabled Veterans of America.

The fact that we have been in business for 5 years shows that we are capable and talented business men in our field. We have a large coastal clientele that would love for us to be around to help keep building their futures also. 
With the funds requested we will ensure that equipment is replaced, materials purchased, branded sale items purchased as we’ve seen before these item get returns. We intend to keep leaning forward no matter the outcome. We have strong work ethics, good moral code, and the will to be sure we do not get here again. ( we will start by not moving again) 
our lesson learned. Moving a business is much more than changing building and bringing you stuff to it. It require capital and attention to detail. Now we know. Additionally, we learned a valuable lesson on payment as a posed to consignment. We will get paid on future purchases from Surf Shops.  


Other Ways You Can Help
If you contribute, no worries, we are still extremely grateful and only ask If you know anyone that would be willing to help a couple of young retired veterans trying to stay afloat then we ask you to please pass the word , use the indiegogo share tool !  
Last, I want to say what an amazing tool for people to use no matter their outcome. To be able to ask someone for funds but offer a product in return to help yourself is amazing.  
Thank you from Joe and I your kind support is of significant value to us. Thank you

story:
New ICY BEV KOOLER® - V 2.0

(3 in 1 Bottle Insulator, Can Insulator, and Double Wall Vacuum Sealed Insulated Water Bottle)

At Grand Fusion Housewares, we design products to make life easier. We work with a talented group of product designers and inventors.  We focus on products we are passionate about. And, that includes keeping drinks cold in hot weather. 

There are many water bottles and beverage insulators on the market, but we wanted something that was multi-functional that could be used in a wide variety of situations including the beach, pool, tailgating, camping, hiking, and more....  We wanted something that could really take a beating and hold up to the challenges of someone with an active lifestyle.  We reached out to our customers to get feedback from them on an ideal solution and we also added our own ideas. We then collaborated with Gary Moore to make the product beautiful. The result is the Icy Bev Kooler V 2.0.

HOW IT WORKS:

CAN INSULATOR – The double wall vacuum sealed base will fit most 12 oz. beer and soda cans keeping them ice cold for hours. Use the sizing disc for proper fit on short cans.

BOTTLE INSULATOR – Just add the top cone to the base to protect from drops and spills.  Keep your drinks ice cold at the the beach, pool, lake, golfing, boating, camping, tailgating, and more… Fits most common 12 oz. beer bottle sizes.

INSULATED WATER BOTTLE – You can use the Icy Bev Kooler as an insulated water bottle. Just make sure the base and top cone are firmly attached to the center ring. There are silicone gaskets in the middle and on the cap to prevent leaking.

ADDITIONAL ACCESSORIES - There’s a silicone stopper that nests inside the cap to be used to re-seal your bottle.

And, the cap and the sizing disc both have a built-in bottle opener.

 

THE ICY BEV KOOLER WILL FIT A WIDE VARIETY OF COMMON 12 OZ BOTTLES AND CANS:

 
This product was invented and designed in the USA.
 

US Patent D830,784

story:
Ultralight Merino.tech Organic Merino Wool Long Sleeve T-shirt

At Merino.tech, we create simple products for uncompromising performance in sports and everyday life. Clothing you can wear for any occasion. Gear that you can fit in any bag, and truly travel light for weeks.

Today we're thrilled to present to you our news't product — the Merino.tech Organic Merino Wool Long Sleeve T-Shirt. It's the perfect base layer, that looks amazing, feels great and doesn't smell even when it’s worn for multiple days. Merino.tech 100% Organic Merino Wool T-shirt is designed to be ideal for daily activities. Forget about the rubbing, overheating, or bunching of regular cotton t-shirts!

The design of the t-shirt is clean, simple and timeless - so you can fit right in wherever you go.

You will look sharp when you are burning those calories, or when you are conquering the trails, and on the days when you feel like dressing it up a bit, you can pull that off as well.

Be confident in the gear you wear every day with Merino.tech.

 

 

About Merino.tech

Merino.tech was founded in 2018 in Canada to produce high performance, yet affordable Organic Merino Wool Clothing. Our company is the result of collaboration between our team and some of the finest mills and factories around the globe. Our products are made from the finest 100% pure organic merino wool from New Zealand.

Our passion is traveling around the world. Like most travelers, we always strive to travel with the least amount of clothing possible. That's why we wanted to create an ideal clothing for travel.  Clothing that you can wear in the morning and keep fresh throughout the day. Gear that you can fit in any bag, and truly travel light for weeks.

This is why we created the Merino.tech Organic Merino Wool T-Shirt - the perfect base layer, that looks sharp, feels incredible and doesn't smell even when it’s worn for multiple days. Classy yet versatile - Merino.tech t-shirts allow you to look incredible for any occasion.

 

 

Versatile Merino.tech wool clothing

 

Styles and Colors

 

Merino.tech Organic Merino Wool Socks

Pair your Merino.tech T-Shirt with our socks, and you can ditch that suitcase and truly pack light.

 

Size Chart

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team has 20 years of joint experience manufacturing the highest quality clothing. We already manufactured a test batch of merino wool t-shirts and worked out every detail in the process. Our manufacturers all ready to start and all that is missing is your support. We know what we're doing and you should be confident that we will deliver what we promise when we say we will.


Since our delivery is planned for December it is reasonable to anticipate some seasonal delays with postal services. We will strive to ship out all rewards as soon as possible but we can't guarantee specific delivery dates.
We're always in touch with our customers and do everything to keep them happy with our product and our support. Should any issues come up, you can be confident we will handle them with the utmost care for you, our backers.

story:
ONAK is the best fit for both real thrill seekers and paddling enthusiasts.

We can boa(s)t around about our newest creation and keep on convincing you this is perfect for you, but instead we like to let our ONAK adventurers do the talking.

Discover your state of inner peace on the water

Canoeing with ONAK is fun and relaxing, and even more so when done together. You can either paddle together, or you can steer the canoe from the back while your paddling partner enjoys a carefree experience.  

 

Seek out new travel routes 

We have gathered already more than hundred adventures and travel routes all over the world from our fellow ONAK enthusiasts. All of these can be found on our website. We would love to hear about your ONAK adventures as well.

As seen on

OK, a tiny bit of boasting should be allowed :)  

The launch of ONAK did not go unnoticed. Our canoe has received several awards including a Great Gear Award, an Outdoor Industry Award and a Bizidee Award.   Alos, ONAK has gathered exposure in highly respected media sources such as National Geographic, Business Insider, and Canoeroots Magazine. Moreover the reinvention of ONAK 2.0 was already featured in the renowned Tech & Science magazine New Atlas.

We developed the ONAK 2.0 to make paddling even easier and more accessible than ever before. The countless adventures of our customers provided us with amazing feedback. Now we've implemented all these suggestions in our ONAK 2.0. Let’s take a look at what we improved.


Stronger  

ONAKs are made from an in-house developed Honeycomb - Curv™ Polypropylene composite. After hours of study and development we have created a material that is lighter, stiffer, and stronger than the aluminium used in classic canoes (strength-to-weight). The fold lines are flexible so they can be folded and unfolded for thousands of times.

 

Simplified  

A pulley system has been added to the straps. Not only does this require minimal effort to tighten, but the straps stay permanently connected so you don’t have to figure out which buckle fits where. This system really speeds up the set-up process.

Once on the water, the canoe moves fast thanks to its streamlined design: The stiffness transfers your the energy instead of absorbing it, while still being comfortable with the adjustable wooden seats. 

Assembling the ONAK takes less than 15 minutes and disassembling only takes about 5 minutes.

 

Compact  

ONAK delivers the high quality of a professional canoe, but without any of the usual hassle like storage place and transportation limitations due to size and weight.  

Fold the ONAK and enjoy the many possibilities of transportation: stash it in the trunk of your car, carry it around on foot or with public transport or attach it to a bicycle.

This whole project could never have been possible without the support of our loyal community. Which is why we want to offer a reward for our awesome backers: Every ONAK owner who refers a friend to support this Kickstarter will receive a message and is able to get a little extra.

 

With the help of our loyal community, we gathered all the feedback to further achieve our end goal: to provide everyone with the means to paddle wherever and whenever they want, without having to settle for lesser quality or experience.

We are convinced that the result does the trick, as we managed to improve on many product features of an already remarkable product. ONAK has become even stronger, lighter and easier to set up, without straying away from its initial design.

The ONAK story continues to unfold, but we also need to convince the market. Hence, the main purpose of this Kickstarter. And together, we can make it happen.

Risks and challenges

Bringing out a new boat involves big investments in a lot of areas. This is what we try to cover with this campaign, through which we will be able to greatly reduce any risks involved in the production. Once we hit our goal, we will be able to start production. All boats and accessories will be shipped by April 2019.

Before launching the very first ONAK, we created more than 15 prototypes that were tested in different circumstances over the course of 3 years. Not only did these canoes endure empirical tests, but we also ran countless simulations on individual parts. And we achieved a great success with our first Kickstarter campaign in 2016, with hundreds of backers. 
However, we didn’t stop at the first design. The ONAK 2.0 is the answer to all the customer feedback we received on the original ONAK. As ever before, we will continue to test and improve our design until your ONAK gets delivered. This is made possible by working with more local woodworkers and metal manufacturers aside of the processes we already know and use

We're all ready to go, all we need is your trust. Support ONAK, you won't regret it!

Not only did these canoes endure empirical tests, but we also ran countless simulations on individual parts. And we achieved a great success with our first Kickstarter campaign in 2016, with hundreds of backers. However, we didn’t stop at the first design. The ONAK 2.0 is the answer to all the customer feedback we received on the original ONAK. As ever before, we will continue to test and improve our design until your ONAK gets delivered. This is made possible by working with more local woodworkers and metal manufacturers aside of the processes we already know and useWe're all ready to go, all we need is your trust. Support ONAK, you won't regret it!

story:
The BOWRANGER is the world’s first commercially available electronic bow sight with integrated rangefinder. The power of the BOWRANGER lies in the speed and accuracy with which a perfect shot can be achieved.

It takes care of all human factors and removes all the guesswork

  • no distance guessing
  • no interpolation errors between pins
  • no missed opportunities due to time consuming ranging and guessing  
  • no more wounded animals (more ethical hunting)

Just RANGE-AIM-SHOOT because the BOWRANGER does all the work for you!


How does the BOWRANGER supports ethical hunting?

No Guessing:  Precision arrow placement. The BOWRANGER measures the distance and angle to the target and calculates the correct pin setting for the selected arrow. The correct pin is then highlighted (LED marker) ensuring precision arrow placement.

Speed:  Ranging, calculating and setting the correct LED marker takes less than 0.2s. Thus the full cycle of targeting, ranging, aiming and shooting can be achieved in the shortest time possible when the shot is clean. 

Stealth:  No additional body movement as with the use of a hand-held rangefinder.


How does the BOWRANGER work?


Range Finder:  The specially developed small and light weight integrated range finder has a single measurement function and also a continuous scan function which will allow the user to scan distances every second without pressing any button. In scan mode the correct LED marker will also be continuously updated.  

Arrows and Pins:  Up to 10 arrows with up to 10 pins per arrow can be calibrated and stored for up to 5 users.

  • not limited to a small number of pins. More pins equals higher accuracy
  • not restricted to one arrow type when hunting
  • seamless switching between users and arrow types
  • backup and share calibration via USB.
Pins:  Actual flight path parameters are established from the calibrated pins. The perfect pin for the perfect shot is calculated based on these parameters. This completely eliminates the user guessing between pins under stressful conditions. The BOWRANGER  is equipped with 64 pins, more than a pin for every meter under ethical hunting conditions. 

Angle shots: The pin position is compensated for inclined and declined shots.

OLED Screen: The clear OLED Screen provides feedback to the user. The feedback includes:

  • target distance so the user can determine if the correct target was ranged
  • angle of shot
  • rotation angle of bow for increased accuracy
  • battery status
  • temperature
  • warning messages to enhance ethical hunting.
Ambient light sensor:  OLED screen and pin indicator brightness is continuously updated according to ambient light intensity to avoid glare.

Battery: The BOWRANGER is equipped with a lithium polymer battery compatible with 5V micro USB cell phone chargers. It provides 16 hours of continuous use from a 2 hour charge cycle. (This is adequate for many weeks of active hunting.) An auto power off battery saving function is standard.


How to use the BOWRANGER while hunting?

Aim to Range:  When aiming at a target you simply aim through the peep sight on the target and get the center green LED marker on target. A manual sight is also provided.

Range: When the green LED marker is on target press the range button and the desired red LED marker for that distance will be illuminated and the distance displayed on the OLED screen.

Aim to Shoot: Aim at the target with the illuminated red marker.

Shoot: When the illuminated  red LED marker is on target just release the arrow.


How do I mount the BOWRANGER on my bow?

Mounting:  Mounting your BOWRANGER to your bow is similar to mounting a conventional sight. The only difference is that the BOWRANGER has a three axis mount that allows the rangefinder to be aligned.

Range Button: The BOWRANGER is equipped with an extended ranging button that is mounted to the bow's grip, allowing ranging with the bow in a fully drawn position.

We need your support!

Shop, Tools and QC: We have a finished and field-tested product, and we need your help to set up a cost effective manufacturing facility for your benefit. We will use your contributions to bring this innovative product affordably to the market.

We offer: This is a first-in-the-world product of its kind at an extremely low price range and we offer you the opportunity to participate in this exciting and rewarding project as outlined in the perks.

For more information

We were at the ATA show in Indianapolis in January 2015. Please check it out at http://www.precisionarrowplacement.com/ata-show-2015.html

Also visit out our website at www.precisionarrowplacement.com

Other ways you can help

Tell all your friends, club together for a discount package, or just like our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/pages/Rangefinding-Bow-Sight/470053433170954?fref=ts


Timeline

What are the specifications of the BOWRANGER bow sight?

BOWRANGER Bow Sight Specs:
Battery:  750 mAh Lithium Polymer Battery

Charging :  5V DC
Input:  USB power supply for charging
Weight:  9.77 oz.(280g) with mounting bracket
Length:  6.1 in (15.5cm)


African Hunting Experience Details

6 Night Hunting experience

  • Shuttle to and from Port Elizabeth airport, South Africa, to the hunting lodge
  • 6 Nights in a 4 star bow hunting lodge in the Eastern Cape Province in South Africa
  • Full board & lodging plus all drinks included
  • Personal hunting guide
  • 3 X Hunts with BOWRANGER Bow Hunting sight
  • 3 Differed trophy game species. (Cape Kudu, Impala, Blesbuck or Warthog)
  • Receive 1 X BOWRANGER bow hunting sight with Wildebees Camo CAP and Shirt signed by design team
  • Meeting with design team of the BOWRANGER bow hunting sight at the lodge and have your personal input in the development of the next level BOWRANGER and be part of the development team

FLIGHTS AND TAXIDERMY COST NOT INCLUDED IN THIS PACKAGE.

8 Night Hunting experience

  • Shuttle to and from Port Elizabeth airport, South Africa, to the hunting lodge
  • 8 Nights in a 4 star bow hunting lodge in the Eastern Cape Province in South Africa
  • Full board & lodging plus all drinks included
  • Personal hunting guide
  • 6 X Hunts with the BOWRANGER Bow Hunting sight
  • 6 Differed trophy game species. (Mountain Reedbuck, Cape Bushbuck, Impala, Blesbuck, Springbuck, Duiker)
  • Filmed interviews during and after hunts for promotional material of the BOWRANGER  Bow Hunting Sight.

  • Receive 1 X BOWRANGER bow hunting sight with Wildebees Camo CAP and Shirt signed by design team.

  • Meeting with design team of the BOWRANGER bow hunting sight at the lodge and have your personal input in the development of the next level BOWRANGER and be part of the development team

FLIGHTS AND TAXIDERMY COST NOT INCLUDED IN THIS PACKAGE.

11 Night Hunting experience

  • Economic flight tickets to and from South Africa (O.R. Tambo Airport and P.E. Airport, South Africa) from anywhere in the world
  • Shuttle to and from P.E Airport to the hunting lodge
  • 11 Nights in a 4 star bow hunting lodge in the Eastern Cape Province in South Africa
  • Full board & lodging plus all drinks included
  • Personal hunting guide
  • 8 X Hunts with the BOWRANGER bow hunting sight
  • 8 Differed trophy game species. (Cape Kude, Gemsbuck, Wildebeest, Cape Bushbuck, Impala, Blesbuck, Springbuck, Duiker)
  • Taxidermist fee fully included for 3 full mounts
  • Transport of your trophies to anywhere in the world including permits.
  • Filmed interviews during and after hunts for promotional material of the BOWRANGER  bow hunting sight
  • Recieve 1X BOWRANGER bow hunting sight with Wildebees Camo cap and T shirty signed by design team
  • Meeting with design team of the BOWRANGER bow hunting sight at the lodge and have your personal input in the development of the next level BOWRANGER and be part of the development team


Meet the People behind BOWRANGER  bow hunting sight.

                                                   Danie Kriek

                                         

Danie has over 40 years experience in weapons development and manufacturing industry, specializing in sighting systems. He is also the grandfather of 11 grandchildren and still know all of their names!

                                                    Renier Kriek

                                        

Renier Kriek has been working with the company for more than 11 years. He has been involved in the successful development of various products such as military sights for assault rifles and also 40mm grenade launchers. He is passionate about outdoor life and is a family man.


                                                        Frik Venter

                                   
                                 

Frik, our electronic engineer,  has been working with the company since 2003 and has been mainly responsible for electronic hardware design. Frik has more than 23 years experience in design, development and manufacturing of electronics and pc boards. Frik was also in charge of the electronics team that developed the Lotus Elize sports car dash board controls. Literally 7 feet and 320 pounds he is without a doubt our biggest partner.

                                                      David Neck

                                  


David and Jimmy have been friends for a very long time. David met Danie met for the first time in 1999 while on a hunting safari with Jimmy and some friends in South Africa. In 2005  the dream of the BOWRANGER was born.  David had the idea for a sight that could be used on a bow with a built in rangefinder and suggested that the South Africans develop a bow hunting sight that had the properties and technology of the military versions.  David was the owner of a bow shop and is passionate about bow hunting and like Jimmy, also enjoys teaching the youth about the outdoors.

                                                      Jimmy Whatley

                                       

Jimmy and Danie have been friends and business associates for many years. Jimmy lives in Valdosta Georgia and is passionate about hunting. Jimmy devotes a lot of his time to teaching children all over the US about turkey hunting. He is also an ambassador for ethical hunting in the USA. 

                                                                   Jaco Venter

                                        

Jaco is working on a contract basis for the company. He is part of the software team and is mainly responsible for the control algorithms. Jaco has worked on other sighting system projects with the company.


Wildebees camo

Wildebees camo was developed by Nico Louw for the African bush veld.  This camo is manufactured from the highest quality material and will withstand all that the African weather and bush can offer. 

Because the African bush veld has its own vibrant colors and textures it also requires a type of camo that will lens to its lush and beautiful bush. Wildebees is the perfect camo for this type of scenario.

In a Nutshell!

We are extremely excited to launch our very first crowd funding campaign and equally excited to get BOWRANGER  into your hands. 

The challenges of a new first production run lay ahead of us, but we have been through many of them successfully. Our extensive experience in the manufacturing of Military sights serves us as a firm foundation for this project.

We are committed to an honest and transparent campaign and will keep our backers informed and up to date on our journey together.

Thank your for helping us to make this dream come alive.
story_txt:
The BOWRANGER is the world’s first commercially available electronic bow 

sight with integrated rangefinder. The power of the BOWRANGER lies in the speed and accuracy with which a perfect shot can be achieved.It takes care of all human factors and removes all the guesswork


no distance guessing


no interpolation errors between pins


no missed opportunities due to time consuming
ranging and guessing  


no more wounded animals (more ethical hunting)


Just RANGE-AIM-SHOOT because the BOWRANGER does all the work for you!

How does the BOWRANGER supports ethical hunting?

No Guessing:  Precision arrow placement. The BOWRANGER measures the distance and angle to the target and calculates the correct pin setting for the selected arrow. The correct pin is then highlighted (LED marker) ensuring precision arrow placement.
Speed:  Ranging, calculating and setting the correct LED marker takes less than 0.2s. Thus the full cycle of targeting, ranging, aiming and shooting can be achieved in the shortest time possible when the shot is clean. 
Stealth:  No additional body movement as with the use of a hand-held rangefinder.

How does the BOWRANGER work?


Range Finder:  The specially developed small and light weight integrated range finder has a single measurement function and also a continuous scan function which will allow the user to scan distances every second without pressing any button. In scan mode the correct LED marker will also be continuously 

updated.  
Arrows and Pins:  Up to 10 arrows with up to 10 pins per arrow can be calibrated and stored for up to 5 users.


not limited to a small number of pins. More pins equals higher accuracy


not restricted to one arrow type when hunting


seamless switching between users and arrow types


backup and share calibration via USB.

Pins:  Actual flight path parameters are established from
the calibrated pins. The perfect pin for the perfect shot is calculated based on these parameters. This completely eliminates the user guessing between
pins under stressful conditions. The BOWRANGER  is equipped with 64 pins, more than a 

pin for every meter under ethical
hunting conditions. 

Angle shots: The pin position is compensated for inclined and declined shots.



OLED Screen: The clear OLED Screen provides feedback to the user. The feedback includes:







target distance so the user can determine if the
correct target was ranged


angle of shot


rotation angle of bow for increased accuracy


battery status


temperature


warning messages to enhance ethical hunting.


Ambient light sensor:  OLED screen and pin indicator brightness is continuously updated according to ambient light intensity to avoid glare.



Battery: The BOWRANGER is equipped with a lithium polymer battery compatible with 5V micro USB cell phone chargers. It provides 16 hours of continuous use from a 2 hour charge cycle. (This is adequate for many weeks of active hunting.) An auto power off battery saving function is standard.




How to use the BOWRANGER while hunting?




Aim to Range:  When aiming at a target you simply aim through the peep sight on the target and get the center green LED marker on target. A manual sight is also provided.



Range: When the green LED marker is on target press the range button and the desired red LED marker for that distance will be illuminated and the distance displayed on 

the OLED screen.




Aim to Shoot: Aim at the target with the illuminated red marker.



Shoot: When the illuminated  red LED marker is on target just release the arrow.



How do I mount the BOWRANGER on my bow?




Mounting:  Mounting your BOWRANGER to your bow is similar to mounting a conventional sight. The only difference is that the BOWRANGER has a three axis mount that allows the rangefinder to be aligned.




Range Button: The BOWRANGER is equipped with an extended ranging button that is mounted to the bow's grip, allowing ranging with the bow in a fully drawn position.




We need your support!




Shop, Tools and QC: We have a finished and field-tested product, and we need your help to set up a cost effective manufacturing facility for your benefit. We will use your contributions to bring this innovative product affordably to the market.



We offer: This is a
first-in-the-world product of its kind at an extremely low price range
and we offer you the opportunity to participate in this exciting and
rewarding project as outlined in the perks.



For more information
We were at the ATA show in Indianapolis in January 2015. Please check it out at http://www.precisionarrowplacement.com/ata-show-2015.html
Also visit out our website at www.precisionarrowplacement.com
Other ways you can help
Tell all your friends, club together for a discount package,
or just like our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/pages/Rangefinding-Bow-Sight/470053433170954?fref=ts


Timeline




What are the specifications of the BOWRANGER bow sight?




BOWRANGER Bow Sight Specs:

Battery:  750 mAh Lithium Polymer BatteryCharging :  5V DCInput:  USB power supply for chargingWeight:  9.77 oz.(280g) with mounting bracketLength:  6.1 in (15.5cm)

the hunting lodge

Eastern Cape Province in South Africa


Full board & lodging plus all drinks included


Personal hunting guide

Impala, Blesbuck or Warthog)

Taxidermist fee fully included for 3 full mounts


Transport of your trophies to anywhere in the
world including permits.

story:
Sharing our project is also huge help for us. Thank you that you care. 

For many creative people, pen is the most powerful tool ever created. It is the tool, from which the concepts of the most successful business on the planet come. We can also include there design concepts and countless groundbreaking ideas, which would otherwise stay merely thoughts without paper and pen. These ideas could have been conveyed only because of the discipline and diligence of its authors.

   

With this modular pen, you can now save your ideas, create new projects, and put down any notes more effectively every day. Or you can simply play with the magnets just for fun. There are 729 possibilities how to design this modular pen. Because you know what suit’s you the best.    

       

       „Design is not just what it looks like. Design is how it works.“Steve Jobs 

    

TIP: INFINITY Pen is great for students and people who would like to learn or get better at something because the more we visualize things on paper, the easier it is for our brain to absorb and learn new things. 

TIP: Especially creative people can put a better and easier visualization to a good use in order to keep track of their whole concept and thoughts while making something new.

Featured on:

Pen itself is made from high quality materials as aluminium and neodymium magnets. There are 9 high quality refills you can put inside Infinity Pen.

You do not have to worry about the technical quality of our refills. Our chosen manufacturer has been on the market since 1940. We have just given them a new shape and utilization. Despite their size, they last up to 50% time of a usual pen. They stick firmly inside the pen and you can therefore write with an incredible precision.

Available refills are:

Technical info:

  • A tip of the blue pen’s filling is technically similar to Pilot Hi-Tec-C pen’s
  • All markers have 0.5mm tips
  • A tip of a highlighter is triangle-shaped leaving a trace 1 to 4mm wide
  • Our fillings are basically the same as the ones usually obtainable but they have a slightly changed shape so they can fit inside the Infinity Pen

All these options will allow you to adjust the pen according to your personality because you know exactly what is the most suitable for you. If you find out that you need something new then you easily put the old fillings out and put the new ones in. You can have an entirely new tool then.

            

As the authors of Infinity Pen, we personally prefer using a combo pen/red thin marker/green thin marker combination.

TIP: You can add more fillings in the rewards. They may come handy when you run out of them.

You design! We provide!

      „INFINITY PEN , infinity possibilities! Hmm… actually.. it’s 729 possibilities“

Availability of fillings:

After the end of the campaign, we will be able to guarantee the availability of all fillings on our e-shop with a possibility to ship anywhere in the world. It will be in stock in America as well as in Europe. We hope that some penguins also join the campaign so that we could open a store in Antarctica. We are already trying to get the pen inside established local shops of other traders. 

         

                „The deepest creativity bleeds from the pen of inspiration"                                 

We do hope that we will manage to accomplish everything together. After the end of this campaign, the pens as well as fillings can be available even in your city.

          

What is hidden under the second cap? 

                           Ohh yeah! It's stylus. Because everybody need's one. 

A stylus will automatically become a part of every pen for free.

  • A width of the stylus is 5 mm 
  • It can be used on all contact surfaces, smartphones, and tablets. (iPhone / iPad / Samsung devices / HTC devices / Nokia / Sony / LG / ... and many other) 


Your pen is a powerful tool, which accompanies you throughout your whole day and therefore we think that it absolutely necessary to use materials of good quality. 

We would like to make Infinity Pen something far more than a usual pen. Good design, minimalistic, elegant. Some products simply do not deserve the plastic material. The body is made from aluminium and the pen parts stick together using neodymium magnets sometimes referred to as ‘rare earth’.

Aluminium:                                                                   „rare earth“ neodymium magnet:

We wanted to create premium tool, so we had to use premium materials and premium parts.

Aluminium:

  • Aluminium is theoretically 100% recyclable without any loss of its natural qualities. 
  • We have used aluminium because it is lighter than titanium and it preserves its hardness and resistance as well. The pen is therefore very resistant and it can last very long. It is also not unduly heavy.

‘Rare earth’ neodymium magnet:

  • Also known as NdFeB, NIB or Neo magnet.
  • Developed in 1982 by General Motors and Sumitoto Special Metals.
  • Neodymium magnets are the strongest type of permanent magnet commercially available.
  • The pen can be used more comfortably because of these magnets, which save your time you would otherwise spend on screwing the parts together.

We are more than pleased to introduce you the most elegant and ingenious pedestal for a pen in the world.        

   

         „Simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication.“  Leonardo Da Vinci

Our first goal was to create an effective tool for creative people. It was not until then when we realized what the neodymium magnets have to offer. 

They are absolutely brilliant!

Anyone, who comes to your office / room / kitchen or anywhere where your pen is, will stand astonished by its clear and minimalistic design.

         

The pen beautifully levitates above the box and its one side is leaned on a transparent glass ‘crystal glass’. The pedestal also serves as a beautiful box in which the pen will get to you. 

      

The box/pedestal can be considered as the so-called icing on the cake and it clearly demonstrates that practical things can also be elegant.

The box is made from high quality oak wood and cork.

           

TIP: Levitation box is a very convenient, elegant, and unusual asset for your office or desk.

100% of money will be used on the first production run. In addition, it will also be used on keeping the sufficient amount of fillings in store for the future refilling. Our goal is little bit more ambitious than selling some because the pen consists of more parts and each requires a special attention during the preparation of manufacturing. None of the existing forms can be used for creation our parts. There is therefore no risk of neglecting a certain part of the pen and all the parts will be of the highest quality.

We hope that together we will be able to finish this amazing product.

We thank everyone who has decided to support our project. To show good faith, we would like to offer you our product for cheaper price before the others can buy it.

Special offer for students: 

We have prepared an extended version for the price of the standard one for the secondary school and university students.

--> You can simply choose Infinity Pen standard --> send us a picture of your student’s ID on student@infinitypens.com --> we will then send you the Infinity Pen extended =)

TIP: You can choose any colours, types of filling, pens, and boxes in a survey, which we will send you to your email at the end of this fundraising campaign.

Special offer for supporters from Canada: 
 We have a special present for all supporters from Canada. You will get one extra magical mini neodymium magnet with every purchased Infinity Pen.

Worldwide shippping included in every perk!

TIP: Infinity Pen will get to you before Christmas. It can become a very unusual and useful Christmas present.

Stay connected for newest updates:

Follow our Facebook or Twitter for newest updates.

How to Create Your Indiegogo Profile

How To Set Up Your PayPal Account

How to Claim a Perk

How to Upgrade Your Perk

How to choose Infinity Pen colour, levitation box colour, type, colour, and number of refills?

After the fundraising campaign, you will be sent a survey where you will be able to choose the pen’s colour, levitation box colour, type, colour and number of refills.

How To Make Fresh Orange Juice



The preparation of the product and everything connected with it took us almost a year. During this long period, we managed to solve everything in advance. Everything is ready and settled. Manufacturers are the best in their field and we have also services of great technicians and designers.

The main risk, which might occur, is a delay in the manufacturing process due to unexpected issues. However, we will be receiving frequent updates after the fundraising campaign so you will stay informed.

Another possible risk must be mentioned. It is the fact that after finishing the package, we will no longer have full control over the exact time the package gets to you. It might be slower or faster in some states. The unexpected checks at the customs might also cause some problems. We have already some tips on reliable delivery services but we are also open to your suggestions.

The most formidable challenge is to expand the availability of fillings and pens in local stores as much as possible. Furthermore, it is also the development of new types of filling, with which we will broaden the usage of Infinity Pen.

The last but not least, we would like to thank everyone who has decided to join us. We have spent tremendous amount of time and effort on fruition of this project. The result has far exceeded our initial expectations. We cannot wait till the product hits the market.

Can the magnets damage my cell phone or credit card?

The magnets in the pen have no effect on cell phones, tablets or modern laptops whatsoever. The magnets in the Infinity Pen have no such power to damage any modern electronic device. The same applies to credit cards.

We do not recommend putting precious metal things, such as watch, on Levitation Box. There are stronger magnets than the ones in the pen, which could damage delicate metal parts inside. Levitation Box is meant only for Infinity Pen.

Can other fillings be used to refill Infinity Pen?

The only usable fillings are the ones meant for Infinity Pen. After the end of the fundraising campaign, we guarantee the availability of all types of fillings on our e-shop worldwide. One of our primary objectives after the fundraising campaign is to ensure the availability of fillings in local stores of our partners. We are willing to cooperate with other manufacturers of pens and fillings.

How much does the whole pen weigh?

Infinity Pen standard with fillings weighs 25 grams or 0.882 ounces

Infinity Pen extension with fillings weighs 35 grams or 1.235 ounces

Why do you want to check my student ID?

Scanned or photographed student ID is only to verify that you still study. All the personal details will not made public anywhere and we will erase all the data after rewards have been sent.

Why do the supporters from Canada get an extra magical mini magnet?


http://www.cnet.com/news/polar-magnet-pen-suffers-health-and-safety-setbacks/  (little joke for Polar Pen fans =) )

We are more than pleased to introduce you the most elegant and ingenious pedestal
for a pen in the world.        
   
         „Simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication.“  Leonardo Da Vinci

Our first goal was to create an effective tool for creative people. It was not until then when we realized what the neodymium magnets have to offer. 
They are absolutely brilliant!
Anyone, who comes to your office / room / kitchen or anywhere where your pen is, will stand astonished by its clear and minimalistic design.

         
The pen
beautifully levitates above the box and its one side is leaned on a transparent
glass ‘crystal glass’. The pedestal also serves as a beautiful box in which the
pen will get to you. 
      

The box/pedestal
can be considered as the so-called icing on the cake and it clearly
demonstrates that practical things can
also be elegant.




The box is made from high quality oak wood and cork.
           


TIP: Levitation box is a very convenient, elegant, and
unusual asset for your office or desk.




100% of money will be used on the first production
run. In addition, it will also be used on keeping the sufficient amount of
fillings in store for the future refilling. Our goal is little bit more
ambitious than selling some because the pen consists of more parts and each
requires a special attention during the preparation of manufacturing. None of
the existing forms can be used for creation our parts. There is therefore no
risk of neglecting a certain part of the pen and all the parts will be of the
highest quality.
We hope that together we will be able to finish this amazing product.



We thank everyone who has decided to support our project. To show good
faith, we would like to offer you our product for cheaper price before the
others can buy it.
Special offer for students: 

We have prepared an extended version for the price of the standard one for
the secondary school and university students.

--> You can simply choose Infinity Pen standard --> send us a picture
of your student’s ID on student@infinitypens.com --> we will then send you
the Infinity Pen extended =)

TIP: You can choose any colours, types of filling, pens, and boxes in a
survey, which we will send you to your email at the end of this fundraising
campaign.







Special offer for supporters from Canada:  We have a special present for all supporters from Canada. You will get one extra magical mini neodymium magnet with every purchased Infinity Pen.


Worldwide shippping included in every perk!





TIP: Infinity Pen will get to you before Christmas. It
can become a very unusual and useful Christmas present.
Stay connected for newest updates:

Follow our Facebook or Twitter for newest updates.


How to Create Your Indiegogo Profile
How To Set Up Your PayPal Account
How to Claim a Perk
How to Upgrade Your Perk

How to choose Infinity Pen colour, levitation box colour, type, colour, and
number of refills?

After the fundraising campaign, you will be sent a survey where you will be
able to choose the pen’s colour, levitation box colour, type, colour and number
of refills.
How To Make Fresh Orange Juice



The preparation of the product and everything connected with it took us
almost a year. During this long period, we managed to solve everything in
advance. Everything is ready and settled. Manufacturers are the best in their
field and we have also services of great technicians and designers.

The main risk, which might occur, is a delay in the manufacturing process
due to unexpected issues. However, we will be receiving frequent updates after
the fundraising campaign so you will stay informed.

Another possible risk must be mentioned. It is the fact that after finishing
the package, we will no longer have full control over the exact time the
package gets to you. It might be slower or faster in some states. The
unexpected checks at the customs might also cause some problems. We have
already some tips on reliable delivery services but we are also open to your
suggestions.

The most formidable challenge is to expand the availability of fillings and
pens in local stores as much as possible. Furthermore, it is also the development
of new types of filling, with which we will broaden the usage of Infinity Pen.

The last but not least, we would like to thank
everyone who has decided to join us. We have spent tremendous amount of time and
effort on fruition of this project. The result has far exceeded our initial
expectations. We cannot wait till the product hits the market.



Can the magnets
damage my cell phone or credit card?


The magnets in
the pen have no effect on cell phones, tablets or modern laptops whatsoever. The
magnets in the Infinity Pen have no such power to damage any modern electronic
device. The same applies to credit cards.
We do not
recommend putting precious metal things, such as watch, on Levitation Box. There are stronger magnets than the ones in the pen,
which could damage delicate metal parts inside. Levitation Box is meant only
for Infinity Pen.


Can other fillings be used to refill Infinity Pen?
The only usable fillings
are the ones meant for Infinity Pen. After the end of the fundraising campaign,
we guarantee the availability of all types of fillings on our e-shop worldwide.
One of our primary objectives after the fundraising campaign is to ensure the
availability of fillings in local stores of our partners. We are willing to
cooperate with other manufacturers of pens and fillings.


How much does
the whole pen weigh?
Infinity Pen standard with fillings weighs 25 grams or 0.882 ounces
Infinity Pen extension with fillings weighs 35 grams or 1.235 ounces
Why do you want
to check my student ID?
Scanned or photographed student ID is only to verify that you still
study. All the personal details will not made public anywhere and we will erase
all the data after rewards have been sent.

Why do the
supporters from Canada get an extra magical mini magnet?



http://www.cnet.com/news/polar-magnet-pen-suffers-health-and-safety-setbacks/  (little joke for Polar Pen fans =) )

story:
FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING


                             for men                                               and women                                 


17 features for everything



SUPREME QUALITY FABRIC:

We have identified and secured the best quality fabric manufacturers 


EXCHANGE POLICY:

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jackets for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Also, all items must be in the condition you received them with all hangtags still attached.

17 features for everything












SUPREME QUALITY FABRIC:
We have identified and secured the best quality fabric manufacturers 
EXCHANGE POLICY:
If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jackets for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Also, all items must be in the condition you received them with all hangtags still attached.

story:
Q-Ring by Addin Creative CO., Ltd.

Addin Creative CO., Ltd. is formed by a group of passionative senior industrial designers who are expertise in electronic products, living goods, and transportation design. We want to bring the world better living experience from our creative design and develop experience.

Q-Ring is our first fund-raising case. We have prepared the project for six months, from the ideas to the complete design. We believe we have gave previous luggage scale a new identity. Q-Ring makes your travel more convenient.

$45,000 USD is our target, mainly for mass production. Customers who purchase at this stage will get a discounted price (including shipping), the retail  price afterwards is $60. If this fund raising case reach our target, we will start shipping in March 2017. If this fund raising case does not meet our target, all funds will be returned to fund raisers.

 

 

Unlock Q-Ring and open it.

 

Pass through the baggage handle and line up the central position.

 

Close Q-Ring and press the POWER button,

 

Lift baggage with Q-Ring for few seconds, put down when display results.

 ​

 

 

Unlock Q-Ring and open it.

 

Use Q-Ring to hang shopping bags.

 

Close Q-Ring, it will automatically lock.

​

We have prepared the project for six months, from the ideas to the complete design. We believe we have gave previous luggage scale a new identity. Q-Ring makes your travel more convenient.$45,000 USD is our target, mainly for mass production. Customers who purchase at this stage will get a discounted price (including shipping), the retail  price afterwards is $60. If this fund raising case reach our target, we will start shipping in March 2017. If this fund raising case does not meet our target, all funds will be returned to fund raisers.  Unlock Q-Ring and open it. Pass through the baggage handle and line up the central position. Close Q-Ring and press the POWER button, Lift baggage with Q-Ring for few seconds, put down when display results.
 ​  Unlock Q-Ring and open it. Use Q-Ring to hang shopping bags. Close Q-Ring, it will automatically lock.​

story:
The next level of Sports Utility Transportation

It all started on one of our many surf trips to Hourtin Plage by the Atlantic Coast. Tired of carrying our surf boards and gear to the beach we built our own surfboard trailer using a windsurf bow, old bike wheels and a tarpaulin. After receiving many envious looks and positive feedback we just had to take our idea further.

Back home we developed the first reacha prototype in cooperation with a bunch of creative minds.
Our friends at auswall in Tegernsee made it possible to take our prototype to the next level. With extensive experience in ergonomics, design and technology we could not wish for better partners in crime.

Being the sports lovers that we are, our mission is to take the drag out of sports utility transportation. It would be amazing to see our baby go into serial production, so a huge thank you to everyone who wants to support us during this journey! 

about reacha

the features

The reacha consists of an extremely stable frame, trunk (I don’t think this is the right word, but I don’t know what to use instead) and adjustable bike wheels. The aluminium frame is produced in Bavaria. You can customize reacha with wheels from 20 to 28 inches. This makes it suitable for all kinds of sports and terrains. It allows you to transport any kind of equipment like several surf boards, stand up paddle boards, canoes and kitesurf equipment. Optional fat bike wheels help your reacha become even more stable.

The maximum load capacity for reacha is 45 kg when attached to a bike and 60 kg when used as a hand trailer.

 

accessory

our reacha accessory will upgrade your reacha and adjust it to your needs even better. From our reacha bike connector to our expansion options - we've really thought it through!

bike connector

Our optional reacha bike connector makes it possible to pull the trailer with a bike. You can attach reacha to any bike in less than a second. No annoying tucking-the-board-under-your-arm while riding your bike! With the bike connector and our 22" - 26" reacha wheel options you're ready to roll. 

You won't need an additional adapter, the bike connector is material-friendly and compatible with any bike.

 

 

bow

the bow makes sure that your equipment always stays safe! If you want to transport several surf or SUP boards - or your little kids that do not feel like walking all the way to the beach anymore - the reacha bow is the stabilizer in our reacha family.
(We will activate this perk later during the campaign.)

XL kit

The XL kit allows you to widen the reacha for bigger adventures: How about just bringing your canoe or kayak right to where you want to start your journey on the water? Or just load your reacha with up to six surf boards.

With the XL kit you get 1 meter of reacha loading area - in case you were planning on opening a surf school - this is the right accessory for your plan! 
(We will activate this perk later during the campaign.)

DIY version

For the all the creative minds out there, how about designing your own reacha?

Our DIY version allows you to re-use your beloved old bike wheels and build your own trunk. This makes your reacha unique and affordable! Just order the DIY perk, download the instructions from our website and watch our video tutorial (coming soon). Here is a little time laps video:

Share your DIY reacha using the hashtag #myreacha on facebook or instagram. If you impress us, you could win an awesome prize!

 

about the campaign

the perks

We have 5 different reacha sets, one for each purpose, as well as 3 accessories. See the perk descriptions for detailed info.

 

the timeline

After successfully completing our campaign we will start producing after a final quality check. 

 

 

recently featured in

 

with a little help from

 

supported by

FAQ

What is INDIEGOGO and what is "crowdfunding"?
Crowdfunding means that a bunch of people who believe in a team and their product give money to them in advance to the production of the product. This helps the team to surpass financial squeezes or can give them a start-up financing. Reacha is running a fixed-goal campaign. This means if we don't reach our goal of 35.000 € you get a 100% refund of your money.

Why can I only pay with credit card?
INDIEGOGO is a company out of the USA where credit card payment is far more common than in Europe. Although refunds on credit cards in case of a failed campaign are easier than via bank transfer. We still chose INDIEGOGO because it gives us the best technical solutions to set up the campaign. Sadly they just decided to discontinue PayPal as a payment method.
We really hope that you still go the extra mile and support us via credit card payement. Thank you!

Shipping outside of EU
Currently we do not ship our products outside of EU countries. This might change after the successful completion of our crowdfunding campaign and the eventual facilitation of international distribution channels . If you have any questions regarding shipping conditions please contact us: hello@reacha.de

Haven't found an answer to your question? Don't hesitate to contact us: hello@reacha.de

other ways to support us

It would be amazing to see this project take off! A million thanks to everyone who wants to support us by sharing our story, our INDIEGOGO campaign and following us on facebook.

risks and challenges

So far we have ten reacha prototypes.  We need your support to get reasonable pricing for the project to scale up the production from the get go. We are still learning and will do our very best to keep the proposed deadlines while not compromising on providing the highest possible quality. 
We have completed some of the supplier deals, on some we are still working. The final product may differ slightly from the picture.

The bigger your support on INDIEGOGO the faster we can test and release new features and improve our serial production. We are grateful for every single one of you supporting our project!

Your

reacha team

team good goods tegernsee

team auswall - our partners in crime

 

 

 

See you out there!

story:
WORK & JOURNEY is all you need!

You may ask us why? Well the answer is below.

The idea of our mobile application occured once we were through our own journey. We were run out of our money and we were about to earn some extra cash to finish our trip. We found out that looking for a small jobs around the world is a bit difficult challenge. Walking from house to house takes too much time when you have your trip planned. Also we found out that there is no such application on the market. This inspired us to introduce mobile application like this.

Have you ever thought about travelling without any barriers, not worrying about money, or maybe you just want to make extra money doing some small jobs in the neighbourhood? With our application you will have a chance for both. You will see job offers in your neighbourhood on a map. It is your decision to choose which of them you want to do and which are not interesting. You take the job that interests you, do the job and earn money that you need and then you will continue your journey. Backpacking has never been so easy as it is using our mobile application. Plan your dream trip and don’t worry about the money you will need. Pick cities and countries you want to visit and then... go for the trip of your life. During the next stops of your travel use our application to find interesting offers, accept them and the money will be transferred to your account. Thanks to our application thousands of people will combine travelling with making money, while others can simply earn extra pocket money.

On the other hand, if you have money to spend while you do not have time to waste, well this mobile application is for you as well. Put the job you want to offer on our application and don't waste your time. Someone will do the job for a little fee, you will have a free afternoon. This is how the offers come to our mobile application. 

With our mobile application everyone gets their benefits. Some people can get extra pocket money, some can get money for their dream journey and others get free time to spend on doing things they like!

Investing in us, you are investing in your future journeys!

WORK & JOURNEY is all you need!

 

 

Potential risk

We cannot do this application without your help. To be honest the only thing that stops us now is the money that we need to run the application. 

This is hard to success as a unit. The success as a team is easy. We need your support to make this success comes true.

The great risk is that starting the mobile application without its first users may ruin the project, with you the risk is reduced to minimum
